pa gnyis/ /gru mo bsgyur na thig gis mnan/ /bgegs bskrad phyir na 'bru tshugs blta/ /rtse gcig rdo rje stabs su gcad/ /rkang pa g.yas g.yon res kyis
bskor/ /lho byang g.yon te shar nub g.yas/ /brkyang zhing drag tu brdab par bya/ /rgyab nas drang dang tho ba dang / /rdo rje dang ni zhags pa'i rgya/ /phyogs bzhir bya ste
'khor lo'i stabs/ /phyag rgya dang ni stangs stabs kyis/ /phyogs skyong rnams kyang skrag byed na/ /'byung po'i tshogs 'joms smos ci dgos/ /thams cad dbang
du sdud par byed/ /de nas phyogs bcu bcing ba yis/ /rkang stabs khyad par bshad par bya/ /shar du rkang pa mnyam pa yis/ /rdo rje thal mo gyen du brdeg /lhor ni rkang rting
sprad de gdang / /hUM sgrog thal mo mdun rgyab sbyar/ /nub tu rkang sprad lag pa gnyis/ /so sor sdigs mdzub gyen du brkyang / /byang du ral gri'i phyag rgya dang / /rkang pa ya
gcig sa la bsgreng / /khu tshur mdzub sbyar dpral bar ldog /rkang gnyis mnyam byas res kyis 'phyar/ /mche gtsigs hUM sgrog khro gnyer blta/ /byang shar thig
ler grags pa'i rgya/ /khu tshur mthe'u chung mche ba'i rgya/ /rkang pa res bteg shar lhor phye/ /lho nub rkang gnyis res kyis brdab/ /zhags pas 'debs dang ral gris
gcod/ /nub byang rkang gnyis brdab pa dang / /lag gnyis mtheb sprad 'khor lo bskor/ /yang na tshe gcig phyag rgyas gdab/ /stangs stabs thams cad ha hUM sgrog /de
nas rig sngags ldog pa yis/ /phyag rgya cho ga bshad par bya/ /khu tshur gung mo brkyang rtse sprad/ /mdzub gnyis de yi 'gram du bcad/ /sngags dang phyag rgya thams cad
kyis/ /lha klu srin po gnod sbyin dang / /mkha' 'gro 'byung po mi ma yin/ /gsod dang sprod de me ltar mdzad/ /'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i
rgyud las/ sngags dang phyag rgya'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //bla na med pa'i ras ris sku/ /cho ga de nas bshad par bya/ /
bris sku 'dod pas thams cad du/ /dge ba'i ras bzang btsal nas kyang / /bkrus te sngags kyi bsrungs byas la/ /ngur smrig du ni bsgyur bar bya/ /rgyud bzang dal
zhing dul bag yod/ /chos thos ri mo mkhas la sgrin/ /sred chung yid gzhungs khro med pas/ /sen rtsi shun kan tsha la sbyar/ /snangs dang mu zi kan ltar ljang / /ba
bla ka ni bla na ser/ /li khri sgo nga mtshal lpags dmar/ /ram dang mthing shun bru nir sngo/ /spyig dang a dza nag po ste/ /she twa dag kyang dkar por 'gyur/ /sa snod
so btang skags snyigs byug /pir 'jam rab 'bring tha ma bri/ /rgyal dang sa ri nam gru dang / /snon snrubs smin drug lha mtshams shis/ /de nas yang dag rab
bshad pa/ /thub pa'i dge ba ras ris la/ /dbus su byang chub shing mchog drung / /gser mdog 'khor los bsgyur ba'i chas/ /chos 'chad phyag rgya ngur smrig
mnabs/ /logs su 'dab bzang rgyal po gnyis/ /snyim pa me tog bkang ba'i gzugs/ /g.yas su 'jig rten dbang po dkar/ /ngur smrig gyon pas thal mo
sbyar/ /de yi zhabs su mi g.yo ba/ /spyan gsum khros pa klu yis brgyan/ /na ra'i stod g.yogs stag smad dkris/ /rin chen rgyan can do ker can/ /rdo ba dmar po'i khri
steng na/ /ral gri dang ni zhags pa dang / /g.yon pa cung zad brkyang ste bzhengs/ /gtso bo'i g.yon gyi phyogs cha la/ /rdo rje 'dzin sngo ngur smrig can/ /rdo rje dang ni zhags pa
'chang / /de yi 'og tu sgrub po ni/ /pus btsugs spos kyi khang bu 'dzin/ /gtso bo zhabs su khro bo che/ /nag po khams gsum bstan pa yi/ /lag gnyis rin chen
khri la bteg /gtso bo sna tshogs pad+ma ste/ /'jig rten dbang dang khro bo yi/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang sgrub pa'i sngo/ /yan lag lnga pa sdong po gcig /klu yi bu mo mdzes ma gnyis//
pang gis 'khyud de 'dzin par mdzad/ /zhi ba rgyas pa dbang gi phyir/ /de nas bris sku yang dag bshad/ /dbus su shAkya thub pa dang / /g.yas su 'phags pa 'jam
dpal te/ /g.yon du phyag na rdo rje'o/ /bsnyen pa'i don du ras ris ni/ /shin tu blta dka' gsus po che/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi klu yis brgyan/ /kha nas khrag 'dzag lce
'dril ba/ /mche gtsigs hrIHsgra cher sgrog pa/ /spyan gsum nyi ma shar ka'i 'od/ /ngur smrig mnabs pa char sprin mdog /sku la thod rlon phreng ba can/ /dbu la thod pa
tshar bzhis brgyan/ /g.yon du rin chen zur phud 'phyang / /bskal pa'i me 'od 'bar ba yis/ /phyogs kyi bgegs tshogs sreg par
mdzad/ /g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje ste/ /gnyis pas ral gri 'od 'bar 'chang / /g.yon gyi dang po rdo rje zhags/ /gnyis pa sdigs mdzub brkyang ste mdzad/ /rin
chen rdo yi khri steng du/ /bgegs kyi rgyal po mnan nas kyang / /g.yon brkyang pa yi gar gyis gnas/ /de yi mdun du zhi ba'i byad/ /spos khang bzung ba'i
sgrub po bri/ /ci 'byor rgyun du mchod par bya/ /mngon spyod sgrub pa'i ras ris ni/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /ngur khrod ras la mi g.yo ba/ /mdog nag
spyan gsum zur mig blta/ /ngur smig gos gyon khro gnyer ldan/ /ral gri dang ni zhags pa 'chang / /bris nas bdag gi khrag gis ni/ /spyan phye gsol ba
btab par bya/ /ri mo 'dis ni rig 'dzin kyang / /sgrub po mngon spyod smos ci dgos/ /yang na sna tshogs las kyi phyir/ /mthing ga na ra'i rgyan can ni/ /brkyang bskum
rdo rje dril bu 'dzin/ /pad+ma zla ba la bzhugs bri/ /dmag dpung rengs pa'i ras ris ni/ /gser mdog khro bo mi g.yo ba/ /mi sdug mche ba gtsigs pa'i sku/ /'bar
phreng 'khrigs pa'i 'od ldan pa/ /zhal bzhi phyag kyang bzhi pa ste/ /ral gri zhags pa dang por 'dzin/ /ri bo che dang sdigs mdzub 'og /zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi snying
gar ro/ /de nas rig 'dzin dngos grub kyi/ /ras ris bri ba yang dag bshad/ /mi g.yo khro bo zhal gcig pa/ /mdangs bzang zar ma'i me tog mdog /ral gri zhags
pa sdigs mdzub can/ /pus mo g.yas bteg g.yon pa ni/ /sa la cung zad btsugs par mdzad/ /mkha' la lha yi bu gnyis kyis/ /dbugs 'byin mdzad pa nyams
dga'i gzugs/ /g.yas su rnam snang mdzad bris te/ /g.yon du 'od dpag med pa'o/ /de mdun sgrub po nyid kyang bri/ /gang yang rig ma thams cad la/ /mchod de me
tog gtor nas kyang / /spyan phye na bza' gsol byas te/ /rten 'brel sngags kyis rab gnas bya/ /de rjes smon lam btab pa ni/ /oM ldan bdag gis bsags pa
yi/ /bsod nams grangs med gzhal mi lang / /des ni 'gro ba ma lus pa/ /bla med go 'phang thob par shog /sems can dmyal ba dud 'gro dang / /yi dwags
gang dag grangs med rnams/ /bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis ni/ /thams cad bde dang ldan gyur cig /gang yang lha mi dbul phongs dang / /mi nad mu ge dgra chom
sogs/ /bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis ni/ /de dag thams cad bral gyur shog /ji snyed sems can thams cad rnams/ /de snyed sdug
bsngal rgya mtsho kun/ /sna tshogs de dag kun zhi nas/ /'ga' yang sdug bsngal med par shog /sems can gang dag lus ngag yid/ /mi dge spyod pa bral
gyur nas/ /dge ba phun tshogs spyod gyur te/ /kun kyang bde ldan thob gyur shog /de nas rgyal sras kun btud de/ /lag na dri dang me tog sogs/ /mchod pa'i
yo byad kun thogs nas/ /bla 'og tha dad gsal bya'i phyir/ /bde gshegs bsdu don 'di skad brjod/ /oM bde gshegs pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ /skyob pa
dngos su bzhugs pa rnams/ /bdag la slar yang brtse ba'i phyir/ /rgyal ba sras bcas la mi mnga'/ /bdag don grub par 'gro ba la/ /brtse phyir slar yang
byon par mdzod/ /de nas gtor ma me tog dri/ /dkyil 'khor rgyan dang rdul tshon rnams/ /dngos grub dam tshig gnod spang phyir/ /lag pas reg par mi bya ste/ /
gos kyi phur ma la sogs pa/ /ci bde bas ni phyags nas kyang / /skye 'gag med pa'i sngags brjod nas/ /chu bo la ni dor bar bya/ /'bras dang 'o ma sha ka dang / /
mar dang bcas pa bskol byas te/ /'bras zan dang ni lhan cig tu/ /dga' bskyed phyir na dge 'dun dang / /bram ze la ni ston mo bya/ /de nas bris sku brtan par ni/ /gsang ba'i gnas
su mchod par bya/ /khyad par tshes brgyad dus su mchod/ /bla ma la ni yon dbul zhing / /rtag tu sngags 'dzin thams cad kyang / /mnyes par bya zhing khros pa min/ /sems can ma
mos spang bar bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la nges bskyed de/ /the tshom le lo spang bar bya/ /rang gi phung po bsnyen bkur phyir/ /khrus dang gtsang sbra dang ldan byas nas/ /gos bkra dri ma
med pa bgo /zas kyang 'bras sogs dri med la/ /nyung du bza' zhing btung bar bya/ /mang bas gnyid dang le lo dang / /dri nga ba ni bskyed par 'gyur/ /tho rangs dang por langs nas ni/ /
srod thal bar du brtson par bya/ /nam gyi gung la gnyid pa'i tshe/ /'gro la phan bya'i sems kyis nyal/ /'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las/ bris sku'i
le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ste/ /lha sgom pa yi rim pa ni/ /rang gzugs stong par byas nas su/ /yi ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo las/ /sgra grags pa ni rig pa

che/ /zla ba'i gzugs brnyan lta bur snang / /der son pa ni rdo rje sogs/ /rang gi phyag rgya nyid yin no/ /de las gyur pa'i sku mchod ni/ /'ja' tshon shar ba ji lta bar/ /mtshan dpe mdangs 'od yang dag
ldan/ /brjid cing dgyes pa'i mdangs dang ldan/ /sgeg cing rol pa'i cha byad ni/ /byis pa gzhon nu'i lang tsho 'dra/ /rin chen rgyan dang na bza' ni/ /gzugs
mdzes lha yi ci lta ba/ /khros pa'i srin po lta bu ste/ /skra dang kha spu la sogs pa/ /spu sogs ser zhing rtsub la 'khyil/ /sna tshogs dur khrod rgyan rnams ni/ /
rtsub cing blo ldan rab tu khros/ /na bza' rlon pa khrag can ni/ /steng gi khams su yod par mdzad/ /ha ha hUM hUM phaT phaT kyi/ /ngar skad 'brug sgra sbyugs glu ni/ /ri
rab 'bum snyil chal chom ltar/ /lus rab ltos 'gros brgyan pa ni/ /gzi ldan 'khyud cing phu sgra 'don/ /'phro 'du 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /nyi 'bum
dus me'i bskal pa 'dra/ /rab gdug mtshon cha du ma ni/ /lha min dus kyi 'khrug pa'i cha/ /khro bo khro mo'i tshogs 'byung ba/ /thams cad yi ge hUM sgra can/ /ma mo
dang ni mkha' 'gro rnams/ /b+h+yo yig drag po'i bdag nyid can/ /thub pa yi ge muM las bskyed/ /rgyal sras rig ma nyan thos dang / /'jig rten skyong rnams sngags
'dis bskyed/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM sarba saM ska ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harmA te ga ga na sa mud ga te sa ha pa ri shu d+d+he/ ma hA na ya pa ri
wA re swA hA/ rang gi lus la sems bcug nas/ /sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi/ /ngang tshul bzang por yang dag byung / /rig par gyur pa'i sems ldan nas/ /drang srong rdzu
'phrul can du 'gyur/ /gzhan yang sdug bsngal zhi nus na/ /rang gi bde thob smos ci dgos/ /rang rang rigs kyi lha rnams kyi/ /gzugs brnyan phyag mtshan kha dog
ni/ /dkyil 'khor ram ni ris ma las/ /gsung ba ji ltar bsgom par bya/ /de nas mi g.yo khro bo ches/ /rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal nas/ /dag cing gsal la snyan
pa yis/ /tshig gi yang ni 'di gsol to/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa bcom ldan 'das/ /gtum mo mtshan nyid ldan pa yi/ /nga yi mtshan nyid khyed bshad nas/ /de tshe rdo rje
'dzin rgyal pos/ /gtum mo'i cha byad ldan byas nas/ /rang gzugs sngags dang bcas pa yis/ /gsang chen brda 'di bka' stsal to/ /dag pa'i sems nyid hUM rdo
rje/ /mthing ga'i mdog las rdo rje 'dzin/ /mthing ga brkyang bskum khro sems can/ /na ra'i rgyan bcas 'jigs byed sku/ /gyen skra kha spu gyon ser dmar/ /pad+ma zla
ba'i steng du ni/ /me yi nang bzhugs rdo dril 'chang / /rnam snang 'dzin dang gnyis dang po/ /bzhi ba'i lnga pa de'i gsum pa/ /lnga pa'i lnga pa bdun pa'i bzhi/ /me yis sa
bon dgug pas mnan/ /bdun pa'i dang po gsum pa yin/ /gsum pas bteg go hUM phaT bcas/ /gsang sngags rgyal po bla med
'dis/ /dgos pa thams cad 'grub pa dang / /khyad par du ni 'byung po sel/ /klu 'dul ba ni dkar po che/ /nam mkha' lding gi cha byad che/ /grub pa'i gter
gyi don du ni/ /ser po 'od dang ldan pa yi/ /dmar po dang ni ljang nag dag /drag po'i gdon rnams sel ba dang / /tshe ring ba la shis pa'o/ /ldan pa skyed pa'i sku
mchog ni/ /'byung por gyur pa'i de ma thag /sa steng thams cad mun nag 'khrigs/ /bdud rnams thams cad rab tu tshig /ye shes me 'od chen po 'di/
bzod par sla la gcig ma mchis/ /bgegs chen log par 'dren pa rnams/ /dog pa'i sems kyis thag ring 'bros/ /gsang sngags yi ge hUM sgra can/ /
glog 'khrug pa yi 'od zer 'dra/ /klad par yi ge hUM gi gzugs/ /gru gsum me yi gzugs brnyan can/ /'od dmar tshal pa rab 'thor bas/ /bgegs tshogs
sreg cing 'bros par byed/ /bong bu rnga mo khyi spre'u gzugs/ /ro langs ma lus thams cad kun/ /ha hUM brjod cing 'bros par byed/ /rlung gis g.yengs pa'i rdul
dang mtshungs/ /gyen thur haM gi 'phro 'du dang / /khro bcu sa bon yi ge hUM/ /me dang rlung gi tshul du 'bar/ /mngon sum rtswa la me bzhin du/ /snying gi hUM gis bdas nas
kyang / /klad pa'i hUM gis sreg par byed/ /'od dang phyag rgya lha yi sku/ /bskrad dang bcing dang myos byed bsam/ /seng+ge dang ni glang chen 'brug /drag po'i sgra skad ci 'dra
bar/ /rtsa ba'i gsang sngags zlos pa ni/ /bgegs dang log 'dren ma lus pa/ /sreg cing phye ma rdul du rlog /snying nang snying po bstan pa ni/ /'od 'bar 'od
kyis sdig pa'i tshogs/ /du ma rnams kyang zad par mdzad/ /lus ngag yid brtan 'khor lo sngags/ /oM dang AHdang hUM sbyor gyis/ /dpal 'phel dbang phyug bskyed pa

dang / go cha chen po bskon par byed/ /na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi ka nAn/ ta thA ga tA nAM haM/ go cha chen po'i gsang sngags 'dis/ /rgyal sras rnams kyang 'dar gyur na/ /bgegs rnams sreg pa smos ci dgos/ /
sa ma ya s+t+waM aM haM gis/ /ye shes lha dang 'brel par bya/ /rgyal bas dbang bskur sbyor bas ni/ /ye shes dbu rgyan brtag par bya/ /gtso la mi bskyod dbu rgyan can/ /'khor kun mi
g.yos rgyas gdab bya/ /bdag nyid yi ger byas nas su/ /me gzugs shin tu phra bas ni/ /mtshan mo dus su nyams par bya/ /sdang ba hUM gi sgra las so/ /'phags pa rdo
rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las/ lha 'byung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas yang dag
bshad bya ba/ /sngags spyod tshul gyi cho ga nyon/ /dad pa dang yang mi ldan zhing / /byang chub sems kyang ma bskyed de/ /dbang bskur rjes gnang ma thob la/ /
sdom tshul dam tshig bral ba'i mi/ /gsang sngags rang nyid len pa ni/ /byis pa lcags sreg mid pa 'dra/ /thog ma med sgrib bkru ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje slob
dpon 'di skad brjod/ /oM/ sngags mchog ting 'dzin rnam dag chu/ /bskal pa du mar bsags pa yi/ /sdig pa'i tshogs rnams dag gyur nas/ /rang
bzhin dag pa'i sems su byed/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra ad+hiSh+ThA na kA ya bA ka bi sho d+ha na a b+hi ShIny+tsa hUM/ oM/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa yi/ /rin
chen sngags las byung ba yi/ /dbu rgyan lha rdzas cod pan 'dis/ /dbang bskur rin chen mchog tu gyur/ /oM badzra d+ha ra shrI badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM/ rat+na mu
ku Ta a b+hi ShIny+tsa hUM/ rdo rje chen po bla na med/ /bzung bas phyogs las rgyal gyur te/ /rdo rje lta bur brtan byed pas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zungs/ /oM sarba
badzra a b+hi ShIny+tsa hUM/ dril bu dbyangs snyan bla na med/ /sku yi rdo rje rab tu skyed/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zungs/ /khams gsum srid pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /oM sa ma
ya g+haN+Da badzra a b+hi ShIny+tsa hUM/ oM/ snying rje shes rab dbyer med rgya/ /gang gis thos pa nang gis su/ /de yi ming mtshan bdag por 'gyur/ /rtag pa'i ngang gnas blang
bar mdzod/ /oM badzra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje snyems
bdag bdag mdzod cig /sangs rgyas kun gyi dril bu'i rgya/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad/ /rtag tu khyod kyis bzung byas nas/ /byang chub mchog thob
rgyal bas gsungs/ /oM/ shes rab ral gri bla na med/ /gang gis 'chang ba rgyal 'gyur te/ /bdud kyi dpung ni gshegs nas kyang / /mkha' la ye shes 'od
'bar 'gyur/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra dz+nyA na khaD+ga a b+hi ShIny+tsa hUM/ a/ rdo rje zhags thugs rdo rje can/ /nyon mongs srid pa'i sdong po rnams/ /thabs kyi zhags pas bcings
nas kyang / /srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol mdzod/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra pA she na a b+hi ShIny+tsa hUM/ dbang dang rjes gnang ma thob cing / /dam tshig sdom pa mi ldan la/ /bla
ma mnyes par mi byed na/ /sgrub pa 'bras med ngan song 'gro/ /log lta can gang bla ma 'tshe/ /dmyal ba'i gnas su 'gro bar nges/ /'dir
nyams pas ni nad yams dang / /dgra bo mu ges rtag tu 'tshe/ /dkyil 'khor sa gzhi nyams dga' ba/ /chu klung mtsho 'gram ri ljongs dang / /'bras bu me tog skyed
mos tshal/ /kun dga' ra ba khang bzang mchog /bzhi mdo ri sul shing gcig drung / /phyugs lhas khang brtsegs glang chen bres/ /gtsug lag khang dang dgon pa
dang / /chu gling mtshe'u 'gram ne'u gsing du/ /bsnyen dang dbang bskur byed pa dang / /dur khrod sogs su las rnams bsgrub/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor khru gang ste/ /
dbang gi dkyil 'khor chen po la/ /thub pa'i dkyil 'khor khru bzhi pa/ /yang na drug gam brgyad kyang bya/ /gzhan ni khru gsum tshad du bya/ /yang na lnga'am bdun
du bya/ /gza' yi dkyil 'khor khru gnyis te/ /yang na phyed dang gsum par bya/ /kun tu bzhi cha pho brang ste/ /khang pa tshad kyi phyed yin te/ /khang pa gnyis pa cha gsum
pa/ /rta babs rdo rje pad+ma'o/ /lha rnams bzhi cha dag tu 'gyur/ /thub pa'i sgo ni bzhi yin te/ /gzhan du sgo gcig pa nyid shis/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni byang gi sgo/ /
chos ni nub sgo rdo rje lho/ /gza' dang 'jig rten skyong sogs shar/ /dbang bsgyur lha yi gnas rnams su/ /bum pa phyag rgyar bcas pa'am/ /sku'am rang rang phyag rgya
gzhag /thub pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /pad dkar steng du lhung bzed do/ /gtso bo yi ni sor drug ste/ /lhag ma rnams ni sor bzhi'o/ /rigs kyi mtshan mas
yang yang bskor/ /byang du 'jig rten dbang sdud ni/ /pad dkar rdo rje gdengs por bcas/ /dbang ldan spyi blugs byams pa'i'o/ /shar du 'jam dpal ut+pal sngo/ /
mer ni kun bzang yid bzhin no/ /lhor ni rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin/ /bden bral mkha' snying pad dkar te/ /nub tu pang ser rdo rje chos/ /nub byang sa snying pad+ma dmar/ /gtsug
tor gnod mdzes steng 'og char/ /gtsug tor dang ni gtun shing ngo / /shar du rnam rgyal thod pa ste/ /mer ni 'dod rgyal rtse gsum mo/ /rdo rje rtse gcig gshin gshed lhor/ /
bden bral ral gri stobs po che/ /nub tu rta mgrin pad+ma ste/ /byang du bgegs dgra rdo rje rgya/ /nub tu dbyug pa sngon po ste/ /dbang ldan du ni mi g.yo ba/ /de yi rgyab tu nyan
thos ni/ /shA ri'i bu dang rab 'byor dang / /mau dgal bu dang 'od srung dang / /rgyal mchog dang ni sa steng skyong / /rta thul dang ni ba lang bdag /drag shul dbang chen chang bu
can/ /b+ha ra d+h+wa dza steng rgyas dang / /dga' bo nyer dga' sgra gcan no/ /de ltar bcu drug phyag rgya'o/ /pad+ma'i steng du lhung bzed do/ /de nas yang
dag bshad bya ba/ /'jam dpal dkyil 'khor bzang po yi/ /dbus su ral gri me 'od can/ /rin chen rdo brag steng du bri/ /byang du rdo rjes mtshan pa yi/ /bum pa bri
pa byams pa'o/ /shar du kun tu bzang po yi/ /rdo rje dkar po bri bar bya/ /lhor ni me 'od ldan pa yi/ /lag na rdo rje'i rdo rje bri/ /nub tu 'jig rten dbang po ste/ /pad
dkar 'od dang ldan pa bri/ /yid bzhin nor 'dzin mdzes gzugs can/ /rin chen rdo steng dbang ldan bri/ /mer ni rab 'bar rdo rje yi/ /bgrang phreng pad+ma la gnas
bri/ /bden bral du ni rab brjid pa'i/ /go cha 'bar ba bri bar bya/ /rlung du mdzes pa gzhon nu'i lha/ /rin chen sgron ni bri bar bya/ /steng du rtul phod ces khro bo'o/ /
pad+ma'i steng du khro bo yi/ /'og tu khro rgyal mngag gzhug gi /rdo rje brag steng zhags pa bri/ /khro bo lhag ma sngon gyi ni/ /tshul gyis rgyal bar dgod par bya/ /brtan pa
zhes pa'i pho nya mo'i/ /chu gri byang du bri bar bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'chang ba yi/ /mkhar sor ma ni shar du'o/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'chang ba yi/ /rnam
'jigs ma ni lho ru'o/ /nub kyi phyogs su bri bar bya/ /mdzod spu ma zhes rin phreng 'dzin/ /rin chen rdo steng shar lho bri/ /shar lhor bgegs 'dzin ma zhes pa/ /'khor
lo me 'bar rdo rje bri/ /'bar ba'i gtun shing bden bral du/ /'joms pa'i tho ba rlung du bri/ /thal sbyar gung mo nang du bcug /pad+ma mdzod kyi phyag rgya dang / /sngags
'dis dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ hUM hUM ba ba maM maM swA hA/ spyan drangs gshegs su gsol ba dang / /srung ba mchog

gi sngags yin no/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaH/ he he he Adz+nyA pa ra ma ga ga na A gats+tsha gats+tsha b+ha ga wA na shI g+haM swA hA/ bsnyen pa 'bum la byin rlabs
dang / /lha sgrub pa dang mchod pa'o/ /de nas yang dag par bshad bya ba/ /rdo rje chos kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /dbus su 'jig rten dbang sdud nyid/ /pad+ma dmar po 'chang pa 'o/ /
shar du don yod zhags pa ni/ /bgrang phreng sngon po 'chang ba'o/ /lhor ni nam mkha' dri med de/ /rdo rje sngon po 'chang ba'o/ /nub tu gar gyi dbang pad+ma/ /byang du thugs
rje shugs po che/ /rdo rje nag po 'dzin pa bri/ /sgrol ma khro gnyer ral gcig dang / /yid bzang ma ni mtshams su bri/ /khro bo dang ni pho nya mo/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis
rim pas dgod/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje yi/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag bshad par bya/ /dbus su phyag na rdo rje nyid/ /rdo rje dkar po 'chang ba 'o/ /shar du sangs
rgyas spyan ma yin/ /lhor ni pad 'dzin mA ma kI/ /nub tu gos 'chang na bza' dkar/ /byang du sgrol ma ut+pal 'chang / /phyogs bzhir nam mkha' dri med dang / /shugs po che
dang rdo rje tog /snyems tshul chen po zhes pa rnams/ /rigs kyi mtshan ma 'dzin pa 'o/ /der yang sngon ltar khro bo rnams/ /rim pa bzhin du bri bar bya/ /de yi cha rgyab dkyil
'khor la/ /drag po lha rnams bkod pa ni/ /dpung bzang la sogs rdo rje can/ /brgyad po byang gi phyogs su bri/ /tshogs 'chang bshes gnyen 'gro skyong dang / /mthong
dka' rig byed bden bral med/ /ngan spong brgyad de drang srong shar/ /lhor ni rdo rje dgra sta ma/ /rdo rje tho ba drag shul ma/ /rta rna ma dang khro gnyer ma/ /ro langs ma dang
lcags sgrog ma/ /mthong dka' ma ste brgyad po bri/ /dug sel rma bya 'od zer can/ /nor rgyun ral gcig dpung rgyan ma/ /dbyangs ldan dril sgrol brgyad nub phyogs/ /
kun kyang rang rig phyag rgya can/ /sgo yi phyogs su dgod bya ba/ /thub pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi/ /brgya byin khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/ /changs pa 'jam dpal
dkyil 'khor la'o/ /rgyal dang rnam rgyal mi thub ma/ /gzhan mi thub ma spyan ras gzigs/ /nag mo che dang uts+tshuSh+ma/ /gzhon nu 'phrog mo gter 'dzin gyi/ /khro bo mi g.yo
sgo bzhi la/ /nag po che dang dga' byed dang / /ngan spong dang ni tshogs bdag go /mi g.yo dbang bskur dgyes pa yi/ /dbus su khro bo mi g.yo ba'i/ /ral gri me 'od
'bar ba 'o/ /phyogs bzhir khro bo mdog bzhi 'o/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i cha byad can/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang / /rgya gram g.yas pa'i phyag tu 'chang / /g.yon
pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa 'chang / /rin chen brag la sku bzhugs nas/ /zhabs gnyis pad+ma'i steng du 'o/ /mtshams su khro mo bzhi po yang / /gtso bo dang
mtshungs sgeg pa'i nyams/ /de rgyab sngon ltar khro bo bcu/ /sku 'am phyag rgya'i phreng ba bri/ /dkyil 'khor cha yi rgyab tu ni/ /'jig rten skyong bcu drug shul can/ /
khros pas rang rig 'khor bcas bri/ /bum pa tshad ldan ras kyis dkri/ /dri bzang chus bkang lha grangs sam/ /bcu gnyis sam ni drug kyang rung / /kha rgyan dang
bcas gzhag par bya/ /bla re ba dan gdugs rgyal mtshan/ /yon chab bdug spos me tog dang / /sgron me byug chab zhal zas dang / /gling bu las snyan na bza'i
tshogs/ /gtor ma dri bzang sman dang bcas/ /yid 'ong dri zhim zas skom tshogs/ /dkyil 'khor spras nas mchod par bya/ /sa la
pus mo tshad brkos nas/ /'bru srin shing rdo dum bu sogs/ /skyon mang bral nas sa yis dgang / /ba yi rnam lngas byugs pa'i sar/ /me tog bcal bkram
mchod sogs bkod/ /lha ni spyan drangs mchod nas kyang / /dge dang mi dge'i rmi lam brtag /rmi lam bzang na spro gyur nas/ /sa bdag mo la gsol pa
gdab/ /khyad par du yang gtor mas mchod/ /bu tshur shog ces theg chen gyi/ /tshul chen khyod ni snod yin pas/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga rnams/ /
khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnams/ /mi g.yo mgon por rab bsgoms pas/ /ye shes mtshungs pa med pa brnyes/ /
skyob pa shAkya seng+ges kyang / /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med 'dis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa/ /dpung chen rnams kyang dpa' bos bcom/ /'jig rten
'dul phyir chos rnams kyi/ /'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das/ /de 'dra kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu khyod blo gros 'di gyis shig /u dum ba ra'i me tog
ltar/ /brgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig /'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ste/ /skyob pa 'jig rten mgon po che/ /rnyed dka' rnyed par gyur na yang / /gsang sngags skyob
pa'i tshul 'byung ba/ /shin tu dka' ste rmad byung phyir/ /sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad pa/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho cher 'jigs las/ /myur du sgrol ba gsang sngags
las/ /sa steng gsang sngags nor bu 'dra/ /rga nad 'chi 'jigs spong ba dang / /nyes mdzad grogs gcugs mthun 'dod dang / /mu ge dgra chom bral bde dang / /
zas skom gos rgyan longs spyod rtag /bde skyid dpal 'byor thob pa dang / /myur du sangs rgyas 'dod pa yi/ /gsang sngags thabs la myur brtson sgrubs/ /ji
ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bya/ /sdom pa yi ni tshul
khrims dang / /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /deng nas mchog tu brtan par gzung / /'gro la lhag pa'i sems bskyed
nas/ /bla ma la ni yon phul zhu/ /yid bzhin nor 'dra bla med sku/ /zhi ba sangs rgyas go 'phang thob/ /srog gcod rkun rdzun mi tshangs spyod/ /myos byed 'thung dang glu
gar rol/ /rgyan byug mal chen mtho ba dang / /phyi do kha zas spang ba ste/ /brgyad dang bcu gcig bco lnga dang / /khyad par du ni gnam
stong la/ /dal 'byor thob pa shin tu dkon/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa shin tu dkon/ /sdom pa blangs nas srog bzhin du/ /g.yeng med bsdams te bsrung
bar bya/ /gsum la rtag tu skyabs 'gro bya/ /lha mi bde ldan lus thob nas/ /dmyal ba dud 'gro yi dwags gnas/ /thob gnas spang dka' de dag ni/ /
nam yang thob par mi bya'o/ /bdag ni dpa' bo ral gri 'chang / /gsang ba'i 'khor lo sbyor byed pas/ /bka' las 'das pa'i gdug can rnams/ /dum
bu phye mar 'gas par 'gyur/ /slob ma gzung phyir thog mar ni/ /bsnyen pas sngags kyi mthu bskyed bya/ /longs spyod 'phel phyir gtor ma gtang / /bsod
nams 'dod phyir mchod pa brtson/ /bla ma thos bsam sgom la gnas/ /gtong phod dul zhing chos spyod mkhas/ /nad med bzod des snying rje che/ /sngags sgrub
brtson dpal shes rab can/ /brtags nas slob ma lnga 'am bdun/ /dad brtson zhi dul bla ma bkur/ /sdigs 'jigs nad med dbang po tshang / /dbyibs sdug
snying rjer ldan pa gzung / /'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las/ skye bo gzung ba'i thabs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas
yang dag bshad bya ba/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub che/ /gzhan du med pa phul byung ba/ /rgyud 'dir bshad pa nyan par byos/ /mi ni rin chen dang po ste/ /gang gang
sgrub pa de dang de/ /'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/ /ral gri lcags sam shing la byas/ /sor bzhi pa 'am sor brgyad bya/ /yu bar rigs kyi rgya lnga bri/ /ba yi
rnam lnga dri zhim chus/ /bkrus te dri dang me tog mchod/ /zla drug sngags bzlas khro bo bsgom/ /ral gri dud thul 'od du 'bar/ /blangs pas mkha' spyod yul
'gro 'gyur/ /tshe ni bar gyi bskal pa ste/ /lha yi bzhon pa sna tshogs bcibs/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gser dngul zangs kyi zhags pa 'am/ /
shing gi zhags pa'ang de ltar 'grub/ /rgyal mtshan nor bu gi'u wang gdugs/ /lcags kyu rnams kyang de bzhin sgrub/ /lha rnams sgrub na thang shing la/ /gang 'dod lha
yi gzugs byas te/ /sngags bzlas tsam gyis mdun du 'ong / /ci 'dod gsol 'debs 'dod pa smra/ /klu la nA ga ge sar shing / /gnod sbyin la ni gser las
gzugs/ /dri za la ni 'o ma'i shing / /mkha' lding 'jim pa'i gzugs kyis so/ /srin po la ni dur khrod shing / /gang yang gzugs
byas rkang pa ni/ /g.yon pas de yi ske mnan te/ /sum 'bum bzlas na mdun du 'ong / /ci 'dod smra tshe dgos pa bslang / /shar du ras ris kha sprad drung / /dus
gsum khrus byas gos rlon gyon/ /sum 'bum bzlas na mar ngo / yi/ /brgyad la 'byung po gtor ma sbyin/ /maN+Dal steng du ro bzhag nas/ /rang nyid rin chen khri
steng du/ /snying po khri brjod ro 'gul 'gyur/ /mi skrag kha yi nang du lce/ /pad+ma kha phye lte can mthong / /bcad na ral gri rig 'dzin 'gyur/ /lha yi gzugs kyis
tshangs pa yi/ /'jig rten khams kyi gnas rnams rgyu/ /gi'u wang bdun bzlas thig les ni/ /skye bo kun gyis mi mthong ngo / /mi g.yo pus mo btsugs pa 'am/ /
'jam dpal ris ma'i drung du ni/ /'jam dpal sngags 'di sa ya bzla/ /nya la khyad par mchod pa bya/ /mtshan rangs bzlas pa'i tho rangs nas/ /dang po rtags
sa g.yo bar 'gyur/ /gnyis pa nyi ma 'gyur ldog byed/ /phyogs bzhir mkha' la sgra chen po/ /ha ha 'brug skad grag par 'gyur/ /gsum par mkha' la rig
'dzin rnams/ /me tog char 'bebs chun 'phyar bsgreng / /de rjes rig 'dzin ma lus dang / /'jig rten skyong bas rab bskor nas/ /khro rgyal byon nas gsung snyan gyis//
ci 'dod bu khyod gsung bar 'gyur/ /rig 'dzin rgyal po mi snang sogs/ /ci 'dod par ni smra bar bya/ /'grub nas brgyad gnyis cha byad can/ /rgyan bzang lag na
ral gri thogs/ /lha yi bzhon pa la bcibs nas/ /rig 'dzin tshogs mang lhan cig tu/ /sangs rgyas zhing mang phyin pa'i tshe/ /rgyal sras rnams kyis phyag byas
nas/ /mchod pa chen po thob 'gyur te/ /bskal pa du mar tshe gnas 'gyur/ /ut+pal sngon pi lig bu mig /ru rta zangs snod ril bu gzhag /zla ba gzas zin par bzlas
nas/ /mig bskus 'dod pa'i khams gsal 'gyur/ /bdag ni sus kyang mi mthong ngo / /gnam lcags rdo rje sor bcu drug /ngos gnyis rtse gsum dbyibs can te/ /
tsan+dan dmar dang dri bzang byug /cho 'phrul tshes gnyis nya yi bar/ /mchod cing bzlas na tha mar ni/ /mar me brgya sogs kyis mchod de/ /ku sha khres kyi steng 'dug
nas/ /rdo rje lag gnyis bzung ma thag /dul 'thul 'od du 'bar nas kyang / /'khor bcas rig pa 'dzin pa yi/ /'khor los bsgyur ba thob par 'gyur/ /'khor
lo bdun brtsegs mtshon cha dang / /gser dang mal lham tshangs skud sogs/ /dgos pa thams cad de ltar sgrub/ /sngon gyi tshul du dngos
grub 'byung / /tshes gcig nyin par sku gzugs kyi/ /mthe bor dzA ti sngags brjod brdeg /stong phrag brgyad kyis mthe bong las/ /'od zer phyung nas reg ma thag /
dbu skra lcang lo 'khyil gyur nas/ /'khor bcas rig 'dzin rgyal po thob/ /sus kyang mi thub lus grub 'gyur/ /tshe ni bskal pa'i bar du gnas/ /sa la pad+ma
'dab brgyad bri/ /bum pa skud pa nag pos dkri/ /tsan+dan gyis byug dris kyang dgang / /pad+ma'i steng bzhag pad steng 'dug /stong phrag brgyad bzlas sa gzhi gas/ /
pad+mar snang zhing sa gzhir snang / /chu des gtor la khru gang bskor/ /blangs pas bskal ba'i tshe tshad thob/ /grog mkhar sa la seng+ge bya/ /gi'u wang gis byugs
dkyil 'khor gzhag /g.yon 'gul bar du ma chod cing bzla/ /seng+ger gyur nas rgyab zhon nas/ /'dod gzugs lha gnas kun tu 'gro/ /sangs rgyas zhing
yang mthong bar 'gyur/ /tshe lo khri phrag gcig bskor nas/ /rig 'dzin chen po'i gnas su 'gro/ /'dir gsungs pa 'am ma gsungs pa/ /sngags dang lha
'dis sgrub pa yis/ /rig 'dzin grub par grags pa rnams/ /ma lus thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i rtog pa bsdus pa
las/ rig 'dzin sgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /phran tshegs las kyi spyor ba gtso/ /gza' yi cho ga 'di
yin te/ /gnod pa sel dang phan skyed mdzad/ /ba yi rnam lngas byugs pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su pad+ma ni/ /kha dog sna tshogs nyis brtsegs kyi/ /dbus su
sangs rgyas de bzhin lhor/ /chos kyi rdo rje chos dkar bo/ /shar du dge 'dun ljang gu 'o/ /nub tu 'jig rten dbang phyug dmar/ /byang du phyag na rdo rje ste/ /byang shar du
ni 'jam dpal ser/ /mer ni gshin rje gshed po nag /dbyug 'chang ma he zhon pa'o/ /mi g.yo mgon po srin po'i phyogs/ /rta mgrin rlung gi phyogs su 'o/ /
dkon mchog gsum po chos 'chad rgya/ /sems dpa' khro bo rang rtags so/ /kun kyang rin chen khri la bzhugs/ /de rgyab cha la gza' rnams te/ /shar du nyi ma dkar
ser ni/ /rta la zhon te pad+ma 'chang / /nub tu zla ba dkar po ni/ /ku mu da 'chang ngang ba zhon/ /lhor ni mig dmar kha dog dmar/ /ril ba'i steng bzhugs me sgron bsnams/ /
lhag pa mdog ser ut+pal 'chang / /byang du pad steng bzhugs pa yi/ /phur bu mdog sngon glegs bam thogs/ /shar lho phyogs
su klu la bcibs/ /pa wa sangs dkar shing thog 'chang / /lho nub gser gyi khri la bzhugs/ /byang shar spen pa mdog nag ni/ /tshangs pa'i steng na dbyug pa
thogs/ /nub byang sgra gcan dud ka ni/ /sbrul gyi steng na 'khor lo 'dzin/ /rnon po ljang gu ral gri 'chang / /gtso bo'i drung du pad steng bzhugs/ /na maHsarba ta
thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM b+ha ki nAM swAhA/ nyi ma'i snying po'o/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM sarba tra
yaM a swA hA/ zla ba'i 'o/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM a bIR+ya ya swA hA/ rnon po'i'o/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba sa
pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM su bi shud+d+ha swAhA/ mig dmar gyi'o/ /na maH/ sarba ta thA ta ga te b+h+yaHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM bi su Ta pa ka ya
swAhA/ gza' lhag gi'o/ /oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM b+hi ka mya d+hA ya swAhA/ phur bu'i'o/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/

sarbA sa pA ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM su d+harmA r+Na ra ho swAhA/ pa wa sangs rgyas kyi'o/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM kr-iSh+Na bar+Na pha ka swAhA
spen pa'i 'o/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM bi kr-i da la ku ru tsi swAhA/ sgra gcan gyi'o/ /sngags re brgyad stong brgyad brgya bzlas/ /
ci 'byor mchod de gsol ba gdab/ /longs spyod spel cig 'jigs pa sel/ /nad med bgegs rims 'joms par 'gyur/ /rims sogs gzas zin nang
la yang / /sku yi drung du gsol btab sel/ /zhi rgyas dbang drag gang sbyar ba/ /de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /mi dang bya rgod sbrul rus pa/ /skabs su btums
nas dgra khyim sba/ /dgra bo nad skyed nor rnams brlag /rtag tu 'thab mo 'byung bar nges/ /stag bu thod rus 'ug pa'i spu/ /dgra bo'i sgro sbas skrod par byed/ /ne'u le
nag po wa sbal rus/ /rang khrag rtsangs pa'i mgo bo rnams/ /gong bu ming bcas dgra sgor sba/ /dgra bo 'khor bcas shi bar 'gyur/ /mi tshil dur thal rgya skyegs ni/ /
thod pa so can nang blugs nas/ /gang gi sgor bzhag khang pa 'jig /ku sha'i gzugs brnyan rkang pas mnan/ /dbang byar 'dod pa'i sngags bzlas na/ /rgyal po che yang
dbang 'gyur na/ /'byung po gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /bud med skyes phyugs la sogs la/ /rang ming ldan pa'i gzugs byas te/ /rkang
ba g.yon mnan ming bcas bzla/ /gang dang gang yang nges par 'grub/ /sa la bgegs kyi gzugs bris te/ /sngags kyis brdungs na brlag par 'gyur/ /'jim
pas bgegs kyi gzugs byas te/ /gdab cing brdungs na sel bar nges/ /phur bus gdab dang mtshon chas brab/ /rdo rje ri rab lcog brgyad ldan/ /sa la byas
pa'i them bar du/ /gzugs brnyan bcug ste rkang pas mnan/ /gzas zin nub mo'i maN+Da la/ /dri bzang me tog sil ma bkram/ /pha rol phyin pa'i glegs bam bzhugs
dwangs ma'i snod du mar bzhag ste/ /seng ldeng mes ni bskol bar bya/ /dngos grub rnam gsum 'grub pa dang / /gter mthong bar yang 'dis 'gyur ro/ /khros
pas spyan gyi phyag rgya bya/ /hUM mtha' gsang sngags drag tu brjod/ /dur khrod thal ba gang byin pa/ /gdon gyis 'dzin nam bran du 'gyur/ /de nas mi g.yo spyan
gcig pa'i/ /sngags kyi cho ga bshad par bya/ /ris ma'i drung du 'bum phrag gsum/ /brjod pas 'di yi bsnyen pa rdzogs/ /dben par zan gyi chang bu sbyin/ /des
na rtag tu 'brel par 'gyur/ /mdzub mo'i rtse la hUM bkod nas/ /brjod pas sprin rnams 'bral bar byed/ /dgra bo lhar bcas gzugs brnyan la/ /rkang g.yon mnan
bzlas lcags phur gdab/ /bka' nyan 'gyur ro gtubs na shing / /skud pa ser po bcings nang ngag/ spang leb mnan na mnan par 'gyur/ /ra lpags brabs na
bka' nyan 'gyur/ /srad bu yungs kar la bzlas te/ /'chang na gang 'dod srung bar byed/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM tsaN+Da la ma hA

ro Sha Na hUM traM thA ma hA tsaN+Da/ a tsa la ka na hUM hUM hUM a pra ti ha ta/ ta thA ga ta dz+nyA sma ra hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du/ /tsan+dan sbags pa'i pad+ma ni/ /sngags
bcas ci tsam bsgyur ba'i grangs/ /gser gyi dong tshe rnyed par 'gyur/ /bram ze 'am ni dge 'dun ras/ /rgyal po ras sam gro ga la/ /pad+ma mu khyud gnyis ldan bri/ /
lte bar oM hUM ming dang bcas/ /tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/ /phaT dang bcas pa 'dab mar bkod/ /mu khyud dang por rtsa sngags te/ /gnyis pa 'jam dpal sngags nyid
bri/ /dri dang me tog sogs mchod nas/ /skabs kyis dril nas lus la bcang / /gdon dang nad dang mu ge sel/ /g.yul du phyin pa rgyal bar 'gyur/ /yang na
ral gri so bzhir bri/ /'od kyi ri mo nang chud pa/ /ye d+harma la sogs kyis bskor/ /dbus su ming dang bcas pa yi/ /snying po sngags
ni khrigs su bri/ /'dis kyang sngon gyi yon tan 'gyur/ /mtho las 'khor ba'i bar du ni/ /mtho gang 'phang du yod pa bya/ /nang du mtshal gyis 'jam dpal
sngags/ /mgo ni gyen du bltas pa bri/ /kha la nye bar rten 'brel sngags/ /spra tshil las byas dgra yi gzugs/ /dug dang gri khrag gis bris nas/ /ming
yig gsod par bcas pa ni/ /ling+ga'i snying gar bcug byas te/ /dkyil 'khor gru gsum nag po yi/ /dbus su mtho gang brus byas te/ /nang bzhag steng
du par bu sbub/ /ji srid mar gyi tshes gcig nas/ /zla ba mi snang zhag bar du/ /nyin mo rten 'brel sngags bzlas te/ /mtshan dus khro bo spyan gcig pa'i/ /
sngags ni drag tu brjod par bya/ /mtshams dang ci srid mtshams par du/ /g.yon du bskor zhing rtsa ba'i sngags/ /drug cu rtsa bzhi'i grangs su brjod/ /'jam
dpal sngags kyis chos gos bsrung / /bde gshegs yi ge brgya pas ni/ /mchod rten la ni gseg shang gsil/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig pa dang / /
sngags la 'phya zhing sems can 'tshe/ /log lta log par spyod byed cing / /sems can la 'tshe byed pa ni/ /rgyal po khro bo che bcu dang / /'jig rten skyong dang rgyal
chen bzhi/ /ma tshogs gza' dang rgyu skar tshogs/ /bstan dga' rnams kyis myur du sgrol/ /rgyud gzhan dag la grags pa yi/ /bden pa'i mthu yang du ma brjod/ /
dur khrod sa la mchod rten ni/ /nag po gru gsum khru gang ba'i/ /srog shing nag po gsum pa la/ /bde gshegs yi ge brgya pas dkri/ /gur gum li khris bris
pa'o/ /mya ngan med shing gru gsum la/ /rgya gram dbang chen rim par bca'/ /laM dang staM b+ha ya nan brgyad/ /phyogs brgyad bri ba'i rwa dbus la/ /nye snying ming dang
bcas pa bri/ /de yi lte bar snying po ni/ /gsad pa'i ming bcas bri ba 'o/ /tshogs kyi bdag po gtor mas mchod/ /ma mo rnams dang legs ldan sras/ /sha khrag
me tog nag pos mchod/ /ci srid gsum dang bdun bar du/ /le lo med par byas gyur na/ /dge slong dge tshul bsnyen ldan gang / /sdom brtson de ni ldan gyur te/ /
sdig ldan myur du shi bar 'gyur/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /gtum po rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /sna tshogs las rnams thun mong ste/ /khyad par sbyor ba cung
zad bshad/ /yungs kar bsnun pas 'byung bo 'bros/ /ser ba srung na 'khor lo 'am/ /rnga dang dung la bri bar bya/ /g.yul du
'jug na ral gri sogs/ /nad la 'khor lo chu yungs kar/ /thod le kor gyis sa phor la/ /bris te sgro sbas spre'u srung / /spra tshil gzugs brnyan sor bzhi
pa/ /dur khrod thal bzlas sgo steng bzhag /nad pa gdon las srung bar nges/ /snying gar ming sngags spel bcug nas/ /tsher ma khar btsugs ngag rengs
byed/ /snying la btsugs na khros pa zhi/ /nan tan sems kyis gsod par nges/ /ling+kas rtags kyi nus pa med/ /yang na rabs chad thod pa la/ /ming sngags
bris te mi khrag bkang / /rabs chad dur sbas rigs rgyud 'chad/ /khyi nag thod par ming sngags bcas/ /dug bkang klu gnas sbas mdzes 'dzin/ /dgra yi
sgor sbas 'byed par byed/ /zhing du sbas na lo nyes byed/ /phyugs nad god 'byung zla dang 'byed/ /chu dong sbas na chu skam 'gyur/ /me dur sbas na rims kyis
'dzin/ /yang na dgra ming khrag gis bris/ /spra tshil gzugs kyi snying gar bcug /mchod rten nag po mtho gang ba'i/ /nang bcug dong bzhag lhung bzed sbub/
bram ze rigs bzhis sngags brjod cing / /nag po tshes nas phyis bskor zhing / /bden pa'i mthu brjod gzugs brnyan bsreg /dgra bo shi 'gyur the tshom med/ /gri
khrag bya rog 'ug pa'i khrag /ka tra ta yi lte ba la/ /ka ro ki yi dus su ni/ /gzugs la ming dang sngags bcas bri/ /rkang pas mnyes na rdul du 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin
pa'i bka' bzhin no/ /mtshon gyis bsad pa'i thod pa la/ /sngags dang yul lha'i ming spel bri/ /lha yi gnas bcug de steng du/ /sngags bzlas phur pa snying gar
gdab/ /gdug pa'i tsher ma'i hom sbar te/ /mi rta ba lang khyim he/ /sna tshogs khrag bsres 'di skad brjod/ /lha khyod yul 'dir thog ser phob/ /med na bskal
par khyod nyid sreg /de rjes dkar dang mngar mchod do/ /'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las/ /sbyor ba phran tshegs kyi le'u ste
brgyad pa'o// //de nas sbyin sreg las rnams kun/ /myur 'grub thabs ni bshad par bya/ /mngar gsum dur ba bsregs pa yis/ /gnod
rigs thams cad sel bar byed/ /ya ma shing 'bras bu gsum bsregs shing / /gdon nad thams cad zhi bar byed/ /'o ma can gyi yam shing la/ /'o ma
dur ba til dang 'bras/ /snying rje'i sems kyis brgya bsregs na/ /gnod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/ /ga pur mngar gsum 'bru
thams cad/ /dur ba dkar po'i yam shing rnams/ /'o ma can gyi shing la bsreg /nad dang gdon rnams thams cad zhi/ /'o ma sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad/ /
phyugs ngas chen po zhi bar 'gyur/ /dur ba mngar gsum ming bcas pas/ /bsregs pas rta phyugs nad zhi byed/ /shar lho nub byang phyogs kyi ni/ /dkar nag
dmar ser kha dog 'grub/ /khru gang khru gnyis tshad kyi thab/ /sor bzhir kha khyer rim pas gtang / /sems dpa' pad+ma'i rdo rje dang / /gcig pus zhi rgyas
dbang drag 'grub/ /de nas rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg ni/ /ci 'dod thob pa bshad par bya/ /pad+ma'i chu la 'bum phrag gcig /rgyal po thob ste blon po ni/ /ku mu da
la 'bum phrag gsum/ /zho dang mngar gsum dang bcas pa'o/ /a ba marga'i 'bras bu dang / /mngar gsum 'bum gyis yul bdag thob/ /rigs bzang
'bum phrag bdun gyis ni/ /yid la ci 'dod thob par 'gyur/ /dur ba til dang 'bras sogs bsreg /bud med bu bzang thob par 'gyur/ /nor 'dod pas
ni rkun po yi/ /lag pa g.yas pa mdzod bzhag nas/ /mchod cing gsol ba btab pas ni/ /nor rnams myur du thob par 'gyur/ /yang na rgya yi pags pa la/ /gur
gum gi'u wang yung bas ni/ /byi ba che brjid ser po bri/ /shar na mdzod phugs bltas par bzhag /zas kyi lhag mas mchod bya zhing / /gsol ba btab pas nor
rnyed 'gyur/ /pad+ma'i ze ba ka li ka/ /bri yang kus ni nor rnyed do/ /'bras bsregs pas kyang nor chen thob/ /ku mu da yi 'bras sogs bsreg /longs spyod che dang
sa gzhi 'thob/ /pad+ma zho dang sbrang rtsi mar/ /sbyin sreg 'bum gyis mchog stsol ba/ /gsum pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ /bil ba'i 'bras bu mngar gsum
bcas/ /'bum phrag gsum du bsregs pas ni/ /rang nyid rgyal po chen por 'gyur/ /mar dang nyungs kar dkar pos ni/ /nim pa'i shing la 'bum bsreg na/ /
snying po snying po rgyas par 'gyur/ /nas la sogs pa'i 'bru rigs rnams/ /gang bsregs gsol btab de rgyas 'gyur/ /gang 'dod gos kyi kha dog can/ /me tog
bsreg na gos rnyed 'gyur/ /sbos shing bsreg na 'khor g.yog 'phel/ /zho mar seng ldeng me la stong / /bsregs na nor rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ /de nas dbang
gi bsreg lugs bshad/ /til dang 'bras sogs phub ma bsregs/ /bud med dbang du byed pa'o/ /bri yang ku yi sbyin sreg gis/ /
byis pa rnams ni dbang du 'gyur/ /'o ma sbrang rtsi a ru ra'i/ /shing la bsreg na lha dbang byed/ /gsum po de dang gu gul sreg /gnod sbyin rnams ni dbang du
'gyur/ /mya ngan med pa'i yam shing gis/ /gnod sbyin mo rnams dbang du 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i yungs kar yungs mar bcas/ /bsregs pas rgyal po dbang
du 'gyur/ /de nas drag po'i las grub pa'i/ /sbyin sreg yang dag bshad par bya/ /ming bcas tshad dang nim pa bsregs/ /bstan sdang dgra bo myur du 'chi/ /dgra
ming dug gis nim pa la/ /bris te dug dang lhan cig tu/ /sbrul shun thum po lnga byas nas/ /thod pa lnga yi nang bzhag ste/ /lnga po yungs mar gyis bkang nas/ /
gsum ni skyes bu gnyis brtsegs la/ /khros pas gcig tu skra grol bas/ /sngags brjod thal bar gyur bar du/ /nyin phyed bsreg na dgra 'chi nges/ /'chi
ltas 'dam ma rtsa ba shun/ /ra khrag nyung mar tshwa rgya skyegs/ /tsha ba'i bud shing yam shing la/ bdun phrag ming dang bcas pa bsreg /stong phrag gnyis kyis rta
phyugs 'chi/ /bzhis ni bu dang chung ma 'chi/ /drug gis nye du gnyen 'dun brlag/ /brgyad kyis dgra yi rang srog 'chad/ /gal te skyabs su 'ongs gyur na/ /'o ma stong
bsregs rnal du sos/ /khrag dang dug phye nim pa'i 'bras/ /yungs mar la sbrags brgya rtsa brgyad/ /myos byed la bsreg dgra bo 'chi/ /yang na rus phye nim pa'i
lnga/ /rang gi khrag gam yungs mar sbags/ /yang na skye tshe dug dang ni/ /nim pa'i 'bras bu gsad par bya/ /yang na gri khrag gis bsregs pas/ /byad ma myur du
gsod par 'gyur/ /nim pa'i lnga dang ra khrag dug /dri ma lnga bcas gzugs snying gar/ /ming yig bcug nas phur bus gdab/ /rig sngags byad ma nyid log
'gyur/ /rgya skyegs mi rus phye ma yis/ /mi lpags rlon pa dgra gzugs bri/ /dug dang ske tshe cung zad byug /nim pa'i me la khros pas bsro/ /bsregs pas tsha
ba'i rims kyis 'chi/ /dur ba 'o mas sos par 'gyur/ /dug dang nim pa sgog skya dang / /mi rus phye bsregs phyugs rnams brlag /tsha gsum lan tshwa du
rang skyur/ /yungs mar ro skra sbrul shun dang / /nim pa'i lnga dang mi rus phye/ /skye tshe dug phye sgog tsong dang / /sgog skya tsher ma'i me la bsreg /dgra bo khrag tu skyugs
te 'chi/ /rgya skyegs lan tsha ba lang mkhris/ /bsreg na mchin gas nad kyis 'chi/ /sge'u gsher lan tshwa tsha ba gsum/ /gzugs
brnyan dur khrod mgal dum la/ /mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du bsreg /thig nag gis ni gsod par 'gyur/ /'o ma can gyi yams shing la/ /dkar gsum bsreg
na sos par 'gyur/ /dri chus sbangs pa'i sa las ni/ /thab khung byas te dug gis byug /nim pa'i 'dab mar dgra bo'i ming / /ra khrag gis bris rgyus pa dkris/ /
tsha gsum shing gi mer bsregs pas/ /rgyal po myur du 'chi bar nges/ /dug khrag lan tshwa tsha ba gsum/ /ming bcas gzugs brnyan nim pa'i mer/ /bsreg
na dgra bo dmu rdzing ngam/ /mdze nad kyis ni gsod par 'gyur/ /tsha gsum nim pa dug dang dur/ /khrag dang lan tshwa'i gzugs brnyan ni/ /lan tsha nim pa tsha
ba'i mar/ /byugs nas arga'i shing la bsregs/ /mdze nad chen pos gzung nas 'chi/ /ra khrag tshwa gsum nyungs mar sbos/ /nim pa'i lo ma na le sham/ /
nyungs mar dug bsregs tsha bas 'chi/ /na le sham mam dug dang tsha/ /gang du ra lnga che ba gsum/ /sol ba la ni dgra gzugs bya/ /nyungs mar byugs te bsreg
na 'chi/ /tsha gsum pa yi 'bras bu yi/ /nim pa'i 'dab ma dgra ming bri/ /thod par dug nyungs lhan cig bzhag /gang dur lnga btsos na 'ching / /ris ma byang du bltas nas kyang //
rang nyid lho phyogs blta bar bya/ /tshangs pa la sogs lha tshogs dang / /'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul can/ /ma mo mkha' 'gro sha za sogs/ /sa bcu'i dbang phyug byang chub
sems/ /rig 'dzin khro bo'i rgyal po dang / /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor lha rnams gson/ /sdig can nga rgyal gdug cing khro/ /chad lta sngags 'phya dkon mchog bcom/ /
bstan la sdang zhing sems can 'tsho/ /mtshams med can 'di bsgral du gsol/ /rlung gis 'phar zhing char gyis gsher/ /mes gdung rdul tshub skabs 'dir skye/ /
seng+ge mkha' lding stag khro bos/ /bcom zhing 'bu sbrang bung rgod kyis/ /khrag 'jib bya tshogs mkha' la khyer/ /mngon spyod las kyis bsam gtan no/ /de nas sna tshogs
las bshad pa/ /mi rus phye ma tshe skye tshe/ /gnod sbyin 'khrig pa dug shing la/ /tha dad ming bcas bsregs pas ni/ /bskrad dang dbye dang smyo bar byed/ /dur ba 'o mar
bcas pas sos/ /hang dur yan lag lnga 'bras bu/ /tsher ma'i mes bsregs smyo bar byed/ /tsha gsum lan tshwas tsha rims bskyed/ /yang na shing skam lta
bur bskams/ /dzam pa'i ra dang rang skyur bcas/ /dgra bo grang ba'i rims kyi 'debs/ /khwa'i sgro e raN+Da'i mar khus/ /byugs pa
da dur me la bsreg /lag stobs khwa ta lta bur ni/ /dgra bos mtha' kun tu 'khyam/ /ske tshe mi rus lan tshwa dug /nyungs mar nim pa'i me la bsreg /dgra bo rtag
tu 'thab pa dang / /nad rnams kun gyis 'debs par 'gyur/ /dur khrod thal ba sol bar bcas/ /dgra bo'i gzugs byas dum bur mnan/ /tsham dam phur
bus 'debs pa ni/ /phol mig nad ngan skyed par byed/ /bya rgod 'ug pa byi la sha/ /ne'u le'i bu rnams khyer ba'i mer/ /drug cu rtsa brgyad bsregs pa yis/ /
mthun gnyis myur ru 'byed par nges/ /khrag gcan ras la gzugs bris nas/ /rkang g.yon sker mnan tsham ngam bcas/ /'dod bcas sngags ni drag po yis/ /
brgyal dang rims nad mtsher nad bskyed/ /dgra yi skra dang rkang rjes sa/ /dgra gzugs dug dang ske tshes byug /tshor mes bsregs na rengs par 'gyur/ /dgra yi pha
rus dug rang skyur/ /gzugs byad nim pa'i mer bsregs na/ /dgra bo gdon chen nad kyis 'debs/ /phag rtug snu ha arga'i shing / /tsher mes sregs na mgo 'khor
'gyur/ /ne'u le byi la byi tsher spu/ /bsregs na bong bu brlag par 'gyur/ /mi dang ne'u le khwa rus pa/ /yungs mar nim pa'i me la bsreg /grong dang grong khyer bskrad par byed//
stag spu thod rus 'ug pa'i spu/ /sa ha me tog na le sham/ /nim pa'i lo ma dug sreg byed/ /nim pa'i 'bras bu dug lan tsha/ /da dur 'bru bsregs nad
skyed byed/ /dug khrag da dur 'bras bu yis/ /nim pa'i shing la dgra ming bri/ /tsha gsum lan tsha khrag gis byugs/ /lcags snod yungs mar nang bzhag nas/ /
nim pa'i shing gis me yis btso/ /dgra bo lha dang 'byed par 'gyur/ /mi khyi bya rgod rus phye dug /ske tshe yungs mar sbrul shun dang / /nim pa'i lnga dang skags lan
tshwa/ /tsher mes bsregs na nad kyis 'debs/ /ske tshe sbrul shun tsha ba'i mar/ /gzugs byas tsha ba'i me la gdung / /char ches pa dang / thog 'bab 'gyur/ /'phags pa rdo
rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las/ /sbyin sreg ga le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas tshangs pa khyab 'jug sogs/ /'khor gyi dkyil
'khor thams cad kyis/ /bzhengs te thal mo sbyar nas kyang / /snyan pas ched du 'di brjod do/ /e ma sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /thabs dang shes rab bsam du med/ /
thugs rjes gyur pa'i thugs kyis ni/ /mtshungs med rgya che dam chos gsungs/ /dug gi 'jigs pas sa steng 'khrigs/ /nyon mongs
mun 'jigs med pa yi/ /bdud rtsi 'od bzang 'di gus na/ /ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa stong par 'gyur/ /de nas tshangs sogs 'jig rten skyong / /rdzu 'phrul
ldan rnams kun 'dus nas/ /ngam zhing ched du brjod pa 'di/ /snyan pa'i tshig gis rab tu gsol/ /e ma sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag /sems can kun la sman
par dgyes/ /skyob chen 'jig rten mgon po yis/ /mtshungs med bsam gyis mi khyab thabs/ /gsungs pa 'di la gang gnas pa/ /'khor ba'i sdug
bsngal rgya mtsho sbyong / /'gro la sman mthong bsgrubs pas ni/ /lhag pa'i bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs/ /byang chub sems dpa'i
tshogs rnams kyis/ /ngo mtshar spyan ni gdangs nas su/ /ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ gdod nas thugs su 'gro don
chud/ /rtog med rang bzhin las grol nas/ /bsam gyis mi khyab go 'phang gsungs/ /'chang byed dang po ngan 'gro gcod/ /gnyis pa mthong chos dngos
grub byed/ /de rjes 'jigs med nga yi med/ /dogs pa spangs na zad par gyis/ /sa la bzhugs nas sems can don/ /ma bsams thogs pa med par byed/ /
gsang sngags rgyal po skyob kun la/ /sbyangs nas 'dod don kun grub ste/ /nam mkha' chu ser dag pa ltar/ /sgom pa bla med yid rgyas byed/ /de nas rig
pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs/ /ma lus pa rnams 'dus nas kyang / /gtso la me tog gtor byas te/ /ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /
dam pa'i chos kyang bsam mi khyab/ /'gro la phan dang don byed pa'i/ /cho ga'i ming dang shes rab dang / snying rje'i dbye bas rgyas gyur nas/ mnar med la sogs
ngan 'gro yi/ /'jigs rnams las rgal pad+ma ltar/ /rnal 'byor can de mdzes par spyod/ /de nas mthu stobs cher ldan pa'i/ /phyogs bcu'i khro bo kun 'dus
nas/ /shin tu dam pas snyan tshig gis/ /ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma sangs rgyas chos chen dang / /dge 'dun dkon mchog bsam mi khyab/ /'khor ba'i
mun pa chen por ni/ /bying bas blta dka' rtogs pa yis/ /sngags dang phyag rgya bsam mi khyab/ /mthong dang thos pa tsam gyis kyang / /blta dka' 'byung po
drag po rnams/ /lhag pa'i sems ni skyes par 'gyur/ /de nas rig pa'i lha mo che/ /spyan la sogs pa rgya chen rnams/ /ngo mtshar
gyur nas spyan gdangs te/ /snyan pas ched du 'di brjod do/ /e ma sangs rgyas rmad du byung / /e ma sangs rgyas dpa' bo che/ /e ma sangs rgyas rab tu zab/ /chos
rnams skye med 'gag pa med/ /sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs rol pa ltar/ /sgyu ma gdul bya tshim mdzad pa/ /spros pa dang bral spros pa ltar/ /sgyu ma rab tu 'phel
bar mdzad/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /ched gsum mi mjed 'jig rten khams/ /gdul ba dag la rab gzigs nas/ /'dul mdzad rdo rje
'chang ba la/ /ngo mtshar rmad kyi gsung gis ni/ /ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /oM zhes dang po phyag 'tshal bkra shis ster byed pa/ /ser sna rnam par dag
nas yo byad dbang thob dang / /gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ni/ /rab dga' ye shes khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal 'dud/ /tsaN
yig dri bzang tsan+dan byugs dang ngang tshul mtshungs/ /tshul khrims rnam par dag pas tshe la dbang ba dang / /las dang rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs
dang ni/ /dri med ye shes khro rgyal mi g.yo phyag 'tshal lo/ /Da yig nyon mongs sgrib pa gtor ba'i zhi gnas dang / /bzod pa dag pa skye ba la dbang thob pa dang / /mos pa
sna tshogs mkhyen pa zhes bya'i stobs dang ni/ /'od 'phro ye shes khro bo dbyug sngon phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma yig sgyu 'phrul chen po lhag mthong che ba'i bdag /brtson
'grus dag pas sems la yang dag dbang thob dang / /khams kyi rnam pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ni/ /'od byed ye shes gshin rje gshed po phyag 'tshal
lo/ /hA yig ma chags shes bya'i sgrib 'phrog sbyangs pa che/ /bsam gtan dag pas rdzu 'phrul la ni dbang thob dang / /thams cad dag tu 'gro ba'i lam dag stobs
dang ni/ /sbyang dka' ye shes rta mgrin kho bo phyag 'tshal lo/ /ro yig 'khor 'das nang bral shes dag las dbang thob/ /bsam gtan rnam thar ting 'dzin dang ni snyoms
zhugs pa'i/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang lta ba kun mkhyen stobs/ /mngon gyur ye shes 'dod pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal lo/ /Sha yig mnyam nyid sdom chen
dbang phyug chen po rgyal/ /stobs chen dag las mos pa la ni dbang thob dang / /sngon gyi gnas rnams rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs/ /ring du song ba'i ye shes bdud rtsi
'khyil la 'dud/ /Na yig skyes bu chen po sgra chen klu mchog gtso/ /smon lam dag pas smon lam che la dbang thob dang / /dbang po
mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs/ /mi g.yo ye shes khro bo stobs chen phyag 'tshal lo/ /hUM yig hu lu sprin gdengs 'brug sgra gad rgyangs can/ /
thabs dag pas ni ye shes che la dbang thob dang / 'chi 'pho dang ni gang zhig skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs/ /legs pa'i blo gros ye shes khro bo hUM mdzad 'dud/ /phaT
sgras bag chags kun gtor dag pas shel dang mtshungs/ /ye shes dag pas chos la dbang ni thob pa dang / /zag pa thams cad yang dag zad pas mkhyen
pa'i stobs/ /chos kyi sprin gyi ye shes khro bo gnod mdzes 'dud/ /de nas chos rje thub pas ni/ /ljags kyi dbang po bkram byas nas/ /'dzum pa mdzad pas rab
gzigs te/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus/ /lag na rdo rje mthu chen la/ /snyan pa'i gsung gis bka' stsal pa/ /mchog tu brtan par rab bsngags
pa/ /rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /mi gang bsod nams dman pa 'am/ /mtshams med la sogs byed pa yang / /rgyud 'dir zhugs pa'i de ma thag/ /gser 'gyur gyi
ni rtsi bzhin du/ /log rtog ma lus dag nas kyang / /rtog med bde ba'i skur byung ste/ /rmi lam bzang bo'i sems bzhin du/ /rnam 'phrul sna tshogs cir yang snang / /
mu mtha' med pa 'khor ba'i mtsho/ /bskal ba'i gzings chen bla med 'di/ /chags gsang med pa'i tshul du ni/ /khyod kyis rtag tu gzung bar bya/ /lag na rdo rje stobs po
ches/ /ston pa la ni 'di gsol to/ /rgyud 'di phyung ma thag tu ni/ /gdul dka' ba ni rab tu zhi/ /sa steng nad dang gdon mu ge/ /bar chad gnod pa kun dang bral/ /slar
yang bstan pa 'phel ba'i phyir/ /brtan por bdag gis gzung bar bgyi/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro drag po rnams/ /yid kyis brtul zhugs phyung nas kyang / /rgyud
'di 'dzin pa'i rjes su 'brang / /lha dang 'jig rten pa dang ni/ /ma mo srin mo mkha' 'gro ma/ /sha za gnod sbyin srin po rnams/ /rgyud 'di 'dzin pa skyong bar byed/ /
rgyud 'dzin longs spyod spel bar byed/ /ston pas gsungs pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /legs so shin tu cher legs so/ /rgyud 'dzin rnal 'byor can chen de/ /rgyun du srung
zhing blo 'phel mdzod/ /de skad kyi ni gsung thos nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang / /mkha' 'gro ma mo 'jig rten skyong / /lha klu gnod spyin dri zar bcas//
thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor de rnams/ /dgyes te thal sbyar mngon par dga'i/ /mi g.yo thugs rje'i lcags kyu bzung bas 'khor ba'i btson ra nas/ /lha klu
'bum phrag 'tshe bral dkar po dge ba'i kun slong sems/ /skyes nas byang chub rin chen nor thob mdzad pas rmad byung mtshar/ /rgyas pa'i tshul bsdus bstan pa'i chos 'di dman la
shin tu gsang / /'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa las/ /mngon par dga' ba'i le'u ste bcu ba'o// //'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus
pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ /AR+ya a pa lo ki te shwa ra aSh+To t+ta ra sha ta ka nA ma d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/ bod skad du/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'tshal lo/ /na maH
sarba bud+d+ha/ bo d+hi satwA nA na/ sa man+ta a mo g+ha/ a pra ti ha ta/ shA sa nA nA na/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ ma hA bo d+hi satwA ya/ badzra satwA ya/ badzra bi pU lA
ya/ pad+ma saM b+ha bA ya/ pad+ma yo na ye/ tad+ya thA/ oM hrIHka ra shrI ka ra pra b+ha ka ra badzra satwA/ badzra saM b+ha ba/ pad+ma saM b+ha ba/ pad+ma sA ga ra/ pad+ma go tsa ra/ ba ra da/
ma hA kA ru Ni ka /kA ru Ni saM b+ha ba/ hUM hUM/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ da ra da ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka ma hA shung+d+ha sa twa swA hA/ de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mgo bo la byugs te bka' stsal pa/ yon tan rin
po che'i phung po chen po khyod kyis gzungs sngags 'di bshad pas/ sems can rnams la sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i chos bstan pa legs so legs so/ /'di ni thos pa
tsam gyis kyang sems can rnams shin tu rnam par dag par byed pa'o/ /gang la la nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa des ni yon
tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / dag pa'i mchog kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i dbang po dbang phyug chen po dpag tshad 'bum phrag du mar khyab
cing / 'jig rten gyi khams gsum po kun tu rgyas ko lta ste/ 'khor dang bcas pa dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
kyis mgo bo btud nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sa'i dbang phyug dpa' bo rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas mngon par
bstod pa/ /sa yi dbang phyug rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ba/ /srid gsum ma lus yon tan chen po'i bdag /dri med skyon bral gsal
ba'i dkyil 'khor can/ /snying rjes khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya che ba/ /rab dga' rab dgyes rab tu ston pa'o/ /bskal pa bzang po rnam par zhi ba'i mchog /
shin tu rnam dag yon tan chen po'i bdag /rnam dag du mar grags pa'i me tog thod/ /rab mchog srid gsum dag gi mig gcig pa/ /mchog sbyin
'gro ba kun gyi 'byor ba mdzes/ /dpag med pas kyang dpag med bskal par 'byung / /skyabs dang yid 'phrog dag cing sel bar mdzad/ /nor bu'i thod
can rdo rje las byung ba/ /srid gsum gcig pu dpa' bo pad+ma'i spyan/ /thos pa'i rgya mtsho sems can kun bas dpa'/ /'gro ba thams cad rnam par grol
mdzad mchog /snyam cha 'gul zhing pad+ma dag pa bsnams/ /dbang phyug bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i thor tshugs can/ /tshul bzang yon tan rgyan du 'tsham
ba'i gzugs/ /'jigs pa'i rlung chen 'tshubs pa'i mtshon cha can/ /dge ba'i rgyu ste dam pa stsol ba'i rgyu/ /tshul gyi longs spyod bde chen mchog gi rgyu/ /
dkyil 'khor mchog gi spyod yul rgyu gcig pa/ /srid gsum sgrol ba'i zam pa gcig pu lags/ /dkyil 'khor mchog gi rgyan te sdig med pa/ /gser
mdog 'od rgyan rten du gyur pa ste/ /mnyam pa nyid kyis mi mnyam mtshungs par 'gyur/ /sa brnyes 'od zer rgyas pa rgyan phreng mnga'/ /chen po'i mche ba thogs
pa med pa ste/ /snga ma mun pa kun bsal nyon mongs med/ /dge ba dag pas spyod yul rnam par dag /tshul gyi dkyil 'khor yangs shing rnam par dag/ srid
gsum dbang phyug pad+ma las byung ba/ /srid gsum bde chen yangs pa'i dbang phyug ste/ /dbang phyug mi g.yo rnal 'byor mkhas pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa chen po rab mchog yangs/ /nor bu'i rgyan te rdo rje'i rgyan du thogs/ /pad+mas brgyan pa lhun po las byung ba/ /dge snod yon tan chen po'i snod gcig pa/ /bde la
longs spyod rnam 'dren chen po'i bdag /smon lam rgya chen rgya mtsho ldan pa ste/ /'gro ba srid par lhung ba grol mdzad pa/ /sa dang mnyam pa thams cad gzigs
par mdzad/ /skal bzang bskal pa stong gis gnang ba po/ /rdo rje mchog gis sgeg pa'i dkyil 'khor can/ /yon tan rnam grangs khyad par dkyil 'khor
ba/ /dge ba'i mtshan nyid dpa' bo'i rtsal mnga' ba/ /de bzhin nyid chos ro mkhyen spyod yul can/ /cod pan thig le dmar po'i dkyil
'khor ldan/ /lha chen brgya mnga' sum cu gsum bdag dbang / /lha dang lha min dbang bcas rnams kyis btud/ /brtson 'grus brgya dang ldan zhing rtsal stong mnga'//
bsod nams brgya mnga' mtshon cha brgya 'chang ba/ /pad+ma brgya pa pad+ma nyid las byung / /dkyil 'khor brgya yi dbus na mdzes pa ste/ /chos brgya ldan pa mchog
stong ston pa po/ /sangs rgyas stong phrag mang pos yongs bstod pa/ /bskal pa rab 'byams mang por mkhas pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor mang po dag na dpa' ba'i
sku/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i mthu mnga' ston pa po/ /rgya chen dri med dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs/ /rab dga' bsgyings pa 'thor mdzad me tog thod/ /na
bza' dar dkar la mnabs 'od mdzad pa/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor thugs rjes brgyan pa lags/ /cha phrar gser mdzad mtha' yas zad mi shes/ /dpa'
bo'i nyi ma 'od zer rgyan mnga' ba/ /nor bu'i dkyil 'khor zla 'dra 'od gsal zhing / /nyi mas kha phye pad+ma mchog bsnams pa/ /me tog mtshon cha thogs pa'i
lha zhes grags/ /gtsug phud gsum pa tshangs sras skye rgu'i bdag /btsun rigs mchog ste rigs chen nang du skyes/ /rang gi rigs gsal dbang chen dkyil 'khor ba/ /
pad+ma bzang po'i rigs mchog thig le'i mtshan/ /spyan bzang dge ba'i lha rnams rten gyur pa/ /gsang sngags mang po 'dzin pa'i dbang phyug po/ /tshogs chen 'dun ma
'dus pa'i mnga' bdag lags/ /spyan gsum dag gis dkyil 'khor mdzes gyur pa/ ka la ping+ka'i skad kyis sdang ba 'dul/ /mda' dang rus gzhu stobs
chen mtshon cha bsnams/ /stobs kyi lha ste stobs dang brtson pas 'dul/ /rgyan rnams sna tshogs legs par spras pa ste/ /rgyal ba rigs sngags 'chang ba mang
pos bstod/ /tshogs mchog dga' byed rnams kyis rab bstod pa/ /chu srin 'dzin khri 'jigs las rab grol mdzad/ /gzugs mang mnga' zhing bde skyid rab
sbyin pa/ /lha yul 'gro ba'i khyad par dkyil 'khor can/ /mtshungs med pas kyang mtshungs med mthu rtsal mnga'/ /stabs gshegs yon tan mche mchog
'od zer ldan/ /'jig rten nang na mkhas pa spyan ras gzigs/ /sa gzhi'i dkyil 'khor dbus kyi dkyil 'khor can/ /'od zer mang po stong phrag zad mi shes//
nyon mongs rdul rnams thams cad sel mdzad pa/ /mtha' dang bral ba kun tu gzigs pa ste/ rab zhi kun las 'phags pa'i
spyod yul can/ /don dam tshul la sems can gcig dpa' ba/ /theg pa bzang po 'dzin pa'i nyi ma lags/ /dul dang spyan dang tshul la dad pa bsnyes/ /
skyu rgu rnams kyi dri ma ma lus bcom blo gros bzang po rab dgyes ston pa po/ bde ldan gos rgyan yang ba sna tshogs can/ bcom ldan 'byung ba 'jigs
pa med par mdzad/ /rtag tu dge ba kun mchog sbyin pa po/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i rnam thar brnyes pa'i blo/ /bde la longs spyod che 'byung dri ma med/ /zhal
gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas shing dri med pa/ /ming dang sred med brgya byin lag pa'i mchog/ /'jig rten mang po gzigs pa'i dbang phyug go/ /stobs dang rigs dang
mthu stobs che ba lags/ /sangs rgyas mtshungs shing chos mchog rin chen mtshungs/ /dge 'dun mtshungs shing chags bral thub par dka'/ /khyad par
gsum 'phags rin chen mchog chen mtshungs/ /khyab bdag nyon mongs rnam gsum rdul bsal ba'i/ /rdo rje sems mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
pad+ma dri med phyag gi dbus bsnams pa/ /thor tshugs can la gzugs ldan cod pan thogs/ /spyi bo 'od dpag med rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal/ /de nas bcom ldan
rang byung mun sel ba/ /rnga chen sgra ltar brtan pas bka' stsal pa/ /mchog chen rdo rje'i glu la bstod pa yi/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad skyon sel legs pa mnga'/ /
ci ste la la rtag tu dge mchog 'dod/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang la ni bstod byed pa/ /des ni ring po mi thogs yon tan gyi/ /longs spyod mchog chen chos ni
thob par 'gyur/ /mi ni gang zhig rtag tu 'dis bstod la/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang dam pa sbyin par byed/ /sdig pa rnams kyang de la 'byung mi 'gyur/ /'dod
pa gang yin bde blag de yis 'thob/ /de ni sdig pa'i dri mas ma gos te/ lam srang bzang por dmigs te 'gro bar 'gyur/ /srid gsum skyags 'os gcig
pu pad+ma skyes/ /de 'dra'i chos kyi mchog la spyod par 'gyur/ /de ltar ming gi khyad par grub 'dod cing / /gang zhig rtag tu bde bar 'dod pa yis/ /'gro kun skye rgu'i
bdag po spyan ras gzigs/ /pad+ma las byung rtag tu bstod par gyis/ /bcom ldan 'das bla ma 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa
brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya mai tri nA ma aSh+To t+ta ra sha ta ka d+hA ra Ni man+t+ra sa hi ta/ bod skad du/
'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po byams pas rang gi snying po smras pa/ na mas+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAn/ sarba thA ga tA nAn/ ta d+ya thA/ oM sa ra sa ra/ su ru su ru/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA d+ha ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/
ma hA tsa ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ma hA b+ha ra/ kam+pa kam+pa/ ma hA kam+pa hUM/ ma hA s+pha ra Na/ d+harma a gra sA ga ra swA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
kye ma gzungs chen po 'di ni yon tan che ba ste/ mtha' yas par khyab pa/ bskal pa bye ba phrag mang por yang shin tu thos par dka' ba/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad
ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snyed kyis bsnyen bkur mdzad pa/ sgrib pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'khrug pa
dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad las thar bar byed pa/ sems can gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa yongs su thar bar byed pa
ste/ shin tu dkon pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lha dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa nor bu'i cod pan gyis bsgyings pa/ rgyan phreng rab tu g.yo
ba rnams kyis spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa'i mchog 'phags pa byams pa la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ dpa' bo
chen po thabs brnyes pa/ /rgyal tshab mi yi bdag po ste/ /'jig rten bdag po rnam par gsal/ /dar ba chen po mngon par rgyas/ /tshan chen stobs ldan che ba ste//
de bzhin gshegs shing rdul dang bral/ /dbang chen brtse ldan 'od ldan pa/ /sa yi dbang phyug rnam par gnon/ /rgyal chen mtshon che brgya pa ste/ /mtshon cha
chen po rdo rje'i mtshon/ /yon tan 'od rgyas bsgyings pa ste/ /nor bu'i rna cha'i rgyan thogs pa/ /srid gsum dge na dpa' ba'i sku/ /rgya mtsho lta bu'i spyod yul can//
lhun po zla 'byin ti se yi/ /rtse nas dkyil 'khor 'char ba po/ /dkyil 'khor chen po longs spyod pa/ /rab tu dga' ba de bzhin des/ /yongs su dga' ldan
chen po'i lha/ /che ba lha rnams kun gyi mchog /sangs rgyas gdung brgyud rgyas mdzad cing / /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rgyan dang ldan/ /sangs rgyas longs spyod
longs par spyod/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa ston pa po/ /ti si zla 'byin bzhin du gnas/ /sa yi dbang phyug bde mdzad pa/ /rdo rje'i pad+ma
legs par skyes/ /chos kyi longs spyod longs par spyod/ /sa dang mnyam pa thub par dka'/ /snang bar byed pa 'byung ba po/ /srid gsum ye shes nyi ma
lags/ /gtso bo chen po cher grags pa/ /seng+ge chen po stobs po che/ /cha lugs chen po zhal che ba/ /skye bo ngan dang sdug bsngal 'dul/ /rdo rje byi ru bai DUR+ya/ /
nor bu'i dbu thod rgyan du thogs/ /byi ru gser gyi gcal bkram la/ /sku chen zhabs kyi stabs kyis gshegs/ /zhal gdangs nyi ma du ma'i gzi/ /lcang
lo cod pan dbu thod can/ /rig sngags 'chang brgyas zhabs la gtugs/ /brjed par bya ba rnams kyis mchod/ /nor bu rgyan 'gul 'od zer gyis/ /
brang gi phyogs rnams dag par byas/ /cod pan can te 'od 'tsher ba/ /nyi ma bye ba brgya 'od ldan/ /rin chen sna tshogs mchog bkram zhing / /dri med dkyil
'khor rab tu 'phro/ /rlung gis ma lus bskyod pa yi/ /'bar ba chen po'i lta ba can/ /'od zer mang pos phog pa yi/ /phan pa'i thabs ni rab ston pa/ /
brjid pa'i tshul gyis bshad pa yi/ /'od kyi zhal gsal rnga yab bskyod/ /dpung rgyan 'od zer spel mar bkod/ /tshon bris shin tu mdzes par 'tsher/ /lhun
po phrad cing 'khrug pa ltar/ /ha ha zhes pa'i sgra chen sgrog /rdo rje chen po'i rtse mo can/ /shin tu dga' mdzad bde sbyin pa/ /byams pa'i dkyil 'khor go char bgos//
btsan pa kun las rnam par rgyal/ /snying rje'i stobs las byung ba ste/ /mtshon cha chen po shin tu 'bar/ /byams pa byams pa'i rtog pa can/ /kun nas dpa' ba'i
dkyil 'khor ba/ /ma pham thub med dag pa ste/ /sangs rgyas cha lugs mnyam med che/ /byams pa'i snying po snying po che/ /byams pa'i pad+ma las byung ba/ /rdo rje 'chang
chen rdo rje can/ /rdo rje'i bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor ba/ rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis btud/ /de bzhin bsten cing bstod pa'o/ /grub pa chen po'i rig sngags
grub/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mdzes par mdzad/ /thams cad grub mdzad grub pa po/ /sangs rgyas gdung gi sdong chen lags/ /gsang sngags chen po'i rnam par
nges/ /mdo sde'i bkod pa mdo sdud pa/ /nges gyur nges pa'i 'od sgron gyi/ /snang bas dri ma sel bar mdzad/ /'bar brtsa dmar 'od snang ba/ /dkyil 'khor dkar
po che ba ste/ /gzhung dang mthun pa'i chos dbyings dang / /nye bar gyur cing shin tu nges/ /swA hA swA hA'i bdag po mchog /'od zer bde legs
bde legs mdzad/ /stobs che 'chang ba bkra shis pa/ /nyi ma 'dra ste snyoms pa lags/ /stobs byed rgyal ba'i longs spyod ldan/ /mkha' ltar dri med spyod
yul can/ /dpa' bo rdo rje 'joms par mdzad/ /rdo rje chen po rab sgrub pa/ /sgrub pa po ste rtsod pa med/ /dkyil 'khor ldan pa rdo rjes ston/ /rlung chen shugs
kyis bskyod pa yi/ /g.yo dang 'brug sgrog sgra ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul pad+ma ste/ /de bzhin nyid kyi mtsho las skyes/ /mngon shes chen po mngon shes
brnyes/ /khyab bdag sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /de nas sa yi dbang phyug po/ /byams pa'i dkyil 'khor byams pa la/ /bstod nas kun mkhyen gnod bral
ba/ /thub pa'i nyi mas bka' stsal pa/ /kye ma ming brgya rtsa brgya mchog /ming gi yon tan 'od ldan la/ /bde dang phun sum tshogs sgrub pa/ /thabs chen bla
na med pa ste/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni/ /'jig rten kun gyis bde skyed pa/ /'di ni bton pa tsam gyis kyang / /sdig pa thams cad dag par 'gyur/ /sdig
pa dag las rgyal ba yi/ /byams pa bstod pa'i gnas po la/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'dis/ /ming ni la la gang bstod pa/ /de la lha la sogs kun dang / /lag na rdo rje stobs
chen rnams/ /rtag pa nyid du sdug bsngal kun/ /gtan du bsal phyir brtson par byed/ /gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog /myur du 'don pa'i mi de ni/ /sangs rgyas sa yang thob 'gyur
te/ /'di la the tshom yong med do/ /nang par mal nas langs nas ni/ /gang zhig byams pa'i sems kyis bstod/ /de la byams pa rtogs pa yi/ /byams pa bde legs byed par 'gyur/ /
de phyir dri ma thams cad sel byed cing / /sdig 'joms yon tan thams cad bskyed pa dang / /de bzhin 'jig rten sdug bsngal sel ba yi/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad ched du dag par lhogs//
'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya kha gar+b+ha aSh+To t+ta ra sha ta ka nA
ma d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ 'phags
pa nam mkha'i snying po zhal ras rgya che zhing spyan gyis 'od 'phro bas nam mkha'i dkyil dri zhim par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha'i spyod yul can sa'i
dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM swasti ka mA lak+Shi bi pu la sam+b+ha ba/ d+harma d+hA tu go tsa ra swA hA/
gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu ngan song dang ngan 'gro thams cad ni/ /rab tu zhi bar gyur/ sa yang g.yos par gyur/ rnga bo che dag gi sgra yang grags par gyur/
sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye 'khor gyi dkyil
'khor na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams nam mkha'i snying po dkyil 'khor mngon sum pa rnams kyi swA hA'i mchog gi gzungs/ /'byung bar shin tu dka'
ba/ bsod nams chen po/ sdig pa dang nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ma/ rin po che'i phung por gyur pa 'di
nyon cig dang / 'di thos pas dri ma med par 'gyur zhing legs par khrus byas par 'gyur la shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma lta bur 'gyur
te/ 'khor ba'i 'dam gyis mi gos so/ /nyi ma lta bur 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad snang bar byed do/ /zla ba lta bur 'gyur te/ sems can thams
cad rab tu sim par byed do/ /nam mkha' lta bur 'gyur te/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi gos so/ /sa gzhi lta bur 'gyur te/ mtho dman med
do/ /lhun po lta bur 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyis bskyod par mi nus so/ /thar pa lta bur 'gyur te/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi gos so/ /de la
sogs pa yon tan stong phrag bgrangs pa tshad med grangs med pa dag thob par 'gyur te/ nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / brjod pa dang / ston pa tsam
dang / bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis gang ci yang rung ste/ de'i 'dod pa dang / smon pa dang / re ba de dag grub par 'gyur ro/ /bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis
kyang char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / sdang bas dkrugs pa dang / mi nad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / gnod pa 'byung ba dang / 'jigs pa'i dus dang /
'chi ba dang / chom rkun dang / mgon med pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / gcan gzan dang / mu ge'i sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su srung bar byed pa/
bde ba dang / 'byor pa dang / ci 'dod pa dang / ci la dga' ba thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis ha ha zhes ca co dang /
ga zha bton te sgra ring zhes byas nas gos dang rgyan sna tshogs bskyod de snying nas phyag 'tshal nas byang chub sems dpa' thams
cad la dbang byed pa 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i bsngags pa rgya mtsho'i bstod pa yang dag par brjod pa/ nam mkha'i snying
po srid gsum sems can mchog /'byor ldan blo gros rin chen rgya mtsho mnga'/ /sems can dag pa bla med rin chen mchog /thar pa'i sa bon 'khor
ba'i sdug bsngal sel/ /kun mkhyen tshul mkhyen legs dang legs min mkhyen/ /thar mkhyen chos mkhyen bde dang mi bde mkhyen/ /lam mkhyen
gces mkhyen dge dang mi dge mkhyen/ /dus mkhyen dge mkhyen stobs dang / stobs min mkhyen/ /'gro mchog chos mchog sems can yon tan mchog/
lam mchog sngags mchog tshul dang tshul min mchog /rgyan mchog chos mchog 'dzin dang mi 'dzin mchog /dag mchog rtogs mchog mchog dang mchog
min mchog /zhi rab snying rje'i rab ste 'khor gyi rab/ /'od rab thar pa'i rab ste rten gyi rab/ /rgya rab sngags kyi rab ste thugs brtse'i rab/ /mnyam rab sems
can rab ste gsum rig rab/ /legs sgron mchog sgron stobs dang stobs min sgron/ /thar sgron rigs sgron rgyal dang rgyal min sgron/ /dge sgron gzi sgron nor
bu'i 'od kyi sgron/ /rgyu skar zla ba'i rgyan las shar ba'i sgron/ /mchog 'od yon tan kun gyi 'od zer 'od/ /legs 'od thar pa'i pho brang rten gyi 'od/ /'od chen
gti mug rab tu 'byed pa'i 'od/ /rdo rje'i 'od 'bar bde ba'i 'od 'chang ba/ /rdo rje'i dbang po 'dren dbang sems can dbang / /rin chen 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgyan
dbang po/ /rgyal dbang rgyal ba'i stobs rgyun tshad med dbang / /dpa' bo rig sngags 'chang dbang srid gsum dbang / /rdo rje bzang po rngo 'od rdo rje 'bar/ /rdo rje
sems dpa' rdo rje 'bar bas brgyan/ /rdo rje 'od can rdo 'dzin rdo rje drag /rdo rje rgya chen rdo rje rab mchog dbang / /na bza' sngo zhing sku yi cha lugs sngo/ /sku mdog sngo
zhing sngo ba'i 'od kyis brgyan/ /ral gri rno 'jebs sngo zhing brtan pa bsnams/ /mkha' sngo gzhal med khang 'bar nang na bzhugs/ /lha zhal dri med shin tu mi bzad
'bar/ /rab tu drag la 'od zer 'phro zhing 'gyur/ /sdig sel rdul ltar 'khrul byed phreng mchog can/ /klog gi stobs kyis snang bas sgeg la brtan/ /ral gri
mtshon thogs dbang ldan mthu stobs mtshon/ /rdo rje'i mtshon thogs mda' dang mdung thung 'jigs/ /'khor lo'i mtshon thogs
bcibs pa ri dang 'khrul/ /gsal zhing mtshon thogs bgegs kyi stobs 'joms pa/ /bde 'byung 'jig rten gsum bdag rdo rje'i dbyug /sku rnams
thams cad nyi ma'i 'od kyis brgyan/ /grags pa'i rigs su byung bas rgyal po mdzad/ /mu tig phreng bas sgeg cing mdzes par bgyis/ /sku mdzes brnyes
shing phun sum tshogs pa brnyes/ /rab 'byams mchog brnyes sa la 'jug pa brnyes/ /mthu stobs lhag pa brnyes shing grub brnyes la/ /rig pa
gsum gyi stobs brnyes mthu brnyes pa/ /bde 'dren zhi ba 'dren cing 'od 'dren pa/ /cha lugs gsal mchog dar ba chen po 'dren/ /byams 'dren nyi ma
'dren cing skye rgu 'dren/ /legs 'dren zhing gi stobs 'dren snying rje can/ /dri med cha lugs gsal ba cha lugs 'bar/ /rnam grangs sgeg pas grags
pa'i ba dan can/ /'gro ba'i skyabs 'byed 'jug dang ldog pa mkhyen/ /longs spyod gsal bar ston pa'i sems kyis 'jug /sku dmar sku mthon sku
mdzes sku bzang ba/ /sku ser sku dkar dar ba chen po'i sku/ /sku rol rdo rje'i sku mnga' spyan legs sku/ /rigs sku rig sngags 'chang ba rin chen bsnams/ /gtsug
gi nor bu gtsug can cod pan mchog /cod pan can te chos 'dzin rdo rje mchog /dpal 'dzin rin chen dam pa 'chang ba'i mchog /sngags bzhi phyag rgya 'chang
ba phun sum tshogs/ /rab mdzes mkha' la gshegs shing rab tu rgyu/ /srid gsum nyi ma gcig pu 'od stong mnga'/ /ri rtser 'char ba bdal legs bkra shis
pa/ /yon tan mthu stobs khyad par rnam par grags/ /nor bu chen po nor sdug nor bu'i 'od/ /nyi ma'i nor bu tshul spyod nor bu 'bar/ /yid bzhin nor bu 'gro
kun mgon gcig pu/ /nam mkha'i dkyil na nor bu gcig snang ba/ /sems can rnam dag yangs shing rnam par grags/ /srid gsum srung ma gcig pu rgyal
sras mchog /zhi ba rab tu zhi ba skyabs 'os rtag /skye rgu'i bdag po pad 'byung pad+ma skyes/ /kun nas 'od bzang legs bshad chos mnga' ba/ /dar ba legs
bshad rab dul legs bshad phyag /blo bzang 'od bzang bde ldan skye gnas bzang / /mkhas rab zhi rab mchog gi chos dang ldan/ /zhi mdzad rgyal 'byung bde ba
'byung ba'i gnas/ /'od kyi 'byung gnas bde mdzad dbang du mdzad/ /legs 'byung shes rab 'byung gnas stobs bskyed pa/ /snying
rje'i 'byung gnas blo bzang rnam grangs mdzad/ /rnam grol nges grol shin tu grol ba'i blo/ /blo yangs par ni bkram zhing rnam par grags/ /kun tu longs spyod
sgo ste bla yi mchog /blo gros brtan pa dkon mchog gsum las bsgrubs/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma mda' rgyas 'dra ba'i zhal/ /dag cing spyan yangs cha lugs yid
du 'thad/ /snying po gsal ba'i snying po brtan zhing dul/ /ngo bo nyid kyi rgyun brnyes rab gsal ba/ /spyan zur mda' ni rab dul gtad legs pa/ /'jigs med zhal
ras ston gyi zla ba 'dra/ /mdung thung brgya yi mtshon mchog mtshon cha rdzogs/ /drag po 'jigs pa sdig sel gsum las skyes/ /rab dul mkhas pa 'grogs
dga' 'dris pa sla/ /rab tu drag ba gnyen rab gser mdog can/ /lha chen bde byed gsal shing phyag na bsnams/ /spyan gsum rig pa gsum ldan me gsum
sel/ /'od bzang me tog mtshon thogs me tog mnga'/ /na bza' bzang mnabs g.yas 'phen tshabs cher 'phen/ /legs bris sna tshogs mtshon cha sna
tshogs mnga'/ /na bza' sna tshogs sna tshogs rgyan gyi dpal/ /zhal ras zla ba 'od zer rgyas pa 'dra/ /zhal mdangs bstan pas 'jig rten kun 'byor mdzad/ /
bzhad pa nyi ma'i 'od zer rab 'jebs mnga'/ /zhal mdangs rgya mtsho gsal mdzad lam me ba/ /dbang chen rdo rje'i thog legs 'jigs pa'i sgra/ /rdo rje
drag po nor bu g.yo ba 'dzin/ /sgra snyan snang bar mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan/ /blo gros chen po blo gros rna ba'i mchog /rgyan 'dzin dpal 'dzin rin chen zhal
dang ldan/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba kun gyi gnas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mgon sras phreng ba bzang / /stobs chen 'jig rten blo gros ngo bo nyid/ /skye rgu'i bdag po
bka' lung mnyam zhing brtags/ /mi yi mnga' bdag mtho ris skyed pa'i rgyu/ /sgyu 'dra 'dod pa'i mda' dang rdo rje can/ /mthu stobs mnga' zhing spyan bzang
sdug par ldan/ /ston pa bzang po stong nyid lam gyi stegs/ /gces gsum 'phel ba'i rgyu la 'jug par mdzad/ /brtan po rgyu la rab tu nges gyur pa/ /dkyil
'khor dam pa kun gyi slob dpon lags/ /gcig pu skye rgu'i dkyil 'khor cho ga mkhyen/ /rnam par snang mdzad zhing gi gnas nas skyes/ /dbang bskur
brnyes shing sa bcur legs par gnas/ /gnas chen son pa mchog gnas gcig pu lags/ /skye rgu rnams kyi nyon mongs sel
ba dang / /sdig 'joms mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di thos nas/ /bde gshegs sras mchog su zhig 'don byed pa/ /'jig rten zla ba gcig shar bzhin du snang / /
nam mkha'i snying po sems can gcig pu yi/ /mdun 'dug nang bar bstod pa 'di brjod yang / /de ni srid gsum sems can mchog 'gyur zhing / /dri ma'i
gnas kun las kyang thar par 'gyur/ /g.yul dang 'thab rtsod shin tu mi bzad dang / /mu ge'i gnod pa mi nad byung ba na/ /mkhas pa su zhig sngar langs
dad skyes nas/ /nam mkha'i snying po la ni bstod byed pa/ /de ni 'jigs pa'i 'byung gnas thams cad dang / /sdug bsngal 'byung 'dren sdig pa rnams las
grol/ /des ni zhi mchog mchog bde kun gnas dang / /bde ba rgya chen nges par thob par 'gyur/ /bde 'thob longs spyod 'phel bar bya ba'am/ /rgyal srid
'thob dang byad gzugs nor 'thob dang / /rigs 'thob yon tan kun gyi gzhi bsgrub phyir/ /bton na 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /de phyir ci ste rtag tu
'dod bde kun/ /'dod na 'gro ba kun la gcig dpa' ba/ /nam mkha'i snying po srid gsum mgon po la/ /rtag tu brtan cing sngags kyang brtan par bgyi/ /'phags pa nam mkha'i snying
po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya sa man+ta b+ha dra aSh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka nA ma d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/ bod skad
du/ 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po kun tu bzang po nam
mkha'i dkyil kun tu rab 'byams ma lus pa dang mnyam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos kyi snang ba gsal ba brnyes pa/ sa'i dkyil 'khor kun tu 'phros pa'i sku tha dad pa med cing / dus
gsum gyi sku mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ gzugs sna tshogs can/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog dang / rab mchog dam pa sbyin pa yon tan chen po'i skus
