kun tu mnga' mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog kun tu bzang po gzugs sna tshogs can/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rab 'byams sa'i dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang
po snyoms par zhugs ma thag pa de'i tshe stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab rdul snyed kyi sku rab 'byams kun tu yongs
su rgyas par gyur te nam mkha'i khams kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sku rnams sa'i dkyil 'khor du ma dag tu kun nas 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas
sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byams thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i mgo bo la byugs te bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ legs so legs so/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi snying
po gzungs chen mo shod cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog lus 'od zer 'bum gyis snang bar byas pas de'i tshe sangs rgyas
kyi zhing thams cad g.yo bar byas nas gzungs 'di bshad do/ /tad+ya thA/ oM na mo na mas+t+ri/ b+hu ba ni/ shwa te/ ma hA b+ho gA ya/ a sa ma sa ma/ a mr-i ta sa ma/ a
nan+ta sa ma/ ga ga na sa ma/ tri b+hu ba na sa ma/ a she Sha sa ma/ be Sha sa ma/ pa ra mA r+tha sa me/ swa b+ha ba sa ma/ ta tha tA sa ma/ a ra dze sa ma/ a d+d+hi sa ma/ bud+d+hi
sa ma/ d+harma ta thA tA sa ma/ a b+hi Sha sa ma/ sa ma sa ma/ e kA nA ya/ sA ga ra/ bi shud+d+he/ A lo ka/ hI hI/ lab+d+ha lab+d+ha/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ oM pra sa ga ta/ na ya na
ya/ hi ni/ ni ra d+hiSh+ThA na/ saM b+ho ga /aM a na la ya la ya/ d+harma a gra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ dza ya dza ya/ hUM hUM/ d+ha ma d+ha ma swA hA/ de nas rgyal ba'i sras kyi thu bo/ /'jig rten
thams cad kyi mgon po gcig pu/ /sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas
te sa'i dkyil 'khor g.yo bar byas nas de skad ces smras te/ 'jig rten gsum po kun tu gang bar byas so/ /de nas lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i bang chub
sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gang ba'i dkyil 'khor nas gser gyi 'od zer 'bar zhing snang la rab tu g.yo bas brgyan pa'i lus can sa steng kun gyi rdo rje me
tog thod stan chen po las bskyod de dkyil 'khor nas langs nas ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ste smras pa/ kye ma snying rje chen po dang / yon tan grangs med pa'i rgya mtsho rab
tu 'byams pa'i gzungs chen mo/ kye ma sangs rgyas 'byung ba chen mo/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sa gsum dang mnyam zhing / sems can gyi khams grangs
med pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir gnas pa/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor gnas pa med pa'i gzungs chen mo/ kye ma bskal
pa mtha' yas pa nas 'phangs pa'i sdig pa'i bag chags sel cing nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho skem la/ lta ba'i ri bo 'thor bar byed pa'i gzungs chen mo/
bskal pa mtha' yas par dge ba'i tshogs 'byung ba yang dag par bsags shing bde bar gshegs pa 'bum phrag du ma mngon sum du mthong bas byang
chub kyi sa bon ma bsnubs la/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa'i khyad par gyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs pa rjes su thob pa ma yin pa gzhan ni/ sus
kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gzungs chen mo 'di mnyam par yang mi nus na/ gzung ba dang / bklag pa dang / kun chub par bya ba lta
ci smos/ /gzungs chen mo 'di'i ming tsam yang bskal pa byed ba phrag stong gi bar du thos par dka'o/ /kye ma gzungs chen mo 'di sems can gang dag gi
lag na 'dug pa de dag ni/ rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa'o/ /'tsho ba bzang pos 'tsho ba'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi gzhi bzang ba'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba
yang dag par rdzogs pas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa'o/ /yon tan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'o/ /'di lan gcig brjod pa tsam
gyis ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ /lan gnyis brjod pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /lan
gsum brjod pa tsam gyis nyon mongs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar na brjod pa tsam gyis gong nas gong du yon tan rnams 'thob par 'gyur
te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'chag bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na/ sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ /shing gcig
'greng gi drung du bzlas brjod byas na/ grub pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /'gro bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na/ sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur
ro/ /nags tshal chen po'i nang du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la lan bdun brjod na/ bsam gtan chen po thob par 'gyur la nyon mongs pa dang bral bar
'gyur ro/ /'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i sku gzugs kyi drung du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la/ me tog la sogs pa ji snyed pas mchod nas lus ngal bar
gyur gyi bar du gzungs chen mo 'di brjod la/ ngal bar gyur nas de nyid du nyal na/ rmi lam du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
bzang po mthong bar 'gyur te/ phyag g.yas pas de la byugs nas yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ chos kyi snang ba chen po yang stsol bar mdzad
do/ /'di skad du rgyal ba'i sras/ legs so legs so/ /khyod ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa yin te/ khyod tshe brjes
nas sa chen po yang thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes kyang gsung ngo / /de nas lus bde ba dang / sems bde ba dang / dga' ba chen po dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu
dga' ba chen po dang ldan bzhin du sad par 'gyur ro/ /mthu chen po dang / dbang che bar grags par yang 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams kyang de la blta ba'i phyir 'ong ngo / /
nang par langs nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i mdo sde rnams bklag par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing sdig pa thams cad dang bral te nyon mongs pa'i phyogs rnams
bcom pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang bsngags par 'gyur ro/ lha la sogs pa yang de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / spa ba'i phyir brtson par
'gyur ro/ /de ltar ji skad bstan pa bzhin du byed pa'i rgyal ba'i sras de ni/ ring po mi thogs par kun tu bzang po'i sa chen po la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdo rje'i
gtsug phud la sogs pa stong gsum gyi bdag po rig sngags 'chang chen po rnams dang / spyan chen mo la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang chen mo rnams dang / rdo rje
snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rdo rje'i zhags pa la sogs pa rig sngags kyi lha chen mo rnams dang / rin chen dra ba can la
sogs pa rig sngags kyi lha mo chen mo rnams dang / lha mo sgrol ma la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams dang / dar chen dang /
gzugs bzang dang / shin tu blta na sdug pa la sogs pa gzhon nu rnams dang / bran rnams dang / bran mo rnams dang / mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa log
'dren chen po rnams dang / lus mchog la sogs pa srin po'i dbang po rnams dang / ma mo la sogs pa srin mo rnams dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i
dbang phyug rnams dang / rdo rje me tog thod la sogs pa dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams
cad langs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i mchog 'phags pa kun tu bzang po la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bla na med pa'i yon tan gyi snang ba zhes bya bas
bstod pa/ kun tu bzang po kun gyi mchog /sna tshogs kun gyi 'byor ba che/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i rdo rje'i mchog /sna tshogs gzugs can phyogs kyi
bdag /rdo rje chen po dgyes pa che/ /gzi brjid chen po stobs po che/ /gnon dang rab gnon dpal gyi rab/ /khyab bdag rgyal ba'i blo gros rgyal/ /rdo rje chen po
rab tu bzhad/ /sgrub dka' chen po sgrub mdzad pa/ /rol mo chen pos rnam par rol/ /rab dga' chen pos 'dul ba po/ lha chen dbang phyug chen po ste/ /
btsan po khyab 'jug skye rgu'i bdag /sa steng sa 'og sa la dgyes/ /de bzhin sa 'dzin sa gsum pa/ /dul dang sbyin pa'i go rim thabs/ /rab mkhyen stong
gi mnga' bdag lags/ /shes nyen can de bzod la dgyes/ /brtson 'grus 'byung ba 'byor pa che/ /brtson 'grus bcu dang thabs bcu pa/ /stobs bcu'i sras
chen thu po ste/ /mthu stobs stong gis spro ba dang / /yongs su ldan zhing bcu sel ba/ /rdul sel rgya mtsho chen po ste/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ba/ /rdul rnams
rab tu zhi ba'i thabs/ /cho ga mkhyen pa blo mnga' ba/ /mkhas pa mdzes pa skal ba bzang / /shin tu sdug pa dga' skyed pa/ /snying po chen po las byung ba/ /nyon mongs
bral ba thub par dka'/ /sa dang mnyam pa mkha' dang mnyam/ /rlung dang mtshungs pa'i spyod yul can/ /gzi brjid nyid de gzi brjid mtshungs/ /rgya mtsho bzhi yi chu dang
'dra/ /rmugs dang smyo ba zhi bar mdzad/ /thub par dka' ba'i nyon mongs 'jil/ /g.yul sel g.yul la 'gyed pa ste/ /g.yul gyi nyes pa rab 'joms pa/ /gsung
bzang ngang ba'i gdangs su bzhad/ /dbang po nye dbang dbang chen sras/ /dbang po'i las lhag thub dang mnyam/ /chos 'dzin 'byor dang ldan par bstan/ /rab dga'i
bun long zhi mdzad pa/ /nyon mongs 'dam rdzab skem par mdzad/ /dbang po rgyags pa'i rims nad sel/ /khro bo'i dregs pa rnam par 'joms/ /
gsung snyan 'jam pa nyid dang mnyam/ /mnyam pa mi mnyam mnyam pa dang / /mnyam med yul las rnam par 'das/ /sangs rgyas kun dang spyod yul gcig
byang chub snying po rgya cher rol/ /rim pa rab sten dge ba ste/ /spyan bzang phun sum tshogs pa dge/ /gtsang ma lam bzang sbyin mdzad pa/
dag mdzad sreg mdzad mchog sbyin po/ /'joms byed bgegs rnams rnam par 'joms/ /thob mdzad dpe med gsung ba po/ /rdo rje'i 'jig rten gcig
snang ba/ /skyes pa bud med chogs kyi bdag /nges par yon tan 'byor mdzad pa/ /sems can 'khor ba zhi mdzad pa/ /brtan po sdig pa rnams dang
bral/ /kun tu rnam rgyal snang ba po/ /kun tu rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor can/ /kun tu rgya mtsho'i snang ba mdzad/ /kun tu nyes pa sel ba lags/ /mi bzang sa
'og rnam par dkrugs/ /de bzhin zad mdzad thug par mdzad/ /nyon mongs rgya mtsho rnam par dkrugs/ /nyon mongs phyogs rnams zad par mdzad/ /'bar
ba'i dka' ba 'phrog mdzad pa/ /rgyags shing bdo ba zhi bar mdzad/ /rdo rje chen po stobs bskyed pa/ /sdang ba thams cad nges par 'joms/ /pha rol zhugs pa
sdig sel ba/ /dag pa nam mkha'i spyod yul can/ /dag pa sbyin zhing yon tan sbyin/ /'bras bu sbyin zhing kun sbyin pa/ /ye shes sbyin zhing bsod nams
sbyin/ /longs spyod sbyin zhing rgyal sbyin pa/ /dbang phyug sbyin zhing tshig sbyin pa/ /nor sbyin tshogs ldan rdo rje can/ /gzugs bzhin dbang po rnam par rgyal/ /dag cing
dge ba'i tshul sbyin pa/ /bde 'byung gtsug na nor bu thogs/ /sa 'dzin gzung bar dka' ba po/ /dkyil 'khor mgu bar sgrub mdzad pa/ /'bab cing de bzhin 'bebs
par mdzad/ /rin chen dra ba rin chen mnyam/ /sgron ma mun sel rgyal ba can/ /yon tan ye shes theg chen ldan/ /brtan mchog che ba'i chos nyid can/ /gsung ba
chen po shes rab che/ /sangs rgyas tshul ni rab ston pa/ /mchod pa chen po theg chen gyi/ /theg pa bla na med par ldan/ /mchod pa chen po'i chos che ba/ /'bras bu chen
po'i chos kyi mchog /ston mdzad 'dul mdzad ston pa po/ /zhi ba de bzhin zhi mdzad pa/ /bzang po bzang dang mtshungs pa nyid/ /kun tu rab 'byams sel mdzad pa/ /snying
rje ye shes snying po mkhyen/ /snying rje'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can/ /snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs/ /dus chen rnam par dag par mdzad/ /mtsho mchog dang ba rab
mtho ba/ /rtsod chen 'das pa spyod yul can/ /skye rgu srung zhing spyan yangs pa/ /rnyed par dka' ba'i 'byor pa can/ /kun tu spyod pa khong dge ba/ /dga' ba'i dam pa
sbyin pa po/ /kun tu yul kun mnga' ba ste/ /zhe sa bzang po rtag tu mnga'/ /dul ba sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /dkyil 'khor chen
po'i pad+ma lags/ /zla ba lta bur si ma mdzad thabs/ /mkhas pa rgyags spangs cho ga mkhyen/ /spyod yul gcig la gnas pa ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
shes mnga'/ /dam tshig chen po'i de nyid mkhyen/ /slob dpon chen po grags pa che/ /dam pa nyid de bla na med/ /gsang sngags rlabs ni rgyas par mdzad/ /de ltar
khyab bdag chen po ni/ /yon tan brgya yi spos kyis rgyas/ /dag cing byang la mkhas la sogs/ /yon tan 'byung ba rig sngags rgyal/ /gtsug na nor bu thogs
la sogs/ /mchog rnams kyis ni bstod nas kyang / /sdug bsngal chu bo bcom pa yi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di gsungs/ /kye ma bstod pa chen po brgya/ /
ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa yin/ /mi rnams la la gang zhig gis/ /sdig pa bsal kun tu bzang po la/ /snying nas 'di yis bstod byas na/ /des ni sangs rgyas nyid kyang
'thob/ /gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'don/ /mi de yon tan yongs rdzogs shing / /de bzhin gshegs tshul che ba yi/ /ye shes ma lus smra bar nus/ /de ltar
thub mchog sras po yon tan brgya yi spobs las nges par 'byung 'gyur zhing / /yon tan sna tshogs byung dang 'jig rten yan chad dag gis yon tan rgyas rnams las/ /bstod pa chen po snang byas
rgyal ba'i sras la bstod pas nyin re bstod byas na/ stobs bcu mnga' ba'i skur 'gyur snang ba thob cing rnam dag yon tan 'byung gnas 'gyur/ /'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i mtshan
brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya badzra pA Ni aSh+Tot+ta ra sha ka nA ma d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/ bod skad
du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po smras pa/ oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TaM ta ka/ ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ de nas gzungs 'di bshad
ma thag tu sa chen po g.yos par gyur te/ bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad kyang skrag nas nyam thag pa'i skad phyung ngo / /dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa thams cad kyang ha ha
zhes 'dzer to/ /lha la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang chen po rnams kyis kyang rgyan gyi char chen po phab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhal 'dzum bzhin du rdo rje 'chang la gzigs nas bka' stsal
pa/ sdang ba sel ba dang / 'khor 'di dag ha cang skrag par ma byed cig /rdo rje 'chang gis gsol ba/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /bdag gi gzungs 'di ni/ /
mchog tu gsang ba lags so/ /rig sngags thams cad kyi mchog dang / bgegs thams cad zlog pa dang / sdang ba thams cad zlog pa dang / sdang ba thams cad sel ba dang /
dam pa stsol ba dang / 'byor pa stsol ba dang / sdang ba rnams dga' bar bgyid pa dang / thos na don mchis pa dang / brjod na don mchis pa dang / bsnyen bkur
bgyis na don mchis pa dang / stobs bskyed pa dang / /gzugs bzang bar bgyid pa dang / spobs pa bskyed pa dang / dbang phyug thob par bgyid pa dang / nor dang ldan par
bgyid pa dang / dbang bgyi pa dang / sdang ba 'joms pa dang / snang ba 'jig par bgyid pa dang / dug sel ba dang / rgyal bar bgyid pa dang / dga' bar bgyid pa dang /
mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa dang / dang bar bgyid pa dang / nga rgyal 'joms pa dang / pha rol pham par bgyid pa dang / sdig pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / nongs par
bgyid pa spyod pa dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / mtshams ma mchis pa zlog pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa zhi bar bgyid
pa dang / bkra mi shis pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / dpal bskyed pa dang / skal ba bzang por bgyid pa dang / sems can thams cad dga' bar bgyid pa dang / gzhan
la dbang bgyid pa dang / ci 'tshal ba stsol ba dang / yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyid pa dang / char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus
kyi gnod pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags te/ g.yul chen po dang / mi nad chen po dang / rtsod pa chen po dang / mi ma lags pa la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa dang /
sdang ba dang / byad stems dang / ro langs kyi sbyor ba chen po dang / skrod pa dang / srog 'jig pa'i tshe dang / 'jigs pa chen po byung ba na nang par langs nas lus
khrus bgyis la/ gos dkar po 'tshal kha shar phyogs su bltas la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi gdong du blta zhing lan bdun brjod na/ /brjod pa tsam
gyis 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur zhing / grub pa chen po yang thob par 'gyur la/ thams cad du yang rgyal bar 'gyur te/ sems can rnams la
srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sped pa ni/ /gzungs chen mo 'di las lhag pa ma mchis so/ /de nas 'khor thams cad ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas rdo rje 'chad la mtshan
brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che/ /rdo rje 'jigs pa dgyes pa che/ /rdo rje
snying po stobs po che/ /rdo rje 'khrug pa zhags pa che/ /snying rje chen po stobs po che/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par mdzad/ /rdo rje hUM gi hUM lags te/ /rdo rje sa 'og
'jigs pa po/ /chags pa'i rdo rje chags pa che/ /chags pa'i zhags pa mgyogs pa che/ /phyag dmar phyag ni ring ba ste/ /spyan dmar spyan dang ldan pa lags/ /
rdo rje mthon ka mthon ka che/ /mthon mthing dbu skras brgyan pa lags/ /ral gri sngon po ral gri che/ /dkyil 'khor sngon po'i dkyil 'khor can/ /mthon ka'i
spyan te dbu sngo ba/ /'od chen mthon ka'i 'od dang ldan/ /rdo rje sngon po stobs mi mtshungs/ /rdo rje spro ba'i stobs che ba/ /khro bo'i rdo rje khro bo che/ /sel mdzad khro
bo'i rgyags pa sel/ /khros pa'i spyan ni rab tu gtod/ /khro bo bgegs rigs sel bar mdzad/ /gzhu bsnams zhags pa bsnams pa ste/ /rdo rje'i mdas ni
nges par 'gums/ /dbyug thogs rdo rje'i ral gri bsnams/ /rdo rje'i zhags pas rab tu 'joms/ /rdo rje'i 'khor lo 'khor lo che/ /'jigs pa'i sgra sgrog rab tu
tu khro/ /sna tshogs sku ste thig les bris/ /gzi brjid skyed pa grags mdzad pa/ /bzod par dka' ba reg mi bzod/ /sdig dang bgegs rnams gcod mdzad pa/ /drag po
chen po rdo rje khro/ /sgyel byed drag po sgyel bar mdzad/ /gting dpag dka' ba ring du gshegs/ /rin chen rgya mtsho rab tu dga'/ /rgya mtsho lhun po'i dpung dang ldan/ /dam
pa'i ti se lhun po'i rtse/ /gad rgyangs chen pos bzhad pa po/ /spyod yul bskal pa grangs med gsum/ /rig sngags 'chang mchog rdo rje can/ /rig sngags 'chang
chen mnga' bdag lags/ /na bza' lcang lo rtsa dmar gsol/ /mthon ka na bza' mthon la dgyes/ /srin po srung po drag po ste/ /me tog phreng ba'i rgyan la dgyes/ /
nyi ma chen po nyi ma'i 'od/ /'od zer brgya phrag rab tu 'gyed/ /grol mdzad mgon po ston pa po/ /rab mchog rab mchog rnams kyis mchod/ /mgrin chen mgrin
pa'i mdog sngo ba/ /mgur bzang zhal bzang dam pa lags/ /cod pan chen po rdo rje'i 'od/ /phun sum tshogs ldan sems dag pa/ /ye shes che ldan srung ba che/ /
rlung dmar lags te spyod yul ring / /gtso bo sgrol mdzad pha rol gshegs/ /'jigs las sgrol ba rab 'jigs pa/ /rgya chen gtsug na nor bu thogs/ /mtshon
cha chen po sna tshogs mtshon/ /'jig rten gsum gyi tshul chen gcig /gsum gzigs rtse gsum gtsug phud gsum/ /'dod
pa'i lha ste snang chen mtshan/ /za ba po ste 'jigs par mdzad/ /mtho ba sku mchog zhal gsum pa/ /tsham tshom med de srin las byung / /rtag par dkar
dgyes dus 'byor ba/ /rgyu skar rgyal rigs 'phel bar mdzad/ /rgyal po sngags 'chang chen po ste/ /bgegs kun dbang phyug mkhas pa lags/ /baiDUR+ya
ltar dri med sku/ /mdzes shing stobs skyed sna tshogs stobs/ /dga' ba skyed pa dga' bar mdzad/ /dkon mchog gsum po 'dzin pa'i mchog /lha chen
dpa' bo chen po ste/ /brtan po dpa' bo lham me ba/ /bde ba chen po 'ching ba gcod/ /dam du 'ching ba'i rtsal mnga' ba/ /mtshon cha che rdzogs cod pan can/ /
rig sngags 'chang gi tshogs dga' ba/ /pad+ma chen po phyag ring ba/ /pad+ma las byung pad+ma'i mdog /nag po chen po 'byung po che/ /gtum chen thog thog chen po
ste/ /rlung chen bzhad mo 'byung ba dang / /rdo rje mtshon cha brgya rdzogs pa/ /rtul phod thub dka' brtson pa ste/ /'byung po chen po tshogs kyi rje/ /zhi ba dbang po rdo rje'i
mtshon/ /brag gi rtse mo rnam par 'gems/ /rgyal ba'i sras po gzugs che ba/ /rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor rgyan/ /rdo rje lcags mdas sreg mdzad pa/ /rdo rje mdas ni rnam
par sbyong / /rdo rje don yod rdo rje'i dbang / /rdo rje bzang po rdo rje'i rtsal/ /ye shes dam pa theg pa che/ /thabs brnyes pa snying rje chen po lags/ /rdo rje chen po rtsed mo can/ /
spyan bzang rnam par gzigs pa po/ /rdo rje dril bu rnam dag sbyan/ /mdza' bo sdug pa dam tshig mkhyen/ /rdo rje chen po mgon po ba/ /rdo rje sa 'og 'jigs par mdzad/
rdo rje chen po gad rgyangs sgrog /me tog chun po 'od gsal ba/ /dag pa zas gtsang sras kyi sras/ /des pa skal bzang gtsang ba lags/ /sna tshogs can te lha kun
mchog /rdo rje'i dpung gi dkyil 'khor ldan/ /rdo rje gtsug sdug shes rab can/ /rdo rje bkod pa rab tu mdzes/ /mdzes pa shin tu rnam par dag /bskal pa'i
rlung chen lta bu lags/ /dpa' bo gsang ba chen po 'chang / /rig sngags 'chang gi mchog gis rjed/ /gsang ba po ste gsang ba gsung / /skyes pa bud med
tshogs dga' ba/ /rdo rje thog thog sgra chen sgrog /rdo rje'i sgra de rnam par 'joms/ /rdo rje'i lcags kyu dgyes pa che/ /rdo rje 'bar ba cher 'bar ba/ /nor bu spras pa'i na
bza' gsol/ /spos dang me tog phreng gis brgyan/ /dbu yi snyan cha gdub kor btags/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa ston pa po/ /rgyal
po sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /dbang phyug chen po grags pa che/ /dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ston pa po/ /dbu
rgyan cod pan kun nas bcings/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa lags/ /de ltar rdo rje dbang phyug mgon/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dag gis bstod/ /de nas rdo rje
don yod pas gsungs pa/ rdo rje gsang bas brgyan pa yi/ /rdo rje mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di/ /ming ni rdo rje don yod 'byung / /sdang ba thams cad zlog byed pa/ /ming
ni brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'di/ /dad pas gang zhig 'chang byed pa/ /grub pa thams cad thob 'gyur zhing / /nyes pa kun las rnam par grol/ /lag na rdo rje stobs
po che/ /rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur/ /lag na rdo rje'i yon tan che/ /gang zhig nang par langs nas brjod/ /de ni sdig pa kun las grol/ /ngan 'gro
kun las thar par 'gyur/ /gsang sngags thog mar smos pa 'di/ /su zhig nangs par langs nas brjod/ /rgyal po blon po grong khyer pa/ /gnyen rnams kyang ni dga'
par 'gyur/ /bstod pa'i mchog 'di su 'don pa/ /'jig rten thams cad de dbang 'gyur/ /sdig pa thams cad zad pa dang / /tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'dod
pa dam pa bzhin/ /bde ba de yis thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig nang par langs nas ni/ /lag na rdo rje'i drung du brjod/ /de ni ji ltar 'dod pa dang / /ldan 'gyur 'di la the tshom
med/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'don pa la/ /bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang / /'jigs byed rgyal po rnams kyis kyang / /zil gyis gnon par mi nus so/ /shes rab can ni
gang zhig gis/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog bton na/ /gzugs bzang stobs ni skye ba dang / /bde ba 'phel ba de yis 'thob/ /gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di/ /nges par gnas
shing gtsang mar 'don/ /mdor na yon tan rgyas pa yi/ /bde ba de yis thob par 'gyur/ /'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa
rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ /AR+ya many+dzu shrI ku mA ra b+hU tASh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka nA ma d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ phyogs bcu'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya mtha' dag ma lus par khyab cing mchog tu rmad du byung ba'i
rnam par dag pa'i blo mnga' ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ thugs dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang
bral ba/ yon tan dri ma med pa'i tshogs kyi 'od zer gyis brgyan pa'i sku/ zhabs rten gyi pad+ma la lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / klu dang / rig sngags 'chang
rnams kyi thor tshugs dang / cod pan gyi rtse mos gtugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs ngan
song gi 'gro ba sna tshogs rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM b+ho ma hA ma Ni ru tsi ra ka lA pa bi tsi tra/ muk+ta dA ma/ a laM kr-i ta sha rA ra/
pa ra ma sa twa mo tsa ka/ ta thA ga ta ma hA d+harma koSha d+ha ra/ pra ba ra d+harma/ la ba d+ha/ bi dza ya/ su ra ta/ sam+b+ho ga u pa de sha ka/ kle sha ga par pra sha ma ka/ shU n+ya tA swa
b+hA ba/ a nu swa ri/ ma hA bo d+hi sa twa ba ra/ ba ra Na/ ba ra Na da da/ oM ma hA pA sha pra sa ra/ a sa ma sa ma/ a nan+ta sa ma sa man+ta b+ha dra/ sa man+ta san+d+ha ra/ sa man+ta A
ka ra/ man+ta pra sa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ he he many+dzu ra ba/ ma hA badzra/ ma hA khaD+ga/ ts+tshi ts+tshi b+hin+da/ bi ra dza bi ra ja/ karma a ba ga ma ka/ ku ru ku ru/ d+hu ru
d+hu ru/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha/ d+hu d+hu d+hu d+hu/ ma hA ma hA ma hA ma hA/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ b+ho b+ho/ b+hI ma b+hI ma/ na da na da/ sa ra sa ra/ ma hA bo d+hi sa twa/ mo
tsa ya/ ma ma na tha/ ma nu sr-i ta/ a pA ya duHkhaM/ su khaM da/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ /a na tho\u0f85haM/ duHkhi to\u0f85haM/ sa ra dzo \u0f85haM/ u pa dru to \u0f85haM/ a bi bik+to \u0f85haM/ ku
sI d+ho \u0f85haM/ me ra Na d+harmo \u0f85haM/ taM b+ha ga wA na/ duHkhi ta nAM/ su khaM da dA/ a nA thA nAM/ sa nA thA ka ra/ sa ra dza saM/ bA ra dza ska ra/ u pa dru tA nAM/ swa ro pa dra ba/ pra
sha ma ka/ sa bi bi ga tA nAM/ ku sha la sam+b+ha ra/ pa ri pu ra yi tA/ ku si d+hA nAM/ ma hA bIR+ya d+ha ta/ ma ra Na d+ha rmi Na/ ma mi ta pa dA dA tA/ mam bi b+ha ga wA na/ nA tho b+ha
ba/ sha ra NAM/ pa ra yA nAM/ tra tA/ sarba duHkhA ni me pra sha ma ya/ sa rba kla sha ra dzi si mi/ a ba na ye/ sarba saM swa ro ba drab/ duHkha ni me/ nA sha ya/ sarba ku
sha la/ d+harma pa ri pu ra me ku ru/ sarba karma A ba ra Na/ kle sha pa ra tA me bi ka ri/ /ma hA bo d+hi sa twa si bi d+hi/ bI R+ya pA ra mi tA/ yo gam+me san+ni yo dza ya/ A ba ra
Na d+ha rma bi rA ga bi ra dza/ sany+tsa ha/ pra dza ha/ d+ha ri Ni/ sa ma kha sa ma/ dza la ni d+hi sa ma/ me ru sa ma/ ma hA bo d+hi sa twa pa ra da swA hA/ rig sngags don kun grub pa 'di/ /
'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa na/ /de ma thag tu sems can rnams/ /skye dang rga ba zad par gyur/ /ngan 'gro thams cad zhi gyur
nas/ /bdud kyi sde rnams rab tu 'dar/ /lha rnams thams cad rab tu dga'/ /log 'dren rnams ni skrag par 'gyur/ /sdig pa zhi ba byed pa yi/ /gzungs
'di bshad pa'i mod la yang / /grangs med phrag ni dung phyur snyed/ /'khor ba'i btson ra dag nas thar/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yis/ /'jam pa'i
dbyangs ni rab bsgrubs shing / /gang tshe rig sngags bshad pa na/ /brag dang nags dang tshal du bcas/ /rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba'i/ /sa gzhi de yi tshe na g.yos//
sangs rgyas 'od kyi snang ba yis/ /sa yi steng yang khyab par gyur/ /bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang / /srin po mi bzad gzugs can rnams/ /stobs
bcu ldan la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /skad phyung tshig ni mthun par smra/ /lha rnams zhi ba'i cha lugs can/ /thams cad yid ni dga' gyur nas/ /gang na rdo rje ral
gri cha/ /de yi drung lhags smras pa ni/ /phyag 'tshal mchog sbyin rdo rje'i mchog /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni stobs chen la/ /shugs stong ldan pa rgyal ba can/ /bgegs
kyi yul 'khor rab 'joms pa/ /sngags 'chang gsang sngags chen po 'chang / /sna tshogs gzugs can mi yi bdag /shin tu stobs ldan gzugs mdzes 'jigs/ /
drag po drag po rab 'joms pa/ /gzi brjid gzi brjid mnga' ba'i dpal/ /dpal ldan mnyam pa med pa'i dpe/ /rdo rje can de snying sbyong ba/ /mi shes pa yi rab rib
sel/ /sgeg pa'i cha lugs mchog mnga' ba/ /skye rgu'i bdag po sgeg par dgyes/ /gzhu stobs can la phyag ring ba/ /nyon mongs dgra rnams sel bar mdzad/ /mdzes
pa na bza' sna tshogs gsol/ /me tog phreng rgyan sna tshogs can/ /spyan bzang dbu ni mdzes pa ste/ /dgyes shing na bza' mdzes par gsol/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs te
rab tu bzhad/ /dkar nag 'byes pa'i spyan mnga' ba/ /ha ha'i sgra ni rab tu bsgrags/ /rab tu dka' ba ston par dga'/ /rgyan chen gser gyi mdog dang ldan/ /rgya
mtsho'i snying po'i spyod yul can/ /tshul mkhyen tshul ldan 'jigs pa ste/ /sdang ba'i snying ni 'jigs par mdzad/ /cha lugs sngo las skyong ba/ /lha yi bdag po
dga' bar mdzad/ /'dod pa'i lha ste 'dod sel brtan/ /rgyal po 'jig rten sa 'dzin pa/ /brtan po rnams la brtan par grags/ /yon tan dag gi phyogs su bzhad//
btud pa yis btud phyag bgyis pa/ /rtag tu mchod cing rjed pa lags/ /stobs po cha la shugs che ba/ /phyag ring g.yul chen
mnga' ba po/ /sgeg chen rdo rje dam pa ste/ /'dzem shes rab srung ngo tsha shes/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po mchog /dkyil 'khor chen por ston pa po/ /dkyil
'khor chen por grags pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor chen po mdzad pa lags/ /dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can/ /zhabs la rjed pa'i tshogs dang
ldan/ /ha ha swA hA'i bdag che ba/ /mchod pa chen po sa dang mnyam/ /hUM gis 'jigs mdzad 'jigs pa ste/ /'jigs pa'i 'od kyis gsal ba po/ /lha
dang lha min rnams kyis btud/ /de bzhin mchod cing ri mor bgyis/ /zham 'bring gad rgyangs chen po can/ /rlung drag mun pa sel bar mdzad/ /'jig rten
gsum du snyan par grags/ /gnod sbyin srin pos bsnyen bkur ba/ /drag po dkar mdzad bde 'byung ba/ /mnga' bdag gtsug gi nor bu can/ /'dzum zhing
sgeg par kun tu spyod/ /spyod pa sa ltar brtan pa lags/ /nor bu'i dkyil 'khor 'od mdzes pa/ /nyi ma gsal ba lam me ba/ /nyi ma'i 'od 'dra 'ja' khugs
bzhin/ /tha ler bzhugs shing rgya cher bzhad/ /mthong na dga' zhing dga' bar mdzad/ /nor sbyin de bzhin gsang sngags sbyin/ /dbang phyug sbyin zhing rgyal srid
sbyin/ /gzugs sbyin de bzhin stobs sbyin pa/ /dpal ldan dpal mdzad bgegs gnon ri/ /kun tu rmongs pa sel bar mdzad/ /'dus pa'i nang du gdan
gshegs pa/ /zhabs la mchod pa'i tshogs bsags pa/ /dpung rgyan snyan cha gdub kor can/ /nor bu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba'i
sgron/ /rab rib sel bar mdzad pa po/ /ston pa ston mdzad skyong mdzad pa/ /dbang po mnga' bdag dmag gi mchog /'jigs pa sel bar mdzad pa ste/ /'jigs
pa med pa'i gnas sbyin pa/ /dkar ba sngo ba 'od bzang ba/ /mgrin sngon gyi ni ston pa lags/ /ji ltar 'dul ba 'dul 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin cha lugs rab tu
ston/ /shes rab ral gris 'debs par mdzad/ /stong nyid chos ni lhur 'dzin pa/ /byams pa mchog dang tha ma mkhyen/ /rnam par grags pa gsan pa des/ /
rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis bstod/ /rig sngags 'chang ba stobs po che/ /shin tu rnam rgyal 'khor los bsgyur/ /'jigs med blo gros shes rab can/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dzin pa/ /mgur bzang du mdzad zhi ba ste/ /zhi ba'i lam ni ston mdzad pa/ /lha dang lha min bcas
pas bkur/ /sems can thams cad 'jigs med mdzad/ /sems can kun la rab ston pa/ /brtan po sems can kun gyi mchog /sems can kun gyi blo la
mkhas/ /sred med bu ste drag shul stobs/ /me yi 'od dang 'dra ba ste/ byis pa'i sku mchog sbyin pa/ /rtsed mo rol mo ston par mdzad/ /phyag rgya mdzad
cing gsang sngags mdzad/ /bdag gir mi mdzad rdul med brtan/ /mkha' 'dra dpe med smra mkhas pa/ /bdud dpung nges par 'joms pa po/ /mi mchog
brtson pa bskyod du med/ /de bzhin thub med rnam par rgyal/ /brtan po sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs/ /mya ngan med cing gnas pa med/ /'joms med tshig
bzang cha lugs bzang / /dpa' bo dgra rnams rnam par 'joms/ /tshan chen nges 'joms rnal 'byor pa/ /'dod pa gnon pa khyad par gshegs/ /mgon
po rgyal ba'i sras kyi mchog /gshin rje pham mdzad skye rgu srung / /las dang nyon mongs rab sreg pa/ /ston mdzad nyon mongs sel ba lags/ /legs pa khyod
kyi mchog gi mtshan/ /brgya rtsa brgyad pa rab gsal zhing / /dad pa skyed par byed pa 'di/ /lha mchog rnams kyis rab tu bshad/ /bgegs chen dang ni log 'dren
dang / /gnod sbyin lha min srin po dang / /mdangs 'phrog rkun po rgod rnams kyis/ /de ring legs par bstod par gyur/ /'jam dpal rdo rje mchog gi rab/ /bsgyings
pas bltas pa'ang bde bar gyur/ /de dag kun la bltas nas kyang / /'di skad du ni tshig smras pa/ /khyod kun rtag tu bgegs med cing / /nges legs thar pa thob
gyur la/ /'jigs med bkra yang shis par shog /nga la 'jigs par ma sems shig /de nas rab tu cher bzhad cing / /'brug chen sgra ltar sgrog pa yi/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa zhal gsal bas/ /shar phyogs gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/ /kye ma gsang sngags mchog gi yul/ /sems can gti mug
bsal ba'i phyir/ /sems can rnams kyi bsod nams tshogs/ /shin tu rgyas pa byung bar gyur/ /kye ma bsod nams cher bcas pa'i/ /sems can rnams ni
rab spyad phyir/ /dam pa sbyin pa'i grub pa'i gzungs/ /'dzum pa'i glog gis rab tu bshad/ /la la gang zhig mnyam bzhag nas/ /sdug bsngal thams cad sel
ba yi/ /grub pa'i gzungs 'di 'don pa'am/ /yang na nyan tam sems kyang rung / /de yi don kun 'grub 'gyur zhing / /sdug
bsngal kun las thar par 'gyur/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam dag pa/ /de yis nges par 'thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa chen yang / /ring por
mi thogs de yis 'thob/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis/ /rab dga' shin tu dri ma med/ /'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro can/ /sbyang dka' de bzhin mngon
du gyur/ /ring du song dang mi g.yo ba/ /legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin/ /sa chen dam pa de dag kyang / /gang zhig nges gnas 'don pa yi/ /sems can chen
pos mi thogs par/ /tshe zad nas ni thob par 'gyur/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam dag dang / /sems can kun la sdug pa dang / /spros pa thams cad zhi ba yi/ /
byang chub bla med thob par 'gyur/ /rig sngags 'chang kun skyed pa dang / sdig pa thams cad zhi byed pa/ /bkra shis mchog tu dge ba yi/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad
yid 'ong 'di/ /sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar nas/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi mdun 'dug la/ /shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis su/ /nang bar langs nas su brjod pa/ /
de la rig sngags 'chang kun dang / /de bzhin lha yi bdag po rnams/ /gnod sbyin srin po mang po dag /rtag tu yang ni srung bar byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kun
dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rnams dang / /de bzhin rdo rje'i mtshon 'chang rnams/ /de la nges par srung bar byed/ /de ni sangs rgyas skur bzhugs shing / /mnyam
par gzhag pa snang bar 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin lha yi bdag po rnams/ /bgegs dang log 'dren chen po dang /dga' zhing bsam pa dam pa yi/ /rgyang ma dag nas
phyag kyang 'tshal/ /de phyir bgegs rnams dga' gyur pas/ /'tshe bar byed kyang mi nus so/ /lan gcig bklags na tshangs chen dang / /bsod nams mnyam
par thob par 'gyur/ /shes rab chen po gang zhig gis/ /nyi zer mtshan mchog brjod byas pa/ /dri ma med cing rab dag la/ /rab tu 'od gsal sgra snyan dang / sems
can thams cad dga' ba yi/ /yid du 'ong ba'i gnas kyang 'thob/ /mtshungs pa med cing stobs skyed lam mchog 'gro ba dang / /'od gsal dam tshig can gyi
lha rnams kyis bstod cing / /yid 'phrog lha dang lha min tshogs te 'dun pa yi// gzungs 'di rgyal pa rnams kyis legs par gsungs pa yin/ /'phags pa 'jam
dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ /AR+ya sarba ni ba ra Na bi skaM b+hi nI nA maSh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka d+hA ra NI
man+t+ra sa hi ta/ bod skad du/ /'phags pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a mri ta/ bin+du dza ba/ ma hA su kha swA hA/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang
mdzad kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba tshim par mdzad nas bka' stsal pa/ /yon tan
rin po che'i tshogs can khyod kyi gzungs sngags 'di byung bas sems can rnams kyi bde ba chen po bskyed pa legs so legs so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ /gang la la
gzungs sngags 'di thos pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi spyan sngar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gang la la'i rna
lam du grags par gyur pa de yang sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad dam/ /tshes bco lnga
la smyung bar 'dug cing / /gso sbyong dang ldan par byas te/ spos dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa la sogs pas mchod la bskor
ba byas nas/ bzlas brjod byas na dam pa ci 'dod pa thob par 'gyur te/ sdig pa thams cad dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las thar
par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la spos la sogs pas mchod de bzlas brjod byas na rmi lam du ston
par 'gyur te/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / /nyon mongs pa dang / sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed do/ /de nas rdo rje me tog
thod chen pos gsum gyi dbang phyug dang thabs cig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de'i nang nas stan las langs te byang chub sems dpa' chen po
sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la btud nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ sems can kun gyi gtso bo che/ /byang chub sems dpa'
tshul che ba/ nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das/ /chos dbyings khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrib pa kun las nges par grol/ /nyon mongs dri ma kun sel cing / /
nyes pa kun las rnam grol ba/ /skyon bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lam srang gcig pu'i tshul ston cing / /theg pa gcig pu'i
tshul gcig pa/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul brnyes te/ /theg pa dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /snang ba chen por snang ba brnyes/ /yon tan dkyil 'khor 'jig rten
bdag /zla ba bzhin du 'od dkar ba/ /'jig rten 'das pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /theg pa chen po dag pa che/ /sangs rgyas theg pa rtogs gyur cing / /rdo rje'i dkyil
'khor rnam grangs pa/ /rdo rje chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /dpa' bo chen po bdud las rgyal/ /dar ba che po nyon mongs choms/ /bgegs thub gshin rje
thub pa ste/ /rin chen dra ba khyod phyag 'tshal/ /zla ba chen po nyi ma che/ /lhun po chen po dbang phyug che/ /lha chen mgon po chen po ste/ /'byor pa chen po khyod
phyag 'tshal/ /sgrib pa thams cad gcod mdzad cing / /sgrib pa thams cad sel mdzad pa/ /kun mkhyen yon tan bdag nyid che/ /rnam sel khyod la phyag
'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul bzhugs pa ste/ chos kyi spyod yul gshegs pa lags/ /ye shes dbang phyug ye shes che/ /sred bral khyod la phyag 'tshal
lo/ /sku mdzes yon tan snying po mkhyen/ /rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor brgyan/ /sangs rgyas lam ste don yod che/ /ye shes dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /bstan pa gnas
dbang bdag po ste/ /bde mdzad thugs kyang zhi ba ste/ /yangs pa dri med shes rab can/ /snang ba dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /zab cing brtan la rnam par gnon/ /zhi
ba 'jig rten dag par mdzad/ /ston pa skyabs 'os srid gsum na/ /dpa' btsan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skal ba chen po nyon mongs bcom/ /'khor
ba'i dkyil 'khor 'joms pa ste/ /zhi ba zhi mdzad bde 'byung ba /chu bo zhi mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal/ /thar pa'i rgyu ste chos lugs che/ /bde 'gror gnas pa
dri ma med/ /rnam dag thugs mnga' zhi ba mkhyen/ /nyes sel khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtse mo yangs pa rnam par grags/ /sngags chen mang pos 'dul
mdzad pa/ /snying po chen po dkyil 'khor mchog /dkyil 'khor mkhyen pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sdug bsngal gsum sel gsum gyi mchog /dkon mchog
gsum dang spyod yul 'dra/ /rnam gsum mkhyen pa brnyes pa'i bdag /rnam thar gsum khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi/ /'byor pa
brnyes shing mnyam nyid brnyes/ /bskal pa dag ni grangs med par/ /tshogs chen bsags khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /sa la gnas
pa sa chen brnyes/ /sa yi 'bras bu phun sum tshogs/ /yang dag sa 'dzin las byung ba/ /ye shes sa khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /ting nge 'dzin la mnga' brnyes
pa/ /nyes gsum spong zhing sdig pa sel/ /ting 'dzin mkhyen cing rgya che ba/ /mnyam pa nyid mnyam khyod phyag 'tshal/ /mgon po chen po snang ba che/ /
sdug bsngal chen po'i dri ma sel/ /zhi gyur ma lus zhi mdzad pa/ /yon tan pha mtha' khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas kun mtshungs gsung ldan pa/ /chos
kun zhi ba phun sum tshogs/ /dkon mchog gsum rigs dpe med pa/ /rin chen mtha' yas khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje chen po dri med mchog /rdo rje mtshon
bsnams sdig mi mnga'/ /nam mkha' ma lus yul dang ldan/ /ye shes spyod yul rgya mtsho mnga'/ /de bzhin gshegs dang yul gcig pa/ /sel
ba po ste dri ma sbyong / /shes rab chen po rgyal ba'i sras/ /sred gcod khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i mchog /rdo rje 'dul ba rdo rje 'chang //
rdo rje rtsal can rnams kyi rtsal/ /rdo rje snang ba khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rin chen chen po rin chen blo/ /rin chen rdo rje'i 'od che ba/ /rin chen 'od mdzes rin chen 'byung / /
rin chen bstan pa srung mdzad pa/ /stong pa nyid kyi yul brnyes shing / /ye shes stong pa nyid kyis ston/ /stong nyid longs spyod yul dang ldan/ /stong nyid mchog
khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes rab mtshungs med shes rab can/ /dge ba rnam dag sa dang bral/ /chos gcig las byung snang ba po/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i tshul
chen lags/ /'jig rten snang mdzad smra mkhas pa/ /'jig rten chos las snang bar 'das/ /'jig rten mkhyen pa'i yon tan brnyes/ /brgyan par mdzad pa
dkyil 'khor dag /nyes pa ma lus sel ba ste/ /phyag chen skye bo kun la phan/ /sa 'dzin rnam par grags pa po/ /kun mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
dga' mkhyen dga' la longs spyod pa/ /dga' ba'i rigs mchog rnams kyi mchog /dga' bar mdzad pa'i rtog pa can/ /dga' ba ldan pa khyod phyag 'tshal//
sgeg chen 'dzin cing dgongs par ldan/ /rnam par sgeg la spyod pa brtan/ /rdo rje rig pa sgeg pa'i mchog /sgeg chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas
byang chub sems dpa'i mchog /rdo rje mchog gi dkyil 'khor che/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas/ /bla med mchog khyod
la phyag 'tshal/ /dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa'i mchog /sgrib pa thams cad sel mdzad la/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'khor rnams kyis/ /ming brgya rtsa
brgyad kyis bstod nas/ /rdo rje bstan pa rnam grags pa/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /kye ma 'byor chen snang ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal ba'i
dkyil 'khor ba/ /gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ /'di dag so sor rjod byed na/ /de ni nyes pa kun zlog cing / /rtag tu de yi phyi bzhin 'brang / /nang par langs
nas gtsang ma yis/ /sgrib pa thams cad sel ba la/ /blo ldan gang zhig bstod byed pa/ /de yi sdig pa med par 'gyur/ /gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog/
nang par langs nas rjod byed pa/ /sdang ba thams cad de dbang 'gyur/ /bgegs rnams kyis kyang yongs su btang / /sdig pa dag pa 'thob pa dang / /de bzhin
bsod nams 'phel ba dang / /ye shes rgya mtsho longs spyod cing / /sa mchog chen po thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig nges par gnas byas la/ /ming brgya rtsa
brgyad mchog 'don pa/ /des ni 'byor chen sangs rgyas sa/ /ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur/ /rgyud chen ldan zhing blo che ba/ /gang zhig ming mchog 'don pa ni/ /rdo rje dkyil
'khor bstan pa la/ /ring por mi thogs 'jug par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas
pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya k+Shi ti gar+b+ha aSh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka nA ma d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sa'i snying po'i
mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM
suM b+ha ni suM b+ha/ ha ra tsa ra/ ma hA pA sha /ma ru tA/ a mo g+ha badzra satwa swA hA/ de nas yon tan sbyin pa yi/ /gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu yang / /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor
dam pa ni/ /ti se'i gangs bcas g.yos par gyur/ /sa yi snying po tshogs dbang la/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis smras/ /skal ldan chen po legs so legs//
sa steng khyod kyis yangs par byas/ /khyod kyi gzungs ni rnam grags shing / /yon tan dpag med mchog skyed pa/ /sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal dang / /nyes pa zlog byed thos
pa 'di/ /'khor bar rab tu rgyu ba na/ /nyes pa kun gyis mi gos te/ /ji ltar 'dam gyi pad+ma dag /'dam gyi nyes pas mi gos
bzhin/ /lus can dag las su yang rung / /khyod kyi gsang sngags 'chang byed pa/ /de dag las ni gcig tsam yang / /byang chub las ni ldog mi 'gyur/ /
mkhas pa gang zhig gzungs sngags mchog /thos nas mos par byed pa dang / /nges par yon tan thams cad kyang / /thob par 'gyur te the tshom med/ /
de nas thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor/ /langs tes yi dbang phyug po/ /sa yi snying po sa mchog la/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad smras pa ni/ /sa yi snying po gtso bo
che/ /glog 'gyu lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba/ /cod pan can te sa brnyes pa/ /phun sum tshogs ldan 'byor pa mchog /rig ldan rig mdzad mchod pa'i gnas/ /
gtso bo dge sbyong ston pa po/ /gzhi bcas ldan pa'i klung gi tshul/ /swA hA'i blo ldan snying rje'i rab/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyi ma'i mchog /snying po snying po mkhyen
par grags/ /gsang sngags rol cing rgya cher rol/ /sa yi dbang phyug gar thabs can/ /sgeg po zhal bzang gar mkhan ldan/ /'bras bu mngon sum ston pa
po/ /rab 'byor blo gros snying po mkhyen/ /snying po brnyes pa 'jigs pa med/ /mgon po sangs rgyas gzugs mnga' ba/ /shes rab kyis ni ma lus gzigs/ /
'dod chags la sogs skyon bsal zhing / /gar stabs chen po ston pa po/ /ston pa dpag bsam shing dang 'dra/ /nam mkha'i dbang phyug gsung snyan pa/ /nyi ma
chen po nyid yin te/ /dbang phyug chen po 'bar bas bskor/ /yon tan mtha' yas longs spyod pa/ /sa yi dbang phyug spyod yul can/ /chos kyi longs spyod longs spyod
che/ /yon tan rgya mtsho'i gang chen mtsho/ /yon tan sna tshogs longs spyod pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchog /thabs tshul zab la mkhas pa ste/ /
theg pa chen po 'jigs pa med/ /mchod pa chen po sgra che ba/ /zla ltar grags pa'i dkyil 'khor can/ /rdo rje 'chang chen mtshon brgya pa/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor
me tog thod/ /blo gros chen po phyag ring ba/ /pad+ma chen po stobs po che/ /sngags 'chang chen po stobs cher ldan/ /sa gzhi chen po lhun po lags/ /lag na
rdo rje yon tan nges/ /nor bu'i me tog thod kyis brgyan/ /mnyam nyid 'byams la longs spyod pa/ /rgya chen zhing gi rgya mtsho can/ /rdo rje'i 'od mnga' rdo rje ldan/ /sa yi
bdag po lhun po bzhin/ /sa la longs spyod longs spyod che/ /mtshon cha g.yo ba phun tshun tshogs/ /rab 'byams snod ni rnam
par grags/ /smra mkhas rdo rje rab 'joms pa/ /spyan rtsa yid tsam dmar ba ste/ /me tog sngon po'i thod kyis bcings/ /spro ba chen po phyag ring ba/ /brtan
po brtan la bde sbyin pa/ /ded dpon dpal bzang chen po ste/ /gangs can lhun po lta bu lags/ /dbang po gshin rje rgyal chen dang / /btsan po khyab
'jug stobs dbang phyug /'jig rten mchog rigs sangs rgyas tshangs/ /de bzhin nyid tshul spyod yul can/ /rin chen tog ste cher bzhad pa/ /dgyes pa
na bza' sna tshogs gsol/ /gzigs pa ring pa spyan yangs pa/ /nam mkha' bzhin du thogs pa med/ /thogs pa mi dpog rin chen gtsug /srid
gsum 'dod pa med pa'i rgyu/ /dul ba nyon mongs dri ma bsal/ /dag pa gtsang ma gso sbyong can/ /rnam par gnon pa yul las 'das/ /ljang mdog
skyabs mdzad snying rje che/ /stobs kyis grags pa rgya che ba/ /bsams na shes pa'i spyod yul can/ /dpa' bo seng+ge 'jigs par byed/ /sdang ba rnams kyi snying
'joms pa/ /mnga' bdag grags pa yul dang ldan/ /dga' ba rgyal cher rab 'byung ba/ /rigs mkhyen rigs kyi snying po mkhyen/ /rigs kun tu ni mchod pa lags/
rgyal po rigs mchod skyed pa'i rten/ /rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor brgyan/ /rdo rje sa 'og rab grags pa/ /rig sngags 'chang ba stobs po che/ /mngon par 'phags pa
khyad par mchog /mgrin bzang nad dang bral ba lags/ /skyong mdzad ston pa dag pa ste/ /sangs rgyas lam ni rab ston pa/ /sgrol pa smin mdzad sdud par
mdzad/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus rnams kyis btud/ /rab zhugs dkyil 'khor rnams la mkhas/ /rdo rje'i slob dpon yon tan rten/ /grub pa sbyin pa rnam
dag mchog /tshul dang tshul min rtogs pa po/ /dkyil 'khor rtsa ser mnga' ba ste/ /'od zer ljang gu'i 'od dang 'dra/ /ser la na bza' ser po mnabs/ /dkyil
'khor ma lus kun gyis brgyan/ /spyan rtsa dmar ba zla ba'i dpal/ /nor bu sna tshogs 'od 'byung ba/ /rdo rje brgya yi stobs kyis spro/ /mnyam nyid mnyam pa
dri ma med/ /sku yang dag cing na bza' dag /dag pa mkhyen cing dag par ldan/ /dag pa'i chos mnga' snang ba ste/ /'byung ldan sreg pa sel mdzad pa/ /'khor ba
zad mdzad shes rab can/ /tshul shes tshul la spyod yul ba/ /rdo rje rgya mtsho'i snying po lags/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dge ba che/ /'byung
ldan rab 'byams shes rab can/ /ma lus grags pa'i 'od bzang ba/ /sa yi snying po snying po che/ /rdo rje'i snying po rnam par 'dren/ /dpag tu med pa dpag med
rdzogs/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i yul la gnas/ /zab cing gsal ba'i gtso bo ste/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer bsil/ /dga' dad dang ba skyed pa ste//
ye shes rgya chen spyod yul ba/ /rlung gi drag shul lta bur grags/ /drag po lags te drag sel gtsang / /rgyal bar byed cing rgyal la zhi/ /rgyal ba'i dpal
mdzad dga' bar mdzad/ /lhun po ti se ma la yas/ /spyod yul zab mo non pa ste/ /rin chen rdo rje snying po che/ /sa gzhi spyod yul mnga' ba lags/ /rin chen
brag las byung ba'i 'od/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dag gis brgyan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lhur dgyes pa/ /shugs drag dpal gyi gzhi rten lags/ /rab gsal
dpal mdzad gtsang ma ste/ /phyogs cha'i dbang phyug dbang phyug che/ /de ltar rdo rje 'chang chen la/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog rnams kyis/ /rdo rje sems dpas bstod
nas ni/ /rdo rje sa gsum dbang mchog smras/ /yon tan snying po shes rnams kyis/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog brjod cing / /nyes pa zlog pa 'di las gzhan/ /sa
yi steng na ngas ma mthong / /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di/ /thams cad 'grub byed dga' ba ste/ /sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang / /dri ma kun bral yon tan des//
de phyir sgrim pa thams cad kyis/ /phun sum tshogs pa 'dod pa'i mis/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dge ba 'di/ /rtag tu yang ni brjod par gyis/ ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa
'di/ /bsam pa kun dang 'byor ba yi/ /gnas mchog bla na med pa ste/ /dpal yon rgya chen sbyin pa yi/ /yid ni shin tu dang ba yis/ /sa yi snying po mtshan
gsal ba/ /'dod pa thams cad rab sgrub pa'i/ /yon tan mchog ni gang brjod dang / /dpal yon rgya char 'dzin pa yi/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di/ /mi ni gang

zhig rjod byed pa/ /sdug bsngal kun las myur du grol/ /'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya many+dzu shrI shri nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta kaM /bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag
'tshal lo/ /shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis su/ /thub la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags pa yi/ /mtshan
rnams 'dir ni brjod par bgyi/ /gzugs mdzes gzugs dang ldan pa ste/ /gzugs rnams kun gyi bla na med/ /mtshan rnams thams cad kun tu rdzogs/ /'jam dpal
dpal gyi dam pa lags/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bsam dang bral/ /mthu rtsal bsam yas rmad du byung / /sku gsung 'phrin las bsam mi khyab/ /de bzhin thugs kyang bsam mi
khyab/ /stong nyid sgom pa'i bdag nyid can/ /stong pa'i chos dang yang dag ldan/ /stong pa nyid la lhag par mos/ /srid pa gsum po stong par ston/ /thams cad
mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs/ /sa rnams kun gyi mchog tu gyur/ /sems can kun gyi mchog tu gyur/ /sems can kun gyis phyag bgyis pa/ /ngan
'gro kun dang de bzhin du/ /mu stegs can rnams thams cad 'joms/ /phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcod pa/ /smra ba'i seng+ge mi yi mchog /dul zhing nyon mongs
dgra rnams dang / /sgrib pa dri ma kun mi mnga'/ /sems can thams cad yongs su skyob/ /grol zhing 'jig rten grol mdzad pa/ /ral pa mun dza brtul zhugs
can/ /tshangs pa tshangs pa'i gnas na bzhugs/ /bgrang nor thogs shing phyag mkhar bsnams/ /dag cing dag pa rnams dang ldan/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs can mnga'
bdag mdzad/ /pad+ma las 'khrungs pad+ma can/ /pad+ma'i ze ba'i kha dog 'dra/ /bzhugs pa'i gdan khri pad+ma lags/ /gtsang ma ut+pal sngon po bsnams/ /bsam dag
zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan/ /khyod ni sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas/ /khyod ni dang po'i sangs rgyas lags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing mnga' dbang brnyes/ /bden pa bzhi dag
ston pa po/ /'jig rten skyong ba spyan stong mnga'/ /khyod ni dbang phyug skye rgu'i bdag /khyod ni zhi ba'i sems can rnams/ /kun gyi mnga' bdag yon tan gtso/ /khyod
ni khyu mchog skye rgu'i gtso/ /thu bo de bzhin tshe rabs dgongs/ /rnam par 'dren dang 'dul mdzad pa/ /rgyal sras rgyal ba nyid las 'khrungs/ /'od zer stong ldan
nyi ma khyod/ /zla ba dang ni phur bu'ang khyod/ /rnam thos bu dang chu lha'ang lags/ /dbang phyug che khyod khyab 'jug khyod/ /klu yi rgyal po mtha' yas khyod/ /de bzhin
sde dpon skem byed lags/ /lha min dbang po thags bzang ris/ /mig dmar gza' lag pa sangs/ /spen pa dpa' bo lha kun lags/ /lha rnams kun gyis phyag
bgyis pa/ /'jig rten chos kyi dri ma bral/ /khyod ni 'jig rten gang zag mchog /'jig rten mkhyen pa 'jig rten rig /ye shes
can gyi dam mchog pa/ /dam pa sbyin dang gnas dang skyabs/ /bdud kyi las kyis yongs mi brdzi/ /kha na ma tho mi mnga' zab/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen kun
tu grags/ /khyod ni sman pa zug rngu 'byin/ /mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba'i mchog /blo gros ldan zhing rtogs dang ldan/ /blo dang ldan zhing mkhas pa lags/ /
khyod ni bsod nams dpag bsam shing / /byang chub yan lag me tog brgyan/ /rnam grol 'bras bu phun sum tshogs/ /lus can kun gyi mchog tu
gyur/ /yid du 'ong zhing yid 'phrog pa/ /sdig pa mi mnga' tshangs par spyod/ /khyod ni mjug ring gza' mchog lags/ /khyod ni drang srong thub pa mchog /
khyod ni rgyal tshab dbang bskur ba/ /sa bcu'i dbang phyug gtso bo lags/ /ded dpon 'gro ba rnams kyi gtso/ /mya ngan 'das pa mchog ston bzhin/ /khyod ni
nam mkha' sa chu bzhin/ /khyod ni me dang rlung lta bu/ /khyod ni yid bzhin nor bu ltar/ /sems can re ba kun rdzogs mdzad/ /'byung po kun gyis phyag bgyis
pa/ /rin chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jam dpal gyis ni bka' stsal pa/ /oM wA kye daM na ma swA hA/ ji skad smos pa'i mtshan rnams dang / /rig sngags
bcas par 'dzin na ni/ /sdig gyur rnam dag rab tu thob/ /brgya las rtsa brgyad lhag pa'i mtshan/ /skyes bu dus gsum su klog pa/ /de 'dod bsam rgu yid bzhin
du/ /gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /bzang po'i mtshan rnams dran na ni/ /mtshams med skal pa mnyam pa yi/ /las rnams mi bzad gang byas
pa/ /de dag thams cad myur du 'byang / /'jig rten pha rol 'pho ba dang / 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba'i tshe/ /sems can dag pas dran byas na/ /'jam
pa'i dbyangs kyang thob par 'gyur/ /blo dang ldan pas dran byas te/ /nges par gnas nas su klog pa/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni 'dod na yang / /thob 'gyur 'di la
the tshom med// //'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyud pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya mai tri pra
ti dz+nyA nA ma d+ha ra NI/ bod skad du/ /'phags pa byams pas dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba byams
pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo rat+na tra ya ya/ /na mo b+ha ga wa te/ shAkya mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/
oM a dzi te a dzi te/ a pA rA dzi te/ a dzi tany+dza ya/ ha ra ha ra/ mai tri a ba lo ki te/ ka ra ka ra/ ma hA sa ma ya sid+d+hi/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ma hA bo d+hI maN+Da bi dze/ sma
ra sma ra/ Asma kaM sa ma ya/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ ma hA bo d+hi swAhA/ rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /oM mo hi mo hi/ ma hA mo hi swA hA/ snying po'o/ /oM mu ni mu ni sma ra swA hA/ nye ba'i
snying po'o/ /gzugs 'di nyan pa tsam dang / /klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la sems pa dang / bsgoms pa tsam gyis gang gi tshe
bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa na bdag gis sems can de nges par btsal
bar bgyi ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bgyi'o/ /tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa'i ri dwags dang / bya rnams
kyi rna khung du sgrog par byed na/ de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob bo/ /'di thos pa tsam gyis nam du yang ngan
song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ /ngan song gi dri mas kyang mi gos so/ /mi'i mngal du yang mi skye'o/ /lha'i bskal pa stong du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /
dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar bsam zhing don du gnyer ba'i longs spyod 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis
kyang sems can de bskyud par mi bgyi lags so/ /nges par bdag byang chub kyi snying po la mchis nas de ji ltar gyur kyang rung bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu lung bstan par bgyi'o/ /'phags pa byams pas dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra pA
Ni dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos ki shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya dzam+b+ha la nA ya aSh+Ta sha ta kaM/ bod skad du/
'phags pa gnod 'dzin gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ 'phags pa gnod 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas gnod sbyin 'brog gnas po/ /gser dag gis
ni legs par brgyan/ /rin chen gyis ni rab mdzes shing / /me ni shin tu 'bar 'dra ba/ /lcang lo can du bzhugs nas kyang / /gsang bdag rdo rje 'chang ba yi/ /zhabs gnyis
la ni rab 'jus nas/ /shin tu mnyam bzhag dris ba ni/ /bcom ldan gnod 'dzin rgyal dbang po/ /gsang sngags tshogs ni kun
gyi bdag /rig sngags 'chang rnams kun gyis mchod/ /lha dang lha min phyag byas pas/ /ma rungs 'dul la brtson pa po/ /byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan
ldan/ /mgon po sems can kun don mdzad/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba 'dzin/ /sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas/ /snying rjes non pa'i yid kyis
su/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub phyir/ /bdag gis kyang ni sems bskyed de/ /mi rnams nor ni nyung ba dang / /bsod nams chung zhing dbang chung ba/ /mthong
nas sdug bsngal chen po yis/ /rab tu gzir to gsang ba'i bdag /de nas gnod 'dzin gyis smras nas/ /bcom ldan gsang ba gsang ba'i bdag /snying rjes
non te smras pa ni/ /legs par nyon cig gsang ba pa/ /mgon po gnod 'dzin dpal dang ldan/ /sems can kun gyi don byed pa/ /dbul po'i nyon mongs
sel ba po/ /nor ro cog gi dbang phyug gi /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bsod nams ldan/ /dbul ba'i nyes sdig sel byed pa/ /gang+gA'i bye ma'i grangs snyed kyi/ /rgyal
mchog rnams kyis sngon gsungs pa/ /'od zer brgya pa zhes pa yi/ /zhing na sangs rgyas nyi ma'i zhal/ /chos ston pa na bdag gis kyang / /de ni rang gis sngon thos
te/ /dbul ba sel cing bsod nams ldan/ /de ni bdag gi shes rab kyis/ /sems can kun don brtson pa po/ /khyod la legs par bstan par bya/ /khyod ni
mnyam bzhag rab tu nyon/ /'phags pa lha dang lha min bla/ /shes rab ldan zhing chos la gus/ /snying brtse'i bdag nyid bzod ldan brtan/ /dbang po zhi ba dbang po
thul/ /dge bas sdig 'joms shes nyen can/ /nges shing don kun sgrub pa po/ /mi gnang mi slu dpal dang ldan/ /mdzod bdag gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /dkon mchog
gsum gyi skyabs gcig pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis gzigs pa po/ /gter rnams skyong ba gzi brjid can/ /rtag sbyin nor ni 'phel byed pa/ /rin chen 'byung
gnas skye bo 'dul/ /chu yi bdag po chu 'bebs pa/ /gnod sbyin chu spyod bdag nyid can/ /gter don nye bar ston pa po/ /gser gyi ri bo lhun po ste/ /dbul
ba'i gdon las thar byed pa/ /dbang po nye dbang 'gro ba'i mgon/ /chu yi dbang po sprin mdog can/ /'jig rten mig dang 'jig rten bla/ /nyi ma zla ba ther zug pa/ /nor
chen rgyal po chen po ste/ /lag na ne'u le rab gnas pa/ /gzhon nu seng+ge tog can te/ /gnod sbyin chen po rdzu 'phrul che/ /tshig gi
bdag po bzhin 'dzum pa/ /gsong por snyan par smra ba po/ /bram ze 'dod pa'i lcags kyu ste/ /che ba don grub grub pas mchod/ /rig sngags 'chang ba
'khor los bsgyur/ /ku be ra dang mi la zhon/ /bum pa'i lto can mig yangs pa/ /lha yi dri ldan yid ltar mgyogs/ /khyab bdag bde 'byung nor bzang
sras/ /sems can rnams ni skyong la dga'/ /'dod rgyur sgyur gzugs yid kyi lha/ /cod pan can de rigs dga' ba/ /g.yon phyogs cod pan lag pa
dbyug /lag pa brgya pa stobs po che/ /sa brgyad dbang phyug lha yul ba/ /zla ba nya ba'i zhal mdog can/ /ded dpon tshogs kyi bdag po ste/ gnas brtan
tshong pa skal ba bzang / /yid bzhin nor bu bum pa bzang / /dpag bsam ljon shing mi yi bdag /mchog don 'os pa gtso bo ste/ /mchog sbyin mi'u thung
khyab 'jug pa/ /skyabs 'os bkra shis srung ba po/ /rin chen phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /lha yi seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi
bdag /rab tu dar ba nor mi zad/ /seng+ge'i rtsal gyi mthu rtsal can/ /ston pa 'jig rten gsum las rgyal/ /gtso bo tshong pa rigs kyi mchog /pad+ma'i lte ba thub
med rgyal/ /tshangs par spyod pa rgya mtsho che/ /gnod 'dzin bdag nyid che ba yi/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad ngas bshad 'di/ /sdig pa thams cad 'joms byed cing / /dbul
ba'i nyon mongs sel byed pa/ /'byor dang skal bzang skyed pa po/ /glang po rta nor 'phel byed pa/ /gza' dang rgyu skar rmi lam ngan/ /ltas ngan sel bar byed pa
ste/ /nags sam gal te grong dang ni/ /dur khrod yang na ri yang rung / /mkhas pa gang na klog pa dar/ /g.yul dang dgra ni nyam nga ba/ /sbrul dang me chu chom
rkun sogs/ /stag dang dom dang 'jigs pa che/ /rgya mtsho bgrod dka' mi bzang las/ /me ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /dbang po me dang chu lha dang / /gshin rje srin
bdag rlung lha dang / /nor sbyin dpal ldan ku be ra/ /nor bu bzang sras lnga rtsen dang / /rtse mo can dang 'brog gnas dang / /lha dang gnod sbyin gzhan dag kyang / /
g.yel ba med par nyin mtshan du/ /rab tu dga' bzhin srung bar byed/ /gang na ming 'di klog pa der/ /glang chen rta dang ba lang dang / /lo tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
'bras bu me tog rnams kyang 'phel/ /mi nad dang ni 'go ba'i nad/ /gnod pa kun las byung ba rnams/ /thams cad du ni bde
legs 'gyur/ /lhag par byis pa rnams la shis/ /de la yi dwags klu rnams dang / /ma mo dang ni gdon drag dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang mi'am ci/ /srin
po rnams kyang 'chi mi byed/ /nad do cog las rnam par grol/ /de bzhin bde zhing nor dang ldan/ /bu dag dang ni tsha bo dang / /dpal dang gtong ba rnams kyis/
rgyas/ /rigs mchog rgyal ba 'byung ba dang / /longs spyod chen po'i nang du skye/ /tshe dang dpal dang ldan pa dang / /nad mang rigs dang bral bar 'gyur/ /tshe rabs
kun tu skye ba dran/ /lobs skyen thos pa 'dzin pa dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan ldan/ /skal ba bzang po nyid du 'gyur/ phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal
gnod sbyin rje/ /gsang bdag khyod la phyag 'tshal te/ /ma rungs 'dul la brtson pa po/ /lag na rdo rje khyod la 'dud/ /sems can dad la mnyes gshin pa/ /
nor bzang sras kyi grags pa 'di/ /dbul ba'i nad ni zhi byed pa/ /rab tu bshad pa legs par gsungs/ /don kun grub pa gsang ba'i sngags/ /bdag gis kyang
ni 'dir dbul te/ /de ni legs par dran tsam gyis/ /me ni dbul las grol 'gyur zhing / /gzhan gyis mi tshugs srung bar 'gyur/ /dgra rnams kyis kyang mi tshor
zhing / /skal pa bzang dang skal dang ldan/ /lo brgya yang ni 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /lha yi glang po rin chen dang / /rgyal dang rgyal srid 'os rnams kyang / /nges par myur du

thob 'gyur te/ /rgyal srid kyang ni the tshom med/ /na mo rat+na tra ya yA/ na mo ma Ni b+ha dra ya/ /ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ /oM hrIM hrAM k+ShA dzrIM hrIM hrAM/ dIpa bya rat+nau ga pa ri sha na a ta
wA ka de ba yak+Sha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hiHhUM phaT swA hA/ 'phags pa gnod 'dzin gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ A TA nA
TI ya su traM nA ma ma hA sU traM/ bod skad du/ mdo chen po kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag
'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra
ba bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu kha dog 'phags pa/ g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang /
g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa nam sros pa dang bcom
ldan 'das ga la bder song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi
bu'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas
de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /blo ldan khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/ /lha rnams kyis ni de ma 'tshal/ /dpa'
chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa dang / /da ltar byung dang ma byon pa/ /thams cad la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ /khyod la'ang bdag ni
skyabs su mchi/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang dag gnas mal dgon
pa dag dang / nags 'dab dag dang / bas mtha' dag na gnas pa dag kyang mchis la/ de na gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa
gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa dag dang / mngon par ma dad pa dag kyang mchis te/ /gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang
dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa de dag ni/ shin tu nyung la/ gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das
kyi gsung rab la mngon par ma dad pa de dag ni/ ches mang lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen
rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams 'di ltar bdag nyid srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas
pa mngon par ma dad pa dag mngon par dad par bgyi ba dang / mngon par dad pa rnams kyang slar zhing 'phel bar bgyi ba'i slad du kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo
rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang ba la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher 'dzin cing kun chub par bgyid na legs so legs so zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan
'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la cang mi gsung bar gnang bar mdzad do/ /de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang
bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar kun tu rgyu ba dang / ku
tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya chen gsol to/ /skye bo gang
dag gtong phod cing / phra ma mchis ser sna bral/ /gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchis pa/ /mi de rnams kyis rnyed pa legs/ /gang gi char la brten nas
ni/ /de na nyi mor brjod pa yi/ /nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can/ /nyi gdugs gang nas 'char 'gyur ba'i/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal
chen gegs dang ldan pa ni/ /dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /dri za
rnams kyis yongs bskor cing / /dri za rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag ming mthun grags
pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ /kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs
rgyas nyi ma gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/ /rgyang ring gnas
shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/ /khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ /de skad yang dang yang du thos/ /de slad bdag ni 'di
skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshal cig /sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ /mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi//
de ltar shar gyi phyogs de ni/ /bzang pa lags zhes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldang pa lags/ /gang na yi dwags
zhes bgyi ba/ /rgyab kyi sha 'tshal phra ma can/ /srog gcod bgyid pa ma rungs pa/ /'jungs shing mi snyan smra bgyid pa'i/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal
chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /grul bum
rnams kyis yongs bskor cing / /grul bum rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag ming mthun grags pa
ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ /kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /de dag rnams kyis
rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ /skyed mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /mi yis phyag bgyis
khyod la ni/ /rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/ /khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ /de skad yang dang
yang du thos/ /de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs
ldan pa/ /mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshal mchi/ /de ltar lho yi phyogs de ni/ /bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /
rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/ /gang zhig nub pa kho na las/ /des na mtshan mor brjod pa yi/ /nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can/ /nyi gdugs
gang du nub 'gyur ba/ /de na mtsho chen zab mo ni/ /shin tu 'da' bar dka' ba ste/ /de ni chu sngon rgya mtsho zhes/ /skye bos rtogs pa mchis pa yi/ /phyogs de
mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni mig mi bzang zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /klu dang gar
gyis rtag tu rtse/ /klu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor cing / /klu rnams kyis ni mdun gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de
dag ming mthun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ /kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /de dag rnams kyis
rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /mi yis phyag bgyis
khyod la ni/ /rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/ /khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ /de skad yang dang yang
du thos/ /de skad bdag ni 'di skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ /mya ngan
'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/ /de ltar nub kyi phyogs de ni/ /bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa
lags/ /gang na byang gi sgra mi snyan/ /dga' zhing lhun chen blta mdzes dang / /gang na mi rnams tshe lo ni/ /brgya phrag bcu pa skye 'gyur zhig//
de dag mi rmo mi 'debs la/ /gshol yang 'cha' bar mi bgyid cing / /tshe ring mdog dang ldan pa dang / /nges par yongs su spyod bgyid cing / /zas su sA lu kha
dog dang / /dri dang ro dang ldan pa dang / /dri bda' me tog tshogs 'dra zhing / /lha yi bdud rtsi 'dra ba 'tshal/ /na li ke ra bskol bgyis nas/ /tshod mar de 'tshal
sran tshod min/ /gang na me lce'i rtse 'dra ba'i/ /sman dag 'khrungs par 'gyur ba yin/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /gnod
sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni lus ngan bo zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyis yongs bskor cing / /
gnod sbyin rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi
stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ /kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong
nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/ /rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /
bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/ /khyod la ming mthun phyag 'tshal ba/ /de skad yang dang yang du thos/ /de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal la phyag
'tshol cig /gau tam khyod la phyag 'tshol cig /sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ /mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/ /de ltar byang gi phyogs de ni/ /
bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/ /shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung / /lho phyogs
na ni 'phags skyes po/ /nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang / /byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/ /rgyal po chen po sde bzhi dag /'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan/ /rdzu
'phrul chen po stobs po che/ /phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid/ /rgyal po dag gi mngag gzhug pa/ /gnod sbyin 'dod rgur mchi ba rnams/ /de dag glang po che
'tshal zhing / /phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyu/ /de dag ni/ chibs rta dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang / bya dang /
skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma la 'tshal zhing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/ /glang po che gcig
gis shing rta drangs shing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/ /chibs rta dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug dang / sprul dang /
bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma gcig gis shing rta drangs shing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/ /rdzu 'phrul chen
po stobs po che'i/ /gnod sbyin 'dod rgur mchi ba rnams/ /bzhon pa de dag 'tshal nas ni/ /phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid/ /rgyal po dag gi grong khyer
dag /sna tshogs mkha' la rgyu ba mchis/ /'di lta ste/ kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / sa la kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / gar bcas
sa steng kun tu rgyu ba dang / sbubs can dang / grong khyer sbubs can zhes bgyi ba dag lags so/ /byang phyogs na mtsho ka bi pang+ka zhes bgyi ba yang mchis lags
so/ /nub phyogs na grong khyer gsar pa gser ldan dang / gos can dang / gos mchog can dang / pad+ma can dang / pad+ma bzang po can dang / sa gzhi can zhes bgyi
bdag kyang mchis so/ /chab rgyun mang po'i gnas gyur pa/ /'dzin pa zhes bgyi'o mtsho mchis te/ /chab rgyun tha dad de las 'byung / /de las dgung char 'bab par 'gyur
btsun pa/ /grong khyer u shi ri'i sbubs kyi pha rol na/ lus gnas dang ni gnas yangs dang / /de bas gnas yangs rgyun lugs can/ /rgyun lugs mang dang de bas
mang / /bar snang mkha' la bya ltar gda'/ /btsun pa/ grong khyer sbubs can gyi pha rol byang gi phyogs cha na 'dun sa bya gar can zhes bgyi bde mchis te/ der ni/ gnod
sbyin rnams 'du zhing gnas lags so/ /rkang mi sdug la mchu 'phyang dang / /'jigs rung lto spu can dag mchis/ /de na ljon shing 'bras bu rtag /rma bya khrung khrung sgra
snyan cing / /khu byug sgra skad chen po dang / /shang shug te'u dag sgra 'byin cing / /rma bya rnams kyi sgra dag dang / /kau kum+b+ha dang chun lag dang / /bya rnams sna tshogs skad 'byin
cing / /me tog sbrang rtsi'i ro la dga'/ /lus ngan pa de glu gar gyis/ /pad+ma can dang lhan cig rtse/ /btsun pa/ grong khyer lcang lo can gyi pha rol na rgyal po dpa' bo zhes bgyi
ba yul 'khor mu khyud na mchis lags so/ /bdag gang na mchis pa'i mdun sa de ni/ khyu mchog can zhes bgyi ste/ bdag gi ming ni/ rnam thos kyi bu zhes bgyi lags
so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni/ 'di dag lags so/ /ta pya thA/ i li mi li/ i li mi li/ ki Ti mU le/ hi li ki Ti mU le/ hu
du me/ hu dur du me/ gau ri/ gan+d+ha ri/ go do ha ni/ o ke mo ke swAhA/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis dri za rnams dang / dri za chen po
rnams dang / dri za'i sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/ /'di lta ste/ 'dod myos dga' bas myos pa dang / glu yis
myos pa spun dang ni/ /phreng bas myos dang sprang rtsis myos/ /me tog myos pa spun rnams dang / /rtag tu myos dang dpal gyis myos/ /nor gyis myos dang dga' byed
dang / /ut+pal pad+ma zla ba dang / /rnga 'dzin dang ni khu byug sgra/ tum+bu ru dang gtsug lnga dang / /gser spyod bu mo gser can dang / /pa ba sangs dang phur bu dag
'brog gnas ji snyed rgyal po lags/ /de dag ni/ bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag dri za 'di ni/ bdag la 'tshe'o/ /dri za 'di ni/ bdag mi gtong
ngo/ /zhes mchi zhing / de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/ /bdag la 'tshe ba'i dri za dang / /bdag mi gtong ba'i dri za yis/ /legs par smras pa 'di thos nas/ /
ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/ /de mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni/ 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ kun+tu le/ kun+tu le/ kun+tu le/ kun+tu
le/ a hi e hi/ sA d+ha ma ti ke /sA d+ha b+haN+Di ni ke/ tiSh+Tha duSh+Tha ba to si swAhA/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge
bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / srug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur
ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la gal te dri za'am/ dri za mo'am/ dri za rgan po'am/ dri za rgan mo'am/ dri za'i bu pho'am/ dri za'i
bu mo'am/ dri za'i 'khor pho'am/ dri za'i 'khor mo 'am/ dri za'i mngag gzhug pa'am/ dri za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags
tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ dri za rnams kyi dri za 'du ba'i nang du
mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /btsun
pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba
dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos
shing 'don par bgyid pa de la gal te sha za'am/ sha za mo'am/ sha za rgan po'am/ sha za rgan mo'am/ sha za'i bu pho'am/ sha za'i bu mo'am/ sha
za'i 'khor pho'am/ sha za'i 'khor mo'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug pa'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol
ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la sha za rnams kyi sha za 'du ba'i nang du mchir
mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /de la gsang
sngags kyi tshig ni/ 'di dag lags/ /tad+ya thA/ hu me hu me/ hu me li/ hu mi lA ba tI ye swAhA/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis
grul bum rnams dang / grul bum chen mo rnams dang / grul bum gyi sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon gyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/ /'di lta ste/ byin dang nye
byin kri mi sha /rtsibs logs che dang gsus po che/ /lag bcu dang ni sa la rgyu/ /g.yon phyogs nag po dmar po dang / /sprin mdog dang ni dri med dang / /rna ba ring dang 'brug
sgra sgrog /ral pa can dang stobs bcu dang / /srid sgrub dang ni 'dod rgur mchi/ /'jog po dang ni bya ba sbed/ /la ba bzang ldan gsum po dang / /tshon kun dang ni mig
bkra bo/ /'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags/ /de dag ni/ bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag grul bum 'di ni/ bdag la 'tshe'o/ /grul bum 'di
ni/ bdag mi gtong ngo / /zhes mchi zhing / de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/ /bdag la 'tshe ba'i grul bum dang / /bdag mi gtong ba'i grul bum gyis/ /legs
bar smras pa 'di thos na/ /a rdza ka yi dog pa bzhin/ /de yi mgo tshal bdun du 'gas/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni/ 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ si re bi si
re/ si ri bi si re/ si ri bi si re/ si ri bi si re/ kriSh+Na tsha ga le/ ka rA Di/ biM ga le swAhA/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong
ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo rig sngags
dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don bar bgyid pa de la gal te grul bum mam/ grul
bum mo'am/ grul bum rgan po'am/ grul bum rgan mo'am/ grul bum gyi bu pho'am/ grul bum gyi bu mo'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor pho'am/ grul
bum gyi 'khor mo'am/ grul bum gyi mngag gzhug pa dang / grul bum gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar byed pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye
bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'grang ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la grul bum rnams kyi grul bum 'du ba'i nang du mchir
mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /btsun pa
bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa
dang mthun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la gal
te yi dwags sam/ yi dwags mo'am/ yi dwags rgan pho'am/ yi dwags rgan mo'am/ yi dwags bu pho'am/ yi dwags kyi bu mo'am/ yi dwags kyi 'khor
pho'am/ yi dwags kyi 'khor mo'am/ yi dwags kyi mngag gzhug pa'am/ yi dwags kyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la
la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la yi dwags rnams kyi yi dwags 'du ba'i nang du
mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /de la
gsang sngags kyi tshig ni/ 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ yu mi yu mi/ yu mi le/ yu mi la bA ti ye swAhA/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
bdag gis klu rnams dang / klu chen po rnams dang / klu'i sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/ /'di lta ste/ dga' dang nye
dga' kun dga' dang / /nor rgyas dang ni 'dzam bu bzang / /ser po dang ni zho rna dang / /dbang po'i lag dang bkra shis dang / /mya ngan med dang
mya ngan bral/ /rab grol dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag /ngos yangs po dang ngos bkra dang / /yangs pa can dang bkra bdud rgyal/ /gdengs ka chen dang skar dga' dang / /nag
po che dang lag 'gro dang / /ra skyong dang ni 'jog po dang / /g.yon phyogs de bzhin nag po dang / /sngo bsangs dkar dang 'grogs pa ni/ /'gro gnas ji snyed mchis
pa lags/ /de dag ni/ bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag klu 'di ni/ bdag la 'tshe'o/ /klu 'di ni/ bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing / de dag la go
bar bgyid lags so/ /bdag la 'tshe ba'i klu dag dang / /bdag mi gtong ba'i klu rnams kyis/ /legs par smras pa 'di thos na/ /ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin//
de yi mgo tshal bdun du 'gas/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni/ 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ tsi le bi tsi le/ tsi li bi tsi li/ gau ri/ gan+d+ha ri/ ma taM gi
gaN+Da li swAhA/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyis dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba ma
lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par 'gyid
pa de la gal te klu'am/ klu mo'am/ klu rgan po'am/ klu rgan mo'am/ klu'i bu pho'am/ klu'i bu mo'am/ klu'i 'khor pho'am/ klu'i 'khor mo'am/ klu'i
mngag gzhug pa'am/ klu'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis
