par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ klu rnams kyi klu 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob
ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/
dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa
la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la gal te las srul bo'am/ lus srul mo'am/ lus srul rgan po'am/
lus srul rgan mo'am/ lus srul po'i bu pho'am/ lus srul po'i bu mo'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor pho'am/ lus srul
po'i 'khor mo'am/ lus srul po'i mngag gzhug pa'am/ lus srul po'i mngag gzhug ma'am/ 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la
zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la lus srul po rnams kyi lus srul po 'du ba'i nang du mchir
mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig
ni/ 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ A pe ne ba ha ni/ ma hA na ba tI ya swA hA/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis gnod sbyin rnams dang / gnod sbyin
chen po rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/ /'di lta ste/ dbang po zla ba chu lha dang / /b+ha ra d+h+wa
dza skye rgu'i bdag /dbang ldan tsan+dan 'dod gtso dang / /mgrin ngan dang ni mgul nges dang / /stobs ldan nor bu nor spyod dang / /sgra rab dang ni nye lnga dang / /ri mnyam gser
can gang po dang / /seng ldeng ma dang g.yon can dang / /gnod sbyin ba skyong 'brog gnas dang / /rgyal ba khyu mchog mi rgyal po/ /dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/ /lcags mdung ring dang
ma ldan dang / /tshig lnga ser po yid dga' dang / /gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas/ /'bras bu gsum dang mgul gsum pa/ /'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags//
de dag ni/ bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag gnod sbyin 'di ni/ bdag la 'tshe'o/ /gnod sbyin 'di ni/ bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing / de dag la go
bar bgyid lags so/ /bdag la 'tshe ba'i gnod sbyin dang / /bdag mi gtong ba'i gnod sbyin gyis/ /legs par smras pa 'di thos na/ /ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/ /de'i
mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni/ 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ hi li mi le/ kIrti mU le/ hi li kIrti mU le/ oM tum+be tum+be/
oM tum+be tum+be/ oM g+he mo g+he/ go de hi/ b+h+riM ga re/ ri Shi sat+ta me swA hA/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen
ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang / /srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur pa 'di nyid rgya
cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la gal te gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo'am/ gnod sbyin rgan po'am/ gnod sbyin
rgan mo'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu pho'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor pho'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mo'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug
pa'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng dam/ nye bar mchis par
gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas
mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/
dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung pa dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag
'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la gal te srin po'am/ srin mo'am/ srin po rgan po'am/ srin po rgan mo'am/ srin
po'i bu pho'am/ srin po'i bu mo'am/ srin po'i 'khor pho'am/ srin po'i 'khor mo'am/ srin po'i mngag gzhug pa'am/ srin po'i mngag gzhug ma'am/
'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la srin po rnams kyi srin
po 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags
so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni/ 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ hU lu hU lu/ yu me yu me la/ yu mI la ba trI ye swA hA/ de nas rgyal po rnam
thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal
bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher brjod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan
mo 'das pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtso la gdan bshams pa de nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal
pa/ dge slong dag /mdang rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu kha dog 'phags pa/ g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin du ma dang / /g.yog 'khor
gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa nam sros pa dang / nga
ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i kha dog gi mthus
rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
gsol to/ /rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /blo ldan khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/ /lha rnams kyis ni de ma 'tshal/ /dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa dang / /da ltar byung dang ma byon pa/ /thams cad la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ /khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /btsun pa/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang dag gnas mal dgon pa dang / nags 'dabs dag dang / bas
mtha' dag na gnas pa dag kyang mchis la/ de na gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la
mngon par dad pa dag dang / mngon par ma dad pa dag kyang mchis te/ gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi
gsung rab la mngon par dad pa de dag ni/ shin tu nyung la/ gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung
rab la mngon par ma dad pa de dag ni/ ches mang lags te/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang /
dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams 'di ltar bdag nyid bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi
ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa mngon par ma dad pa dad par bgyi ba dang / mngon par dad pa rnams kyang slar zhing 'phel bar bgyi ba'i slad du kun
tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher 'dzin cing
kun chub par bgyid na legs so legs so zhes gsol pa dang / dge slong dang /ngas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la cang mi
gsung bas gnang bar mdzad do/ /de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus ngas cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
nga'i spyan sngar kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba
'di nyid rgya cher gsol te/ skye bo gang dag gtong phod cing / /phra ma mchis ser sna bral/ /gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchis pa/ /mi de rnams kyis rnyed pa
lags/ /gang gi 'char la brten nas ni/ /des na nyin mor brjod pa yi/ /nyi ma chen po'i dkyil 'khor can/ /nyi gdugs gang nas 'char 'gyur ba'i/ /phyogs
de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu
dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /dri za rnams kyis yongs bskor cing / /dri za rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/
de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ /kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /de dag rnams kyis rdzogs
sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/ /
rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/ /khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ /de skad yang dang yang du thos/ /de slad
bdag ni 'di skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal ni phyag 'tshol cig /gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ /mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol
mchi/ /de ltar shar gyi phyogs de ni/ /bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/ /gang na yi
dwags zhes bgyi ba/ /rgyab kyi sha 'tshal phra ma can/ /srog gcod bgyid pa ma rungs pa/ /'jungs shing mi snyan smra bgyid pa'i/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /
rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni 'phags skyes bo zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /grul bum
rnams kyis yongs bskor cing / /grul bum rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig
de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ /kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /de dag rnams kyis
rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /mi yis phyag bgyis
khyod la ni/ /rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/ /khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ /de skad yang dang yang du
thos/ /de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ /mya ngan
'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/ /de ltar lho yi phyogs de ni/ /bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan
pa lags/ /gang zhig nub pa kho na las/ /des na mtshan mor brjod pa yi/ /nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can/ /nyi gdugs gang du nub 'gyur ba/ /des na mtsho chen
zab mo ni/ /shin tu 'da' bar dka' ba ste/ /de ni chu sngon rgya mtsho zhes/ /skye bo rtogs pa mchis pa yi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa
ni/ /klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni mig mi bzang zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /klu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor cing / /klu
rnams kyis ni mdun gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /
lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ /kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod
la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/ /rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/ /
khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ /de skad yang dang yang du thos/ /de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol
cig /sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ /mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/ /de ltar nub kyi phyogs de ni/ /bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon
par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/ /gang na byang gi sgra mi snyan/ /dga' zhing lhun chen blta mdzes pa/ /gang
na mi rnams tshe lo ni/ /brgya phrag bcu pa skye 'gyur zhing / /de dag mo rmo mi 'debs la/ /gshol yang 'chang bar mi bgyid cing / /tshe ring mdog dang ldan pa
dang / /nges par yongs su spyod bgyid cing / /zas su sA lu kha dog dang / /dri dang ro dang ldan pa dang / /dri dang me tog tshogs 'dra zhing / /lha yi bdud rtsi 'dra ba
'tshal/ /na li ke ra bskol bgyis nas/ /tshod mar de 'tshal sran tshod min/ /gang na me lce'i rtse 'dra ba'i/ /sman dag 'khrungs par 'gyur ba yi/ /phyogs de
mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni lus ngan po zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/
glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyi yongs bskor cing / /gnod sbyin rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad cu
dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ /kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /de
dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ /skye mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /mi yis
phyag bgyis khyod la ni/ /rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/ /khyod la mi min phyag 'tshol ba/ /de skad yang
dang yang du thos/ /de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan
pa/ /mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshal mchi/ /de ltar byang gi phyogs de ni/ /bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags
dang ldan pa lags/ /shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung / /lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/ /nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang / /byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/ /
rgyal po chen po de bzhi dag /'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che/ /phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid/ /rgyal po dag gi mngag gzhug
pa/ /gnod sbyin 'dod rgur mchi ba rnams/ /de dag glang po che 'tshal zhing / /phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyu/ /de dag ni/ chibs rta dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang /
ma he dang / ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang / bya ba dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma la
che gcig gis shing rta drangs shing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang che gcig gis shing rta drangs shing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/ /chibs rta
dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang / bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma gcig
gis shing rta drangs shing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che/ /gnod sbyin 'dod rgur mchi ba rnams/ /bzhon pa de dag
'tshal nas ni/ /phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid/ /rgyal po dag ni grong khyer dag /sna tshogs mkha' la rgyu ba mchis/ /'di lta ste/ kun tu rgyu ba dang /
kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / sa la kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / gar bcas sa steng kun tu rgyu ba dang / sbubs can dang / grong khyer sbubs can zhes bgyi
ba dag lags so/ /byang phyogs na mtsho ka bi bang+ka zhes bgyi ba yang mchis lags so/ /nub phyogs na grong khyer gsar pa gser ldan dang / gos can dang /
gos mchog can dang / pad+ma can dang / pad+ma bzang po can dang / sa gzhi can zhes bgyi ba dag kyang mchis lags so/ /chab rgyun mang po'i gnas rgyur pa/ /'dzin pa
zhes bgyi'i mtsho mchis te/ /chab rgyun tha dad de las 'byung / /de las dgung char 'bab par 'gyur/ /btsun pa/ grong khyer u shi ra'i sbubs kyi pha rol na/ lus
gnas dang ni gnas yangs dang / de bas gnas yangs rgyun lugs can/ /rgyun lugs mang dang de bas mang / /bar snang mkha' la bya ltar gda'/ /btsun
pa/ grong khyer sbubs can gyi pha rol byang phyogs na 'dun sa bya gar can zhes bgyi ba de mchis te/ der ni/ gnod sbyin rnams 'du zhing gnas lags so/ /
rkang mi sdug la mchu 'phyang dang / /'jigs rung lto sbu can dag mchis/ /de na ljon shing 'bras bu rtag /rma bya khrung khrung sgra snyan dang / /khu byug sgra skad chen po
dang / /shang shang te'u dag sgra 'byin cing / /rma bya rnams kyi sgra dag dang / /kau kum+b+ha dang tshun lag dang / /bya rnams sna tshogs skad 'byin cing / /me tog sbrang rtsi'i ro la
dga'/ /lus ngan po de glu gar gyis/ /pad+ma can dang lhan cig rtse/ /btsun pa/ /grong khyer lcang lo can gyi pha rol na rgyal po dpa' bo zhes bgyi ba yul 'khor mu khyud
na mchis lags so/ /bdag gang na mchis pa'i 'dun sa de ni/ khyu mchog can zhes bgyi ste/ bdag gi ming ni/ rnam thos kyi
bu zhes bgyi lags sa/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni/ 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ i li mi li/ i le mi le/ ki Ti mU le/ hi li ki Ti mU le/ hi li ki Ti mU le/ hu du me/
hu dur du me/ gau ri/ gan+d+ha ri/ gau do ha ni/ o ke mo ke swA hA/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis dri za rnams dang / dri za chen po rnams
dang / dri za'i sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/ /'di lta ste/ 'dod myos dga' bas myos pa dang / /glu yis myos
pa spun rnams dang / /phreng bas myos dang sbrang rtsis myos/ /me tog myos pa spun rnams dang / /rtag tu myos dang dpal gyis myos/ /nor gyis myos dang dga'
byed dang / /ut+pa la pad+ma zla ba dang / /rnga 'dzin dang ni khu byug sgra/ /tum+bu ru dang gtsug lnga dang / /gser spyod bu mo gser can dang / /pa ba sangs dang phur
bu dag /'gro gnas ji snyed rgyal po lags/ /de dag ni/ bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag dri za 'di ni/ bdag la 'tshe'o/ /dri za 'di ni/ /bdag ni
gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing / /de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/ /bdag la 'tshe ba'i dri za dang / /bdag mi gtong ba'i dri za yis/ /legs par smras pa 'di thos
nas/ /ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/ /de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni/ 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ kun tu le/ kun+tu le/
kun+tu le/ kun+tu le/ e hi e hi/ sA d+ha ma ti ke/ sA d+ha b+haN+Di ni ke /tiSh+Tha duSh+Tha b+ha to si swA hA/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong
ma'am/ dge ba snyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa
la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la gal te dri za'am/ dri za mo'am/ dri za rgan po'am/ dri za rgan mo'am/ dri
za'i bu pho'am/ dri za'i bu mo'am/ dri za'i 'khor pho'am/ dri za'i 'khor mo'am/ dri za'i mngag gzhug pa'am/ dri za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa
glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ dri za rnams kyi dri
za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin
du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang
la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur 'di nyid
rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la gal te sha za'am/ sha za mo'am/ sha za rgan po'am/ sha za rgan mo'am/ sha za'i bu pho'am/ sha za'i
bu mo'am/ sha za'i 'khor pho'am/ sha za'i 'khor mo'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug pa'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing
glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la sha za rnams kyi sha za 'du ba'i
nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /de
la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni/ 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ hU me hU me/ hU mi le/ hU mi le/ bA tI ye swA hA/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
bdag gis grul bum rnams dang / grul bum chen po rnams dang / grul bum gyi sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags
so/ /'di lta ste/ byin dang nye byin kri mi sha /rtsibs logs che dang gsus po che/ /lag bcu dang ni sa la rgyu/ /g.yon phyogs nag po dmar po dang / sprin mdog
dang ni dri med dang / /rna ba ring dang 'brug sgra sgrog /ral pa can dang stobs bcu dang / /srid sgrub dang ni 'dod rgur mchi/ /'jog po dang ni bya ba sbed/ /la ba
bzang ldan gsum po dang / /tshon kun dang ni mig bkra po/ /'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags/ /de dag ni/ bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag grul bum
'di ni/ bdag la 'tshe'o/ /grul bum 'di ni/ bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing / de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/ /bdag la 'tshe ba'i grul bum dang / /bdag
gi gtong ba'i grul bum gyis/ /legs par smras pa 'di thos na/ ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/ /de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig
ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ si re pi si re/ si re bi si re/ si re bi sa re/ kr-iSh+Na tsha ka le/ ka ra Di/ pi ga le swA hA/
btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba
ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don
par bgyid pa de la gal te grul bum mam/ grul bum mo'am/ grul bum rgan po'am/ grul bum rgan mo'am/ grul bum gyi bu pho'am/ grul bum gyi
bu mo'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor pho'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor mo'am/ grul bum gyi mngag gzhug pa'am/ grul bum gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tsho bar
bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed
la/ grul bum rnams kyi grul bum 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog
pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du 'gas lags so/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la
kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung
mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la gal te yi dwags sam/ yi dwags mo'am/ yi dwags rgan po'am/ yi dwags rgan mo'am/ yi dwags kyi bu pho'am/ yi
dwags kyi bu mo'am/ yi dwags kyi 'khor pho'am/ yi dwags kyi 'khor mo'am/ yi dwags kyi mngag gzhug pa'am/ yi dwags kyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa
glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la yi dwags rnams kyi yi
dwags 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du
'gas lags so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ yu me yu me/ yu mi li/ yu mi lA ba trI ye swA hA/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan
'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis klu rnams dang / klu chen po rnams dang / klu'i sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming
brjod par bgyid lags so/ /'di lta ste/ dga' dang nye dga' kun dga' dang / /nor rgyas dang ni 'dzam bu bzang / /ser po dang ni zho rna dang / dbang po lag
dang bkra shis dang / /mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral/ /rab grol dang ni rgyal po'i bdag /ngos yangs po dang ngos bkra dang / /yangs pa can dang bkra bdun
rgyal/ /gdengs ka che dang skar dga' dang / /nag po che dang lag 'gro dang / /ra skyong dang ni 'jog po dang / /g.yon phyogs de bzhin nag po dang / /sngo bsangs
dkar dang 'grogs pa ni/ /'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags/ /de dag ni/ bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag klu 'di ni/ bdag la 'tshe'o/ /
klu 'di ni/ bdag mi gtor ngo zhes mchi zhing / de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/ /bdag la 'tshe ba'i klu dag dang / /bdag mi gtong ba'i klu rnams
kyis/ /legs par smras pa 'di thos na/ /ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/ /de'i mgo tshal ba bdun du 'gas/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni/ 'di dag lags so/ /
tad+ya thA/ ci le bi tse le/ gau ri/ gan+d+ha ri/ ma taM gi/ tsan+Da li swA hA/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/
dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar
'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la gal te klu'am/ klu mo'am/ klu rgan po'am/ klu rgan mo'am/ klu'i bu pho'am/ /klu'i bu
mo'am/ klu'i 'khor pho'am/ klu'i 'khor mo'am/ klu'i mngag gzhug pa'am/ /klu'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba
la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ klu rnams kyi klu 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi
chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du 'gas lags so/ /btsun pa/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun
pa'i mdo rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don
par bgyid pa de la gal te lus srul po'am/ lus srul mo'am/ lus srul bo rgan po'am/ /lus srul po rgan mo'am/ lus srul po'i bu pho'am/ lus
srul po'i bu mo'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor pho'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor mo'am/ lus srul po'i mngag gzhug pa'am/ lus srul po'i mngag
gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng dam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed
cing gnas mi rnyed la lus srul po rnams kyi lus srul po 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ /
de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni/ /'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ a be ba ha na ba ha
na ba tI ye swAhA/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis gnod sbyin rnams dang / gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnams
dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/ /'di lta ste/ dbang po zla ba chu lha dang / b+ha ra d+h+wa dza skye rgu'i bdag /dbang ldan tsan+dan 'dod gtso dang / /
mgrin ngan dang ni mgul nges dang / /stobs ldan nor bu nor spyod dang / sgra rab dang ni nye lnga dang / /ri mnyam gser can gang po dang / /seng ldeng ba dang g.yon can
dang / /gnod sbyin ba skyong 'brog gnas dang / /rgyal ba khyu mchog mi rgyal po/ /dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/ /lcags mdung ring dang ma ldan dang / /tshig lnga ser po
yid dga' dang / /gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas/ /'bras bu gsum dang mgul gsum pa/ /'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags/ /de dag ni/ bdag
gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag gnod sbyin 'di ni/ bdag la tshe'o/ /gnod sbyin 'di ni/ bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing / de dag la go bar bgyid
lags so/ /bdag la 'tshe ba'i gnod sbyin dang / /bdag mi gtong ba'i gnod sbyin gyis/ /legs par smras pa 'di thos na/ /ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/ /de'i
mgo tshal ba bdun du 'gas/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni/ 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ hi le mi le/ hi le mi le/ kI rti mU le/ hi le kI rti mU le/ oM tum+be
tum+be/ oM tum+be tum+be/ oM g+he mo g+he/ go de hi/ b+hing+ga re/ r-i Shi sad t+ta me swAhA/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge
slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo rig sngags
dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la gal te gnod sbyin nam/ gnod
sbyin mo'am/ gnod sbyin rgan po'am/ gnod sbyin rgan mo'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu pho'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor pho'am/ gnod
sbyin gyi 'khor mo'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug pa'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig
nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi
chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /btsun pa/
bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa
dang mthun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung nod cing 'don par bgyid pa de la gal
te srin po'am/ srin mo'am/ srin mo rgan po'am/ srin mo rgan mo'am/ srin po'i bu pho'am/ srin po'i bu mo'am/ srin po'i 'khor pho'am/ srin po'i
'khor mo'am/ srin po'i mngag gzhug pa'am/ srin po'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi
zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ srin po rnams kyi srin po 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i
pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni/ 'di
dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ hi le hi le/ hu lu hu lu/ yu me yu me le/ yu mi lA bi hI ye swA hA zhes rgya cher smras nas nga'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te de
nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag /khyed kyis 'di ltar bdag nyid bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bde ba la reg par
gnas par bya ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi ma yin pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa mngon par ma dad pa dag mngon par dad par bya ba dang / mngon par
dad pa rnams kyang phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug
pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid longs shig /zungs shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /par sdom ni/ i/ ku/ hu/ si/ yu/ ci/ A/
hi/ hi/ gsang sngags kyi tshig rnam pa dgu smos pa dang go rim bzhin du sbyar ro/ /mdo chen po kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo
zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pra dz+nyA wa rma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing
zhus te gtan la phab pa/ @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya ma hA me g+ha/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sprin chen po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga'i gnas na nor bu rin po che dpal gyi
snying po sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po'i tshogs
chen po 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' dang / rgya mtsho dang / ma dros pa dang / gzi can dang / chu lha dang / 'jog po dang / yul 'khor srung
dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang / klu'i rgyal po btang bzung dang / sa srung gi bu dang / mdongs bu dang / dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / dpal bzang dang / glog gi phreng ba
dang / gtsug na nor bu rin po che dang / gtsug na nor bu thogs dang / snang ldan gtsug phud can dang / gtsug phud 'ja' can dang / klu'i rgyal po dbang po'i rgyal
mtshan dang / dbang po'i mchod sdong dang / 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / bkra shis ldan dang / dkyil 'khor chen po can dang / lag gis 'gro chen po dang /
skar mdog dang / zla ba'i gzi brjid dang / dpal gyi blo gros dang / zla mthong dang / klu'i rgyal po legs mthong dang /
shin tu brtan dang / mgul na nor bu dang / sprin byung dang / char rgyun dang / rab 'joms dang / rnam par 'joms dang / mthu bsgyings dang / gdengs ka
chen po dang / dbyangs zab dang / klu'i rgyal po cher sgrog dang / rnam par sgra 'byin dang / ut+pa la dang / rtsal chen dang / gshol mda' 'dzin dang /
sna tshogs sde dang / zhags pa chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab ma dang / kun tu snang dang / rna rtsub dang / dung dang / dar dar dang / klu'i rgyal po u
ba dar dar dang / bde byed dang / lag 'gro dang / lag 'gro chen po dang / dri ma chen po dang / 'phur lding dang / sog ma med dang / 'phyang ba dang / srin bu
gnas dang / nag po dang / klu'i rgyal po dbang po sde dang / 'dam bu dang / nye ba'i 'dam bu dang / dung thogs dang / 'gro lding dang / rab mdzes dang / glang
chen sna dang / rnon po dang / ser skya dang / glog 'bar dang / glog 'od chen po dang / stobs lha dang / chu stobs dang / klu'i rgyal po dam pa 'gebs dang / bdud
rtsi can dang / mu stegs can dang / bai DUR+ya'i 'od can dang / gser mdog sgra dang / gser 'od dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan 'od dang / nyi 'od dang / 'char pa dang / ba
lang mgo dang / klu'i rgyal po dkar po dang / nag po dang / gshin rje dang / dge tshul dang / sbal pa dang / ngang pa'i gzi brjid dang / mu khyud 'dzin dang / sa
'dzin dang / mgo stong can dang / gtsug na nor bu dang / klu'i rgyal po don yod mthong ba dang / sprin chen dang / sde bzang dang / sa skyong dang / mis byin dang /
rnam par dul dang / dga' ba 'byung dang / chu srin kum+b+hi ra dang / chu srin kum+b+hi ra'i gdong dang / dug 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po myur gdug dang / pad+ma ka dang /
mjug ma dang / rab 'phyang dang / 'jigs byed dang / gzi brjid mdzes dang / mgo lnga pa dang / bal li ra dang / shing rtas rgyal dang / klu'i rgyal po bla
ma dang / klu'i rgyal po mjug ring dang / mgo bo che dang / pim+bi ka dang / bi ta ra dang / mgyogs 'gro dang / klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa dang / klu sde dang / gzi
chen dang / 'dam bu byin dang / klu'i rgyal po skrag byed dang / 'od 'bar dang / mgo bdun pa dang / sdong chen dang / mthong dga' dang / rab tu cher gtum dang /
dri med gzi brjid dang / mig bzang dang / drag po chen po dang / 'od 'phro phung po dang / klu'i rgyal po gtum po dang / khro bo drag shul
can dang / rin chen chu sbyin dang / chu sbyin sprin chen dang / dbang po'i 'od dang / rkang pas 'thung dang / sprin zla dang / rgya mtsho'i sprin dang / me tog dri chen po
dang / ku mu da'i 'byung gnas dang / klu'i rgyal po rin chen mig dang / tog chen po'i rgyal mtshan dang / sprin chen snying po dang / kha ba can dang / dpal
gyi snying po dang / sprin mthu can dang / mtshan mo 'dzin dang / chu sbyin dang / chu sbyin chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi brjid me 'dra dang / sprin gyi dbang phyug
rgyal po dang / khro med dang / sa'i bum pa dang / klu dpa' dang / chu 'dzin dang / sprin gdugs dang / ang gi ra'i gdong dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can
dang / sprin las mngon byung dang / klu'i rgyal po gom stabs mtha' yas dang / cha byad mdzes dang / lus chen dang / spyad lto dang / zhi ba dang / dpa' ba dang /
gser dad can dang / mchog tu brtson dang / dug drag dang / dbyangs snyan dang / klu'i rgyal po bdud rtsi snying po dang / rab tu char 'bebs chen po dang / rnam par
g.yo dang / 'brug sgra dang / rnga sgra dang / bdud rtsi'i rgyun dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / 'brug sgrog dang / dpa' sde dang / sred med kyi bu dang / rgya mtsho'i klong dang //
klu'i rgyal po yon po dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po de dag la sogs pa klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dag 'dus te 'khod pa dang thabs cig tu
bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po de dag 'khor dang bcas te stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bla ma la gus pa dang / phu dud chen po byed pas/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos
dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dar gyi lda ldi dang / rol mo'i sgra dang /
sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs dang / rin po che'i me tog dang / rin po che'i lnga ldi dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / klu'i me tog dang / mu tig
gi dra ba mchog tu mdzes pa rnam pa sna tshogs dpag tu med pa grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das la phul nas bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs
gcig tu 'dug nas smon lam rnams btab pa/ lus rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul
snyed kyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams rgya mtsho thams cad
dang / sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams dang / gzugs su snang ba thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams las
rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la yang lus kyi sprin rgya mtsho bgrangs pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ grangs med/ dpag tu med/ bsam
gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa las yang dag par 'das pa dag dang / lus re re la yang lag pa rgya mtsho'i sprin
phyogs kun gyi rgyun tu mngon par phyogs pa/ dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa dag byin gyis brlabs nas rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyi cha re re las kyang mchod
pa thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtsho phyogs kun gyi gzhi rgyas par 'gengs pa/ ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
mchod par bya'o/ /snyam pa 'di lta ste/ kun tu spyod pa'i lus rgya mtsho'i sprin ma 'dres pa dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod
du med pa dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas byang chub sems dpa'i lus rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du
rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang / 'od zer stug po dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams
dang / rin po che thams cad kyi phreng ba dang / me tog gi rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi snang ba chen po'i snying po khang pa brtsegs pa rgya
mtsho sprin rnams dang / phye ma dang / shing ljon pa thams cad kyi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos dang / bdug pa thams cad kyi gzugs kun tu ston
pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sgra thams cad sgrog pa'i rol mo'i rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos thams cad kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nam mkha'i
dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas de la sogs pa mchod pa thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/
gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa/ ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho
thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /yul thams cad du bkod pa rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po
can gyi nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya
mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /thams cad kun tu snang ba'i nor bu rin po che'i char 'bab pa bkod
pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba 'bar ba dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas la nges par gyur pa'i dbyangs kyi
nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun tu sgras 'gengs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /
kun nas sgo rin po che 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa snang bar byed pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ma 'dres pa rnams su bkod
pa thams cad snang ba kun tu ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'od 'phro ba sgron ma sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i nor
bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang snang ba kun tu ston pa'i
nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rdul la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku snang ba rnam par snang bar byed pa'i
nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho
sprin thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /rin po che dang / spos dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs
pa ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po kha dog mtha' yas pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin
rnams dang / rin po che'i sgron ma dang / spos kyi 'od 'phro ba can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig thams cad kyis rnam par spras
pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog thams cad kyi ze brgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i phreng ba mtha'
yas pas legs par brgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas phyogs bcu kun tu
'od zer snang ba'i snying po can bkod pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rdul phra
rab kyis rab tu brgyan pa bkod pa du ma kun tu ston pa khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa kun tu rgyas
par 'gengs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sgo kun tu me tog gi rta babs dril bu'i dra ba dbyangs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i
dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor
bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /gser dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshong tshong dang / phreng ba dang / rin po che'i mgul gdub kyi snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho
sprin rnams dang / me tog ltar snang ba sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / an+da rnyil dang / 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi pad+ma sna tshogs
kyi snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i sgron ma'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che snang gsal
rgyal mtshan gyi pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po ches brgyan pa'i pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho
sprin rnams dang / an+da rnyil mdzes par 'bar pa'i 'od zer ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'od zer 'bar ba zad mi
shes pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'bar ba thams cad 'byung ba'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi
seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'bar ba mchog dam pa thams cad 'byung ba'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs
rgyas kyi gsung sgra'i 'od zer dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs
te sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par
bya'o/ /spos dang / nor bu sna tshogs pa thams cad kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgo lo ma las thal mo sbyar ba'i sprin 'byung ba'i spos
kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / shing ljon pa thams cad kyi gzugs mtha' yas pa bkod pa kun tu ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /
me tog thams cad kyi sprin rab tu 'phyang ba'i sprin shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad 'byung ba'i mdzod mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i
shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang bar byed pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang
byang chub sems dpa'i lus phyed tsam na thams cad kyi phye mar kun tu ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / byang chub kyi snying po thams cad kyi
bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od can gyi shing ljon pa'i rin po che'i gos thams cad kyi mdzod nyi ma ltar snang bar byas pa dang ldan pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho
sprin rnams dang / sgra dbyangs thams cad sgrog pa yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kun tu gtong ba'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che kha dog mtha' yas
pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun tu mngon par phyogs pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po snang bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya
mtsho sprin rnams dang / rgyan bkod pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs 'od 'phro ba'i
sgron ma'i phreng ba'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgra rin po che'i shing ljon pa 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin
rnams dang / spos dang me tog dang pad+ma thams cad kyi phreng ba rin po che'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdan
bkod pa kun tu ston pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad kyi phreng ba rab tu dpyangs pa'i rta
babs stegs bus rab tu brgyan pa rin po che'i sprin gyi snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i yal ga dang / phye ma'i mdzod yod
pa'i sdong po thams cad kyi snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer
ka'i dra ba kun nas brgyan pa nyid snang bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs
te sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /yid bzhin gyi nor
bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi gzhal med khang rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / an+da rnyil gyi ze ba can gyi me tog bkod pa thams cad kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams
dang / spos dang / nor bu thams cad kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma'i gzugs kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas
kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par ston par snang ba'i dbyangs can gyi nor bu'i rgyal po'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu sna tshogs kyi gos bkod pa thams cad snang ba
kun tu ston pa'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog thams cad kyi chu bo 'bar bar snang ba'i rin po che'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / dril bu sna tshogs
kyi sgras kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dra ba bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / pad+ma 'bar ba kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogs su snang ba'i nor bu'i snying po can gyi
pad+ma'i dra ba'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / gser gyi dra ba can gyi 'od zer snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa bsam gyis mi
khyab par snang ba'i 'od zer mtha' yas pa bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs
te sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o//
nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs la/ rin po che bcu'i 'od
zer snang ba bkod pa'i me tog gi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig kha dog mtha' yas pa'i mdzod kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas
dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje'i sgo'i sgra'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od 'phro ba'i gdugs
rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che rdul kun tu snang bas rab tu brgyan pa'i dril bu'i dra ba dpyangs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho
sprin rnams dang / nor bu thams cad kyi sdong bu yal ga'i rgyan gyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nyi ma rnam par snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i nor
bu'i rgyal po dang / spos dang bdug pa thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i mdzod kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs rgya
mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po snang bar byed pa kun tu bkod pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams
kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /rin po che
thams cad snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi gzugs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres
pa rnams dang / me tog gi sprin snang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i
'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gtogs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun
nas sgo sangs rgyas kyi yul sgrog pa rin po che'i yal ga'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / baiDUR+ya dang / rin po che'i rigs dang / nor bu rin po
che'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sems can gyi gzugs mtha' yas pa dag sems kyi skad
cig la kun tu ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam las byung ba yid du 'ong ba'i sgra rab tu 'byin pa
dang ldan pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can 'dul ba'i dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po'i
'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /
mchod par bya'o/ /nor bu thams cad kyi mdzod kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs dang / /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang reg bya'i
'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
chos sgrog pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin
rnams dang / me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rdul gyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /
bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa sgrog pa can gyi 'od zer rgya mtsho
sprin rnams dang / rin po che mi zad pa thams cad bstan pa dang / me tog thams cad kyi ze ba'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / khri stan bkod pa thams
cad kun tu ston pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar
bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba kha dog mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams dang / kun tu 'od kyi nor bu'i rgyal po
'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing rgya chen po bkod pa snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos thams
cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i 'od 'phro ba rgya
mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi ze ba 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / gos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro brgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / byang
chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa'i spyod pa dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig gi sgron ma thams cad kyi 'od 'phro
ba rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dag/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang bu bya'o/ /bla mar
bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o /mchod par bya'o/ /spos dang me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams
cad kyi pad+ma'i dra ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog
dang ldan pa'i mu tig gi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che dang / spos dang / tsan+dan thams cad kyi
phye ma rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu'i rgyal po yid du 'ong zhing
sdug pa mdzes pa'i dbyangs can rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / /nyi ma'i 'od kyi nor bu'i tshogs kyi phreng ba rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang / rin
po che'i mdzod mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / thams cad kun tu bzang po'i lus ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis sangs
rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /
mchod par bya'o/ /zhes de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas klu'i rgyal po de dag gi yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor
ba byas te zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rang rang gi stan la 'khod do/ /de'i tshe stong
gsum gyi stong chen po'i klu'i bdag po chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i smon lam gyi stobs can g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil
'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i
gling 'dir 'ongs so/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po stan las
langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces
bka' stsal to/ /klu'i bdag po/ /ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems
rangs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi
dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad
rgyun chad par 'gyur/ /bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur/
rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal thams cad 'khrungs par 'gyur/ 'bru thams cad skye bar 'gyur/ bcud thams cad yang dag par
skye bar 'gyur/ gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag
po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /klu'i bdag po/ khyod
sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa legs so/ /legs so/ /klu'i
bdag po/ /de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la zungs shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do/ /klu'i bdag po/ chos gcig dang ldan na/ klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug
bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /chos gcig po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa'o/ /klu'i bdag po/ byams pa
de la gnas pa'i lha dang / mi rnams ni/ /mes mi 'tshig/ mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ chus mi 'khyer/ dug gis mi tshugs/ pha rol gyi dmag pa'i tshogs kyis
zil gyis mi non/ bde bar gnyid kyis log par 'gyur/ bde bar sad par 'gyur/ rang gi bsod nams kyis yongs su srung bar 'gyur/ /bsod nams
chen po'i gzi brjid kyis gzi can du 'gyur/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang / mthong na dga' bar 'gyur/ 'gro ba
thams cad du thags thogs med par 'gyur/ sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad pa dang / rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / mi'i chos
bla ma rtogs nas lus zhig pa'i 'og tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te/ klu'i bdag po/ lha dang mi'i byams pa la
gnas pa rnams kyi phan yon ni 'di dag go /klu'i bdag po/ de bas na/ byams pa'i lus kyi las dang / byams pa'i ngag gi las dang / byams
pa'i yid kyi las kyis gnas par bya'o/ /klu'i bdag po/ gzhan yang bde ba thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs brjod par bya ste/ des klu thams
cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun gcod par byed/ bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs
par byed/ rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / lo tog thams cad skye bar byed do/ /klu'i bdag po/ de la bde ba thams
cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs de gang zhe na/ tad+ya thA/ d+ha ra ni d+ha ra ni/ ut+ta ra ni/ saM pra tiSh+Thi te/ bI dza ya bar+Na/ sad t+ya bra ti dz+nyA sa ra ha/ dz+nyA na ba ti/ ud
de bA da ni/ b+hi nA ma ni/ a b+hi She tsa ni/ a b+hi bya hA ra/ shu b+ha ba ti/ a dzi ma du/ e hi kum pa la ni/ ba ha hA ra kle sha na/ d+hu na pA paM/ sho d+ha ye marga na/ nir ti ka/ d+harma tA
shud+d+ha/ lo ka bi ti mI ra rA dza sa du khA sha ma nA sarba bud+d+ha a ba lo ka nA a d+hiSh+Thi te/ pra dz+nyA dz+nyA pi swAhA/ klu'i bdag po/ gzungs kyi tshig don thams cad sgrub par
byed pa/ chos kyi sku la 'jug pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlab pa/ bde ba thams cad sbyin pa 'di dag gzung bar bya/ brjod par bya'o/ /klu'i
bdag po/ /gzhan yang sprin gyi rigs las 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs bkod pa gzi brjid kyi snying po sprul par snang bar byed pa/ ye shes kyi tog gi chu'i
rgyun gyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khor dpal dang ldan pa gser gyi 'od zer rnam par snang bar byed pa/ skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas gcig las byung ba'i rus dang / rigs
kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan gzung bar bya/ yid la bya'o/ /de dag gis klu thams cad dang / klu'i rigs thams cad dang / klu'i rus thams
cad dang / klu'i cho rigs thams cad dang / klu'i 'byung ba thams cad dang / klu'i skye gnas thams cad dang / klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang / klu'i bu mo thams
cad dang / klu'i g.yog thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad gcod par byed/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad sgrub par byed do/ /klu'i bdag po/ /de la
de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rigs las byung ba sprin gyis rnam par mdzes pa la phyag
snying po can gyi sprin chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rigs las byung ba sprin gyis rnam par mdzes pa la phyag
'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi chu 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ldan
sprin gyi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'byung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nam
mkha' dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i glog 'bar ba'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen mthu rtsal dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin mdzes la phyag 'tshal
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sdud chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi dkyil
'khor chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
sprin chen seng+ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa blta sdug sprin chen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen pos khebs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa sprin las byung ba snang bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu mtho 'gebs rnga'i sgra dbyangs shin tu rab sgrog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen bsil 'byung mi dga' rab 'joms sgra zab sgrog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa sprin chen gda' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs gang+gA'i chu sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
rtsal gyi sprin ltar dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra bsgrags pa la phyag
'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin kun tu ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rgya chen
po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 'dzag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin
ltar rnam par sgrog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa sprin lta bu'i na bza' mnabs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyis lo tog bskyed la phyag 'tshal
lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi gnas la gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa cher sprin gyi sprin
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 'du bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rnam
par rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen ut+pa la la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
sprin chen spos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa sprin chen dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'od mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen byin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che chen po'i sprin lta bu la phyag
'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi
chu bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sdud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dus ma yin
pa'i sprin dang lce 'bab pa rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po ltar nam mkha' mtho nas bsgrags
pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen sga 'byin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan
'das ded bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen char chu skyes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa snyams pa'i gzi brjid sgrub pa'i
sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ro bro ba drug dang ldan pa'i chu chen po'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa chu 'thor sprin chen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen rgya mtsho 'gengs la phyag
'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa char mi 'bab pa na sprin gyis kun tu 'gebs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa sprin gzugs mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas sprin chen po thams cad rnam par sgrub pa/ 'dzam bu'i sprin gyi dpal gyi gzi brjid 'od mdzad pa sprin gyi 'od zer can rnams la phyag 'tshal
lo/ /klu'i bdag po/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag brjod pas klu thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun 'chad pa dang / bde ba thams
cad dang ldan pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char pa'i rgyun 'bab pa dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang /
lo tog thams cad skyed par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod
pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal pos gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling
'dir char mi 'bab pa'i tshe gang dag brjod na/ char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par bgyid pa dang / mi bzad pa'i dus kyi tshe dang / gnod pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe
dang / chos ma lags pas skye bo 'thab pa'i dus kyi tshe dang / yams kyi nad dang gnod pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe dang / nad dang 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe dang /
skar ma ma rungs pa gnas pa'i dus kyi tshe yams kyi nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ de ltar bu'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags
kyi gzhi rnams bshad du gsol/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlab par gsol/ gang dag klu thams cad
la yang dag par skul ma 'debs par 'gyur ba dang / lha thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms par 'gyur
ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ba dang / gnod pa thams cad zlog par 'gyur ba dang / zhi ba dang /
bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyid pa dang / rgyu skar ma rungs bas bgyis pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis char pa'i bar chad
lnga gsungs pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad sel bar 'gyur ba dang ldan pas bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de bzhin 'gyur ba de lta
bu'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams bcom ldan 'das mchog tu thugs rje dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan par thugs brtse ba
dang ldan pas bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'tshal lo/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan
'das kyis klu'i rgyal po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /klu'i
bdag po/ khyod sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa legs so legs so/ /klu'i bdag
po/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / snying rje chen po las byung ba 'brug chen po'i sgra can bsgyings pa dpa' ba'i tog ces bya
ba'i gzungs/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa/ rjes su yi
rang ba bshad par bya ste/ de ni/ char med pa'i tshe char 'bebs par byed/ char ches na gcod/ 'chi ba'i gnod pa rab tu zhi bar byed/ klu thams cad
la skul bar byed/ lha thams cad sim par byed/ bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed/ sems can thams cad bde ba thams cad dang ldan
par byed do/ /tad+ya thA/ ma hA dz+nyA na/ a ba b+hA sa ni/ shwI te dzo la gasmi Ti Ta bi kra mA/ badzra saM hA ta ne/ pa ra ma bi ra dza/ nirma ku na ke tu sUR+ya pra b+he/ bi ma laM ga yiSh+Ta/
b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ du du ma bu/ ha na ha na/ ma hA pra b+he biM d+hU ta ma hA mo ha aM d+ha kA ra/ pra dz+nyA gra shud+d+he/ pa ri pU ra Na

mi tre/ mai tri bI ra ma na skan+d+ha/ mai tri ma bud+d+ha re/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ dz+wa laM bud+d+ha re/ dz+wa laM bud+d+ha re/ bo d+h+yad+ga ku su me da sha ba le/ tsa tu ra du bai shA ra d+ye/ aSh+Ta da
sha/ a be Ni ka bud+d+harme/ shu b+ha ma ti/ pu N+ya rA shi/ shu kla d+harma sa ma n+wi ti/ gam+b+hi re/ bi ra dzi ske/ bi ma lo/ bi she Sha/ pra pa te/ ni rA pra

b+ha d+harme/ sarba lo ka dz+yeSh+Tha dz+yeSh+Tha/ pa ra pra ba re/ a nu ta ta re/ a sang+ge/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ shAn+ta ma te/ shAn+ta ma te/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ti/
tsu ru tsu ru/ pa ra ma bud+d+ha nu ma te/ ma hA pra dz+nyA pA ra mi te swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes rgya mtsho dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal
lo/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char dbab pa'i phyir klu thams cad kyi snying po
brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bden pas char pa'i bar chad byed pa lnga bsal bar bya'o/ /s+yad ya the da na/ sa ra
sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ nA gA nA na/ dza ba dza ba/ dzi bi dzi bi/ dzu bu dzu bu/ klu chen po dag tshur sheg /sangs rgyas kyi bden pas/ 'dzam bu'i gling
'dir char rab tu phob cig /tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ klu'i bdag po chen po dag tshur sheg /kye klu chen po dang / /sangs rgyas kyi bden pas/ 'dzam
bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig /ba ra ba ra/ bi ri bi ri/ bu ru bu ru/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pas klu thams cad dgug par bya'o/ /byams pa'i sems
dang / snying rje'i sems dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / btang snyoms kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs
dang / bden pa dang / bsam pa chen pos klu'i bdag po chen po dag tshur bsheg /sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems
dpa'i yon tan rnams dran par gyis shig /b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ chu chen po'i chu dang / sprin gyi chu 'chang ba can lag gis 'gro chen po'i
g.yog rnams byams pa'i sems kyis tshur shog /ston pa'i bstan pa dam pa dran par gyis shig /g+ha Ta g+ha Ta/ g+hi Ti g+hi Ti/ g+hu Tu g+hu Tu/ drag shul can khro ba shugs
chen po dang ldan pa/ dug chen po'i lce 'byin pa rnams byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas tshur shog /de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char phob cig swA ha/ ta Ta ta Ta/ ti Ti ti Ti/ tu Tu tu Tu/ nor bu rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa dang ldan pa/ sbrul
gdug pa'i gzugs can rnams dkon mchog gsum gyi byin gyi rlabs dran par gyis la/ /rdo rje 'chang gi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char phob
cig swAhA/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ chu chen po la gnas pa dang ldan pa/ sprin chen po brtsegs pa'i bzhon pa la zhon nas mngon
'gro ba rnams tshur shog /byams pa'i sems kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char gyi rgyun thong zhig /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bden pa dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis lag na rdo rjes bsgo ba/ ra la ra la/ ri li ri li/ ru lu ru lu/ lag gis 'gro thams cad khyed rnams gnyid
med par dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bden pas g+ha ma g+ha ma/ g+hi mi g+hi mi/ g+hu mu g+hu mu swA hA/ klu thams cad dgug go /byams pa'i sems
kyis byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro bas na ra na ra/ ni ri ni ri/ nu ru nu ru swA hA/ yon po sna tshogs su gyur pa'i mgo stong pa/ mgo dang mig dmar ba/
stobs che ba'i lto 'phye chen po rnams dgug par bya'o/ /kye kye lag gis 'gro chen po dag /mchog tu thugs rje can/ bsod nams thams cad kyi gzi
brjid kyis brjid pa/ nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dran par gyis shig /ga Da ga Da/ gi Di gi Di/
gu Du gu Du swA hA/ stobs dang / pha rol gnon pa dang / gzi brjid thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char gyi rgyun rnams
phob cig /sha ra sha ra/ shi ri shi ri/ shu ru shu ru swA hA/ kye kye klu chen po rnams/ /rang rang gi rigs dang / cho rigs dran par gyis la ma shol bar
lha thams cad kyi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char gyi rgyun phob cig swA hA/ tshangs pa'i bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dzam
bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ brgya byin gyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bden pas
'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu chen po dag /brgyad po'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu
phob cig swA hA/ klu chen po dag /rgyun du zhugs pa'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling du char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu chen po dag /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i
bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu chen po dag /phyir mi 'ong ba'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob
cig swA hA/ klu chen po dag /dgra bcom pa'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu chen po dag /rang sangs rgyas kyi
bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu chen po dag /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bden pas
'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu chen po dag /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pa dang byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dzam bu'i
gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ lha thams cad kyi bden pas gnod pa thams cad zhi bar gyis shig swA hA/ klu thams cad kyi bden pas sa chen
po 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ gnod sbyin thams cad kyi bden pas sems can thams cad srungs shig swA hA/ dri za thams cad kyi bden pas mi rnams kyi
'khrug pa dang / gnod pa thams cad sol cig swA hA/ lha ma yin thams cad kyi bden pas rgyu skar ma rungs pa thams cad rnam par zlog cig swA hA/ nam
mkha' lding thams cad kyi bden pas klu thams cad byams par byos la 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char chen po'i rgyun phob cig swA hA/ mi'am ci'i thams
cad kyi bden pas sdig pa thams cad zhi bar gyis shig swA hA/ sems can thams cad ni/ tshim par gyis shig swA hA/ lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi
bden pas yangs shing rgya che ba'i char gyi rgyun phob cig swA hA/ 'dir char la sgrib pa lnga po yang dag par zungs shig swA hA/ mi thams cad kyi bden pas mi
thams cad la yongs su srungs shig swA hA/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ da ra da ra/ di ri di ri/ du ru du ru/ na ta na ta/ na ti na ti/ nu tu nu tu/
shin tu mgyogs par bzhud ma/ sprin chen po'i chu 'dzin ma/ sprin ldan ma/ sprin chen ldan ma/ sprin chen chu 'dzin ma/ sprin gsal ma/ sprin 'byung ma/
dus sprin ma/ sprin gyi 'byung gnas ma/ sprin sgrog ma/ sprin bzhugs ma/ sprin gyi cod pan ldan ma/ sprin gyi phreng ba
mnga' ma/ sprin gyis rnam par brgyan ma/ sprin bcibs ma/ sprin la gnas bcas ma/ sprin gyi snying po'i sprin gyi ral pa can/ sprin 'od ma/
sprin gyi 'khor ldan ma/ rgya chen sprin bzhugs ma/ mchod phyir sprin thogs ma/ lo tog 'ongs sgrub ma/ ri sul na bzhugs ma/ klu'i yum
bcom ldan 'das ma/ sprin chen dpal ldan dkar mdog can/ bsil reg ma/ tshub ma chen mo spyod yul ma/ klu chen rnam par rol mdzad
ma/ bcom ldan 'das ma bon tra bcud kyis len drug 'dzin ma/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu dbab tu gsol
swA hA/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/ g+hi ri g+hi ri/ g+hu ru g+hu ru/ g+hi ri Ni g+hi ri Ni/ g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma/ g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma/ g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma ri/ dbu dgu dang ldan ma/
sprin chen phreng ldan ma/ glog tshogs phreng ldan ma/ lag gis 'gro thams cad 'dzin ma/ sprin lta bu'i na bza' mnabs ma/ dug drag po thams cad
spyod yul ma/ sprin bkod pa la bcibs ma/ 'brug sgrog ma/ sgra sgrog ma/ klu tshogs le skul ma/ lha mo sprin chen phreng ldan ma klu thams cad la ma shol
bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char phob cig ces bskul du gsol swA hA/ ya ra ya ra/ yi ri yi ri/ yu ru yu ru/
dza ra dza ra/ dzi ri dzi ri/ dzu ru dzu ru/ dz+ha ra dz+ha ra/ gu Tu gu Tu/ gu gu Tu/ ga Da ga Da/ gi Di gi Di/ ha ra ha ra/ hi li hi li/ mu lu mu lu/ ta la ta la/ ti li ti
li/ tu lu tu lu/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gr-ih+Na grih+Na/ marda marda/ pra marda/ pra ba ra sha big+ha nAn/ mai tre ya dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ bu bud+d+he/
bu bud+d+he/ ha ra pA paM/ sarba satA nAn/ a d+hiSh+Thi ya pa N+ya ma/ sarba bud+d+ha nAn d+ha ri Ni d+ha re/ shu b+ha ma te gu NA gra pra b+he Ne/ ma hA dz+nyA no/ /la ge /shu ka la d+harme sa t+ya

ba ti dz+nye/ ma hA ya nA d+huSh+Thi tre lo ka dz+yeSh+tha b+ha ga ba ti/ bud+d+ha mai tri A pU rA ya sarba kA+e trA NI/ shu kle shwe twA ma/ pa ra d+ha re/ pa na ta ra pa sa ni/ d+hu d+hu re/ d+hu d+hu ru/ sha
ma sha ma/ shAn+ta ma na sa/ char gyi bgegs thams cad rnam par bsal bar gsol swA hA/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pas
byams pa'i thugs kyis yang dag par brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub kyi thugs skyon med pas klu chen po rnams la yang dag
par bskul lo/ /klu'i rgyal po chen po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal bo la yang dag
par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal bo dga' bo dang nye dga' bo la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam
bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/
klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po gzi can la yang dag par
bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po chu lha la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir
char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po 'jog bo la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po yul
'khor srung la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam
bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po btang bzung la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal
po sa srung gi bu la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po nu ta la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam
bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig
swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po dpal bzang la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir 'char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po glog gi phreng ba la yang
dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po gtsug na nor bu chen po la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i
gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po gtsug na nor bu thogs pa la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA
klu'i rgyal po snang ldan gtsug phud can la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/
de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po thams cad la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ nA ge nA ge/ ma hA nA ge/
g+ho ra ma na se/ nA ga hr-i da ya/ d+hu mA ku le/ u gra ro She pra tsaN+Da te dze/ bi Sho gre/ bi shi /a hi go re/ kri Sha ping+ga le/ tsany+tsa le/ lo la dzi he/ ma hA pha
na ka re/ kA la pA she/ rau tra bA si ni/ Du Du mA be/ g+ha Na g+ha Na/ shi ki nI/ ka na ka na/ ga Na ga Na/ ma hA ga Na ga Ne/ pa ra pa ra/ pi ri pi ri/ pu ru
pu ru/ bi spu rdza ne/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ ma hA b+ho gi ma Ni da re/ phi ri phi ru/ phu ru phu ru/ pha ra pha ra/ baR+Sha baR+Sha/ dza lam+bu da ra/ sham+bu sham+bu/ ba ta tu Tu
ma me/ d+huM d+huM/ d+huM d+huM be/ me g+ha pra b+he/ me g+ha b+ha g+hi ni/ d+ha ka d+ha ka / ka d+hu d+hu ma be/ g+ha nA g+ha nA/ shi ki ni/ ka na ka na/ ga Na ga Na/ ma hA nA ga ga ne/
ni ra traN+Tu/ pa dza dar ka ri ma hA nA dI da ye/ g+hu ma g+hu ma/ g+hu ma pA ya ti ka/ dzAM ga ri b+hu dzaM ga me/ bi ka Ta saM ka Te/ go ri bispu rdza ni badzra b+ha Na/ klu thams cad dgug
go /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pa dang / byams pa'i thugs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling
'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ na maHsarba bung+d+he b+h+yaHsing+d+h+ya n+tu man+t+ra pA da ni swA hA/ 'phags pa sprin chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo stong phrag brgya ba las/ char
dbab pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i le'u ste drug cu tsa bzhi ba'o// //cho ga ni/ char chen dbab par 'dod na/ bla gab med
ba'i sa phyogs gtsang mar bla re sngon po bre/ ba dan sngon po dpyang ngo / /chos smra ba lus bkrus la yan lag brgyad pa la nye bar gnas shing gos gtsang ma sngon
po bsgos la spos dri zhim pos bskus nas zas dkar gsum zos la stan sngon po'i steng du 'dug nas kha shar phyogs su bltas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad la gsol ba btab nas sprin chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u 'di nyin mtshan rgyun mi 'chad par bklag par bya'o/ /chu sngon pos bkang ba'i bum
ba gang ba bzhi gzhag par bya'o/ /gtor ma dang / bdug pa dang / me tog ci nus kyis sbyar ro/ /de la chos smra pas phyogs bzhir ba'i lci ba'i khu bas bri bar
bya ste/ shar phyogs su khru gsum tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo bo gsum pa klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa'i lci bas
bri bar bya'o/ /lho phyogs su khru lnga tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo bo lnga pa klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ /nub phyogs su khru bdun
tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo bo bdun pa klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ /byang phyogs su khru dgu tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo bo dgu pa klu'i
g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ /chos smra pas rang gi lus bsrungs la byams pa la gnas te sems can thams cad la snying rje'i
sems nye bar bzhag nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la gsol ba btab na/ klu rnams dang dge ba'i rtsa ba bgo bar bya ste/ 'di
ni/ cho ga'o/ /gang zhig char mi 'bab pa'i tshe sprin chen po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u 'di klog na/ nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis nas nyin zhag
bdun tshun chad gdon mi za bar char 'bab bar 'gyur ro/ /rgya mtsho ni/ dus las yol yang srid kyi/ thub pa chen po'i gsung rab char gyi cho ga 'di ni/ gzhan
du mi 'gyur ro/ /de lta mod kyi/ tshul khrims dang / yon tan la gnas te/ 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang / sha dang / nya sha la sogs pa yongs su spang
par bya'o/ /'o thug dang / zho dang / 'o ma dang / 'bras can bu ram can la sogs pa dang / mngar gsum za zhing bklag par bya'o/ /de ltar na 'grub par
'gyur te/ thub pa'i rgyal pos gsungs pa bzhin du the tshom med par bya'o/ /'phags pa sprin chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo las/ char dbab pa rlung gi
dkyil 'khor gyi le'u zhes bya ba drug cu rtsa bzhi pa cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / shI len+d+ra bo d+hi
