bcom ldan 'das ma'i thang ga'i cho ga ni nyams pa med cing / /skra'i nyams pa med pa skud pa ma chad pa'i zheng du mtho gang gi tshad nyid la ring du mtho do byas te steng du bcom ldan 'das bri/ g.yas su 'phags pa

spyan ras gzigs bya/ g.yon du rdo rje 'chang bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og thang ga'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das ma bri ste/ gser gyi mdog can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gos srab mo'i sham kag mnabs pa/

de bzhin du gos srab mo'i stod g.yogs can/ kha dog sna tshogs kyi sham thabs dang ldan pa'o/ /de nas 'og phyogs su sgrub pa po lag na mchod pa'i cho ga bya'o/ /de nas sgrub pa pos gtsang sbra byas gos gtsang ma gyon te gso sbyong yan lag

brgyad bya'o/ /de'i mdun du bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig byas la ji ltar 'byor pas mchod pa'i cho ga bya'o/ /de nas sgrub pa po dang ldan pas smyung ba byas te zhing gi dbus su thang sku bzhugs su gsol te/ dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa

dang / nye bar longs spyod pa'i gtor ma byas la brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o/ /thang ga'i 'og tu lan brgya rtsa gcig gis sngags byas pa'i bum pa chus yongs su gang ba bzhag par bya'o/ /bum pa'i chus gtor ma btang zhing /

gleng bu dang / thong 'dzin gnyis la gtor bar bya'o/ /gleng bu'i mgul pa dang / thong 'dzin gyi mgul par me tog gi phreng ba gdags par bya'o/ /de rnams kyi mdun du sngags pas chu'i rgyun zhing la lan g.yas logs su

bskor bar bya ba ni sngags pas mdun du 'gro zhing sngags pa'i rting ni zhing rmor 'gro bar bya'o/ /phyis sa bon 'debs pa'i dus su cho ga 'dis brgyad brgya bsngags la sa bon sbar ba gang la lan bdun bzlas te zhing

la gtor bar bya'o/ /sa bon gdab pa'i cho ga'o/ /de ni zhing brnga ba'i dus su yang cho ga 'dis bya'o/ /cho ga lhag po ni 'dir dge slong bzhi la zhing gi mtshams bzhir ci 'dod kyi ston mo byas te/ de nas sngags pas

chang ba bdun bzlas pa byed cing / brnga ba ni lo tog rtsa ba bya ba'i cho ga'o/ /da ni g.yul 'chag pa bya ba'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ g.yul 'chag pa'i dus su sngags pas rang nyid gtsang sbra byas la gos gtsang mgon la shar du zhal
bstan te sku gzugs bzhugs su gsol la dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / yang na nye bar longs spyod pa'i gtor ma byas
la bzlas pa byas te 'bru'i phung po mtshams bzhir gzhon nu ma gsar du bag ma byas shing khyo yod pa'i bud med bzhi la ston mo byas la/ de snyed kyi mthar zad pa
med par gnas so/ /de nas skyes bus 'bru 'dral zhing grangs byed pa'i dpral ba la sngags dgod par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ma'i sngags de sred du smra bcad
byas la bzlas pa bya'o/ /ji snyed du sngo la bltas na gnyis 'gyur du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de snyed bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas 'bru'i lhag ma de mi 'jal bar 'ching
pa'i mi la sogs pa bos shing sbyin pa'am/ dge 'dun la sbyin par bya'o/ /g.yul 'chag pa'i cho ga'o/ /da ni/ 'bru bang mdzod du 'jug pa'i cho ga
bshad par bya ste/ dang po re zhig mdzod kyi sgo g.yas g.yon du 'byung po gnyis gcer bu gsus pa 'chang ba/ dbang po 'phyang ba/ g.yon pa'i lag na 'bru'i
snod gzung zhing 'bru skyug bzhin pa/ gser gyi mdog rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa gnyis bri bar bya'o/ /mdzod kyi khang par yang dri dang / byug pa dang / mchod
yon sbyin zhing / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das ma'i thang ga'i mdzod kyi nang du gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas 'o ma'i chu rgyun
gtor bzhin pa'i sngags pas 'gro bar bya zhing / de'i rgyab nas de nas bri bar khyim du gzhug par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la 'bru'i mdzod khang du phyag rgya gzhag par bya'o/ /de
nas mdzod kyi khang pa'i sgo ru dge 'dun gyi ston mo byas la dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa la sogs pas mchod do/ /nor rgyun ma'i gzungs rdzogs par bklag par
bya'o/ /gtor ma rgya chen po byas la thang ga'i mdun du de nas skyes bus 'bru phyir 'byin par byed de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ma dang 'dra bar bsam la gur gum
gyis gro ga la sngags bris la/ spyi bor bcings la kha gos kyis bkab la nyi ma re re zhing 'bru phyir dbyung bar bya'o/ /mdzod khang gi sgo ru nyin re nor rgyun ma zhes bya ba'i
gzungs kyi mdo bklag par bya'o/ /sngags pa bsgrub bya'i sngags bltas la dus gsum du brgyad brgya bzlas pa bya'o/ /ji ltar rnyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun
ma'i rtog pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA kA la tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud/ dbang gi rta mchog sku la phyag
'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ shar lho'i dur khrod chen po ha ha drag tu dgod pa'i gnas shing tsan+dan gyi nags
tshal rab tu dga' ba'i ming zhes bya ba mi ma yin pho mo mang po 'dus pa'i pho brang du dpal nag po chen po zhes bya ba bi nA ya ka la sogs te 'khor gdug pa can rnams
kyi dbus na skye 'gro sems can rnams kyi srog dbugs la dbang byed pa'i nag po chen po zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
khams na mthar byed rta'i rgyal po zhes bya ba rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa'i 'khor byis bskor te dregs pa can 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
nas lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas nas oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba hUM hu lu hu lu hUM baM zhes brjod pas/ dur khrod ha ha drag tu dgod pa'i gnas nas nag po rang dbang med
par mthar byed rta'i rgyal po'i mngon du byung ste las ci bya zer zhing rang rtags srog gi snying po 'di mdongs gsol du phul ba/ oM badzra ma hA kA la k+ShiM k+She tra big+h+nAM bi nA
ya ka hUM hUM phaT ces phul lo/ /dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas rgyal po mig mi bzang gis mthar
byed rta'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /e ma pad+ma khros pa'i bdag /nag po chen po drag shul can/ /gsang ba'i sgrub pa bshad du gsol/ /mgon po bsgrub
par bya ba gang / /gsad cing lus srog dbye ba dang / /ma grub shi sa bstan pa dang / /mgon po'i rtags dang ser ba rnams/ /rta mchog chen pos bdag la stsol/ /ces
zhus pas/ de nas pad+ma khros pa yis/ /nag po'i sgrub thabs ched du brjod/ /dam tshig ldan pa'i sngags pa yis/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung slad du/ /gza' skar
tshes grangs shis pa la/ /dur khrod la sogs shing gcig tu/ /bsod nams tshogs ni bsags byas la/ /nag po chen po bsgrub par bya/ /phung sa'am sa nag dag la
ni/ /stegs bu gru bzhi byas nas ni/ /dri spos khrag gis chag chag bya/ /dbus su gru gsum zla kham ldan/ /phyi rol pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri/ /de dbus thod chen nang du ni/ /sha
lnga snying snas brgyan pa yi/ /gtor ma bshos bu khru gang tshad/ /de la mda' gzugs dmar nag dar/ /gri snying tsa ka li yang gzugs/ /de nyid mgon po'i rten du gzhag/
DA ma ru yi pags pa'i nang / /mgon po'i srog sngags bri bar bya/ /ldo yi nang du bla rdos dril/ /spos dang rgyun gtor gtang bar bya/ /dkon mchog spyi la mchod pa bsham/ /de nas pad+mar bdag bsgoms
la/ /thugs ka'i hrI las 'od 'phros pas/ /bla ma sangs rgyas la sogs pa/ /rang gi mdun du bsam byas la/ /mchod pa rnams lnga
dbul bar bya/ /rnam dag bdun gyi 'og tu ni/ /tshad med bzhi po bsgom par bya/ /btang snyoms la sogs paM raM tri/ /pad steng yi ge hUM las ni/ /nag po zhal
gcig phyag drug pa/ /gri gug phreng ba DA ma ru/ /thod pa mdung dang zhags pa bsnams/ /g.yas g.yon rim pas bsnams pa'o/ /sbrul dang rin chen rgyan gyis
brgyan/ /sku smad ba ti khra bo gsol/ /stag lpags zhing gi sham thabs can/ /gtum po spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs/ /dpral bar dri yi thig les brgyan/ /spyi
gtsug mi bskyod sprul sku brtan/ /de ltar bdag mdun gsal bsgoms nas/ /spyan drangs mchod dang bzlas par bya/ /gtor ma pU dza la sogs pas/ /nag
po che la sbyin par bya/ /mgon po'i thugs ka'i hUM las ni/ /srog gi yi ge g.yas nas bskor/ /khor yug dag gis bzla bar bya/ /oM badzra ma hA ka la k+ShiM k+She tra big+h+nAM bi nA
ya ka hUM hUM phaT/ de skad ces ni rab brjod pas/ /nag po grub pa'i rtags rnams 'byung / /dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ bsnyen cing sgrub pa'i le'u ste
gnyis pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa bshig pa dang / /rnal 'byor bar chad byed pa rnams/ /nag pa chen pos bsgral
'dod na/ /stegs bu gru bzhi byas nas kyang / /drag po e yi nang du ni/ /pho mo rabs chad thod pa'i nang / /gzugs ni sbra tshil dag la bya/ /ming rus dag ni bkod nas kyang / /bsad dang na ba
skabs dang sbyar/ /mgon po'i sku dang dam rdzas rnams/ /kha dang kha la dgod par bya/ /phag thod nang du thun rdzas blugs/ /rtag gtor rgyun gtor g.yas dang g.yon/ /gsang sngags
'di yis gsad par bya/ /oM badzra ma hA ka la k+ShiM k+She tra big+h+nAM bi nA ya ka hUM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kA lA ya shA sa na u pa ha ri Ni e Sha a pa sh+tsi ma ka lo a yaM i daM rat+na tra ya a

pa ka ri NaM ya di pra ti dz+nyA sma ra si ta dA i daM du Sh+TaM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ mA ra mA ra/ grih+Na grih+Na/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ de na me ke na dgra bo mA ra ya
hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hUM bi nA ya ka bi la sa traM bi hr-i hUM dza si ma bu bi nA ya ka a mu ka pri srog hur thums dza mA ra ya rbad/ drag sngags bzlas shing thun gyis brab/ /zhag bdun bar
du smra mi bya/ /de la rtags rnams rdzogs par 'gyur/ /dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ lus srog dbye ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas yang dag
bshad bya ba/ /las mtha' sbyin sreg dag gis brtul/ /gru gsum dbus su gdug pa'i shing / /dbus su nag po 'khor bcas
bskyed/ /ling+ga gtor ma dam rdzas rnams/ /nag po'i zhal du dbul bar bya/ /sngags 'di bzlas shing bsreg par bya/ /ag+ni dz+wa la raM las rdzogs/ /thal ba rlung
dmar dag la bskur/ /a mu ka ni myur du rlog /dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ mtha' brtul ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas yang
dag bshad bya ba/ /de ltar bsgrubs kyang ma grub na/ /gcig dang gnyis la nan tan bskyed/ /de ltar byas kyang ma grub na/ /sa gsum khrag gsum dug gsum
la/ /khru gang pa yi gzugs kyi tshad/ /gru gsum dbus su nag po'i gzugs/ /spyi tshar dag tu lding du gzhug /bris sku dam rdzas bla rdo rnams/ /rang gi gru gsum
mal gyi 'og /dug dang tsher mas steng nas dgab/ /thun rdzas brab cing sngags 'di bzlas/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba hUM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ phaT hUM hUM ka ya nA bi g+hAM bi
kra k+She k+ShiM la kA hA ma badzra oM/ /de skad brjod cing thun gyis brab/ /de la rtags rnams rdzogs pa dang / /de nas gso ba'i cho ga bya/ /bris sku bla rdo dam rdzas rnams/ /spos
chus bkru zhing sngags 'di bzlas/ /oM badzra ma hA ka la k+ShiM k+She tra big+h+nI bi nA ya ka hUM hUM phaT sos sos swA hA/ de skad byas la gnas su ni/ /mgon po'i gzugs kyang spos
chus bkru/ /gru gsum dbus su blangs byas la/ /dgra bo'i ming rus snying gar gzhug /zhag bdun bsgrubs la dgra la bskyal/ /a mu ka ni myur du brlag/ /dpal mgon
bo nag po'i rgyud las/ ma grub na spogs pa'i cho ga dang gso ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /bya nag 'phur zhing lding ba
dang / /mon pa a tsa ra dang ni/ /dge bshes ban+d+he slob dpon dang / /'od dang sgra dang khang pa 'tsheg /mgon po'i sku dag dngos su mthong / /dgra la dmag drangs sems
can bsad/ /mi nag dag la snying stobs dang / /mdze bo dang ni sprang po dang / /bya nag thang la lhung ba 'byung / /dpal mgon po nag po'i rgyud las/ rtags kyi rim
ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /ser ba dbab pa'i las bya na/ /mon nam mdze can thod pa ru/ /'khor lo rtsibs
bzhi bris nas kyang / /rigs lnga klu yi sa bon dgod/ /rtsibs mchan ser srung ming rus dang / /yul du phob ces bya ba bri/ /de mthar 'khor lo rtsibs dgu la/ /dregs
pa'i sngags dag bri bar bya/ /rgyab tu gang yin yul ming dang / /rlung gi snying po bri bar bya/ /bdag nyid pad+ma khros par bsgom/ /gsang
sngags 'di yis gnad la bor/ /oM badzra ma hA kA la k+Shi k+She tra bi g+h+nAM bi nA ya ka hUM hUM phaT/ nA ga snying gzer/ phu hur thums dza khrom shar hril b+h+yo/ /de skad ces ni rab
brjod la/ /nyungs kar nyungs nag ske tshe dang / /khrag dang dug gis thod par brab/ /lo 'bras rlung khyer rtags byung na/ /dgra yi yul du dbab par bya/ /gal te
'jig rten phung ba'o /dpal mgon po nag po'i rgyud las/ ser ba dbab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa/ /e
ma 'khor 'dus ngo mtshar can/ /ma 'ongs dam can sgrub byed na/ /dam tshig la gnas sdom pa gzung / /gtor ma dag la brtson par bya/ /dam rdzas bla rdo lus
la bsrel/ /zhes gsungs pas rgyal po mig mi bzang la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams yid rangs nas nag po chen pos bstan pa srung bar khas blangs nas mi snang
bar gyur to/ /dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ le'u brgyad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po a mo g+ha badzra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba phur bu
'od kyis bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya shrI ma hA kA la nA ma d+hA ra nI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dpal mgon po nag po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs
rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gdan la bdud btul te mngon par
rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon pa zhig na byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su lha'i sde dpon chen po'i tshogs kyi bdag
po ma hA kA la 'dod khams kyi dbang phyug la dbang bsgyur ba/ dpal mgon po nag po chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu
'dug ste 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi rig pa 'bul gyi bzhes su gsol/ oM shrI ma hA kA la gA na gu ti swA hA/ na maHshrI ma hA kA la gA ne
gu ti shA yA/ na mo yo gi na Ni na/ tad+ya thA/ oM hi le hi le/ ki te ki te ni/ tsi de tsi de ni swA hA/ nad thams cad dang / rims thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang /
mi ngas thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / nyes par bsgoms pa thams cad dang / nyes par bltas pa rnams steng du gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la thug pa
man chad bcing ngo / /'og tu ni sems can dmyal ba la thug pa yan chad bcing ngo / /thad ka kho ra khor yug tu ni ri la thug pa tshun chad bcing ngo / /
gzhan yang 'di bton pas gtsug lag khang dang / dkyil 'khor gyi srung ma/ dug gsum nad kyi sman pa/ rig 'dzin yongs kyi srog shing / rnal 'byor kun gyi dgra bla/
bdud 'dul rnams kyi dbang phyug /srin po lang+ka pu ri'i grong khyer gtan nas rlog pa/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo nam mkha'i glog ma sprin rdul du rlog pa/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo nam
mkha'i glog ma snying rdul du rlog pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyis bstan pa srung bar khas blangs shing dam bcas pa'o/ /'phags pa dpal mgon po nag po zhes bya ba'i
gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ de bi ma hA kA li nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ lha mo nag mo chen mo'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon
pa zhig na byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs so/ /de nas 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma bdud kyi yum/ gshin rje'i lcam mo/ lha mo nag mo chen mos bcom ldan
'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo nag mo chen mos gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal
ba'i rig pa 'di 'bul na/ bdag gis de bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdud kyi yum gshin rje'i lcam mo nag mo chen mos
steng du ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la thug pa man chad bcing bar bya'o/ /'og tu ni sems can dmyal ba la thug pa yan chad bcing bar bya'o/ /thad ka kho ra khor yug tu ni ri la thug pa tshun chad

bcing bar bya'o/ /de'i sngags 'di dag kyang bzlas par bya ste/ tad+ya thA/ oM ru ru ro ru bi tiSh+Tha ba to si ru ru ro ru bi tiSh+Tha bA to si swA hA/ 'di bton pas rims dang / nad dang / mi ngas dang / nyes bar bltas
ba thams cad dang / mdze dang / phol mig dang / g.yan pa la sogs pa'i nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro swA hA/ lha mo nag mo chen mo'i gzungs rdzogs so// //'phags pa nag po chen
po'i gzungs rims nad thams cad las rnam par thar bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nag po chen po skyes bu nag ser mche ba rnon po/ mche ba chen

po rims nad thams cad las rnam par thar par byed pa brjod par bya ste/ phyogs gang dang gang du bltas pa der bdag la rims nad med par gyur cig/ /tad+ya thA/ ha na ha na rA dza d+hu te na/ da ha da ha rA
dza d+hu te na/ pa tsa pa tsa rA dza d+hu te na/ ba hu shra be ba hu pa ri bA re/ ba hu pa ri sho d+ha ne/ i pany+tsa ra tsaN+Da la na/ ha na ha na/ oM suM b+ha ne suM b+ha/

shi rau muny+tsa/ tsak+Shur muny+tsa/ shro tra muny+tsa/ g+h+ra Na muny+tsa/ dzI ha muny+tsa/ kaN+Tha muny+tsa/ grI ba muny+tsa/ pr-iSh+Tha muny+tsa/ kA Ti ka muny+tsa/ ku k+Sha muny+tsa/ A ru muny+tsa/ dza nau muny+tsa/ hasta
muny+tsa/ pA dau muny+tsa/ aM gu l+ya muny+tsa/ aM gra pra t+yaM ga muny+tsa/ a pa sa ra/ a n+ya sI muny+tsa/ gats+tsha/ dz+wa ra mu to si/ bdag la swA hA/ oM dzA la mA aM gu le hUM/
sarba dz+wa ra nan phaT/ 'phags pa nag po chen po'i gzungs rims nad thams cad las rnam par thar par byed pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan
po pra dz+nyA warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ shrI de bi kA la pra ma rA dza tan+t+ra kI lo/ bod skad
du/ dpal lha mo nag mo'i bstod pa rgyal po'i rgyud/ rigs sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi mnga' bdag dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad
bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ ri rab kyi rtse mo rtsub 'gyur gyi tshal chen po na bcom ldan 'das dpal drag po chen po phyag na rdo rje lus bskal pa'i me ltar
'bar ba/ srid pa gsum las rnam par rgyal ba/ nyi ma stong gi gzi brjid dang ldan nas bzhugs so/ /'khor ni/ brgya byin dang / sha za dang / srin po dang / ma mo'i
tshogs bye ba dung phyur gyis bskor te bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na dpal phyag na rdo rje pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs te bka' stsal pa/ nga'i 'khor du gtogs pa'i lha ma srin
sde brgyad nyon cig /'dod pa'i khams 'di na bdud kyi ma gshin rje'i sring mo zhes bya ba rgyal tshab chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa 'dzin pa zhig yod
de/ khyed kyis de la mchod pa gyis shig /bstod pa gyis shig /ngas kyang khyed la byin gyis brlab bo zhes bka' stsal pa dang / 'khor gyi nang nas lha'i dbang po
brgya byin stan las langs te dpal lha mo nag mo la dge ba bcu'i sgo nas bstod pa/ sngon 'das bskal pa dang po'i pha rol na/ /dge bcu'i las la sems rab
cher sbyangs nas/ /lam gyi khyad par gong ma rab rdzogs kyang / /mtho ris skyes pa rnams la dge bcu yi/ /tshul gyis don mdzad phyi rol sgyur ba yi/ /dpal ldan lha
mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'das pa'i dus na srog gcod rab spangs pas/ /sku tshe ring zhing gzugs byad phun sum tshogs/ /gzhan gyi lan chags gnod pa'i
rkyen dang ldan/ /'chi bdag 'joms mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ma byin len pa'i tshul la rab spangs pas/ /bsod nams
tshogs kyis longs spyod phun sum tshogs/ /gter gyi longs spyod mi 'grib rab brtan brnyes/ /sbyin pa'i gter 'chang khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mi
tshangs spyod pa'i bka' rnams srung ba dang / /mngal gyi grong khyer dman las rnam par 'phags/ /srid pa'i 'dod chags ring du spangs pa ste/ /dge sbyong
chen mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /nyon mongs rdzun tshig spangs pa'i rnam smin gyis/ /gsung gi dngos grub 'jig rten 'dul ba'i gtso/ /gsung mchog
rnam dag brnyes pa'i rang bzhin te/ /bden par gsung ba khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phra ma'i skyon spangs mi phyed 'khor dang ldan/ /nyid la rnam par 'dul
ba'i 'khor gyis bskor/ /lha dang lha min bden pas 'dul mdzad ma/ /dkar mo'i 'khor tshogs khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ngag 'khyal spangs pa'i
yon tan sbyin pa yis/ /ting 'dzin rtse gcig mi g.yo bar chad spangs/ /dgos 'brel tshul gyis bstan pa skyong mdzad ma/ /byis pa 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag
'tshal bstod/ /nga rgyal khengs sems spangs pa'i yon tan gyis/ /zhi ba'i tshig 'jam lha mo dbyangs snyan ma/ /tshig rtsub gshe ba'i gnyen po byed pa ste/ /ngag rtsub
'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rang sems brnab sems spangs pa'i khyad par ni/ /'dzin pa'i rnam rtog rnam par spangs pa'i rtags/ /bdag med rtags
su seng+ges rna ba brgyan/ /brnab sems spangs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gzung ba'i yul la gnod sems rnam par spangs/ /phyi rol yul 'di gnyis
med chos su gzigs/ /gang la gnod sems yang dag spangs pa'i rtags/ /sprul gyi sna rgyan can la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /log par lta ba'i chos phyogs rnams spangs
te/ /sangs rgyas chos las 'khrungs pa'i gzugs brnyan khyod/ /lta ba rnam par dag pa'i ngang tshul can/ /spros bral don dam ston la phyag 'tshal ba stod/ /'jig
rten 'di na las gnyis dag ma dag /ma dag mi dge bcu las ngan song grub/ /dag pa'i dge ba bcu las mtho ris grub/ /las 'di dge ba dang por rab sbyangs
pas/ /gong nas gong ma'i sa la rab gnas kyang / /dge bcu'i rtags ni dman pa'i zhing 'dir bstan/ /gdug pa'i tshul can 'gro ba 'dren mdzad ma/ /bstod par 'os
pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de nas dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos sras kyis lam rnam pa lnga'i tshul
gyis bstod pa/ dam pa rnams kyis bgrod pa'i khyad par ni/ /tshogs kyis sbyangs pa'i don dam mthong ba yis/ /gnyen po ye shes rim par bsgom pa la/ /mthar
phyin pa la gshegs pa'i don mchog lags/ /de bas lha mo khyod kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /'di ltar rab ldan khyod kyi khyad par te/ /dang po'i tshogs las yang dag rab
bsags pas/ /dang po sa las sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin brnyes/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sa la don dam ni/ /rnam par mi rtog skye med tshul gyis gzigs/ /dpal ldan
byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par ni/ /rang sems sa gnyis dag la rab brten nas/ /de bzhin sa gsum dag pa'i pha rol son/ /rang sems bzhi pa'i sa la cher
bsgoms pas/ /lnga pa'i sa la bsam gtan pha rol son/ /rang sems drug pa'i sa la cher sbyangs pas/ /bdun pa la ni thabs kyi pha rol son/ /rang sems brgyad
pa nyid la cher bsgoms pas/ /dpal ldan lha mo nag mo'i smon lam nyid/ /dgu pa la yang stobs kyi yon tan sgrub/ /de yi stobs kyi ye shes 'phen par 'grub//
'di dag rnam par rdzogs par byas nas ni/ /sangs rgyas sa la smin pa'i smon lam can/ /sa brgyad non pas gzhon nu'i tshul 'chang ma/ /'gro ba 'dul phyir drag mo'i
tshul ston cing / /gdug pa 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdag kyang khyod kyi lam ltar myur 'grub shog /de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa rta mgo
can gyis dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas bstod pa/ dpal ldan lha mo gnyis su med pa ste/ /don dam spros bral chos nyid 'di las
brtsal/ /don dam kun rdzob gnyis su med pas bden/ /'khor ba mya ngan gnyis su med pas zab/ /sems can sangs rgyas gnyis su med pas 'phags/ /las
dang rnam smin gnyis su med pas bstod/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis su med pas smin/ /yul dang yul can gnyis su med gcig gi dang / /spros dang spros med don dam
dbyings kyis bsdus/ /bsod nams ye shes gnyis med tshogs chen te/ /mthong dang dam pa gnyis med dag pas bstod/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi chos ni ngang tshul
gcig /gzung dang 'dzin pa gnyis med zab mo'i mthu/ /mtho ris ngan song gnyis bral dag pa'i zhing / /bzang ngan gnyis med rang bzhin gcig gis bstod/ /skye med
rdzogs pa gnyis med lhun grub mchog /sems dang phung po gnyis med sems nyid de/ /sgrub dang bsgrub bya gnyis med grub pa'i
dang / /bdag gzhan gnyis med tshul mchog gcig gis bstod/ /yab dang yum mkha' gnyis med byang chub sems/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis su
med pa'i don/ /stong dang mi stong gnyis med zhi ba'i ngang / /gyur dang 'gyur med rtsol bral phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sgra tshig gnyis med brjod pa med pa'i
ngang / /lus ngag gnyis med sems nyid gcig gi tshul/ /rtsol byed brtsal bya gnyis med don gcig pas/ /rnam par spros med don dam dbyings kyis
bstod/ /mu stegs sangs rgyas gnyis med tshul gcig pas/ /dbyings dang rig pa gnyis med don rtogs te/ /srid dang rnam grol yang dag don gcig pas/ /
thams cad gnyis med sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phyi dang nang med gnyis med gcig gi ngang / /sems ldan sems med rnam dag zhi ba'i tshul/ /snang dang mi
snang gnyis med gcig gis mthong / /gnyis med don mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'di dag rnams ni don dam zab mo'i tshul/ /spros pa med pa'i don dang
'brel pa ste/ /'di rnams lha mo khyod kyi thugs la gsal/ /'di ltar bstod pas bdag kyang khyod ltar shog /de'i tshe de'i dus na dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pas
dpal lha mo la 'phrin las kyi sgo nas bstod pa/ sems nyid 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i khyad par ni/ /sems nyid gud na med cing sems kyang med/ /don dam spros
bral kha dog gzugs kyang med/ /kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam du rang gi sems/ /mthun par bstan pa'i zhi ba dpal lha mo/ /zhi mdzad zhi 'gyur zhi ba'i ngang tshul can//
zhi ba'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni/ /rtags kyi sku mdog dkar mo shin tu dwangs/ /kun tu zhi mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdag gi dgra dang nad
rnams zhi bar mdzod/ /mthun par bstan pa'i rgyas pa'i dpal lha mo/ /rgyas mdzad rgyas 'gyur rgyas pa'i ngang tshul can/ /rgyas pa'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo
ni/ /rtags kyi sku mdog ser mo shin tu brjid/ /kun tu rgyas mdzad ma la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdag gi bsod nams ye shes rgyas par mdzod/ /mthun par bstan
pa'i dbang mo dpal lha mo/ /dbang mdzad dbang sgyur dbang gi ngang tshul can/ /dbang gi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni/ /rtags kyi sku mdog dmar mo shin tu brjid/ /
kun tu dbang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdag gi nad dang dgra rnams dbang du mdzod/ /mthun par bstan pa'i drag po'i
dpal lha mo/ /drag mdzad drag 'gyur drag mo'i ngang tshul can/ /drag mo'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni/ /rtags kyi sku mdog nag mo shin tu brjid/ /kun tu
drag mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdag gi nad dang dgra rnams drag pos sod/ /khyod kyi rang bzhin cir yang ma grub la/ /'di ltar mtshan nyid cir yang
snang ba ni/ /'phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro don mdzad pa lags/ /bdag kyang las bzhi rang bzhin lhun grub nas/ /khyod ltar gzhan gyi don la brtson par shog/
de nas dpal lha mo nag mo la klu'i rgyal po dga' bos sku'i yon tan kyi sgo nas bstod pa/ gsang sngags rnal 'byor grub pa'i bdag nyid ma/ /yon tan
rnams kyi sku mdog phyag mtshan ni/ /don du snang ba med kyang gdul bya'i phyir/ /rtags kyi phyag rgya 'di ltar bstan pa'o/ /khams gsum gdul phyir gdan du
bong bu zhon/ /mya ngan mi 'da'i rtags su lcags sgrog mnga'/ /bdag don lhun grub glang chen ko bas brgyan/ /gzhan don phun sum tshogs phyir re ldes dkris/ /byang
sems ldan spyi gtsug zla rgyas gsal/ /shes rab rtogs phyir lte ba nyi mas brgyan/ /dug gsum sdong po gcod pa'i ral gri dang / /bsod nams gter gyi phyag mtshan
ne'u le bsnams/ /dbang drag rdzogs phyir ral ba kham nag sprug /nyon mongs 'dren phyir rno dbal mche ba gtsigs/ /'khor ba ljags la gter phyir rkan sgra 'debs/ /
gdug pa zhe la gnon phyir sdang mig bgrad/ /thams cad dbang du sdud phyir spyan rtsa dmar/ /snyoms pa'i tshogs mchog mi 'gyur sku mdog nag /ma mo 'dul
phyir dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan/ /sku gsung thugs rtags phyag rgya kha T+wAM gsor/ /sku gsum rdzogs byed thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan/ /drag po myur mgyogs bstan phyir
tshub mas brgyan/ /nyon mongs bsreg phyir me phung nang na bzhugs/ /'dod khams bskyang phyir yongs 'du'i shing la brten/ /lha min 'dul phyir rdzong gi dka'
zlog ma/ /dpa' brtan brtan phyir stag gi sham thabs mnabs/ /bstan pa bsrung phyir drag mo'i cha lugs rdzogs/ /nga rgyal dbang sdud bdag med sgra sgrog phyir/ /
thabs kyi snyan cha g.yas pa seng+ges brgyan/ /zhe sdang dbang 'dul dug chen 'dul ba'i phyir/ /shes rab snyan cha g.yon pa sbrul gyi rgyan/ 'du byed mi rtag rtags su
dril bu sgrog /chags phyir rngam mdzad pa'i rak+ta'i rba klong 'thung / /dam tshig bsrung phyir zhing lpags rgyan du mdzad/ /tha dad las
rnams 'dul phyir rma bya'i 'phru/ /nyon mongs sgrib pa'i tshogs rnams rab sbyangs nas/ /ye shes rig pa'i tshogs rnams shar ba'i phyir/ /rang bzhin gnas
mchog byang shar mtshams na brtan/ /dbu ma'i sa la gnas phyir dre'u zhon/ /nyon mongs gdug pa 'dul phyir ma yi tshul/ /mkha' 'gro ma mo khyod la phyag
'tshal bstod/ /de nas grul bum gyi rgyal po sbrul mgo dgu pas dpal lha mo la sku gsung thugs kyi sgo nas bstod pa/ don dam gnyis med byang chub
sems yin yang / /srid gsum gdul phyir rtags kyi phyag rgya ni/ /rang sems rnam dag drag po'i gzhal yas khang / /rak+ta khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khyil ba
las/ /keng rus thod phreng zhing gi rgyan dang ldan/ /sku mdog nag la rab 'jigs khro mo rgyal/ /sngon mo ral pa 'dzings pa'i sprul pa 'gyed/ /sku yi sprul pa
dpal ldan re ma ti/ /gru gsum ser nag zhal gyi dbyings su bzhengs/ /yon tan rgyas mdzad ser mo mkha' la bzhad/ /'phrin las rgyas pa thams cad nye
bar mdzod/ /gsung gi sprul pa dpal ldan re ma ti/ /gru gsum dmar nag zhal gyi dbyings nas bzhes/ /dmar mo chen mo dmar chen gtum rma ste/ /dpang gi 'phrin
las thams cad grub par mdzod/ /sku gsung thugs ldan sprul pa rgya mtsho ma/ /drag po 'joms mdzad bdud dpung zil gyis gnon/ /'gro drug sgrol mdzad sems
can kun gyi ma/ /bstan pa rgyas mdzad ma la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis rlobs/ /de nas dpal lha mo la lha ma yin gyi rgyal po
thag bzang ris kyis don dam pa'i sgo nas bstod pa/ spros bral 'od gsal yang dag zhi ba'i ngang / /thugs kyi thugs mchog rnam dag bden pa'i yum/ /gdod
gnas gnyis med nam mkha'i snying po ni/ /dpal ldan khyod kyi rang bzhin khyad par gsal/ /'di ltar rnam dag brjod med ngo bo la/ /byis pa rnams kyis bstod pa byed
pa ltung / /blun po rnams kyis dngos por rab brtags nas/ /gzugs can tshul du gang zhig bstod pa'i tshig /rgyal ba'i don yang thugs chud khyod nyid la/ /tshig dang
yi ge'i sgo nas bstod pa rnams/ /nam yang grol bar 'gyur ba'i chos nyid min/ /gdod nas gnyis med bde chen ma gtogs par/ /khyod kyi smon lam rtags kyi cho 'phrul
la/ /don du bzung nas gang zhig bstod pa rnams/ /khyod la brten nas thams cad btub par 'gyur/ /gang zhig skye ba med par
shes pa dang / /gdod nas gnyis med snying po sgom nus na/ /gang zag des ni khyod nyid bstod pa yin/ /khyod kyi gzugs dang kha dog 'dzin pa yis/ /bskal pa
grangs med 'das par rab bltas kyang / /khyod kyi gzugs dang kha dog mthong mi nus/ /gang zhig gzugs su mi 'dzin rnams kyis mthong / /sgra dang tshig dang brjod
pa thams cad kyis/ /khyod ni bos kyang bskal par mi thos te/ /'di dag spangs pa'i rnal 'byor de yis ni/ /khyod kyang bos la de yang khyod kyis thos/ /gang zhig
lus ngag dge bas khyod sgrub pa'i/ /blun po de yis nam yang khyod nyid spangs/ /lus ngag spangs pa'i sems kyis khyod mchod nas/ /mchod na dngos grub de
yis gter thob 'gyur/ /khyod ni rgyal ba mang po'i yon tan sdud/ /chos kyi dbyings na rgyal ba rnams dang mol/ /zab mo dbu ma'i rang bzhin ston pa'i phyir/ /mi
mjed 'jig rten shin tu rtsub pa 'dir/ /phyir rol tshul gyis thams cad 'dren mdzad ma/ /khyod kyi sku ni 'di ltar rab brtags pa/ /sgrib pa mang po stong nyid ngang du gshegs/
stong nyid dam pa stong pa yang dag khyod/ /stong pa gnyis med shes pa rnams kyis bstod/ /'di ltar bstod na bstong par 'gyur grang bas/ /khyod ni bstod pa'i yul can ma yin yang /
byis pa drang phyir don la 'di ltar bstod/ /de nas nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po rdo rje gser mig can gyis dpal lha mo la bstod pa/ dpal ldan lha mo dpag par dka' ba'i
don/ /thabs kyi cho 'phrul nam mkha'i mtha' la spyod/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa khyod nyid la/ /sgo gsum rdul snyed dbyangs kyis phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdag
gis khyod ni mchod bsam bsgribs kyang / /dpal ldan dngos grub dam pa thob bya'i phyir/ /'dod pa'i yon tan mkha' la char 'bab pas/ /mchod pa'i tshogs 'dis
dbang po rgyal gyur cig /dpal ldan khyod ni dge sdig bdag po ste/ /bdag gi lus ngag yid kyi sdig pa'i tshogs/ /khyod kyi thad du 'gyod pas rab bshags na/ /thugs
rje'i shugs kyis sgrib pa byang bar mdzod/ /khyod kyi khyad par yongs su 'phags pa ni/ /'gro ba'i don mdzad bdag don phun sum tshogs/ /dga' mthun phrag dog med pa'i
spros pa ni/ /rjes su yi rang khyod kyi rgyud la 'bul/ /'di ltar yon tan ldan pa'i sku mchog ni/ /nag mo bzang mo 'jigs pa'i mthu stobs kyis/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum
kun tu 'gro don la/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul gyis bskul bar spobs/ /yang dag khyed kyi yon tan sku mchog ni/ /gdug pa 'dul zhing bstan pa
bsrung ba'i phyir/ /sems can zad par ma gyur bar du ni/ /mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs par gsol ba gdab/ /'di ltar phyag 'tshal mchod nas bshags pa dang / /rjes su yi
rang bskul zhing gsol btab nas/ /dge ba 'di yi ngan song stongs gyur te/ /thams cad tshogs rdzogs byang chub chen por bsngo/ /de nas dpal ldan lha mo la nam mkha'i lha
bran rnams kyis bstod pa/ bskal ba me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na/ /rlung nag dgu pa'i klong dkyil pho brang nas/ /ma gcig 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma/ /bdud kyi
yum la gshin rje'i lcam gcig ma/ /dpal ldan lha mo nag mo re ma ti/ /nag mo za byed rngam pa'i mche ba can/ /mthing nag gcer bu khrag gi ral pa can/ /khyod kyi sku
mdog nag mor bzhugs pa ni/ /don dam dbyings kyi skyod pa med pa'i rtags/ /dbu skra g.yas nas g.yon du 'khyil ba ni/ /yum gyi mkha' la sprul pa 'gyed pa'i rtags/ /
dbu gtsug ral pa gcig tu 'khyil ba ni/ /don dam dgongs spyod gcig tu mdzad pa'i rtags/ /ral ba'i gseb nas me stag 'phro ba ni/ /thugs kyi sprul pa phyogs
bcur 'gyed pa'i rtags/ /dbu la thod rlon pheng ba bcings pa ni/ /thugs rje sprul skus 'gro don mdzad pa'i rtags/ /g.yas na seng+ge 'gying zhing mchong ba ni/ /sman mo thams
cad zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags/ /g.yon na sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka 'phyar ba ni/ /zhe sdang ma spangs dbyings su dag pa'i rtags/ /snyan cha gser gyi dril bu 'khrol ba
ni/ /sangs rgyas kun la bsnyen sgrub byed pa'i rtags/ /spyan rtsa dmar la sdang mig bgrad pa ni/ /srid gsum rnal 'byor dam tshig gzigs pa'i rtags/ /zhal gyis drag
po hom khung gdang pa ni/ /bstan pa 'jig pa'i ru tra sgrol ba'i rtags/ /rno gdug mche ba zur gsum gtsigs pa ni/ /bsgral ba'i zhing bcu sa la sgrol ba'i rtags/ /
sku la zhing spags g.yang gzhi gsol ba ni/ /yang dag chos dang don dang ldan pa'i rtags/ /glang chen ko rlon snam phyed dkris pa ni/ /theg pa mchog gi don dang ldan
pa'i rtags/ /re lde nag pos snam phyed dkris pa ni/ /'jig rten 'di na mche btsan ldan pa'i rtags/ /lte ba'i khung nas nyi ma 'char ba ni/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho bting
nas skem pa'i rtags/ /spyi bo'i gtsug nas zla ba 'char ba ni/ /dug gsum ma rig mun pa sel ba'i rtags/ /zhabs la dbang gi lcags sgrog 'khril ba ni/ /thabs
dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba'i rtags/ /phyag g.yas shang lang nag po bsnams pa ni/ /sdug bsngal skye shi rtsad nas gcod pa'i
rtags/ /phyag g.yon thod rlon dmar chen 'thung ba ni/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal khrag ltar 'thung ba'i rtags/ /bong bu ga pa byin phyogs zhon pa ni/ /log par lta ba'i
sems can sgrol ba'i rtags/ /srin po'i og mas snga ru byas pa ni/ /srin yul lang+ga pu rangs 'dul ba'i rtags/ /sbrul nag chun pos gong rmed byas pa ni/ /zhe
sdang dbang gi bgegs rigs 'joms pa'i rtags/ /rus sbal nag po'i phob tu btang ba ni/ /klu bdud nag po dam la btags pa'i rtags/ /snga sha g.yas pa bdud kyi
khram bam ni/ /dam tshig nyams pa khram pa 'debs pa'i rtags/ /phyi shar nad kyi rgyal pa btags pa ni/ /bstan pa 'di la gnod pa'i dgra bo la/ /nad ka 'bebs
shing dal kha sgyur ba'i rtags/ /don dam bcud kyi rtags su zhag gi zor ris btad/ /thugs rje chags pa'i rtags su rak+ta'i thig las brgyan/ /'dul byed 'phrin
las rtags su thal ba'i mtshan mas btab/ /ma mo 'bum phrag bran du khol ba ni/ /khams gsum khyab par 'phrin las mdzad pa'i rtags/ /ma gcig kha nas
me 'bar rgya mtsho skam/ /rdo rje 'phyar bas ri rab tshogs por 'phen/ /bdag gis btsun par lha mo khyod la bstod/ /de nas yang gshin rje nag pos dpal lha mo la che ba'i yon
tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa/ lha mo dpal ldan mkha' 'gro nag mo khyod la ni/ /rgyun du til mar gyis byugs lan bu gcig ma ste/ /ro nye rna chas bsgyings shing cha lugs
mang po 'chang byed ma/ /rgyun du rkang sgrog lcags la byas pa gcig gis rkang la mdzes par brgyan pa ste/ /mtshan mo bong bu zhon nas 'gro ba de ni nag mo khyod nyid yin
par shes/ /ral pas bdag nyid mdzes par brgyan te khyod kyi spyod pa mtsho chen don dag su yis shes/ /'khor ba 'jig pa'i tshe na mi rus dag la khrag dang zhag 'dzag du
ba 'thul ba na/ /nag mo mche ba mi bzad khyod kyi zhal du 'gro kun skad cig tsam du zhugs par 'gyur/ /lha mo lag na mi thod thogs pa khyod ni rnal 'byor grub pa'i rnal
'byor can du dur khrod dgyes/ /khyod ni g.yog bcas mya ngan med cing 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med par dril bu'i sgra yang sgrog /khyod ni dpa' bo dag gi mgo bcad g.yul du
mtshon gyis bsad pa yi/ /mgo phreng lag na thogs shing gar thabs bskor zhing lag pa brkyang bskum che/ /rkub tshos che la klu dbang gshibs pa'i ska rags bcings shing
lag na mdung dang ni/ /ba dan thogs shing khrag gi chang gis ra ros myos te mig rtsa dmar por byas/ /mtshan mo dur khrod rgyu ba'i lha mo khyod ni
'byung bo phal chen kun gyis mthong / /rkang ba'i gos ni ko rlon mtshan pas drangs pas snam gyi phyed ni re ldes dkris/ /mi yi rgyu ma gsar pas zhal gyi zla ba brgyan cing
khrag zhag tshom bus thig ler brgyan/ /mi sha so sor chem chem za yin mi ro'i cod pan mgo la brgyan pa ste/ /bdag la skyob pa'i drang mo mi sha thos khyod snga nas
ma mthong gzod mthong na/ /bdud dang srin mo ma mo rnams kyang mig rtsa rig rig sdang zhing khyod la 'dud/ /lha mo bzang mo lus mdog nag cing bzod par dka' ba
khyod la ni/ /brgya byin sogs kyis bstod pa byed pa'i gshin rje'i rgyal po nyid kyang rtag tu 'dud/ /lha rnams dang ni 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams 'jug phyir rab rtul
bas na rna ba ya gcig la/ brang gis 'gro ba sbrul mgo gdengs ka stong dang ldan zhing phud sgrog shig gis rgyan nas brgyan du byas/ /ya gcig la ni seng+ge mtshungs
med thogs shing rgya mtsho bskor zhing sa gzhi gnon pa'i sa steng gi /phyogs nas rgyu ba'i nyi ma zla ba lha mo khyod kyi sked nas 'char zhing srid gsum zil gyis gnon/ /
rgya mtsho klong nas me 'bar chu rnams skem par byed par nus pa'i bud med thams cad zhi mdzad ma/ /lha chen sku dang 'tsham par bzhugs pa'i dka' zlog nag mo mi nad phyugs
nad kun la 'jigs pa med/ /ma gcig dpal ldan lha mo khyod nyid la ni bdag ni gus par phyag 'tshal mchod cing bstod par bgyi/ /de nas dpal lha mo nag mo la bram ze
mchog sred kyis kun rdzob kyi bden pa brten par bstod pa/ ma gcig lha mo dpal lha mo/ /rdo rje lha mo nag mo che/ /mthu chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdag gis
btsun par khyod bstod kyi/ /bkra shis mchog grub sems gter gnas/ /yid myur gzugs chen kun tu grags/ /ma mor grags shing 'jig rten skyong / /dpa' rtul
drag spyod brtson 'grus che/ /'thab mo g.yul las rtag tu rgyal/ /gshin rje'i sring mo yin par bstod/ /gos su dar gos sngon po gsol/ /sdug dang mi sdug cha lugs
'chang / /spyan mig mthong na mi sdug kun tu sdang / /dad cing tshogs pa'i mi rnams sdud/ /res 'ga' ri brag zab mor gnas/ /res 'ga' tshal dang shing la gnas/ /res
'ga' dur khrod dbus na gnas/ /lha mo'i gnas rten de ru 'cha'/ /gnas de ri dang tshal dgon du/ /rtag tu lha mo khyod bstod na/ /de yi dgongs pa skong bar byed/ /bdag gis
rtag tu bstod byas na/ /bdag gi bsam pa grub par mdzod/ /rma bya'i sgo la rgyal mtshan byas/ /gang zhig rtag bsten srung bar byed/ /gnag
lug phyugs rnams 'phel bar byed/ /seng+ge stag dang spyang ki yis/ /rtag tu kun nas bskor nas kyang / /rdo rje dril chen snyan par sgrog /byin te dril chen snyan par sgrog /
lan 'ga' lag na tri shUl thogs/ /lan 'ga' nyi zla'i ru mtshon 'phyar/ /mar gyi tshes dgu bcu gcig na/ /de yi dus su mchod byas na/ /lha mo khyod las lhag pa med/ /
bdud 'dul lha min srin mor ston/ /dgra dang 'thab tshe rgyal bar byed/ /bud med nang na mchog yin te/ /tshig dbang 'jig rten mgon po 'dra/ /rgyal po'i khab na pad+ma 'dra/ /
zhal bzang zla ba nya ba 'dra/ /chu la rgal na gru zam 'dra/ /phongs pa rnams kyi gnyen bshes 'dra/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed tshe/ /lha mo khyod kyi lte ba la/ /lha rnams
kun gyi rdzong bcas nas/ /lha dmag dkar po rgyal bar byas/ /lha ma yin rnams pham par byed/ /lag na mdung dmar chems se chems/ /ru mtshon ba dan me ltar
'bar/ /dag 'dul g.yul zlog khyed la bstod/ /de nas drang srong chen po kau di n+yas dpal lha mo la dpe byad kyi sgo nas bstod pa/ 'jig rten gtso la rtag tu gus phyag
'tshal/ /ma rnams nang na khyod ni rtag tu mchog yin te/ /'jig rten gsum po thams cad khyod la bstod/ /byad bzhin sdug mdzes kun gyis blta bar mos/ /yon tan rnam
pa sna tshogs lus rab brgyan/ /mig yangs 'dam skyes sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra/ /bsod nams ye shes snang ba grags pas brgyan/ /dper na rin thang med pa'i nor bu 'dra/ /
deng bdag pad+mo khyod la bsngags pas kyang / /sems la bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /yang dag ye shes gya nom bkra shis pa/ /pad+ma lta bur shin tu rnam
par dag /lus mdog rab mdzes kun gyis blta bar mos/ /mtshan ma yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs brgyan/ /dri med ye shes kun nas rab mdzes pa/ /dran pa rnams kyi
nang nas mchog tu gyur/ /ji ltar seng+ge gcan gzan mchog gyur bzhin/ /sngags bstod tshig ni 'di las 'byung ba yis/ /bsam pa'i dngos po thams cad 'grub
par shog /ces bstod do/ /de nas dpal phyag na rdo rjes 'dus pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyed kyis dpal lha mo la bstod pa legs so/ /da yang bstod pa 'di
dag gi don sgoms shig /yid la rtag tu zlos shig /lha mo 'di la bstod pa ni/ nga la bstod pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas thams cad la bstod pa yin no/ /lha mo des kyang
mi 'di srung bar byed do/ /skyob par byed do/ /ci 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster ro/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / 'khor de rnams rab tu dga'
nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la rgyan gyi char chen po phab nas so so'i gnas su 'khod do/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud rdzogs so// //rgya
gar skad du/ shrI de wi kA li nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta ka /bod skad du/ dpal lha mo nag mo'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/ rgyu dang 'bras bu'i byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad la bden pa'i mtshan rnams ston par mdzad do/ /de'i tshe dpal lha mo nag mo chen po yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste lan
gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge brtson 'grus kyis bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' srin mo'i cha lugs kyis 'jig rten pa'i don mdzad pa'i mtshan gyi rnam grangs
ji lta bu lags zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge brtson 'grus la dgongs nas dpal lha me nag mo la gzigs te 'di skad
ces gsungs so/ /thos bsam sgom la cher gnas pa'i/ /rgyu 'bras rkyen gyis bdag nyid can/ /'gro la phan mdzad mkhas pa'i mchog /dpal ldan lha mo nag mo
'phags/ /byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa ste/ /sa ltar rten pa'i gzhir gyur pa/ /yon tan sdud byed chu dang 'dra/ /byang chub smin byed me lta bu/ /dge ba'i 'du byed
rlung ltar g.yo/ /shes rab rnam dag nam mkha' ste/ /khyod ni 'byung ba chen po 'dra/ /'byung po phal chen rnams kyis bstod/ /bsod nams ye shes rab bsags
pa'i/ /las dang rnam smin dag la mkhas/ /nga rgyal gzugs kyis 'dul pa goms/ /shes rab snying rje'i lam du 'gro/ /khyod ni bum pa bzang lta bu/ /dper na yid
bzhin nor bu'i chu/ /kun la phan pa'i dpag bsam shing / /nyi ma 'dra bar khyod la gsal/ /zla ltar gsal ba'i thugs mnga' zhing / /ming ni ri bong rwa dang 'dra/ /rang
gi rgyud ni 'khor lo 'dra/ /u dum ba ltar khyod dkon yang / /bdud rtsi lta bur yongs tshim mdzad/ /'gro ba kun gyi bdag mo lags/ /rang bzhin med pa'i chos kyang
ston/ /chu dang nam mkha'i tshub ma ltar/ /gdul bya'i srid gsum cis kyang 'dul/ /dus gsum rgyal ba'i bstan pa skyong / /dam pa rnams
dang yang dag gcig /dam pa rnams kyi lam du 'gro/ /lha mo ma mo gnod sbyin mo/ /srin mo klu mo sha za mo/ /bdud mo 'byung mo grul bum mo/ /khrag mo rngam tshul glog
'gyu ma/ /rlung mo nag mo 'jigs byed ma/ /mkha' 'gro gtum mo zhing sgrol ma/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po'i 'dul/ /dkar ser ljang nag dmar yang ston/ /
rnam pa brgyad kyis dbyibs kyang 'byung / /'gro ba drug po'i tshul yang ston/ /phung po lnga yang brjod par nus/ /dbang po tshim byed yul lnga'ang ston/ /rten cing
'brel pa'i spyod pa mkhas/ /yul can rnams ni gsod la mkhas/ /de bzhin dag rnams gsod pa dang / /lus can rnams ni gsod la brtson/ /sems ni
gsod pa med la mkhas/ /'khor ba las ni ring du song / /de bzhin du gshegs pas lung bstan te/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan rnams dang / /'jig rten skyong
mdzad dpal ldan ma/ /dam chos 'dzin pa rnams la byams/ /oM AHhUM shrI de wi kA la sa ma ya dzaHDA ki ni DA ya sa ma swA ha/ ming brgya rtsa brgyad gang
'dzin pa/ /yon tan brgya rtsa brgyad kyang thob/ /dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong mi 'gyur/ /yi dwags gnas su mi skye zhing / /byol song skye bas thogs mi 'gyur/ /lus 'phags
gnas su skyes pa na/ /thog la sogs pa mi 'bab cing / sgra mi snyan du rlung gis min/ /de bzhin ba lang spyod du yang / /chu dang rlabs kyis khyer mi nus/ /'dzam
bu'i gling du gang skyes pa/ /sna tshogs gnod pas nyen mi 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i lha rnams gnas su yang / /skyes nas chos la dga' bar 'gyur/ /bsam gtan
bzhi yi skye gnas su/ /tshad med bzhi ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /gzugs med gnas ni bzhi por yang / /don med na ni mi skye ste/ /'du shes med par nam yang
min/ /'phags pa bzhugs pa'i gnas rnams su/ /khams gsum tshul gyis bdag don spyod/ /rtag tu yul la chags mi 'gyur/ /sems la 'dzin par mi byed
de/ /nyon mongs rtsa ba drug po dang / /de bzhin nye ba nyi shu dang / /mtshams med lnga yang byang bar 'gyur/ /bskal pa grangs med mang por yang / /mi khom brgyad du
skye mi 'gyur/ /mu stegs rtsod pa zlog pa dang / /mthu stobs phun sum tshogs ldan zhing / /tshe ring nad med dpal dang ldan/ /sdug bsngal bskal pa mang por yang / /
nam yang 'khor bar mi ltung zhing / /mya ngan 'das pa thob bya'i phyir/ /nyan thos sa rnams non pa dang / /rten 'brel bcu gnyis shes par
bya/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams ni/ /rab dga' dri med 'od byed 'phro/ /sbyang dka' mngon gyur ring du song / /mi g.yo legs pa chos kyi sprin/ /sangs rgyas
sa chen bla na med/ /bcu gnyis po yang thob 'gyur te/ /kun tu 'od dang bdud rtsi 'od/ /nam mkha'i 'od dang rdo rje'i 'od/ /rin chen 'od dang pad+ma'i 'od/ /las kyi 'od
dang dpe med sa/ /dpal ldan sa dang shes rab 'od/ /thams cad mkhyen dang rang rig ste/ /bcu gnyis sangs rgyas sa rnams kyang / /'di tshe byung na myur du thob/ /sa
rnams ma thob par du yang / /'gro ba rnams la phan pa dang / /shes rab snying rje ldan gyur cing / /chos la dga' ba rnams kyis srung / /dngos grub thob ste de
bzhin gshegs/ /rin chen las byung thob par 'gyur/ /dpal ldan byang chub sems dpa' dang / /dpal ldan lha mo nag mo yi/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad gang
'dzin pa/ /yon tan brgya rtsa brgyad thob ste/ /sku gsung thugs ni grub nas kyang / /khams gsum chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / byang chub
sems dpa'i 'khor de dag dang / dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang zhing mngon par bstod do/ /
dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa yon tan dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstod pa/ dus gsum
'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po dang / /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dug gsum rgyus/ /sdig min las grub lha dang lha ma yin/ /dmyal ba tshogs me ltar 'bar
ba'i gnas 'di ru/ /sha khrag dmar la rol pa'i lha mo khyod/ /lha yi g.yul ngo rgyal bar zhal 'ches las/ /lha ma yin gyi dpung rnams brlag par mdzod/ /
ces bstod do rdzogs so// //@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya sap+ta be ta Da ka nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa ro langs bdun pa
zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i
dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang yang thabs cig go /de'i tshe na mu stegs can kun tu rgyu ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
gnod par bya ba'i phyir ro langs chen po bdun btang bar gyur to/ /de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ba las de dag gis glags ma rnyed/ dmigs
pa ma rnyed do/ /de dag gis glags ma rnyed/ dmigs pa ma rnyed nas de dag tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa kun
dga' bo'i lus la reg go /reg ma thag tu kun dga' bo de sdug bsngal mi bzod pa/ drag pa/ tsha ba/ shi la thug pa'i tshor ba rnams dang ldan par gyur
to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni/ sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ drag pa/ tsha ba/ shi la thug pa'i tshor ba rnams dang ldan
no/ /bcom ldan 'das de ma dgongs so/ /bdag 'di ltar nyam nga bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pas ma dgongs so snyam mo/ /de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mau gal gyi bu chen po tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thag mi ring ba zhig na 'dug par gyur to/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i nye ba'i nyon
mongs pa de lta bu de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mau gal gyi bu chen pos thos so/ /de nas de gnyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der song ste
phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ drag pa/ tsha ba'i tshor ba myong nas bdag la de bzhin gshegs pas ma
dgongs so zhes ci de skad smra'am/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag /bdag gi lus
la tshor ba dang ldan pa ni/ dper na/ sog les mgo bo gsheg pa ltar kun dga' bo la reg pa yang de dang 'dra'o/ /kun dga' bo/ ma 'jigs shig /bdag cag
gis khyod khri'i steng du bzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du bkur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de khyod la yongs su skyob pa mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan
pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mau gal gyi bu chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nyal khri'i steng du bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas
bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du bzhag go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod ci sdug bsngal mi
bzad pa/ drag pa/ tsha ba'i tshor bas thebs sam/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod de'i phyir
legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod la reg pa'i ro langs chen po stobs che ba/ gdul dka' ba/ mthong na
gnod pa bdun yod de/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phreng ba 'dzin ces bya ba dang / nor bu 'dzin dang / gtum po dang / gdol pa dang / rma bya'i snying
dang / tshe zad dang / la ba can te/ ro langs chen po bdun po de dag ni stobs che ba/ gdul dka' ba/ bsnyen par dka' ba/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu
che ba'o/ /kun dga' bo/ ro langs re res kyang 'dod na rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang 'phen to/ /ri'i rgyal po ri rab yungs 'bru tsam
du rnam par 'jig go /steng du bltas nas 'gas par byed do/ /phyogs su bltas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs mtshams su bltas na mes sreg par
byed do/ /de dag gis khyod la reg go /de lta mod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang / chos thos pa'i gus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi
rlabs kyis da dung du khyod kyi lus 'tsho ba yin no/ /kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ legs par bsal du gsol/ phyir bzlog tu gsol/ phyag rgya bcing du
gsol/ skud pas bcing du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bstan
par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ha ra/ ma hA ge re/ g+ha sa ra ba ti/ d+ha ra d+ha ri/ d+ha ra Ni/ tsho ra tsho ra Ni/ ka ro ti ti/ sa to ta sa mA d+hi Ni/ sa ma ra sa ra Ni/ sa ra na ko ta ma ti/ sa
ma b+ha be/ b+ha ba na/ nA ga re/ b+ha di na sa d+ha ni ti swA hA/ kun dga' bo/ gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag lan lnga bcu rtsa gnyis bzlas brjod byas te mdud pa lnga bcu rtsa
gnyis bor na/ brjed byed thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi snying la gnod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /gdon thams cad kyis byas pa las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ legs so/ de ltar mdzod cig /slar yang mi mchi bar mdzad du gsol/ kun dga' bo/ de'i phyir nyon la legs par yang zungs shig /tad+ya
thA/ bad tsa le ba le/ ma hA bad tsa le ba le/ b+hi le b+hi le/ ma hA b+hi ri Ni/ ni mi ri ni/ ha na ha na ha ti ri/ ma tsa thA/ ma bi tsa ra thA/ sti ri s+thi ra mu le/ ma
tha ni rma tha ni/ tsa la ni/ mA ka nI/ dzaM b+ha ni/ pI dA ni/ ba ya swa kr-i N-i/ b+ha ga ba ti/ ta thA ga ta/ bi ta the/ ti be g+ha d+ha re/ pa ra pra de/ ha
re tiSh+Tha/ nI lA ba si na swA hA/ kun dga' bo/ ro langs 'di dag ni/ 'tshog pa/ sdang ba/ gtum por gyur pa/ gsod par gyur ba'o/ /de la rig sngags 'dis
ke mu ru ka'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig por ro/ /de nas 'byung po chen po shin tu 'khrug par 'gyur ro/ /'dis
thams cad kyang spang bar 'gyur/ 'dzem par 'gyur/ zhi bar 'gyur zhing / 'dis 'byung po thams cad kyang dbang du 'gyur/ 'dis 'byung po thams cad
kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ nyon cig dang bstan par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ da ra da ra da ra/ ka ra ka ra ka ra/ ma hA kak+ka ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa da tsa ra
ma hA tsa da tsa ra/ ha la ha la ha la/ hi li hi li/ hu lu hu lu/ hi re bi re/ hi ri ki ri/ bai rai bi ci ni ka ra na ka ri/ sarba b+hU tA nAn/ pra dzaM b+ha ni/ nI la
ba ra sa ni/ tsa ts+tshu/ tsa kra tsa kra/ A yu d+he swA hA/ kun dga' bo/ 'di dag ni/ gnod sbyin thams cad dang / srin po thams cad dang / gsang sngags
thams cad dang / yi dwags dang / byad dang / sdig pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o/ /rgyal pos bkrabs pa dang / la gcan pa phyir zlog par byed do/ /de la rig
sngags 'di skud pa dmar po la lan sum cu rtsa bdun bzlas brjod byas te mdud pa sum cu rtsa bdun bor na/ thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/
gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag zungs shig /chongs shig /legs par rab tu yid la zungs shig /rjes su sbyor bar gyis shig /de lta bas na kun dga'
bo/ /khyod kyis dran pa dang ldan pas gzung bar bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ d+ha ra d+ha/ d+ha d+ha ra/ kha ra kha ra/ ma hA khA ra/ ma hA ba le/ ba ba na sha ni/ go da Ta/ kuT+Ta
ni/ kuT+Ta nI/ sa ma hA re/ kU Ta daM Sh+Te/ ka kha kha re/ ma ku Ta/ d+ha re Ni/ mu lu ka ka /k+Sha Ne ka nI ke /sa me smra shA ni/ ki ni/ gi ri Ni/ b+ho gi sa re/ sA sA be ta
Da/ ku mA ra ka /kri ti swA si/ kin ni ba bud+d+ha si/ bi bud+h+ya/ bi bud+h+ya gri ha na b+h+ye/ kr-i ta bai ra ba/ bi kri te b+hai ra ba/ ma hA ba ye/ kr-i to na/ ha ra si/ kin na mA ra ya
si ki na ni sarba de ba/ nA ga /yak+Sha/ gan+d+ha rba/ a su ra/ sarba a su ra/ sarba b+ha ya sha ma na/ ma ta sa ra swA hA/ kun dga' bo/ rig sngags 'di sbyin
sreg gam/ skud pas bcings na/ 'dod pa'i mthar gtogs pa thams cad 'jigs par byed/ ltung bar byed/ za bar byed
do/ /kun dga' bo/ ro langs thams cad rengs bar byed pa'i rig sngags zungs shig /tad+ya thA/ se me le/ ma hA ha ha le/ ha ra d+ha re/ g+ho ra d+ha re/ d+ha rit+ti/
rit+ti/ bi rot+ti/ ku Nat+ti/ ku ta ni/ saM go tsa ni/ ka tsa ri/ kha tsa ra/ kha tsa ri/ ma ha Ne/ hu hu/ ma re Na/ ma hA mA la d+ha re/ na yo na ma ti swA hA/ kun dga' bo/
gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dmod pa drag po dang mtshungs shing 'dra ste/ 'byung po thams cad rnam par bshig pa'i phyir bal gtsang ma'i skud pa la lan
nyi shu rtsa bzhir bzlas brjod byas te mdud pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi bor na/ log 'dren thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ gsang sngags
kyi tshig 'di dag zungs shig /legs par rab tu gzung bar gyis shig /kun dga' bo/ gsang sngags 'di gang yang rung bas gzung bar mi nus so/ /
kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na legs par gzung bar gyis shig /tad+ya thA/ tsa ta tsa ra/ ma hA tsa ta tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bu ru bu ru/ ma hA bu ru/ saM b+ha le/
ma hA saM b+ha le/ ma hA ba le swA hA/ kun dga' bo/ lha dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / skye rgur bcas
pa'i 'jig rten na gang zhig gsang sngags 'di la mi spro ba ni/ ngas rjes su ma mthong ste/ srung ba dang / rjes su 'brang ba yin no/ /gsang sngags 'di ni/ mi
bzad pa ste/ sreg par byed/ 'tshed par byed/ 'ching bar byed/ 'joms par byed/ 'bar bar byed pa yin te/ rig sngags lan drug cu rtsa gcig bzlas
brjod byas te mdud pa drug cu rtsa gcig bor na/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed/ rig sngags gcod par byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe
dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ legs so/ /legs par bzung lags so/ /mdud pa bor du gsol/ phyag rgya
gzhag par mdzad du gsol/ kun dga' bo/ de'i phyir/ tad+ya thA/ b+ha b+ha re/ b+ha re/ b+ha ra Ni ha re/ pra ha re/ ha ra Ni/ ku tha ni ta Di/ led tshad da ti/ tshangs pas
byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do/ /dbang phyug chen mos byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do/ /khyab 'jug gis byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do/ /brgya byin gyis
byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do/ /rgyal po chen po bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon gyis byas pa'i
rig sngags bcad do/ /zla ba dang nyi mas byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do/ /gza' dang nyi mas byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do/ /gza' dang rgyu skar gyis byas
pa'i rig sngags bcad do/ /phyogs nas byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do/ /phyogs mtshams nas byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do/ /steng nas byas pa dang
'og nas byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do/ /lhas byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do/ /klus byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do/ /gnod sbyin gyi byas pa dang /
nam mkha' lding gis byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do/ /grul bum gyis byas pa dang / tshor ba pos byas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal
rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gdol pas byas pa dang / kla klo dang / ri khrod pas byas pa
dang / seng+ge dang / sprul gyis byas pa dang / 'gro lding ba'i yid kyis byas pa dang / g.yung pos byas pa dang / tong sa la pas byas pa dang / mu da ga ri
khrod pas byas pa dang / sems can thams cad rig sngags 'chang pas byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do/ /tad+ya thA/ ga ga gA ra li phu/ ma hA ga ga gA ri la phu/ bi she

phu/ sha pa ra sing+d+he phu/ tsaN+Da li phu/ ma hA tsaN+Da li phu/ tso gi phu/ tsi mi re phu/ tsi tsi mi re phu/ tsa kre phu/ tsakra d+ha re phu/ kr-iSh+Na phu/ kr-iSh+Na phu/ kr-iSh+Na ru pe phu/ tsaN+De phu/ so ge
phu/ pany+tsa pra li phu/ pany+tsa le phu/ b+hi mi phu/ b+hi pA pa le phu/ biM ga le phu/ piM ga la ak+She phu/ A nan+de phu/ sa man+te phu/ nA sha ni phu/ ts+tshe da ni phu/ bi ts+tshe da ni phu
swA hA/ kri sa ni/ bak+Sha ni/ mA ra ni/ pin+da ni/ pin d+ya nan/ bak+Sha Ni/ nA sha ni/ khA da d+ya ka nan/ gA la b+hi na sha ni/ dA hA ma si/ b+hasma/ b+hasma ni/ ma sa ni/
ban+d+ha ni swA hA/ kun dga' bo/ nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe ro langs chen po gnod byed ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de ston gyi dus kyi tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi rjes su zhugs
nas gang 'od zer de dag gis gang la reg pa 'od zer gyi dra bas reg nas rims su 'gyur te/ de yang bcad do/ /kun dga' bo/ ro langs kha gcig pa zhes
bya ba zhig yod de/ de yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdu bar bya'o/ /klu'i rgyal po sa 'dzin ces bya ba yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdu bar bya'o/ /klu thams cad dang /
grul bum thams cad dang / yi dwags dang / sha za thams cad kyang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/ nam mkha' lding yang 'di nyid
kyi nang du bsdus/ nor 'dzin yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/ rlung lha yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/ sgyu ma len gyi bu pa ra pa Di shes rud dro yang 'di nyid kyi nang
du bsdus/ phung po 'dzin dang / mdung thung 'dzin kyang de bzhin du bsdus/ de bzhin du blon po dang bcas pa dang / 'khor dang bcas pa yang 'di nyid kyi
nang du bsdus so/ /kun nas dpag tshad brgya dag tu/ /nga yis chad pa dag byas pas/ /nga la 'byung pos byar ci yod/ /nga yis sdang ba thams cad bcom/ /gsod
par gyur pa stobs po che/ /ro langs dag gis byar ci yod/ /de dag kyang ni nga'i zhags pas/ /kun nas yongs su bskor ba yin/ /zhags pa kun gyis de dag
kyang / /rmugs shing shin tu rmongs par byas/ /'di yis bdag gis kun 'grub cing / /gsang sngags tshig rnams grub gyur cig /na maHsing+d+ha nAn/ sid+d+h+yan+tu
man+t+ra pA dA swa stir me sarba satwa nany+tsa swA hA/ sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs gang dang / /dgra bcom rnams kyi stobs gang dang / /dam pa'i chos kyi gzi brjid kyis/ /bde
legs su ni rab gyur cig /'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi gzi yis/ /rtag tu 'jigs pa thams cad la swA hA/ cho ga ni/ lan drug cu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te ke
me ru dang / bal gtsang ma la sogs pa'i skud pa dmar po la mdud pa bor ro/ /de bzhin du bya ba yang bya'o/ /'byung po thams cad dang / brjed byed dang / sems
rnam par g.yeng byed la sogs pa dang / dug byin pa dang / dug byas pa dang / rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa rnams la kun tu 'gro ba grub pa'i mchog
yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i
'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa ro langs bdun pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //
rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha siM ha dang / ban+d+he ye shes snying po'i sdes bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra siM ha dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes
zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ su rU ba na ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ su rU pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na maHsu rU pA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ aMr+ha te/ samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ ta d+ya thA/ oM su ru su ru/ pra su
ru pra su ru/ ta ra ta ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ sma ra sma ra/ san+tar pa ya/ san+tar pa ya/ sarba pre ta nA ma swA hA/ gzungs 'dis chu dang bcas pa'i
zan la lan bdun yongs su bzlas te lag pa g.yon pas se gol gyi sgra lan gsum du byas nas yi dwags thams cad la dben pa'i sa phyogs su sbyin
par bya zhing / 'di skad kyang brjod par bya ste/ skabs tshol pa dang / glags lta ba rnams dengs shig /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gnas pa'i yi
dwags rnams la bza' ba 'di bdag gis sbyin par bgyi'o/ /zhes pa'o/ /zas ma zos pa'i sngon rol nyid du sbyin par bya'o/ /de ltar na yi dwags thams
cad la 'bras bre bo che re re'i bza' ba so sor byin par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar byas na/ skye ba nas skye bar yang nyam chung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dbul por mi
'gyur ro/ /stobs che ba dang / mdzes pa dang / mthong na dga' ba dang / phyug cing longs spyod che bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe ring zhing nad med pa dang / myur du bla
na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /shi 'phos nas kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /
gzugs legs zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM dz+nyA nA ba lo ki te sa man+ta s+pha ra Na rash+mi b+ha ba sa ma
ya ma hA ma Ni du ru du ru hr-i da ya dza la ni hUM/ 'bab chu'am mtsho'i 'gram du 'dug ste lag pa g.yas pa'i 'khyor bar chu blugs la ye shes skar mda'i snying po 'di lan bdun
bzlas te chu khyor ba bdun 'bab chur gtor na/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa'i yi dwags ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad lha'i kha zas kyi ro dang /
btung ba'i ro mchog dang ldan pa 'thob cing / yi dwags re re yang kha zas dang / btung ba yul ma ga d+ha'i bre bdun bdun gyis 'tsho bar byas par 'gyur
zhing / chu de 'thungs ba tsam gyis de dag thams cad yi dwags kyi skye gnas las thar cing / bde 'gro mtho ris kyi gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /skyes
pa'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo'am/ gzhan yang byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa yi dwags sam/ bya'am/ chu la gnas pa la sogs pa
gang gis chu de 'thungs pa re dag thams cad sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad byang zhing bde 'gro'i lam du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /ye
shes skar mda'i snying po'o// //yi dwags mo kha 'bar ma dbugs dbyung ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya na shing n+ye gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang /
sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te chos ston to/ /de nas kun dga' bo dben par 'dug ste nang du yang dag 'jog cing rtse gcig tu
yid la byed pas/ chos mngon gsum du byed pa na mtshan mo nam gyi cha smad la de'i mdun du yi dwags mo kha 'bar ma 'dug nas smras pa/ kye kun dga' bo/
khyod gnangs 'chi bar 'gyur te/ yi dwags kyi gnas 'dir skye bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bos smras pa/ rten pa'i thabs ci yod/ yi dwags mos
smras pa/ kun dga' bo/ gal te nang pa yi dwags gang+gA'i klung gyi bye ma khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed dag la yi dwags re re la yang zas dang / skom
yul ma ga d+ha'i bre bo che bdun bdun tsam byin te/ bram ze'i drang srong 'bum yang tshim par byas la/ bdag gi ming gis dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byas na/ de ltar
na khyod kyi tshe yang phyir nur bar 'gyur la/ bdag kyang yi dwags kyi 'jig rten nas shi 'phos te mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas kun dga' bos yi
dwags mo kha 'bar ma rid cing mdog ngan la/ lus skem pa/ kha nas me lce 'bar ba/ lto dang kha skam pa/ ral pa'i phung po g.yengs pa/ spu dang sen mo ring ba mthong
ste/ tshig mi snyan cing yid du mi 'ong ba de thos nas skrag cing sdangs te spu zing zhes byas nas/ stan las langs te shin tu rings pa dang / shin tu myur ba'i shugs
kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te 'dar bzhin du 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
skyabs mdzad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa skyabs mdzad du gsol/ bdag ni gnangs srog 'gum par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis
yi dwags mo kha 'bar ma mthong ste/ khyod gnangs 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes mchi na/ bdag gis rten thabs ci mchis zhes smras nas de'i mchid nas gal te khyod
kyis yi dwags gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed dag chim par byas te/ /bram ze'i drang srong 'bum yang
tshim par byas na/ de ltar na khyod kyi tshe phyir nur bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ kun dga' bo/ gang gis khyod yi dwags
rnams dang / bram ze'i drang srong rnams tshim par byed par 'gyur ba'i thabs yod kyi/ ma 'jigs shig /kun dga' bo/ thams cad du 'od dang ldan pa rgya
chen shugs ldan zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod do/ /des byin pa tsam gyis yi dwags gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed dag tshim par 'gyur
te/ yi dwags dang / bram ze'i drang srong re re la zas dang / skom yul ma ga d+ha'i bre bo bdun bdun byin par 'gyur ro/ /de ni/ sngon nga bram zer gyur ba na
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od las ngas bzung ste/ des yi dwags
dang / bram ze'i drang srong grangs su bgrang ba mang ba dang / ches mang ba'ang ngas zas dang / skom gyis tshim par byas te/ de dag thams cad yi dwags kyi 'jig rten nas
shi 'phos nas lha'i 'jig rten du skyes so/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis zungs la ngo lon gyis shig /na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te/ oM saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM/ kun
dga' bo/ 'di yi dwags kyi gtor ma la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas lag pa brkyang ste drung du sbyin par bya'o/ /se gol yang brdab par bya'o/ /de ltar
byas na/ byin ma thag tu phyogs bzhi'i yi dwags gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag gi bye ma snyed dag tshim par byas par 'gyur ro/ /yi dwags re re
la yang yul ma ga d+ha'i bre bo bdun bdun byin par 'gyur ro/ /de dag kyang zos pa tsam gyis yi dwags kyi 'jig rten nas shi 'phos nas lha rnams kyi nang du skye
bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ /khyod kyis dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par khor zug tu
bsnyad par bya'o/ /de ltar byas na/ bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ tshe yang ring bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag 'bum gyi
bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu mi ma yin pa rgyu ba/ 'byung po dang / sha za dang / grul bum la sogs
pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gdon dang / yi dwags rnams kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang yang ldan par
'gyur ro/ /gzugs dang ldan pa dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro/ /bram ze'i drang srong tshim par byed pa 'dod pa
des ni/ mchod yon dang / dbul bar bya ba dang / snod bkang ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas la 'bab chu ga la yod pa'i gnas der sbyin par bya'o/ /
de ltar byas na/ bram ze'i drang srong gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma'i bye ma snyed dag lha'i bza' ba dang / btung ba rnams kyis tshim par
byas par 'gyur ro/ /bram ze'i drang srong de dag kyang dbang po tshim par 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyis oM bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba'i sgra 'byin
par byed la/ sems can de dag kyang bsam pa yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ bram ze'i gzi brjid dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu tshangs par spyod par
yang 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu dgra thams
cad zhig par 'gyur ro/ /me tog gam/ bdug pa'am/ spos sam/ zas sam/ skom gyi yo byad la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la sangs rgyas dang /
chos dang / dge 'dun la 'bul bar bya'o/ /de ltar byas na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge ba snyen ma des
phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la lha'i mchod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod
pa'i mchog gis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /bla mar byas/ rim gror byas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs shing lung bstan
pa dang / lha thams cad kyis kun tu srung bar yang 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ song la ngo lon yang gyis shig /sems can thams cad la yang dag par ston
cig /dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad kyang gyis shig ces nga smra'o/ /yi dwags mo kha 'bar ma dbugs dbyung ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga rdzogs so// //
yi dwags kha nas me 'bar ba la skyabs mdzad pa'i gzungs/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya na dge 'dun kyi gnas na
dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pas yongs su bskor ba la chos ston te/ de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo bas mtha'
zhig na chos yid la byed cing dran pa mngon du bzhag nas 'dug pa las/ de'i nub mo nam gyi cha smad la yi dwags kha nas me 'bar ba zhes bya ba/ gzugs
byad mi sdug pa/ shin tu rid cing skem pa/ kha nas me 'bar ba/ mgrin pa mo khab tsam du phra ba/ skra 'dzings pa/ sen mo dang mche ba ring la rno ba
shin tu 'jigs su rung ba zhig dga' bo'i drung du 'ongs nas dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod da ste zhag bdun na tshe'i dus byas te yi dwags kyi
khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras so/ /dga' bos des smras pa thos nas shin tu 'jigs skrag ste yi dwags de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag
tshe'i dus byas nas yi dwags kyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ba 'di thabs ci byas na/ sdug bsngal de las yongs su thar par 'gyur/ de nas yi dwags des
dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gal te khyod kyis sang gi nyin mo la yi dwags gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la gtor ma byin te/ bram ze dang /
drang srong brgya stong snyed la yul dbus 'gyur tshal gyi bre tshang ma re re'i zhal zas mchog dam pa phul te/ kho bo'i phyir dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byas
na/ tshe ring zhing yi dwags kyi sdug bsngal dang bral te mtho ris kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe kun dga' bos yi dwags kha nas me 'bar ba lus mi sdug
pa dang / shin tu rid cing skem pa dang / kha nas me 'bar ba dang / mgrin pa mo khab tsam la skra 'dzings pa dang / sen mo dang mche ba ring zhing rno ba yang
mthong la/ yid du mi 'ong / mi 'dod pa'i tshig kyang thos nas lus skyi bung zhes byed pa tsam du 'jigs skrag nas 'dug pa las langs te myur bar bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin nas lus smad lnga sa la gtugs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag
'tshal nas lus 'dar bzhin du sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa'i dpung gnyen mdzad du gsol/ zhes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bdag bas mtha' zhig na chos yid la bgyid cing mchis pa las/ yi dwags kha nas me 'bar ba zhes bgyi ba de bdag la
'di skad ces mchi'o/ /khyod da ste zhag bdun na nges par tshe'i dus byas te yi dwags kyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi'o/ /bdag gis de la thabs
ci bgyi na/ yi dwags kyi sdug bsngal de las yongs su thar par 'gyur zhes dris na/ des bdag la khyod kyis yi dwags gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig
brgya stong snyed la gtor ma byin te/ bram ze dang / drang srong la sogs pa brgya stong snyed la zhal zas mchog dam pa phul na tshe ring bar 'gyur zhes mchi na /
bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ji lta bur yi dwags dang / drang srong la sogs pa de snyed kyi kha zas 'byor bar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod 'jigs par ma byed cig /khyod kyis yi dwags gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed dang / bram ze dang drang stong
la sogs pa la kha zas dang gtor ma mang po 'byor ba'i thabs nga la yod kyi/ /yid blong bar ma byed cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la
bka' stsal pa/ nga la gzungs sngags gzi brjod tshad med pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i 'od zer rnam par rgyal ba'i shugs zhes bya ba yod de/ /gang zhig gis
gzungs 'di brjod na/ yi dwags gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed dang / bram ze dang drang srong la sogs te mang po'i kha zas dang gtor ma mchog dmag
'gyur te/ de dag la sogs pa gcig kyang kha zas yul dbus 'gyur tshal gyi bre tshad mas bcal pa'i bre bdun snyed thob par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ nga yang
bram zer gyur pa na byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dbang sgyur yon tan zhes bya ba las gzungs 'di thos
bas na/ de'i dbang gis yi dwags tshad med pa snyed dang / drang srong mang po la kha zas dang / gtor ma byin par gyur te/ yi dwags kyi khams su skyes pa de
dag kyang sdug bsngal las rnam par grol nas mtho ris kyi lhar skyes par gyur to/ /dga' bo/ /khyod kyis zungs shig /bsod nams dang tshe'i tshad kyang 'phel
zhing skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la gzungs sngags 'di bka' stsal to/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te/ saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM/
bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu'am/ /rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig tshe ring bar 'dod dam/
bsod nams che zhing 'phel ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myur du yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod na/ rtag tu snga dro'i dus sam/ /yang na dus thams
cad du byas kyang bar chad du 'gyur ba med do/ /snod gtsang ma'i nang du chu gtsang ma blugs la chan nam/ /phye'am/ 'khur ba la sogs pa pa cung zad cig
btab ste lag pa g.yas pa snod kyi steng du bzhag ste gzungs 'di la lan bdun bsngags nas de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i mtshan nas brjod par bya'o//
de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang gi mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis yi dwags
thams cad skye ba mang po'i ser sna byas pa mi dge ba'i las bcom zhing / bsod nams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs
dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dam pa'i mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis yi dwags mang po byad gzugs mi sdug
pa bcom zhing gzugs dang mtshan phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sku 'byams klas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sku 'byams
klas kyi mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis yi dwags mang po'i skom pa spangs shing tshim par 'gyur te/ sbyin pa'i gnas yid bzhin du za ba dang chog cing
'grangs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i mtshan nas brjod
pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis yi dwags mang po 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral te yi dwags kyi khams zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka'
stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nas brjod de byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'og tu se gol lan gsum byas te gtor ma'i snod
blangs nas lag pa brkyang ste sa gtsang mar blug par bya'o/ /de ltar gtor ma byin par byas na/ phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa'i yi dwags gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag
khrig brgya stong snyed so so nas yul dbus 'gyur tshal gyi bre tshad mas bcal ba'i bre bdun bdun thob par 'gyur ro/ /kha zas de dag yid dwags kyi yid bzhin du za ba
dang / chog 'grangs pa dang / yi dwags kyi khams spong ba dang / mtho ris kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ gal te dge
slong pha'am/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang zhig rtag tu gzungs 'dis kha zas la bsngags te yi dwags la sbyin pa byin na bsod
nams tshad med pa snyed yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / de nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams dang khyad par
med de/ tshe ring ba dang / bsod nams dang / mdangs dang / stobs skye zhing 'phel ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang / mi ma yin pa dang /
gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dwags ma rungs pa thams cad kyis gtse zhing gnod par byed mi nus pa dang / gzhan la gzi brjid tshad med pa dang ldan
par 'gyur ro/ /gal te gang zhig bram ze dang / drang srong la sbyin pa byed 'dod na/ kha zas yongs su dag pa snod gcig gi nang du bkang ste gzungs sngags
lan bdun bzlas te 'bab chu gtsang mar gtor na/ de ltar byas pas lha rdzas kyi zhal zas mchog dam par gyur te/ des na bram ze dang / drang srong de dag kyang
sngags kyis btab pa'i zas thob nas sngags kyi byin gyis so so nas sngon chad ci dang ci la dga' zhing mos ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bsod nams su yongs su 'gyur
bas/ so so nas mthun par dus gcig tu de la tshe ring ba dang / mdangs dang / stobs su ldan te bde zhing skyid par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/ /gzhan
yang mi de sems bsam pa bzhin du mthong ba dang / thos pa'i sgo nas yongs su dag cing / shes pa mi nor ba dag tshangs pa'i lha'i spyod pa mchog dang ldan
zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams
dang 'dra ste/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis gnod pa mi nus par 'gyur ro/ /gal te dge slong pha'am/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen pha'am/ dge bsnyen
ma gang zhig sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa byed par 'dod na/ spos dang / me tog dang / zhal zas dam pa la gzungs sngags 'di
lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas te dkon mchog gsum la dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas rigs kyi bu pho dang / rigs kyi bu mo des phul ba'i zhal zas de lha rdzas kyi
zhal zas su gyur te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa byas par 'gyur
ro/ /de nas bstod pa dang / gsol ba gdab pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur te/ rtag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis
bsngags shing dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /lha mang pos rtag tu srung zhing skyob pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ khyod
kyis 'di rjes su chos bzhin yid la byas te sems can thams cad kyis mthong zhing thos par bya ba'i phyir yongs su rgyas par ston cig dang / bsod nams
tshad med pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /yi dwags kha nas me 'bar ma la skyabs mdzad pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// //bod skad du/ 'jur 'gegs
zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ser sna las cher lhag pa/ gzhan gyi la 'jur 'gegs
byas pa'i nyes pa'i 'bras bu 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu dang / 'phags pa mau gal gyi bu gnyis bas mtha' zhig na so sor rtog pa'i shes rab
yid la byed cing yod pa las/ nyi ma'i gung la gnyis pos khams gseng du mchis pa'i sa na yi dwags me lus sngo la skam pa/ khog khog zer ba/ skra 'dzings
pa/ mig dmar la mi g.yon du yo ba/ ma mchu ring la g.yas su yo ba/ ske dang / rkang lag shin tu phra la ring ba/ lag pa khu tshur bsdams pa'i sen mos
thad kar phug nas sen mo sngo zang nge yod pa/ kha nas sgra rnam pa lnga sgrog pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ dgos na zhes bya ba dang / med na zhes bya ba dang / ma sbyin cig ces bya
ba dang / ster na yang che ches par 'ong ngo zhes bya ba dang / de tsam je ches kyis phri la byin ces bya ba dang lnga brjod pa/ skyi zing byed pa zhig dang phrad pa las/ der
gang zag gnyis po des bsam pa/ dgon pa bas grong yul thag nye la zas mod pas grong khyer du phyin te bslangs pas dkar gsum dang / mngar gsum dang /
'bras dang / nas kyi zan la sogs pa bza' ba dang / btung ba mang du rnyed nas yi dwags kyi drung du khyer te phyin nas bstabs pas mi len par gong gi sgra rnam
pa lnga sgrog cing bros so/ /der gang zag gnyis po des shin tu ma dga' nas yi dwags mo de'i sems su song nas/ gzhan yid la ma dran te bcom ldan
'das 'od ma'i tshal na bzhugs pa can du de ma thag phyin te zhabs la phyag btsal bas 'khangs nas thang chad de dri ba ma spobs
so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyed ci nyes/ dri ba yod na dbugs phyung la dris shig ces gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das
lags/ bdag cag ni/ shin tu ma dga' ste/ nyid la khong yus che nas 'khams pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ ci las gyur/ smras pa/ bdag
cag gnyis ni bas mtha' zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas gsungs pa so sor rtog pa yid la byed pa las rgyang ring por 'chag tu phyin pa las yi dwags
mo lus po sngo la skam pa/ khog khog zer ba/ skra 'dzings pa/ mig dmar la g.yon du yo ba/ ma mchu ring la g.yas su yo ba/ ske dang rkang lag shin
tu phra la ring ba/ lag pas khu tshur bsdams pa'i sen mos thad kar phug nas sngo bzang nge ba/ kha nas sgra rnam pa lnga sgrog pa 'di lta ste/ dgos na zhes bya
ba dang / med na zhes bya ba dang / ma sbyin cig ces bya ba dang / ster na yang che ches par 'ong ngo zhes bya ba dang / de tsam je ches kyis phri la byin ces bya ba
dang lnga brjod pa/ skyi zing byed pa zhig dang phrad nas bdag cag gnyis kyis bsam pas dgon pa bas grong yul thag nye la zas mod pas grong khyer du phyin te bslangs
pas dkar gsum dang / mngar gsum dang 'bras dang / nas kyi zan la sogs pa bza' ba dang btung ba mang du rnyed nas yi dwags mo de'i drung du khyer nas bstabs
bas kha nas gong gi sgra rnam pa lnga brjod cing gang byin pa mi len par bros te thal na/ 'di ci las gyur pa dang / 'di la sman pa'i thabs ci mchis zhu ru mchis pa
