lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /de ni/ shin tu legs so/ /ngas bshad kyi/ legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig /de ci las gyur na/
lus sro la skam pa ni/ rang gis za ma phod pa las gyur pa'o/ /ske phra ba ni/ gzhan za zhing spyod pa la bdag gis ser sna byas pa las gyur to/ /yan lag phra la
sor mos thad kar phug pa ni/ gzhan la sbyin pa dag la ches kyis phri la byin ces byas pa dang / rang gis kyang spyod mi phod pa las gyur to/ /skra 'dzings pa ni/
kun gyi yid du mi 'ong ba byas pa las gyur to/ /mig dmar ba ni/ 'dod chags kyis yongs su rgyas pa las gyur to/ /g.yon du yo ba ni/ mig mi legs par
gzhan la bltas pa las gyur to/ /ma mchu ring la g.yas su yo ba ni/ ster na yang ches bar 'ong ngo zhes byas pa las gyur to/ /kha
nas sgra rnam pa lnga sgrog pa ni/ byed pa rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ste/ sngon brjod pa'i bag chags brtas pa las gyur to/ /de lta bu'i las kyi dbang gis gzhan
ci byin yang phan par mi 'gyur te/ chu gcig pu las rang gis sbyin nus pa ma yin te/ gzhan gyi chu la 'jur 'gegs ma byas pas da lta yang chu gtsang ma
rtsam pas ma reg pa la sngags lan gcig btab ste se gol lan gcig gtogs te byin na/ de'i rgyud grol zhing 'dod pa tshim par 'gyur ro/ /de 'di lta ste/
oM dz+wa la mi daM sarba pre ta b+h+yaHswA hA/ gsol ba/ de'i 'bru don bshad du gsol/ bka' stsal pa/ oM ni/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin te/ don dam pa'o/ /
dz+wa la ni/ 'dod pa me ltar 'bar ba'o/ /mi daM ni/ mi'i rgyud kyis ser sna dang / 'jur 'gegs byas pa'o/ /sarba ni/ de lta bu'i las las gyur pa thams
cad do/ /pre ta ni/ yi dwags kyi snying po ste/ las kyi rgyud smin pa'i don to/ /b+h+yaHni/ las dang / sdug bsngal byang bar bya ba'i don to/ /swAhA ni/ las dang
sdug bsngal bkres skom byang bar gyur cig pa'o/ /da myur du song la de ltar gsos shig ces gsungs pas/ de nas gnyis kyis myur du phyin nas de bzhin du bgyis
pas gzod dga' nas longs spyod cing lus bag glan no/ /de nas chos ston la bab nas gnyis po res mos byas te shA ri'i bus bshos gsol nas gcig gsol
du stsal te chab byin pas yang gong bzhin brjod de bros so/ /yang gnyis kyis yid ma ches nas bcom ldan 'das la zhur mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das
lags/ bdag cag gis gsungs pa bzhin bgyis lags pas/ gso ru btub pa gda' ba la chos ston yol du dogs nas 'tshal nas yang sngar brjod
cing bros nas yang zhu ru mchis so/ /bka' stsal pa/ de ni/ khyod kyi sen bar du rtsam pa lus pas lan pa yin gyi/ lag pa khrus la gzod byin cig /de'i
drung du 'gro mi dgos te/ 'di nyid kyis btub bo/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de gnyis kyis khrus bgyis te chu sbyin stsal bas yi dwags mo de nyid du 'ongs nas cung
zad na mdangs dang ldan par gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta bu'i chu sbyin 'di ni/ 'dir ma zad de/ dus thams cad
du yang yi dam du gyis la thong zhig /gzhan la yang rgya cher spel cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di'i phan yon ni/ dpag tu med
de tshad las 'das so/ /mdo tsam brjod na 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi phyug po rnams la sbyin pa byas pa bas dbul po 'ga' zhig la sbyin pa
byas na/ de'i bsod nams brgya'i char yang mi nye ste/ de ci ste zhe na/ phyug po rnams ni/ nga rgyal te dregs pa dang rgyags pas gnas ngan len spro bar byed
do/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbul po rnams la sbyin pa byas pa bas yi dwags 'ga' zhig la sbyin pa byas na/ de'i bsod nams brgya'i char yang mi
nye'o/ /de ci ste zhe na/ dbul po rnams la ni/ 'bad du yod/ btsal du yod de/ bslang du yod do/ /yi dwags las kyis de lta bu dag ma yin gyi/ ma
bsngos na kha ru chud kyang dug chen por 'gyur ro/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yi dwags la sbyin pa byas pa bas 'jur 'gegs yi dwags gcig la chub byin
na/ de'i bsod nams brgya'i char yang mi nye'o/ /de ci ste zhe na/ yi dwags de dag la ni/ dmigs pas tshim pa dang / bshams pas tshim pa dang /
bsngos pas tshim pa dang / reg pas tshim pa dang / rjes kyis tshim pa dang / bshal bas tshim pa yod de/ las kyi rim pa bzhin no/ /'jur 'gegs ni/ gzhan
dka' ba'i las kyis sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / dmigs pa gzhan gyis mi thob/ /rdzas thams cad la 'thams te bkag pas rdzas gzhan mi myong / gzhan
gyi chu gcig pu ma bkag pas/ chu gtsang rtsam pas ma reg pa las dbang med/ rang gi rgyud zhi bar byed pa'i sngags dang / phyag rgya se gol gcig min pa gzhan
gang gis kyang thob par mi nus so/ /se gol gcig tu bzhag pa ce zhe na/ gnyis su gyur na gzhan gyi sgrar gyur nas mi thob/ des na rang gi go ba bskyed pa sgra gcig
tu nges pa'o/ /'dis ni/ bar chad kyis mi tshugs pa dang / nad nyung ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / longs spyod dang ldan pa dang / yi ga 'chus pa rnams 'byed par byed pa
dang / mdangs nyams pa rnams gsal bar byed pa dang / 'di gzhan la spel nas rgyud grol nas yi dwags kyi rgyud chad de mthar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /
de skad ces bka' stsal nas rigs kyi bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'jur 'gegs zhes bya ba'i gzungs
rdzogs so// //zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya a
pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang
chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med
zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ steng
gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan dpag tu med pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa shin tu rnam par nges pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ tshe 'dzin cing tshe mthar phyin
par bzhes te/ sems can rnams la chos kyang ston to/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyon cig /'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i mi rnams ni/ tshe thung ba las tshe lo brgya
thub pa sha stag ste/ de dag las kyang phal cher dus ma yin par 'chi bar bstan to/ /'jam dpal/ sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med
pa de'i yon tan dang bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug gam/ ming tsam yang nyan
tam/ klog pa nas glegs bam la bris te khyim na 'chang bar byed dam/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur ba de
dag gi tshe yongs su zad pa las tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ sems can gang dag tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa shin tu rnam par nges pa
gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad thos par gyur pa de dag gi tshe yang 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag tshe zad kar mtshan 'chang bar
'gyur ba de dag gi tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ de lta bas na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo tshe ring bar 'dod pa de dag de bzhin
gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa de'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad nyan tam/ yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug na de dag gi yon tan
dang / legs par 'gyur ba ni/ 'di dag go /oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi tA A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/

tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+ha ba bi
shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swAhA/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad po 'di dag gang la la zhig yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger
'brir 'jug gam/ glegs bam la bris te khyim na 'chang ngam/ klog par gyur pa de'i tshe zad pa las tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur te/ 'di nas shi 'phos
nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan dpag tu med pa la sogs par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /
oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi tA a yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a

ba ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro ba tsi te/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+ha ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swAhA/ yang de'i tshe
sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus dgongs pa gcig dang / dbyangs gcig gis tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri

mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga ta ya ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro
pa tsi te/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga gnas mud ga te swa b+ha ba bi shud+d+ha ma hA na ya pa ri wa re swAhA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis
dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta a yur+dz+nyA na su bi

ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu

yongs su gang ba'i thigs pa re re nas bgrang bar nus kyi/ tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni/ bgrang bar mi nus so/ /
oM na mo b+ha ba ga te/ a pa ri mi ta a yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta re dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa

ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang
zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug gam/ bsti stang du byas te mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba des phyogs bcu'i sangs
rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa yin no/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na
su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro
pa tsi te/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ sbyin pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag
'phags/ /mi yi seng+ge sbyin pa'i stobs rtogs te/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /sbyin pa'i stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur/ /tshul khrims stobs
kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng+ge tshul khrims stobs rtogs te/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /tshul khrims stobs kyi sgra ni grags
par 'gyur/ /bzod pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng+ge bzod pa'i stobs rtogs te/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /bzod pa'i
stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur/ /brtson 'grus stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng+ge brtson 'grus
stobs rtogs te/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /brtson 'grus stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur/ /bsam gtan stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang
dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng+ge bsam gtan stobs rtogs te/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /bsam gtan stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur/ /shes
rab stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng+ge shes rab stobs rtogs te/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /shes rab stobs kyi sgra ni grags
par 'gyur/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye
ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na su b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya
pa ri wA re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags
pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya a pa ri mi ta a yur dz+nyA na nA ma ma hA
ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi
kun dga' ra ba na dge slong brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dag
dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ steng gi phyogs na
'jig rten gyi khams yon tan dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dang
ye shes dpag tu med pa shin tu rnam par nges pa gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /tshe 'dzin cing tshe mthar phyin
par bzhed de/ sems can rnams la chos kyang ston to/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyon cig /'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i mi rnams ni/ tshe thung ba tshe
lo brgya thub pa sha stag ste/ de dag las kyang phal cher ni/ dus ma yin par 'chi bar bstan te/ 'jam dpal/ sems can gang dag de bzhin
gshegs pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa de'i yon tan dang bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi
ger 'brir 'jug gam/ ming tsam nyan tam/ klog pa nas glegs bam la bris te khyim na 'chang gi bar du byed dam/ me tog dang / spos dang / phreng
ba dang / phye ma rnams kyis mchod par gyur pa de dag gi tshe yongs su zad pa las tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ sems can gang dag
tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa shin tu rnam par gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad thos pa de dag tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /sems
can gang dag tshe yongs su zad kar mtshan 'chang bar gyur pa de dag gi tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ 'jam dpal/ de lta bas na/ rigs kyi bu
dang / rigs kyi bu mo tshe ring por 'dod pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa de'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad nyan tam/ yi ger 'bri'am/ yi
ger 'brir 'jug na/ de dag gi yon tan dang legs par gyur pa ni/ 'di dag go /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/
ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te s+yak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ 'jam dpal
de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad po 'di dag gang la la zhig gis yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug gam/ glegs bam la bris te khyim
na 'chang ngam/ klog par gyur na/ tshe zad pa las tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/ /de shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i
sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can yon tan dpag tu med pa la sogs par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na
su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud
ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ yang de'i tes sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus dgongs pa gcig dang / dbyangs gcig gis tshe
dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te

samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swA b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag
brgyad cu rtsa bzhis dgongs pa gcig dang / dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta

A yur+dz+nyA su bi nish+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te sA b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA
na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis dgongs pa gcig dang / dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med

d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te/ swA b+hA ba bi shud+d+hA ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang / dbyangs gcig gis

ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga nas mud ga te swa b+ha ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa lngas dgongs pa

yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis dgongs pa gcig dang / dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di

gsungs so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM dud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma
te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+ha ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug

ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang zhig
tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug na/ de sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i
'jig rten du yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ nam du yang mi khom par skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang dang gang du skye ba'i skye ba thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri

mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ om sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+ha ba bi shud+d+he ma hA
na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang la la zhig gi tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug na/ des chos kyi phung
po brgyad khri bzhi stong 'brir bcug par 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta a yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya

'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug na/ des chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong byed du bcug pa dang / rab tu gnas par byas pa yin no/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi

ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug na/ de'i mtshams med pa lnga yongs su 'byang bar

'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te
ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug na/ de'i sdig

pa'i phung po ri rab tsam yang yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/

tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+ha ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger
'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug na/ de la bdud dang bdud kyi rigs kyi lha dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin pos glags btsal kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba

te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he
ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug na/ de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag
drug cu rtsa dgus mngon sum du lung ston par mdzad de/ sangs rgyas stong gis de la phyag rkyong par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar mdzad par
'gyur te/ 'di la the tshom dang / som nyi dang / yid gnyis ma byed cing /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta

thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang dag tshe dang ye shes
dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug na/ rgyal po chen po bzhis de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang zhing / srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par 'gyur

ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa
gud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swAhA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug na/ de bzhin
gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /oM na bo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo

rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ sa phyogs
gang du mdo sde 'di 'bri ba'i sa phyogs de yang mchod rten du 'gyur te/ phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i bya dang / ri dwags gang dag gi rna lam
du grags par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta

A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya ba
ri wA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug na/ de bud med kyi dngos por nam du yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro//

oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud
ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phyir kaR+Sha pa Ni gcig sbyin pa byin na/ des stong
gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin par 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su
bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga sa mud ga te swA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA
na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la/ mchod par byed pa/ de dag gis dam pa'i chos thams cad khong du chud par 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/

a pa ri mi ta a yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta tha ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ om sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba
bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / log par dad
sel dang / gser thub dang / 'od srung dang / shAkya thub pa la rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni/ bgrang bar nus kyi/ tshe dang
ye shes dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni/ bgrang bar mi nus so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/

ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab
dang mnyam pa'i rin po che'i phung por byas te sbyin pa byin pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni/ bgrang bar nus kyi/ tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung

po'i tshad ni/ bgrang bar mi nus so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra

pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi chus yongs su gang ba'i thigs pa re re nas bgrangs
bar nus kyi/ tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni/ bgrang bar mi nus so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA

ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swAhA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye
shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug gam/ gus par byas te mchod par byed pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa yin no/ /oM na mo b+ha ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA
ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samya k+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re
swA hA/ sbyin pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng+ge sbyin pa'i stobs rtogs nas/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /sbyin pa'i stobs kyi sgra
ni grags par 'gyur/ /tshul khrims stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng+ge tshul khrims stobs rtogs te/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug
pa na/ /tshul khrims stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur/ /bzod pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng+ge bzod pa'i stobs rtogs te/ /snying rje
can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /bzod pa'i stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur/ /brtson 'grus stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng+ge brtson 'grus
stobs rtogs te/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /brtson 'grus stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur/ /bsam gtan stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /
mi yi seng+ge bsam gtan stobs rtogs te/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /bsam gtan stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur/ /shes rab stobs kyis sangs
rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng+ge shes rab stobs rtogs te/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /shes rab stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa

ri mi ta A yur+dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shu d+d+he ma hA na ya pa
ri wA re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyi de skad ces bka' stsal nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang /
dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i gzungs rdzogs
so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya a pa ri mi ta a yur+dz+nyA na hri da ya nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs
sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gang+gA tas bskor ba'i rdzing bu'i 'gram
na dge slong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams
la bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'di nas
nub kyi phyogs rol na/ /bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams/ /de na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med/ /su zhig de yi mtshan brjod na/ /de ni de ru
skye bar 'gyur/ /'chi ba'i dus su ston pa ni/ /dge slong dge 'dun bcas te mthong / /de na bud med yod pa min/ /mngal na gnas pa yod ma yin/ /rin chen rnams kyi pad+mo las//
rdzu 'phrul chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zas dang gos dang sman rnams dang / /chos gos mal cha lhung bzed rnams/ /sems kyis bsam ma thag tu ni/ /de dag mod la 'byung bar
'gyur/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /bde ba can gyi bsngags pa brjod/ /de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab/ /'phags
pa'i dge 'dun bsam mi khyab/ /bsam mi khyab la dad byas na/ /rnam par smin pa'ang bsam mi khyab/ /rnam dag zhing du skye bar 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi pho brang 'khor dang bcas pa zhes bya ba/ rgyar dpag tshad khri bzhi yod pa zhig
yod de/ rgyal rigs su skyes so/ /dge slong dag /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi yab ni/ 'khor
los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bzang po'i mchog ces bya bar gyur to/ /de'i yum ni/ gzi brjid can zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de'i btsun mo ni/ rgyal rigs bzang skyong
ma zhes bya bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sras ni/ zla ba'i 'od ces bya bar gyur to/ /rim gro pa ni/ snyan pa dri ma med
ces bya bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi shes rab can gyi mchog tu gyur pa ni/ bzang po'i tog ces bya bar gyur to/ /rdzu
'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog dang / brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa'i mchog ni/ bkod pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /dge slong dag /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe
dpag med kyi bdud ni/ mchod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar gyur to/ /lhas sbyin gyi ming ni/ dang ba zhes bya bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe
dpag med kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po ni/ nyan thos chen po drug khri yod do/ /dge slong dag /sems can thams cad kyis legs par bsams te de bzhin gshegs
pa tshe dpag med kyi mtshan legs par bzung la zhag bcur sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la ma yengs par bsgom zhing 'jig rten
gyi khams bde ba can na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med rgyun du yid la bya'o/ /dpal 'chi med rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di
yang rtag tu bzlas brjod bya'o/ /nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum yang lag phyag byas la sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag
med bsams na/ zhag bcu 'das pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du yongs su bsngos na/ de 'chi ba'i dus
kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /
dge slong dag /'chi med rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs de gang zhe na/ tad+ya thA/ shA ba le/ a ba le/ sa ma dza le/ ni rde she/ ni rdzA te/ ni
ruk+te/ nirmu khe/ dz+wa la pa ra ts+tshe da ni/ su kha ba ti ni rde she /a mr-i te/ A yurga r+b+ha ni r+hA ni/ a mr-i te/ A yur+b+ra sA d+ha ni/ nirbu d+hi A kA sha ni rdza te/ A kA
sha ni rde she/ /A kA sha ni rku sha la/ A kA sha ni rdaR+sha ne/ A kA sha a d+hiSh+ThA ne/ su kha ba ti a d+hi Sh+ThA ne/ rU pa ni rde she/ tsa twA ri d+harma pra sa d+ha ne/ tsa twA

ri AR+ya sa t+ya pra sA d+ha ne/ tsa twA ri marga b+ha ba na pra sA d+ha na/ ba la pIR+ya pra sA d+ha ni/ d+har+m+ma ts+tshe da na/ ku sha le/ ku sha la ni rde she/ ku sha la pra tiSh+ThA ne/ bud+d+ha
ku la le/ bi shud+d+ha pra b+hA sa/ d+har+m+ma ka ra Ne/ ni rdzA te/ ni rbud+d+he/ bi ma le/ bi ra dze/ rA dzA sa na/ ra sA gre/ ra sA gra ba le/ ra sA gra/ a
d+hiSh+ThA te/ ku le pra te ku le/ bi ku le/ dan+te su dan+ta tsit+te/ su pra shA na tsit+te/ su le su mu khI/ d+har+m+me tsa d+ha rme ba le tsa ba le/ a nu sha a ba le/
bud+d+ha A kA sha gu Ne bud+d+hA/ A kA sha ni rgu Ne/ a mr-i ta du du b+hi swa ra swA hA/ dge slong dag /dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la 'chi med
rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di skad bstan pa de bzhin du kha ton byed pa des gos gtsang ma bgos te sa phyogs gtsang zhing dri ma med par de bzhin gshegs
pa tshe dpag med la me tog dang / spos kyis mchod par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi snying po pad+ma'i gnas dang / byang chub kyi shing phun sum tshogs pa yang yid la
bya'o/ /de la yang 'dod pa bskyed par byas te 'dod pa dang / dad pa byas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dge
slong dag /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi shing gi rgyal po ni rin po che'i pad+ma rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba shing de me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /pad+ma'i
gad na ni dag cing gsal la bzang zhing bkra ba'i 'od zer can zhes bya ba ste/ rin po che du mas bskor ba la de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med bzhugs so/ /g.yas na ni byang
chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go /g.yon na ni byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pas bskor
to/ /dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la mos pa dang / dad pa dang / gus pa mang ba de der skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la
rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma chen po dag la brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dang /dge slong pha'am/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen pha'am/ dge bsnyen ma gang la
la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i mtshan yang dag par 'dzin pa de la me'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / /chu'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / /dug gi 'jigs pa mi
'byung / /mtshon cha'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / /gnod sbyin gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / /srin po'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / /sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni gang la yang ma gtogs
so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas
pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //
rgya gar gyi mkhan po puN+ya saM b+ha wa dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis bsgyur ba'o// //oM badzra A yu she hUM a/ 'phags pa tshe dpag med
kyi snying po 'di rtag tu bzlas sam/ sngags chab kyis dbang bskur na tshe nur bar 'gyur ro/ /oM puN+ye puN+ye ma hA puN+ye/ a pa ri mi ta A yur puN+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te swA hA// //
rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra pad+ma dz+wa la mU la tan+t+ra rA dza na ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba
zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /
'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das hi ma la ya'i tshal chen po tsan+dan sdong po dang myu gu rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs chen po dang thabs cig
tu bzhugs te/ 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun 'gyed gzhon nu
dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mau gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
chen po stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'di lta ste/ pad+ma dkar po dang / nyi 'od dang / gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / pad+ma'i stan dang / ye shes
dbang phyug dang / pad+ma'i dbang phyug dang / rdo rje'i snying po dang / rin chen snying po dang / kun tu bzang po dang / sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / byams pa
dang / 'jam dpal dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / blo gros mi zad pa dang / nam mkha'i mdzod dang / blo gros rgya mtsho dang / mthu chen po thob pa dang / zla
'od dang dra ba can gyi 'od dang / spobs pa brtsegs dang / mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad sel ba'i blo gros la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med pa
dang / gzhan yang gtsor byams pa la gnas pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma mang po dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma mang po dang / lha'i tshogs dang / klu'i tshogs dang / de
bzhin du gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum dang / sha za dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa bye ba
phrag drug dang / khro bo chen po rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang / rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / rdo rje mgrin dang / rdo rje bgegs mthar byed dang / rdo rje gtsug
tor dang / rdo rje gnod mdzes rgyal po la sogs pa bdun cu dang / spyan ma dang / mA ma kI dang / na bza' dkar mo dang / sgrol ma dang / 'od zer can dang / dbyangs can ma dang
phag zhal ma dang / khro gnyer can dang / ri khrod ma dang / dug sel ma dang / nor rgyun ma dang / dkar mo dang / yid bzang ma dang / rnam par rgyal ma dang / dpal phreng mo dang /
sa 'dzin bzang mo dang / rdo rje dbang phyug ma la sogs pa stong phrag drug brgya dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe 'khor de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la bla ma
dang / bkur sti dang / rim gror bya ba'i phyir mchod pa du mas mchod cing bsngags pa du mas bstod par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen
po thugs rje chen po yongs su 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing ltas bco
brgyad du gyur to/ /de'i ltas de mthong nas lang+ka'i rgyal po sgra sgrog shin tu snyems pa dang ldan nas rang gi 'khor du ma dang lhan cig der lhags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgra
sgrog gi sems kyi rtog pa thugs su chud nas sku'i gnas thams cad nas 'od zer bye ba phrag du ma byung ngo / /'od zer de dang sa g.yos pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
kyi zhing thams cad kyang gsal bar gyur te/ de'i tshe sgra sgrog snyems pa dang bcas pas de'i 'khor thams cad kyis 'dzam bu'i gling du yams nad la sogs pas rnam par
'tshe ba de thugs kyis yongs su dgongs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gdong bcu gcig pa drang srong
rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag brgya stong dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags nas zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas phyogs
gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i tshogs rnams kyi nang nas lha'i bu rin po che pad+ma'i dra bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba bzhengs te thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye ma mgon po thugs rje can/ /rig sngags 'chang ba'i tshogs dang bcas/ /che ba'i byin brlabs ldan
pa rnams/ /sgra sgrog snyems pa gzhom pa dang / /nyon mongs rtsad nas gdon pa dang / /sems can rnams la phan pa dang / bdag la shin tu sman pa'i phyir/ /sku dang rjes su mthun pa yi/ /
rig sngags sbyor ba khyad par can/ /snying po dam pa bshad du gsol/ /de tshe 'khor tshogs thams cad kyis/ /mkha' phyogs me tog char gyis bkang / /bcom ldan thub pa'i dbu la ni/ /
rin chen me tog gdugs su gyur/ /lha rnams gtsang mar sbyar ba yi/ /yon chab bdug spos dri dang bshos/ /ci 'byor dang ba'i stobs kyis phul/ /thub pas nam mkha'i mdzod pa
brlabs/ /lha mo bu mo du ma yis/ /rol mo sil snyan 'phan gdugs dang / /bla re rgyal mtshan lhab lhub dang / /lda ldi na bza' du mas mchod/ /de nas mgon po spyan ras gzigs/ /
pad+ma gzhon nu'i zhal mnga' bas/ /bzhengs 'dzum thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /ston pa la ni 'di skad gsol/ /sgra sgrog bzhin gyis snyems pa dang / /mda' dang rtsal gyis dregs pa ste/ /
'di ni legs brtsams las byung yin/ /shin tu log pas las kyang min/ /sngon du sangs rgyas gdong mdzes mi/ /bstan pa la yang mgo btang ba'i/ /bsod
nams grangs kyis byung ba yin/ /lag pa du mar 'khrul pa ni/ /zas dang snod spyad gos nor rgyan/ /bskal pa bzhi bcu'i mchod sbyin te/ /de nas brtsal dang shugs kyang yin/ /mda' ni
b+h+ring gi ri ti yi/ /byin rlabs sngon du byed mod kyang / /grangs mang tshul khrims bral bas ni/ /srin po'i rigs su 'khrungs pa dang / /'khor bcas gzhan la gnod 'gyur yin/ /ngas
ni ngang tshul rmad byung ba'i/ /lus kyi bde gshegs sbyin pa dang / /sgrub brjod legs byas mtha' yas pa/ /spyod bzang la gnas bsgral ba'i grangs/ /gang+gA'i klung gi rdul dang
mtshungs/ /de skad 'bras bu de brtsams te/ /dang po'i las can ji snyed la/ /phan gdags gzhan ni bya ba'i phyir/ /cung zad bsdus nas brjod bya ste/ legs par nyon la yid
la zungs/ /sngon tshe 'das dus bskal pa ni/ /gang+gA'i klung bcu'i snga rol gyi/ /cher 'das pa yi snga rol na/ /bde gshegs rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mtshan/ /man+dA ra yi dri zhes
bya/ /'jig rten ston pa byung ba'i tshe/ /bdag ni khyim bdag drag por gyur/ /thub pa de la rig sngags mnos/ /thob ma thag tu bskal pa'i grangs/ /bzhi khri snyed kyi 'khor ba bsnyil/ /de rjes
bskal pa gang+gA'i klung / /bye ba snyed cig snga rol na/ /bde gshegs rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mtshan/ /thogs med pad+ma brgya yi spyan/ /gtsug tor yon tan rab
rgyas pa'i/ /'od zer rgyal po zhes bya ba/ /'jig rten ston pa bzhugs pa'i tshe/ /bdag nyid drang srong bdag por gyur/ /rig sngags 'di mnos sgrub pa yis/ /
phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhal mthong zhing / /skye med chos la bzod pa thob/ /de rjes 'das dus bskal pa ni/ /bye ba phrag brgya'i snga rol na/ /bde gshegs
rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mtshan/ /tshe dpag med ces 'jig rten du/ /ston pa byung ba bdag gis mnos/ /de tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /bdag la dbang
bskur lung bstan mdzad/ /khyod kyis sngon du bskal pa'i grangs/ /brjod mi lang nas rig sngags phyir/ /yang dag stong phrag stong snyed kyang / /dang po'i
mchod sbyin chen po byas/ /bye ba phrag grangs bcu gcig tu/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dbang bskur blangs/ /de dang de yi rnam smin mchog /sangs rgyas
zhing khams rab 'byams su/ /yang dang yang du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /phyis ni 'dren pa shAkya zhes/ /mi mjed 'jig rten khams 'khrungs tshe/ /mi yul las
kyang khyad par du/ /yi dags gling du skyes pa 'ga'/ /gtan la 'dud 'phel bya ba'i phyir/ /mtshan mo mun nag
sprin rum du/ /skad cig glog 'gyur ci lta bar/ /rig sngags 'chang pa gdong bcu gcig /yan lag stong dang ldan pa la/ /spyan ni tshig stong sum cu pa'i/ /
mtshan dang ldan pa'i sku 'byung 'gyur/ /de tshe skal ldan la la zhig /mtshan nas brjod cing sku la mos/ /rig sngags zlos pa po gang zhig /'jig rten 'dod pa kun
grub cing / /phyi nas ye shes nyis 'gyur ro/ /lung bstan de skad thos pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gcag /grangs snyed zhal nas gsungs pa yi/ /
rig sngags snying po gdong bcu gcig /mthu chen thogs pa med pa ste/ /'gro la sman cing bde ba dang / /nad kun sel byed sdig kun sbyong / /bkra
shis med pa kun zlog cing / /rmi lam mtshan ma ngan kun sel/ /dus min 'chi dang ngan sems zlog/ rtag tu dpal dang sems bde thob/ /mya ngan sdug bsngal
ngal ba sel/ /rtsod 'khrug thams cad zhi ba dang / /bdud dang gdon bgegs zhi bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten smon pa kun grub cing / /bdud dang
bar chad mtshon cha'i nad/ /dbyig pa brdeg dang bcing ba dang / /btson rar bcug dang mtshon chas brtsal/ /gsod sar khrid dang yan lag bcad/ /mig 'bru
mtshon gyis btsab pa dang / /chu dang me dang rlung sa g.yos/ /dug dang byad stems ro langs dang / /chom rkun mi ma yin rnams gnon/ /rig sngags 'di
yis bsrungs pa dang / /len dang 'dzin dang dri ba dang / /klog dang kha ton bshad sogs rnams/ /brtson la 'jig rten lhar bcas dang / /bdud dang tshangs
pa dge sbyong dang / /bram zer bcas pas gnod pa med/ /sngon gyi las drag yod pa yang / /byang zhing bsrabs te med par 'gyur/ /nges pa'i dngos po 'di lags
pas/ /rig nas mngon sum yid ches par/ /rnam par rtog med sems kyis blangs/ /de slad skyabs dang skyob pa dang / /srung dang dbugs 'byin dpal
mgon dang / /gling dang khang khyim 'di nyid yin/ /nye ring sa phyogs ji srid par/ /mtshams bcad nas ni rig sngags dang / /'byung po rnams kyis 'tshe ba
med/ /gang gis sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal mchod/ /skyabs su 'gro zhing sdig pa bshags/ /mngon par dga' zhing gzungs sngags 'di/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig
brjod pa la/ /phyogs bcu sangs rgyas ma lus pa/ /mtshungs par yi rang legs par sbyin/ /rtsa ba bzhi dang mtshams med lnga/ /
ma lus sdig kun byang bar 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin srin po sogs snang yang / /bzung nas byams pa'i snying rje'i sems/ /dang po bskyed nas bla med kyi/ /byang
chub sems mchogs la 'god/ /gang+gA'i klung brgya'i sangs rgyas kyi/ /mtshan nas brjod cing bstod pa bas/ /rigs kyi bu 'am bu mo gang / /bdag gi ming
brjod dran byed cing / /rig sngags rgyun du brjod na de/ /myur du mchog dga'i sa 'thob cing / /lag pa'i mthil nas mthong ba ltar/ /bla med byang chub
myur du 'byung / /rtse gcig dran pas gus byas te/ /rtag tu nang par sngar langs nas/ /chos bzhin du ni dge dgyes te/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du gang brjod
pa/ /tshe 'dir phan yon bcu thob 'gyur/ /rtag par lus la nad med dang / /lha dang sangs rgyas kun gyis srung / /nor 'bru rin chen gos rnyed dang / /dgra
sdang dul zhing 'jigs med dang / /bza' rnams bkur cing rigs btsun 'thob/ /dug dang 'dre gshen gdon bral dang / /lus la dri zhim kun dga'
dang / /bsam ngan mi snyan rjod byed dang / /rims nad bral zhing dgang sla dang / /dus min 'chi ba sangs par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang yon tan bzhi thob ste/ /'chi
khar sangs rgyas zhal mthong dang / /mkha' la 'od 'byung lhas mchod dang / /nam yang ngan 'gror mi 'gro zhing / /bde ba can nam bde 'gror skye/ /rig sngags
'di dang sangs rgyas kyi/ /ye shes snying po 'dzin pa la/ /byang chub sems dang sangs rgyas kyi/ /rnam par thar pa'i chos sgo 'thob/ /bskal pa du mar dge bsags
dang / /rig sngags 'di snyed 'gyur pa ste/ /dad ldan yul yod ngo tsha shes/ /blo bzang brtson ldan snying rje che/ /mdog dkar ngang bzang gsong por smra/ /sems
mjam lus ngag dal bar spyod/ /bla ma la gus brtul zhugs che/ /sred pa chung zhing sbyin la dga'/ /sangs rgyas gus shing sems bcas las/ /nyin mtshan rgyun
du rig sngags 'don/ /bcu bzhi 'am ni bco lnga dang / /khyad par du ni tshes brgyad la/ /gso spyong sku yi mdun du blang / /skyon med tsan+dan dkar sogs shing /
rig bzang las byas sku gzugs sam/ /yang na sa rdo rin chen sogs/ /bzang las bde bar gshegs gzugs bya/ /yang na ris su bris kyang rung / /sku
gcig po'am lha tshogs kyi/ /dkyil 'khor rgyas par byas pa la/ /mngon sum bzhin du dmigs byas na/ /myur du mngon
sum mthong bar 'gyur/ /yon tan kun gyis brgyan pa yi/ /bum pa chu dang bcas pa la/ /sngags brjod pas ni 'dod don kun/ /'grub 'gyur the tshom
mi bya'o/ /nad dang 'phrod pa'i sman rnams la/ /sngags bzlas bza' 'am byugs pas sam/ /bdug pa tsam yang gnod pa sel/ /sras bu'am ni gos
dag dang / /phyag rgyas gdag kyang de bzhin no/ /'dod pa gang dang gang la yang / /me yi las kyi sbyor ba bya/ /gsang sngags 'dren 'dzin yid byed la/ /
bdag kyang rjes su 'jug par bya/ /de skad gsungs pa'i de ma thag /byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dbyangs kyis/ /sngags kyi ngo bo nyid la ni/ /ched du brjod
pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma rang bzhin med pa'i chos/ /sna tshogs gzugs su snang ba la/ /brjod rtog bral ba'i skad cig ni/ /zhi ba'i che ba nyid yin no/ /srid
pa dngos po med pa la/ /dmigs par byed pa sgom pa'o/ /dmigs pa mthar thug med mthong ba/ /de ni sgom pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /kun tu bzang po'i gsang
sngags kyi/ /don la ched du 'di ltar brjod/ /e ma sku gsum tha dad par/ /lus ngag yid kyi don las byung / /don gcig pa yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /sku
gcig tu ni nges par gzung / /gang la gang phan bskyed pa la/ /'ja' tshon bzhin du snang mod kyang / /tshig gis brjod pa'i sprul tsam ste/ /ye shes sku la
dbye ba med/ /sgrib pa rnams sel las la ni/ /ched du brjod pa 'di ltar brjod/ /e ma dngos po'i ngo bo nyid/ /ma byung ma skyes ma 'gags pa/ /skye 'gag lta/
bu'i cho 'phrul ni/ /sku des phyag rgya sngags su snang / /yon tan chu yi rlabs bzhin du/ /skye ba'i ngo la gsal bar byed/ /nan tan gyis ni de nyid kyang / /rgyu ba med
par khong du chud/ /byang chub sems dpa' sa snying gis/ /rgyu la ched du 'di brjod do/ /e ma rang bzhin rnam dag la/ /thog med blo yi mun pa'i dbyings/ /rnam rtog
bag chags kyis dkrugs nas/ /glo bur dkar nag las su snang / /dkar po sangs rgyas chos dge 'dun/ /de la sgro btags byang chub sems/ /de las byung
ba'i 'phrin las kyis/ /nyon mongs las kyi sgrib sbyong byed/ /mgon po byams pas sngags sgrub kyi/ /lam la ched du 'di ltar brjod/ /e ma gdod nas gro
zhi'i sems/ /chu ltar dang bar snang mod kyang / /sna tshogs 'gro ba'i gzungs byung bas/ /mun pa thibs pos rnam par bsgyur/ /de
nyid sems kyi snang ba'i phyir/ /'bad rtsol med pa'i sems kyis grol/ /rtsol ba sems kyi dri mas ni/ /dri ma med pa'i sems 'ching 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i
snying pos sngags ming la/ /ched du 'di ltar brjod par mdzad/ /e ma stong pa mtshan ma bral/ /kha dog dbyibs bral chos nyid dag /dga' ba'i sems
chen gsal byed pa/ /shes rab chen po'i yi ge min/ /mtshan dpe ye shes bde ldan sku/ /gang gang don du de snang ba/ /snying rje chen po'i ring shugs kyis/ /
'byung 'gyur yi ge ta yi don/ /byang chub sems dpa' pad+mos ni/ /gnas la ched du 'di ltar brjod/ /e ma rgyu rkyen nam mkha' la/ /nyi zla skar rgyun 'khor ba
yis/ /gsal nas nyin mtshan bye phrag brjod/ /nyon mongs ma rig sred len gyis/ /'du byed srid pa'i las bskul te/ /rnam shes ming gzugs skye
mched drug /reg tshor skye rga shi sdug bsngal/ /gsal byed dag pa nyid kyis dag /phyag na rdo rjes 'bras don la/ /ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e
ma zab cing rgya che ba/ /sngags mthu bla na med pa ni/ /sangs rgyas mu stegs kyis mi shes/ /shes pa nyid kyang rdzas med la/ /shes bya rdzas su ga la yod/ /shes pa
yul gyi rnam par ni/ /rtog pa'i gzung 'dzin gyis bsgos pa/ /de zad nas ni grol bar 'gyur/ /de nas rig pa'i lha mo'i tshogs/ /spos dang me tog 'thor byed
cing / /snyan pa'i sngags kyi glu yis ni/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la bstod/ /oM/ bcom ldan mgon po thugs rje spyan ras gzigs/ /zhal grangs
mdog dbyibs du ma cir yang snang / /stong dang brgya dang bcu gcig drug dang gcig /byams pa'i zhal bzang mda' ba'i mgon la 'dud/ /spyan
ma'i'o/ /oM rab dgyes zhal mdog du ma cir yang 'gyur/ /la la byams pa snying rje dga' ba'i zhal/ /la la 'dod rmongs ser sna chen po'i zhal/ /khro sdang
gtum chags lta ldan phyag 'tshal lo/ /mA ma kI'i'o/ /oM phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dbang bskur rdzogs pa'i zhal/ /gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin rgyal po'i
phyag /mdzad pa grangs med chub pa'i phyag rgyar ldan/ /gdan gnyis zhabs gnyis gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na bza' dgar mo'i 'o/ /oM mdzad
pa thugs rje'i dbyings la thugs med kyang / /rtsom pa rgya mtsho rgyun mi 'chad mdzad pas/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par sbyor ba yi/ /
mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrol ma'i 'o/ /oM/ nyi ma gzi ldan 'od zer 'gyed pa ltar/ /'jug dgongs mi mnga' kun
rtog mun bral yang / /bskal pa rgya mtshor khyad par don gsal ba'i/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'od zer can ma'i 'o/ /oM/
sems kyi rgyud 'gag mya ngan 'das pa'i tshe/ /'dod chags byung ma thag tu yal ba ste/ /nyon mongs rtsa ba bcad nas pha mtha' med/ /mgon po spyan ras
gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbyangs can ma'i'o/ /oM/ nyon mongs bdag tu bzung na 'khor bar skye/ /de la yang yang brtags na ngan 'gror skye/ /rang
bzhin med par shes na grol bar 'gyur/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phag gdong ma'i 'o/ /oM/ chos rnams dag par mthong na
mtho ris 'thob/ /gnyis 'dzin rtog pa chad na mya ngan 'da'/ /sgyu ma'i sems dang ldan na gzhan don 'byung / /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal
lo/ /khro gnyer can ma'i 'o/ /oM/ rang tshul spyod la chags pas sa bon rul/ /gzhan tshul dman par brjod pas zhing sa tshig /lus ngan gtsang sbra tsam las byang
chub ring / /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sa 'dzin ma'i 'o/ /oM/ bdag lta mun pa'i dug gis brgyal ba la/ /bdag med phyogs bral
ye shes bdud rtsi'i sman/ /pha rol phyin bcu spyod dang rtog rtsol mdzad/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dug sel ma'i 'o/ /oM/ ngang tshul
bzang spyod nga rgyal zhen pa med/ /gzhan spyod btang snyoms byas nas rang sems sbyong / /sred med bzod ldan ngang gis rgol pa lags/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ri khrod ma'i 'o/ /oM/ khrel yod ngo tsha shes shing gtong la dga'/ /dad dang thos ldan tshul khrims shes rab bzang / /chog shes 'dod chung
'di dang gzhan du phyug /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nor rgyun ma'i 'o/ /oM/ yi ge 'bri mchod sbyin nyan klog dang 'chad/ /kha ton
'dzin sems sgom brtson de la chu'i/ /khrus sogs smyung gnas dkar gtsang yon tan stsol/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkar mo'i 'o//
oM/ rang sems dul zhing lus ngag bag yod spyod/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das mchod dam pa 'dzin/ /thos bsam sgom
brtson de ni dgra las rgyal/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par rgyal ma'i glu'o/ /oM/ tha dad kyis 'ching dbyer med grol ba yi/ /
thabs dang shes rab bde chen byang chub lam/ /rnam thar ye shes mtha' yas dpal ster ba/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal
phreng ma'i glu'o/ /oM/ bsam pa bzang po gser gyi sa gzhi la/ /byang chub phyogs chos dpag bsam shing chen 'khrungs/ /ye shes thugs rje rgyun chu rlan
mdzad pa'i/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yid bzang ma'i glu'o/ /sgra sgrog 'khor bcas 'dar gyur te/ /rlung gis btab pa'i
rtswa dang mtshungs/ /thal mo spyi bor sbyar nas su/ /ched du brjod pa 'di gsol to/ /oM/ mgon po rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /gtso bo rab tu che ba'i lha/ /
bsod nams du mas bskyed pa'i sku/ /ye shes mtha' yas thugs mnga' ba/ /blo ldan srid mthar mdzad pa po/ /tshul ldan tshul khrims la sbyor mdzad/ /
gtsang ldan bram ze tshangs pa che/ /mdzad spyod mkha' mnyam spyod phyag 'tshal/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ /'khor la legs so legs so zhes/ /oM AH
hrIHhUM swA hA bcas/ /yang yang brjod pas byin gyis brlabs/ /lcags kyu can gyi nya ra nas/ /klu phyugs 'bum phrag 'dren pa ltar/ /dge sbyong kun slong dkar
pos ni/ /byang chub rin chen gling 'jog mdzad/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las/ gleng gzhi'i
le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas bcom ldan thub pa che/ /mgon po yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sna tshogs snang ba zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin
la snyoms zhugs nas/ /yan lag cha shas thams cad las/ /'od zer sna lnga bye ba phrag /drug cu drug cu'i mtha' gzhal pa/ /grangs med dag ni bkye bar
mdzad/ /zing khams grangs med bdun gyi mtha'/ /phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad du/ /'od kyis gang nas 'od de las/ /snyan pa'i tshigs bcad 'di snang ngo / /
sangs rgyas dang ni chos la brnyas pa spang / /le lo che dang spyod pa mchog 'dzin spangs/ /'gyod dang chos la ma nges 'gyod pa spang / /da rgyal che dang 'dod chags
spyod pa spang / /'gro rnams med na byang chub lam med de/ /'gro la brten nas byang chub che thob 'gyur/ /byang chub che lam thugs rje
chen po ste/ /'gro rnams med na gang la skye bar 'gyur/ /de skad grags pa'i de ma thag /phyogs bcu'i zhing bzhugs sangs rgyas sras/ /brjod kyis mi lang
gtso bo mchog /spyan ras gzigs dbang grangs med gtso/ /thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /mi mjed zhing 'dir lhags par gyur/ /'di nas
shar phyogs zhing khams ni/ /grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid nas/ /zhing khams seng+ge spungs par ni/ /sangs rgyas seng+ge rol pa yi/ /drung du byang chub sems
dpa'i gtso/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang seng+ge'i sgra/ /mdog dkar shel gyi ri 'dra ba/ /byang chub sems mchog bye ba phrag /bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/
glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/ /dngul gyi me tog
du mas gtor/ /bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / /rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/ /zhing rnams rnam par
g.yos par gyur/ /'gro ba'i gti mug mun pa bcom/ /shes rab mtha' yas gsal bar mdzad/ /bdag kyang snying po 'di yi mthus/ /'phrin las 'di nyid
grogs bgyid do/ /oM hrIHsiM ha nA da hUM phaT/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang / /thub pa'i ga la de logs su/ /'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /pus
btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/ /lha yi phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog /grang med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi/ /zhing khams rin chen brtsegs pa na/ sangs
rgyas rin chen dpa' bzhugs pa'i/ /drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang yid bzhin gyi/ /nor bur 'khor los bsgyur ba che/ /gser
gyi ri bo mdog 'dra ba/ /byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag /bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ /glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /bcom ldan mgon po
thub pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/ /rin chen gser gyi me tog ni/ /rgya che du ma 'thor bar byed/ /bde bar gshegs
so rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / /rmad byung che ba'i tshigs bcad kyis/ /zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur/ /'gro ba'i ser sna
'ching ba bcad/ /sbyin pa'i 'byung gnas gter chen rdol/ /bdag kyang snying po 'di yi mthus/ /'phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid
do/ /oM pad+ma d+ha ra d+ha ke hUM phaT/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang / /thub pa'i ga la de logs su/ /'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /pus btsugs thal
mo sbyar nas bzhugs/ /nub kyi phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog /grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi/ /zhing khams pad+mo brtsegs pa na/ /sangs rgyas pad+mo'i
'byung gnas bzhugs/ /drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje can/ /pad+ma ni rte shwa ri gtso/ /pad+ma rA ga'i ri 'dra ba/ /byang
chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag/ bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ /glog 'gyur bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/ /phyag
'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/ /pad+ma rA ga'i me tog ni/ /rgya che du ma 'thor bar mdzad/ /bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs
rgyas/ /'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / /rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/ /zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i 'dod chags 'dam
rdzab bskams/ /tshul khrims byung spos char du phab/ /bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus/ /'phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/ /oM pad+ma ni rte shwa ra hrIHhUM phaT/ snying
po de skad phul nas kyang / /thub pa'i ga la de logs su/ /'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/ /byang gi phyogs
kyi zhing khams mchog /grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi/ /zhing khams rdo rje bkod pa na/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje thogs med bzhugs/ /drung du byang chub sems
dpa'i gtso/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/ /thugs rje chen po mi gshol ba/ /rin chen margad ri bo 'dra/ /byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag /bcu dang
lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ /glog 'gyur bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /'dab ma stong dang
ldan pa yi/ /marga ta yi me tog ni/ /rgya che du ma 'thor par mdzad/ /bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / /rmad byung chen
po'i tshigs bcad kyis/ /zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur/ /'gro ba'i le lo'i nags tshal bsregs/ /brtson 'grus bskul ba'i me phud sbar/ /bdag
kyang snying po de yi mthus/ /'phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/ /oM rat+na a gra a pra ti ha ta hUM phaT/ snying po de skad phul nas
kyang / /thub pa'i ga la de logs su/ /'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/ /byang shar phyogs kyi zhing khams
mchog /grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi/ /zhing khams gter chen brtsegs pa na/ /sangs rgyas don yod 'byung gnas bzhugs/ /drung du byang chub
sems dpa'i gtso/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/ /rje btsun don yod zhags pa can/ /shel gyi ri bo'i mdog 'dra ba/ /byang chub sems tshogs
bye ba phrag /bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ /glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba
du ma byas/ /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/ /rin chen shel gyi me tog ni/ /rgya che du ma 'thor bar byed/ /bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /
'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/ /zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur/ /'gro ba'i zhe sdang ri bo bcom/ /
bzod pa'i nyi ma lhang nger mdzad/ /bdag kyang snying po 'di yi mthus/ /'phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/ /oM hrIHtrai lokya bi dza ya a mo g+ha pA she a pra ti ha
ta hrIHha hUM phaT swAhA/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang / /thub pa'i ga la de logs su/ /'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /pus btsugs thal mo sbyar
nas bzhugs/ /shar lho'i phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog /grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi/ /zhing khams bdud rtsi brtsegs pa na/ /sangs rgyas sman gyi
'byung gnas bzhugs/ /drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/ /rje btsun ha la ha la che/ /pu sha ra ka'i ri bo 'dra/ /
byang chub sems mchog bye ba phrag /bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ /glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/ /phyag
'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/ /pu sha ra ka'i me tog ni/ /rgya che du ma 'thor bar byed/ /bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /
'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / /rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/ /zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur/ /'gro ba'i phrag dog dug sdong sbrul/ /bsam
gtan bdud rtsi rgya mtsho rlabs/ /bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus/ /'phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/ /oM ha la ha la hrIH
pad+ma gar+b+ha hUM phaT swAhA/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang / /thub pa'i ga la de logs su/ /'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /pus btsugs thal mo
sbyar nas bzhugs/ /lho nub phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog /grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid na/ /zhing khams pad+mas brgyan pa na/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma'i snying
po bzhugs/ /drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/ /rje btsun pad+ma rgyas pa'i lung / /zangs ma zhun gyi ri bo 'dra/ /
byang chub sems mchog bye ba phrag /bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ /glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/ /
phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/ /zangs ma zhun gyi me tog ni/ /rgya che du ma 'thor bar byed/ /bde bar gshegs so rdzogs
sangs rgyas/ /'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / /rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/ /zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur/ /'gro ba rmongs pa'i thibs
bo bcom/ /sna tshogs thabs kyi rlung chen 'phyo/ /bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus/ /'phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/ /oM pad+ma a laM kA ra hUM phaT swAhA/ /snying po
de skad phul nas kyang / /thub pa'i ga la de logs su/ /'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/ /nub byang phyogs kyi
zhing khams mchog /grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid na/ /zhing khams stong brgya zhes bya bar/ /sangs rgyas dam tshig dpal bzhugs so/ /drung du byang chub
sems dpa'i gtso/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/ /rje btsun rdo rje chos dbang phyug /nor bu spug gi kha dog 'dra/ /byang chub sems mchog bye ba phrag/
bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ /glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /'dab
ma stong dang ldan pa yi/ /spug gi snying po me tog ni/ /rgya che du ma 'thor bar byed/ /bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / /
rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/ /zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur/ /'gro ba'i mnar sems zhen pa bsal/ /mthu stobs chen po'i rdo rjes
btab/ /bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus/ /'phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/ /oM badzra d+ha rmA d+ha tu hUM swAhA/ /snying po de skad phul
nas kyang / /thub pa'i ga la de logs su/ /'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/ /steng gi phyogs kyi zhing
khams mchog /grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid na/ /zhing khams gtsug tor brtsegs pa na/ /sangs rgyas gtsug tor rgyal po bzhugs/ /drung du
byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/ /ha ri ha ri ha ri la/ /zhon zhes rab tu grags pa yi/ /rje btsun chos kyi gtsug tor
te/ /in+d+ra nI la'i ri bo'i mdog /byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag /bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ /glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /bcom
ldan mgon po thub pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/ /in+d+ra nI la'i me tog ni/ /rgya che du ma 'thor bar mdzad/ /
bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/ /zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par
gyur/ /'gro ba'i log lta'i sgrib g.yogs sel/ /dag pa'i smon lam 'khor lo bskor/ /bdag kyang snying po 'di yi mthus/ /'phrin las 'di nyid grags
bgyid do/ /oM b+h+ruM hrIHha hUM swAhA/ snying po de skad phun nas kyang / /thub pa'i ga la de logs su/ /'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /pus btsugs thal mo
sbyar nas bzhugs/ /'og gi phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog /grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid na/ /zhing khams za ma tog mdzes na/ /sangs rgyas mnon pa'i
dpal bzhugs so/ /drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/ /rje btsun mgrin pa sngon po rgyal/ /an+da rnyil gyi ri bo 'dra/ /
byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag/ /bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ /glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/ /phyag
'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/ /an+da rnyil gyi me tog ni/ /rgya che du ma 'thor bar mdzad/ /bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs
rgyas/ /'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / /rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/ /zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur/ /'gro ba'i shes bya'i sgrib nags
sel/ /ye shes ral gris rtsa ba bregs/ /bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus/ /'phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/ /oM ma Ni
pad+me hUM/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang / /thub pa'i ga la de logs su/ /'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /pus btsug lags thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/
spyan ras gzigs dbang tshogs 'dus nas/ /rig sngags mthu chen 'chad pa dang / /gzhan don rdzogs par mdzad pa de'i/ /shin tu dga' bar mdzad pa
la/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kun/ /phyag rgya rnams ni spyi bor bzhag /'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis legs so byin/ /nam mkha' snyan pa yis
kyang bkang / /de'i tshe phyogs bcur bzhugs pa yi/ /khro bo'i rgyal po ma lus rnams/ /sa steng thams cad gar gyis bkang / /g.yas brkyang g.yon
brkyang zla gam dang / /zlum po gru bzhi gru gsum 'gros/ /mchod dang gyed mchod hril po dang / rdeb dang btsir ba'i tshul gyis su/ /bgegs rnams stabs
kyis tshar gcod mdzad/ /lag pa thal sbyar phyed btsums bskyed/ /ser mo gcig snol gcig 'khyud dang / /kun snol kun 'khyud kun gdengs dang / /rgyab
snol res 'khyud kun 'khyud dang / /mos res 'khyud sgreng kun sgreng dang / /mnyam gzhag dang ni mchog gi rgya/ /sa gnon skyabs sbyin mchog sbyin sogs/ /
phyag rgya du ma bgegs sel mdzad/ /gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong ba'i tshogs/ /ma lus 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /gdong bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba/ /snga
na med pa'i rig sngags rmad/ /ngo mtshar byung zhes thos ma thag /lus kyang shin tu 'dar gyur nas/ /rgyal mchog gtso bo drung lhags te/ /phyag 'tshal
thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol/ /gang zhig gdong bcu gcig pa yi/ /rig sngags len cing 'dzin pa dang / /rgyun du 'don dang /
yid la byed/ /'jig rten mgon po spyan ras gzigs/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshogs 'di rnams/ /gang gi yid la byed pa'am/ /yang na ji tsam dran
yang rung / /dge ldan rigs kyi bu de ni/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba rnams kyi sras/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bshes/ /rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyi
yab/ /byis pa rnams kyi gnyen yin te/ /bdag cag rnams ni de yi 'bangs/ /skyes bu khyu mchog chen po ste/ /bsod nams rnams kyi gter ldan zhing / /
de yi tshul khrims ral ba med/ /mi de skye ba don yod de/ /lta gnas dga' gnas spu gseb tu/ /ye shes 'od zer bdud rtsi
'dzud/ /'jig rten 'di yi nad rigs dang / /gdon rigs ji snyed yod pa'am/ /rig sngags byad stems ma lus pas/ /de la tshugs par mi 'gyur
ro/ /cho ga bzhin du spyad pa yis/ /tshangs pa'i tshe tshad gnas nas kyang / /shi ba sems brgyal med par ni/ /gnas 'pho tshul gyis mtho ris 'jug/
rgyal ba'i zhing du gshegs nas kyang / /rgyal ba rnams la chos nyan cing / /rgyal sras rnams dang stabs cig tu/ /stobs dang mi 'jigs kun brnyes
te/ /mtshan dang dpe byad ldan gyur nas/ /skad cig glog 'gyu ji bzhin du/ /'gro ba ma lus dag byed cing / /zhing rnams ma lus dag par byed/ /'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las/ /lha byung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas lag
na rdo rje 'dzin/ /bzhengs te thal sbyar thub pa la/ /phyag 'tshal phyogs su 'khod nas ni/ /gsang ba bstod nas tshig 'di gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs
ba'i rgyal dbang po/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang kun/ /rang rang gnas nas gshegs nas byon/ /'gro ba thugs brtse chen po yis/ /snying po byin rlabs
ldan la gsol/ /rmad du byung ba'i snying po la/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras bcas dang / /rig pa 'dzin rnams mthun par dgyes/ /'on kyang 'gro mang gzung
ba dang / /dngos grub thams cad myur ba dang / snying po mthu dang ldan pa'i phyir/ /mgon po thugs rje che rnams kyis/ /byin rlabs ldan pa rtsa ba'i sngags/ /'dren
pa de ring bshad du gsol/ /rig sngags nyi ma zla ba'i 'od/ /rtsa ba'i sngags kyis sprin bral byed/ /'gro ba thugs brtse mdzad pa dang / /bdag la phan pa'i don
slad du/ /rgyal ba mya ngan kun bral bas/ /rtsa ba'i gzungs sngags bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das thub pa ches/ /sdig kun myur sgrol bya ba yi/ /ting nge
'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi thugs rje las/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang seng+ge'i sgra'i/ /rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so/ /na mo rat+na
tra ya ya/ /na ma AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ /bo d+hi satwA ya/ /ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ /tad+ya thA/ o a ka Te/ bi ka Ta/ ni ka Te/ Ti ka Te/ ka TaM ka Te
ka ro Te/ bIR+ya swA hA/ yon tan ye shes tshogs rnams kun/ /rig sngags 'dis ni nges par skyed/ /khyad par du ni mdze nad la/ /rtswa
las byung ba'i me bzhin no/ /rtog ldan rnam shes brgyad kyi gzhi/ /sbyor phyir maN+Dal lham pa brgyad/ /bser skya yi bdud rtsis byugs/ /yan lag bcu
gnyis mgor bcas pa'i/ /sngags grangs byin gyis brlabs byugs nas/ /lhag ma yan lag thig ler bya/ /cung zad lce la myang bas ni/ /dus dus
sum brgya drug cu'i tshad/ /nyi ma grangs kyis dag nas ni/ /lo gcig dus su rtogs ldan 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ /dpal skyed 'tshe bzlog
pa yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /mgon po yid bzhin 'khor lo yi/ /rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs
so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwA rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsakra warti pad+ma tsin+ta ma Ni dz+wa la
ma hA pad+me ru ru tiSh+Tha dz+wa la A kaR+Sha ya hrIHhUM phaT swA hA/ 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /glo bur gnod pa bsal ba'i phyir/ /bdun phrag sngags
grangs dang mnyam pa'i/ /nyungs kar ser po brgya rtsa brgyad/ /rang gi lus sam yan lag la/ /mchod dang bcas pas gdags par bya/ /de la yang yang gsol
pa gdab/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ /khams gsum dbang du bya ba yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /mgon
po pad+ma gar dbang gi /rtsa ba'i gsang sngags 'di gsungs so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwA rA yA/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA ka
ru N-i kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ sarba satwa bA sa nA gA pa d+hi ni/ na maHsarba satwA bi si na/ A ha ra Ni/ na maHsarba satwa ba yo d+ha ra NA ya/ na maHstam+b+ha pa sha ma nA ya/ na maHsarba

satwa bo d+hI tsit+ta ki ka ti sa ma ka rA ya na maHsarba satwa ban+d+ha na ts+tshe da na ka rA ya/ na maHsarba satwa duHkha bi mok+Sha Na ka rA ya/ na maHsarba an+d+ha ka rA bi d+ha nA maM ka ra/ na maHsarba
bid+ya d+ha ra rA dza pra sha pra ta ye ma hA yo ga yo gI shwa rA ya/ ha sa ha s+ya nA ya/ na maskri twa i daM AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra mu khod gIr+Na ri shi bi bi ra dA ra nA da/ yak+Sha/
rak+Sha sa/ shAkya brah+ma lo ka pA la ya/ biSh+Nu ma he shwa ra/ nA ra ya Na skan+da ku be ra/ a su ren+d+ra/ mA tri ga Na/ na maskr-i ta tra/ badzra khu Na sa hr-i da ya/ ha ya grI ba na
ma ya/ ma hi da ya/ nA warti Sh+yA mi a pa pra me yota sA da kaM a pa haM/ sarba bi nA ya kaM a mo g+haM/ sarba karmA b+hi Shi ny+tsa/ bi nA ya kaM/ tad+ya
thA/ oM ta ru la/ ta nu ta la/ bi ta ru la/ sarba bi Sha ka ka /sarba bud+d+ha bi da ni/ pra dzA ti pa ta/ a na la bi s+phu li ka /aT+Ta hA sa ke shwa rA ya/ to ba pra bi ta
ya/ badzra khu ra nir+g+ga ti ta/ tsa lita pra pu da ta la/ badzrod shAn+ti ta ti/ si ta ma du to ga ta pra na ma Na ba kA ra ba ra duSh+TaM bid+ya ka ma ga sa b+hak+Sha na ka ra/ sarba
bid+ya ba twa he shA kA ra/ pa ra ma shAn+ti ka ra/ bud+d+ha bo d+hI ye ma ti/ b+ha ga wan ha ya grI ba sarba bId+ya hr-i da ya mA brti Sh+'+ya mi/ kha dra kha dra/ ma hA ro dra/ man+taM na/ rak+Sha
rak+Sha/ At+ma swasti taM man+t+raM sid+d+ha sA d+ha/ sarba karmA su me/ sid+d+hi sid+d+he/ de hi de hi/ A be sha A be sha /pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ sarba gra he Shu a pra ti ha ta/ d+hu
na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ sarba pa rAkra ma kr-i tA n+tA gra/ ka kho rnga dur laM gi ta hi/ ma shi ka /bi Sha ka ta/ sA sha daMSh+Ta/ bi Sha
tsur+Na yo ga a b+hi tsa ra/ ba shI ka ra Na/ sA d+ha any+dza na/ tsa ku mo ha na tsin+ta/ piM shes na kA na niR+ya a pa ra bri Sha ka ra Na/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ ma hA bo d+hi satwA/

rin+d+ha da sha naM/ sarba b+he b+haHsarba satwa nAM/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/ mA ma nu twa d+har+m+ma saM g+ha a nu dz+nyA taM me karma shI g+h+raM/ ku ru ku ru phaT/ ha ya gri ba phaT/ badzra daMSh+To ta ka Ta b+ha ra ba pa ra sa
nA phaT/ ye ka tsa te mA ma a hi da shi go ba kA ya tra min+to/ /maM tra yaM tra sa man+ti/ dza ya ri dzu haM ti/ ka khorda kurbaM di naM/ sarba dza mu khin+d+ra pra taM tA ya phaT/ na maH

sarba duSh+Ta ga ho ta sA da nA ya ha ya gri ba sid+d+h+yan+tu me man+t+ra pa dA ni swAhA/ oM a mr-i te t+b+ha bA ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ na maHsarba satwA sh+tsa sid+h+yin+tu me man+t+ra pa dA ni swAhA/ gang zhig
klus non spyi la ni/ /dung gi me tog sngags stong gis/ /byin gyis brlabs nas gu gul bdug /lus la thogs na legs par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan
thub pa ches/ /thogs med sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /mgon po thugs rje mi gshod
pa'i/ /rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya

thA/ na maHsarba b+hI ma tsa ka raM/ sarba ro ga pra sha ma na kaM ra/ sarba byA d+hi na b+ha ra ka raM/ aSh+Ta k+Sha Ni bi satwe b+h+yaH/ tA rA samyak+saM tA rA NaM da sha di ka bo d+hi satwe b+h+yaH/ na
maHsamyak+saM bud+d+ha ko TI nAM/ a he na mas+t+ri da Ar+yA ba lo te shwa ra shud+d+ha ra Ni ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ a gra bi sh+ya ti/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/
a gra nA ma dz+wa la sa ti kA ra/ ma hA ka ru Ni byu ba sa ma ta ha raM tu/ tad+ya thA/ oM dza Ta dza Ta/ dzi Ti dzi Ti/ dzu Tu dzu Tu/ ra ra ra ra/ ri ri ri ri/ ka la ka la/ ki
li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ ma hA saM gra ha/ a nu ha ran+tu/ ai h+yai sa d+ha ya/ e h+ye hi/ tsa ta tsa ta/ tsi ti tsi ti/ tsu tu tsu tsu/
sarba bo d+hi satwa/ pra Ni d+ha na grih+na/ kA ra a nu san+d+ha ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ saM b+hu ba e h+ye hi/ ra la ra la/ ru lu ru lu/ d+h+ya na bi mok+Sha sa mA d+hi/ sa ma ba tI b+hi

sh+tsa ra a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ tsa la tsa la/ tsi li tsi li/ tsu lu tsu lu/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ e h+ye hi/ bud+d+ho bud+d+ho/ bud+d+ha sa t+ye na/ d+harma sa t+ye na/ saM g+ha sa t+ye na/ oM Te s+thA Te s+thA/

sarba ma hA mai tri b+hu tA na pa ran+tu ma hA ka ru Na me g+haM mA ma sarba ra ga ni ba ra yan+tu/ bu na bu na/ bi bu na/ bi bu na/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ oM Ta s+tho Ta s+tho/ e h+ye hi/ e
h+ye hi/ mA ma sarba sha bu yaM tu/ karma bi sho d+hA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA pad+ma nA dA ya/ pad+ma a pA ya swA hA/ shwe ta A dzA u pa bi d+hA ya swA hA/ ka ru ri Ni swA hA/

shu b+ha dz+nyA swA hA/ tsa kra NAM swA hA/ ya me ye swA hA/ oM da tse bi bud+d+he b+h+yaHswA hA/ saM sba tshe b+h+yo bud+d+he b+h+yaHswA hA/ a du pa du ke b+h+yo byA d+hi de bi de ke b+h+yo byA d+hi b+h+yaHswAhA/ bai d+ha de
bi de ke b+h+yo byA d+hi b+h+yaHswAhA/ bai d+ha de mi aM ti ra ki sha tsa ri b+h+yo byA d+hi b+h+yaHswA hA/ tad+ya thA/ oM tra Ta tra Ta/ tri ti tri ti/ tru tu tru tu/ na mA ma sarba b+ha ye
b+h+yaH/ sarba u pa dra be b+h+yaH/ rak+Sha rak+Sha ku ru swA hA/ gra sa gra sa swA hA/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ na ma AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA
ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ /shang+ka ri yi sa bon las/ /stong du bzlas nas dri chu dang / /lhan cig skrangs la
byugs pas ni/ /lhog nad drag po 'joms par byed/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ /rig sngags rbod gtong gzhom pa yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /mgon po don yod zhags pa yi/ /rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so/ /na ma s+t+rai ya d+ha a nu ga ta pra tiSh+Thi te b+h+yaH/

sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa b+h+yaH/ na maHpra t+ye ka bud+d+ha AR+ya sha ba ka saM g+he b+h+yoH/ a tI ta a nA ga ta pra d+yud ban+ne b+h+yoH/ na maHsamyak+saM ga ta nAM/ na maHsamyak+saM pra ti pan+nA nAM/ na maH
shA ra dwA tI bu trA ya ma hA ma ta ye/ na maHAR+ya mai tri ya pra mu khe b+h+yo ma hA bo d+hi satwa saM g+he b+h+yaH/ na maHsu pra tiSh+Thi ta shai len+d+ra rA dza pra

mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ ar+ha da b+h+yaH/ samyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yoHb+ha ga ba da b+h+yaH/ na maHsu bar+N+Na bar+N+Na su pra ti b+hA se bi narte shwa ra rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsiM ha
bi kri Di ta rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na ma AR+ya a mi tA b+hA ya/ na maHsu pra tiSh+Thi ta ma Ni kA Ta rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsa man+ta ra smyud ga ta shrI kU Ta rA dzA ya
ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bi pA sh+yi ne ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHshi khi ni ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bi shwa b+hu dze ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHkra kuts+tshan dra ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHka
na ka mu na ye ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHkA sh+ya pA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHshAkya mu na ye ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM mu ne mu ne ma hA mu
na ye swA hA/ oM sa me sa me ma hA sa me rak+Sha rak+Sha maM sarba satwa sh+tsa sarba pA paM pra sha ma ne swA hA/ na maHsu pa ri kIrti ta nA ma d+ha yA shri ye ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsa man+ta
a wa b+hA sa bi dzi ta saM grA ma shri ye ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHin+d+ra ka tu d+hA dzA shri ye ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo rat+na pra b+hA se shwa ra rA dzA ya ta thA ga ta ya/ na mo a pra

ti ha ta b+he Sha dz+nyA rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bi kran+ta gA mi na ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bud+d+ha ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ na mo i tA ta a nA ga tA pra t+yu ban+ne b+h+yaH/

sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twe b+h+ya/ b+ha bag ba da b+h+yaH/ tad+ya thA/ smr-i te bar+d+ha ni/ ma ti bar+d+ha ni/ ga ti bar+d+ha ni/ d+h+ri te bar+d+ha ni/ pra dz+nyA bar+d+ha ni/ pra ti b+hA na bad+ha ni/ d+h+ya na bar+d+ha ni/ sa mar+th+ya

bar+d+ha ni/ bi ba sh+ya nA bar+d+ha ni/ sarba bo d+hi bak+Sha d+harma bar+d+ha ni/ sa ka la bud+d+ha d+harma ba ri pU ra NI ye swA hA/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi
satwa ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo ma hA s+thA ma prap+tA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ e b+h+yo na maskri twA i daM AR+ya a wa

lo ki te shwa ra mu khod gIr+N+Na a mo g+ha pA sha rA dzA nA ma hri da yaM ta thA ga tA saM mu khaM b+hA Shi taM ma ha ta baR+Sha ma d+he a ha ma dA nI ma brta yi Sh+ya mi sid+h+yan+tu me man+t+ra ba dAHsarba
kA r+yA NI/ sarba b+ha ye b+h+yo ma ma sarba satwA nAny+tsa rak+Sha b+ha ba tu/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma ra ma ra/ mi ri mi ri/ mu ru mu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/
sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ ma hA pad+ma hasta/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/
ma hA shud+d+ha satwA/ bud+d+h+ya bud+h+ya/ bo d+ha bo d+ha/ bi d+hi bi d+hi/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ pa ra ma shud+d+ha satwa/ ka
ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA s+tha ma prAp+ta/ tsa la tsa la/ sany+tsa la sany+tsa la/ pi tsa la pi tsa la/ pra tsa la pra tsa la/ eT+Ta eT+Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ bi ri bi
ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ ti ri ti ri/ tu ru tu ru/ e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ ma hA pa shu pa ti ye Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra
