sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ pa ra pa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ma ra ma ra/ la ra la ra la/ ha ra ha ra/ ha ha hI hI hU hU/ oM kA ra brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha d+ha ra ha/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu
ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ na ra na ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ha ra ha ra/ rasmi sha ta sa ha sra ti maN+Di ta sha rI ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ta pa ta pa/ b+hA sa b+hA sa/ b+h+ra
ma b+h+ra ma/ b+ha ga wA na so ma/ A di t+ya/ ya ma/ ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ brah+man+d+ra/ bA yu/ ag+ni/ d+ha na da/ de ba ri Shi ga Na a b+h+ya rtsi ta tsa ra Na/ su ru su ru/ tsu
ru tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ g+hu ru g+hu ru/ sa na ta ku mA ra/ ru drwa/ bA sa ba/ biSh+Nu/ d+ha na da/ bA yu/ ag+ni/ ri Shi/ nA ya ka /bi nA ya ka/ ba hu bi bi d+ha be Sha d+ha ra/
d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ tha ra tha ra/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/ ya ra ya ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra dA ya ka /sa
man+ta a ba lo ki ta/ bi lo ki ta/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ tri b+hu ba na shwa ra/ sarba gu Na sa ma a laM kr-i ta/ a ba lo ki te shwa ra/ mu hu mu hu/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya

mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sarba satwaM sh+tsa/ sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaH/ sarbo ba dra be b+h+yaH/ sarbo ba dra be b+h+yaH/ sarbo pa sarge b+h+yaH/ sarba gra he b+h+yaH/ sarba b+hA d+hi b+h+yaH/ sarba be Sha
b+h+yaH/ sarba dz+nyA re b+h+yaH/ e baM/ baM d+ha baM d+ha na/ ta Da na/ ta rdza na/ rA dza ta ska ra/ ag+ni/ u da ka /bi Sha/ shas+t+ra pa ri mo tsa ka /ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ tsa
ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ an+d+ri ya/ ba la bo d+h+yaM ga /tsa tu ra AR+ya sa t+ye saM pra kA sha ka /ta pa ta pa/ ta ma ta ma/ da ma da ma/ sa ma sa ma/ ma sa ma sa/ d+ha ma d+ha
ma/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka /ma hA ta mo an+d+ha kA ra bi d+ha ma na/ Sha Ta pA ra mi ta pa ri pU ra ka /ma la ma la/ mi li mi li/ mu lu mu lu/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ Tha Tha Tha Tha/ Ti Ti Ti Ti/ Tu

Tu Tu Tu/ Thi Thi Thi Thi/ Thu Thu Thu Thu/ e ne ya tsar+m+ma kr-i ta pa ri ka ra/ e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka /i shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ ma hA b+hU ta ga Na b+hany+dza ka/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru
ku ru/ pa ra pa ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ba ra ba ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ki Ti ki Ti/ ku Tu ku Tu/ ma Ta ma Ta/ ma hA bi shud+d+ha be Sha ya na

bA si na/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka shwe ta ya dz+nyo ba bI ta/ rat+na mu ku Ta/ ma lA d+ha ra/ sarba dz+nyA si ra si kr-i ta dza TA ma ku Ta/ ma hA ad+b+hu ta/ ka ma la a laM kr-i ta ke ra ta la/ d+h+ya na sa

mA d+hi/ bi mo k+Sha a pra kam+p+ya/ ba hu sa twa man+ta ti pa ri pA tsa ka /ma hA kA ru Ni ka sarba karma A wa ra Na bi sho d+ha ka /sarba dz+nyA dz+nyA na pa ri pU ra ka /sarba byA d+hi pa ri mo tsa ka /sarba
sa twa A shA pa ri pU ra ka /sarba sa twa mA shrA sa na ka ra na mostu te swA hA/ a mo g+hA ya swA hA/ a mo g+hA pA shA ya swA hA/ a dzi tA ya swA hA/ a pa rA dzi tA ya swA hA/ a mi
tA b+hA ya swA hA/ a mi tA b+hA su tA ya swA hA/ mA ra sai n+ya pra marda nA ya swA hA/ a b+hA yA ya swA hA/ a b+hA ya pra dA yA swA hA/ dza yA ya swA hA/ bi dza yA ya swA hA/ dza ya
bi dza yA ya swA hA/ ba ra dA ya swA hA/ a kA la mr-i t+yu pra shA ma nA ya swA hA/ i dany+tsa me karma ku ru na mo stu te swA hA/ oM ra Na ra Na hUM phaT/ oM dza ya hUM phaT/ oM dzra dzri
dzu swA hA/ oM hUM dza ya swA hA/ oM hrIHtrai lokya bi dza ya a mo g+ha pA sha a pra ti ha ta hrIHhaHhUM phaT swA hA/ oM ba su bi ta swA hA/ oM A ro li ka swA hA/ oM ba hu le ba hu

le swA hA/ oM A ro li ka hrIHhrIHhUM phaT swA hA/ ni ya tA a ni ya ta be da ni ya a shu b+ha s+ya me b+ha ga wa na karma No a she Sha taHk+Sha yaM ku ru swA hA/ oM pad+ma ha sta ya swA hA/ oM bud+d+ha
d+harma saM g+hA ya swA hA/ rabs chad thod par ro bsregs sa/ /nyungs kar ser po dri chur bcas/ /bskyed de myu gus sngags stong brjod/ /'bras bu la ni khri brjod bya/ /lus
la thogs na byad stems sogs/ /nad dang gdon rnams myur du sel/ /gzhan dag las rnams gang la yang / /bdun bdun grangs kyi sngags kyi sbyar/ de nas bcom ldan thub pa
ches/ /ltos 'gro bas ni rab rgyal ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /mgon po ha la ha la ya/ /rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs

so/ /na mo rat+na tra ya ya/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa ya/ sarba su re shwa rA ya/ na maHAR+ya ba lo ki te shwA rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ruM Ni kA ya/ na mo ma hA s+tha ma

prap+ta/ AR+ya mai tri/ AR+ya many+dzu shri/ AR+ya badzra pA Ni a d+hi kaM bo d+hi satwa ma hA satwe b+h+yaHa ta/ na maHgri twaM b+ha ga wA na AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa ra twaM hr-i da ya sarba karma pa daHsarba gra ho ts+tsha da na

ka raM/ b+ha ba a ma ra Ni bi nA shA ka ba shI taM/ s+yad ya rde daM he bo d+hi satwa/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ pra ya bo d+hi sa twa/ hA hA la AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ ba ra ma mai tri tsi ta ti ti ta kA ru Ni ka/
ku ru ku ru/ k+Sha ma g+ha ma bi haM ga ma pi ya ti/ bi dza yan+ti/ ma hA bi dza yan+ti/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ tsa yan+t+ra man+t+ra/ na mo me h+ya d+hi/ sarba satwa b+ha ya/ pra da

sa ha ra ha ra/ ha ri b+ha h+ya no t+d+ha/ bA bA bA bA/ b+ha ba nA ga ku ru ku ru/ ku ru tu ru/ g+hU ru g+hU ru/ su ru su ru/ ma ra ma ra/ tsu ru tsu ru/ su pra si d+ha/ satwa ma bi ma la/ pha la pha la/ murte
AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ pa ra ma kA ru Ni ka kriSh+Na dz+nyA na d+ha/ dza TA mu ku Ta bi laM b+ha/ pra laM b+ha/ tsa le tsa le/ ma la ma la/ ka la ka la/ ha la ha la/ ga la ga la/ ta la ta la/
da la da la/ na la na la/ tu ru tu ru/ hu lu hu lu/ hi li hi li/ he bo d+hi satwa/ na ma s+t+ya d+hA nu/ hUM hUM hUM /hrIHku ru ku ru/ hr-i da ya/ a nu sma ra/ sa ma ya a nu sma ra/ dzA ti a nu sma
ra/ i daM mai kaR+yaM ku ru/ ma no ra thaM me/ pa ri pU ra ya/ sid+d+h+yan+tu me man+t+ra pa dA ni swA hA/ snga par khrus byas gos gtsang gyon/ /bcom ldan spyan sngar nyin re bzhin/ /ba lci sa la
ma ltung bas/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa ni/ /bcu gsum bzlas nas byug par bya/ /lhag mas nad rnams thams cad la/ /byugs pa tsam gyis sos par nges/ /zla
ba drug gis bdud rnams zhi/ /'dod pa thams cad skongs gyur te/ /mtshams med lnga byas mis kyang 'grub/ /gal te grub par ma gyur na/ /bdag gis mtshams med
las byas te/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas kun srung yin/ /snying rjes snying rje can 'grub 'gyur/ /ldang bas khro ba 'grub 'gyur te/ /rtag pa'i gnas 'dod blo gros can/ /
rnam par mi rtog btang snyoms kyis/ /'dod pa kun 'grub zhen pas byin/ /yid la byed pas 'ching bar 'gyur/ /se'u bo che yi lcug ma la/ /ro bsregs thal ba khri phrag
bdun/ /bsngags nas gtor bas char ches pa/ /char pa myur du 'chad par byed/ /dri chu gla rtsir bcas pas ni/ /sbrul gyi gdug pa sel bar byed/ /lto 'phye'i rigs dang sbrang rgod
sogs/ /'jigs pa rnams ni 'grib pa'i phyir/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ /shes rab rnam grol zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /sku gsung
thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /mgon po pad+ma rgyan lung gi /rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya ba lo ki te shwA rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma

hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ na mo AR+ya a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta tha ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ na mo ma hA s+thA ma prAp+tA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo bi
pu le bi ma la/ su pra ti pu la/ sUr+ya sha ta yaM/ a saM ge ya/ sUr+yA sha ta sa ha sra/ a d+hi ka ra/ e b+ha ba ti mur+d+ha ye/ ma hA ma Ni mu ku Ta kuN+Da la/ a laM kA ra d+ha ra Ni/ b+ha ga ba te
pad+ma mA le/ sarba lo ka a pA ya sha ma na ye/ bi bi d+ha mu kha saM be sha /a ba sha sarba satwa pa ri mo tsa kA ya/ b+hur+b+hu ba swA hA/ ma hA lo ke shwa rA ya/ na
ma s+thA mi ra pa dra bi nA sha ka /ra ga be sha mo hA dz+wa la sha ma ka sha sa ma sha na kA ra/ rak+Sha ka sarba a b+ha ya durga ti pra sha ma na kA ra/ sarba sa ma sha na kA ra/ sarba A sha pa ri
pU ra ka /sarba thA ga tA saM baM d+ha na ka ra e h+ye hi/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da/ pad+ma a pa lo ka saM bud+d+ho/ /ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ dza Ta mu ku Ta/ a laM kr-i ta shi ra ma Ni/ ka na ka
rA dza ta/ badzra bai DUR+ya a laM kri ta sha rI ra a ma dza ta dza na ka ma a laM kr-i ta pra b+ha ra Na sha ta sa ha sra a pi la sha ta kA ya/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da/ bi daM kha da ma/ bi nA

sha ya bi nA shA ya/ ma hA yan+t+ra ma kle sha ka pa ta/ a ba bo d+hi b+ha/ bo d+hi yan+t+ra/ g+ha ra tsa ra/ ka pra ma tha na ka ra/ pu ru Sha/ pad+ma pu ru Sha/ saM pra ra Na/ pu ru Sha siM ha/ bi ra bi

ra/ dza su tan+ta Da bi ra br-i ta/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ sa ma sa ma/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ pra sha sa ma ya pra sha sa ma ya/ ki ri ki ri/ b+hi bi ri b+hi bi ri/ tsi ri ca ri/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/

bi d+hi ri bi d+hi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ d+yu nu d+yu nu/ bi d+yu bi d+yu/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ga ya ga ya/ b+hA ta ya b+hA ta ya/ ha sa ha sa/ pra hA sa pra hA sa/ nA ga bi

bi d+ha ke sha se sa na/ ha ra ha ra/ saM ha ra saM ha ra/ du ru du ru/ ma hA maM ga la ka ra Ni/ sha ta pra se/ ka ba a ba b+ha sa bi bi d+ha ba sa na sha ma ka sha sa ka /rA ga kA ma ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ b+ha
ra b+ha ra swA hA/ thub po she dang shu dag la/ /khri phrag bzlas nas 'thungs pas ni/ /shes rab chen po 'phel bar byed/ /nad la mthun pa'i sman dang sbyar/ /pad+ma'i rtsa ba ka rar
bcas/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig yang na bdun/ /sngags brjod snga bar mid par bya/ /de yang dbyangs snyan shes rab 'phel/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ /dgongs pa bla med ces
bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /mgon po rdo rje chen po yi/ /rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma

AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ bai ro tsa na pra b+ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ sarba A dz+nyA ya/

an+d+ra kA ra/ mA ma ya tra/ tad+ya thA/ om sA d+ha ni sA d+ha ni/ sid+d+he sid+de/ sid+d+he d+ha ra/ b+ha ga ba te/ ba raM pa ra/ kle sha di ba na/ A dz+nyA she Sha ma ni sha ma ya/ sarba pA pa bi shud+d+he/ d+ha ma ni d+ha ma ni/ mA lA

dz+nyA ga tsa ra Ni sA shaM mur+d+hi/ su kha ra pra te/ sarba kle sha da pa ni/ bi d+ha ma ni bi d+ha ma ni/ bi nA sha bi nA sha/ bi nA sha ya bi nA sha ya/ b+ha ba ga te/ pu ra sa bi ma la ba d+hi/ sa ra sa ra/
si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ bi sa ra bi sa ra/ A dz+nyA ma i ti sa hA sra NAM/ tsit+ta kA rA ma/ a pa ra Na k+Sha pa yA mi ta su b+hU ta

bi sha ya/ pA sha bi da ni pA ra mi ta b+hA dz+nyA na go tsa re/ pA sha sha ba ti/ sha sha mA le na kA ra Na go tse re/ ma hA dz+nyA na a b+hi She ka ma ti su bi ni sh+tsi taM da d+ha/ ha he b+ha ga ba te
ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ku ru ku ru/ bi shi d+ham ba na/ ma ma sarba satwa b+ho ma hA kA ru No ta sA d+ha ke na/ sany+tsa sany+tsa saM brta ya/ saM b+ha la pra ro ha ya ma/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ bi

dza ya pa ri shud+d+hA ya/ a mu ka bi ku ru bi dza ya na/ sa ra sa ra/ me g+ha ga te/ mA mA mA/ bo d+hi tsi t+ta taM sa ma bud+d+he ma san+tu She/ bo d+hi mi ri kA ra Ni/ bud+d+hi bo d+hi pra de/ na ra

ka pre ta ti R+ya ka ga tu du/ kha gu la ni/ de ba ma nu Sh+ya ga ti saM bi da ni/ bi ga to kle sha sarbA nurda d+harma/ pa ri pU ra Ni badzra d+harmi sad+h+yaM tu ma man+t+ra bA dA ni swA hA/ snga bar langs
nas khrus byas te/ /skyil krung mnyam bzhag phyag rgya can/ /yid kyis phyag 'tshal nyi shu gcig /rdo rje chos la dad pas brjod/ /brgyad dang bcu bzhi bco lnga la/ /gos
gsar gyon nas gso sbyong blang / /me tog tsan+dan dkar sogs mchod/ /don grub sdig sel shes rab 'phel/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ /bdud rnams
'joms pa rdo rje yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya ba
lo ke te shwA rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a mi tA b+ha ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+yA
ba lo ke ta shwa rA ya/ ha ri ha ri/ bi d+ha na d+ha ma ka /bo di satwA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ i li mi li/ ci li tsi li/ tu le tu le/ ku ru me ku ru me/ si ri
si ri/ bi si bi ri/ tsa ra ya/ bi sha re/ g+ho ri/ gan+d+ha ri/ tra mi Ni/ ma taM gi /puk+ka si/ ka Ta ya/ mA la tsaN+Da li/ hu ru ma li ni/ tsi li tsi li/ gra na so ma daR+sha ne ku ru/
tsan+d+ra mu khi/ la g+hu ma Na ya ma ti/ AR+ya dak+Shi Na bud+d+ha/ sarba bid+ya nAM/ ma ma pra sA d+ha ni/ sarba bid+ya naM/ I shwa ri swA hA/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta naM/ sarba A pa ri pU ra kA
na/ tad+ya thA/ oM ha ha ha/ ma ma ma/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ hi ri hi ri/ shA te pra shAM te/ sarba pA pa k+Sha yaM ka ri/ a ba lo kA ya kA ru Ni ka /bo d+hi tsit+ta taM ma na si ku ru ba ya lo
kA ya/ ma ma sma ra sma ra man+ta ya pUrbe/ sat+ya a d+hiSh+Tha na kr-i taM te na sa t+ye na/ sa tsi ba tsi nAM/ sarba ak+Sha me/ pa ri pU ra ya/ bud+d+ha k+She tra me/ pa ri sho d+ha ya/ ma me
kash+tsa/ pi he tha nor+tha bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Tha naM swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ oM dze te dze te/ ma hA dze te yaM/ ma ma kA ya/ dush+tsa ri stam+b+ha b+ha/ ga dush+tsa ristam+b+ha/ ma no dush+tsa

ri stam+b+ha/ d+ha ri ta tra stam+b+ha/ ta ta sarbaM k+ShA pa ya/ a lo ka ya/ bi lo ka ya/ sarba ta tha ga tA/ d+ha ri Sha Ni tsi ma hA biSh+kaM k+Sha mi da po da se da d+ha ri ShA NAM/ ma d+hu ma d+hu/ a
ba b+hA sa me d+ha ri ShA NAM/ sarba ma ku sha la a b+hi ba ra daM da na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ na ma AR+ya ba lo ke ta shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA
ya/ sma ra pra ti dz+nyA ma hA satwa si d+h+yaM tu me man+t+ra pa daiHswA hA/ sngags 'di gur gum tsan+dan gyis/ /gro ga la bris sku'i mchog rten/ /sku gdung bcas par gzhug
par bya/ /yang na sku gdung bcas pa yi/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang sku la gdags/ /tshes brgyad nas ni nya yi bar/ /bum pa mchod pa brgyad pa bshams
te/ /dri yi kha dog sna tshogs pa'i/ /'o thug zho dang 'bras can mar/ /tsan+dan dkar po dri ga pur/ /gtor ma dkar dmar bcas pa'o/ /gtso bo'i mdun du dpe
med sa/ /g.yas su dung can 'jigs sam g.yon/ /sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad/ /gtor zhing dus gsum mchod de bkru/ /sdig sbyangs rmi lam 'od du
'bar/ /bdud rnams zlog par byed pa la/ /rtse gsum sor brgyad tshad ldan la/ /thod pa skam po sor drug ste/ /dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /seng ldeng yu ba khru gang pa/ /de yi
rten yang sor drug ste/ /de ni zur brgyad ldan pa la/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che/ /pad+ma ral gri lcags kyu mda'/ /mdung rnams g.yas nas bskor bar dgod/ /nyi shu rtsa
gcig brjod bya ste/ /mtshan mo sngags su gzugs par bya/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ /dug gi tshogs rnams 'joms pa yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs
nas/ /rje btsun mgrin po sngon po yi/ /rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA

kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ sarba ban+d+ha ts+tshe da na kA rA ya/ sarba pA paM sa mu dro ts+tshe da na kA rA ya/ sarba byA d+hi pra sha ma na ka rA ya/ sarba i t+yu pa dra ba bi nA sha na ka rA ya/ sarba b+ha ye

Shu tra nA ya ta s+ya na maskri taM/ i ma AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa ra ta ba nI li kaN+Tha nA ma hr-i da ya mArta ya Sh+yI mi sarba ar+tha sA d+ha nAM shu b+ha tse ta nAM/ sarba satwa nAM/ pA paM mArga bi sho d+ha kaM/
tad+ya thA/ a ba lo ki lo ka ma ti/ lo ka ga te/ e h+ye hi/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ he bo d+hi satwa/ he ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ he pri ya bo d+hi satwa/ he ma hA kA ru Ni ka /sma ra hri da yaM/
e h+ye he/ Ar+yA a ba lo ki te shwa ra/ pa ra ma mai tri tsit+ta kA ru Ni ka/ ku ru ku ru karma/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bid+ya/ de hi de hi me/ a ra
ga maM gsum/ bi haM ga mi ha sid+ha/ yo gi shwa ra/ hu du hu du/ bIR+ya n+te/ ma hA bIR+yan+te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra Ne shwa ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ bi ma lA ma la mu rte/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te
shwa ra/ kr-iSh+NA dzin mu ku Ta/ a laM skr-i ta sha rI ra lam+ba pra laM ma bi lam+ba/ ma hA sid+d+ha shud+d+ha d+ha ra/ ba la ba la/ ma hA ba la/ ma la ma la/ ma hA ma la/ dz+wa la dza la/

ma hA dz+wa la/ kr-iSh+NA pak+Sha kr-iSh+Na bar+N+Na kr-iSh+Na pA sha nI r+g+hA ta na/ he pad+ma ha sta/ dza ya ka ra Ni shwa tsa re shwa ra/ kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ta yadz+nyo pa bI ta/ e h+ye hi wa rA ha mu khi/ tri pu ra
da d+ha ni shwa ra/ nA rA ya Na/ ba la rU pa be Sha d+ha ri/ he nI la kaN+Tha/ he ma hA ha la ha la/ biSha ni rdzi ta/ lo ka s+ya rA ga bi Sha nA nA na/ dwe Sha bi Sha nA sha na/ mo ha bi
Sha na sha na ni rmok+Sha Na/ hu lu hu lu/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ mu hu mu hu/ ha la ha la/ ma hA pad+ma nA b+h+ri/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ bud+h+ya bud+h+ya/ bo d+h+ya ya bo d+ha ya/ ta

wa nI la kaN+Tha/ o d+h+ye hi/ bA ma s+thi ta si ha mu kha/ ha sa ha sa/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ ma hA aT+Ta na r+NI di ne/ e d+h+ye hi/ b+ho b+ho ma hA sid+d+ha/ yo gi shwa ra/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha bA tsi/ sA d+ha

ya sA d+ha ya/ bid+h+yaM/ sma ra staM he b+ha ga wA na/ lo ka bi lo ka staM/ ta thA ga tAM/ da dA he me daR+Sha NaM/ bra sA d+ha ya me swA hA/ sid+d+ha ya swA hA/ ma hA sid+d+ha ya swA hA/ sid+d+ha yo
gI shwa rA ya swA hA/ nI la kaN+ThA ya swA hA/ bA rA ha mu khA ya swA hA/ siM ha mu khA ya swA hA/ ma hA na ra siM ha mu khA ya swA hA/ sid+d+ha bid+yA d+ha rA ya swA hA/ pad+ma ha stA ya swA hA/

ma hA pad+ma ha sta ya swA hA/ badzra ha stA ya swA hA/ ma hA badzra ha ya swA hA/ kr-iSh+Na sarba kra ta yadz+nyA pa bI ta ya swA hA/ ma hA kA la mu ku Ta d+ha rA ya swA hA/ tsakra A yu d+ha d+ha rA ya

swA hA/ shaM khaM shab+da na r+NI da na ka rA ya swA hA/ bo d+ha na ka rA ya swA hA/ bA ma skan+d+ha de sha s+thi tha kr-iSh+Na dzi nA ya swA hA/ bA ma ha sta byA g+hA tsarma ni ba sa nA ya swA hA/ lo ke shwa rA
ya swAhA/ ma hA lo ke shwa rA ya swAhA/ sarba sid+d+he shwa rA ya swA hA/ rak+Sha rak+Sha maM swA hA/ ku ru rak+Sha murti nAM swA hA/ na mo b+ha ga wa ti Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya swA hA/ bo d+hi
satwa ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru kA ya/ sid+d+h+ya me man+t+ra pa dAHswA hA/ smug bu me lan spur len dang / /shel dang baiDUR+ya ka raM/ /gser gyi snod du 'khor bcas
ba/ /maN+Dal dbus bzhag sngags khri brjod/ /mug khri rdo yi kong bur na/ /chur bcas snga dro brdar byas nas/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags brjod de/ /khong du 'thungs pas
dbyig dug dang / /sbyar dug lhan cig skyes dug dang / /bza' nyes tsam yang sel 'gyur na/ /dug rigs gzhan lta smos ci dgos
dogs pas the tshom mi bya'o/ /dad can shes rab ldan pa'i mi/ /rtsa ba'i gsang sngags gang la yang / /nan tan rtse gcig tu brjod na/ /de yis thams cad
'grub par 'gyur/ /gang zhig dad pa'i lcags kyu dang / /blo yi ra bar ldan pa la/ /lha klu 'bum phrag mthus skyob cing / /dkar po dge ba kun slong sems/ /byang
chub rin chen gter thob par/ /sngags kyi mthus ni mdzad pa ste/ /sngags la nyes dad med pa la/ bstan na rang nyid nyams par 'gyur/ /'phags pa spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las/ rigs kyi khyad par gyi sngags byung ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //
de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bsdus pa'i dngos/ /'jig rten mgon po bcu yi dbang / /stobs bcu rgyas pa'i rang bzhin can//
pha rol phyin bcu lhun grub ma/ /sa bcu gcig tu rdzogs nas kyang / /phyogs bcu kun tu khyab mdzad pa'i/ /bcu gcig pa yi mtshan nyid yin/ /bsod nams
skal par ldan pa'i mis/ /rang gi lus la sngags dgod bya/ /sngags dang bcas pa'i lus la ni/ /sred med bus kyang mi tshugs na/ /'jig rten gzhan lta smos kyi
dgos/ /byad dang sha za ro langs dang / /'byung po mtshon dang grib gnon dang / /ltas ngan rnams ni myur du sel/ /bla ma las byung rim pas ni/ /myur du bla med
byang chub 'gyur/ /bla ma'i lung dang bral bas ni/ /nam yang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /spyi bor yi ge oM dkar po/ /nan tan du ni bsam par bya/ /dpral bar yi ge
AHljang gu/ de bzhin du ni bsam par bya/ /lce yi steng du yi ge mchog /hrIHyig dmar 'od ldan par bsam/ /snying gi phyogs su hUM sngon po/ /lte bar ha yig
ser po ste/ /de bzhin gsang bar ho ljang gu/ /bshang ba'i gnas su ho sngon po/ /pus mo gnyis la sa ser skya/ /rkang mthil yi ge ha ljang ser/ /lag mthil
gnyis la hUM dkar po/ /lag dar la ni hrIHsngon te/ /dpung par yi ge hraM dgod bya/ /yi ge'i tshogs kyis byin brlabs nas kyi byin brlabs nas/ /gang dang gang yang rung ba yi/ /rtsol
ba rnams la 'jug par bya/ /rtsol ba de dang de dag kyang / /sngags kyi byin rlabs las byung zhing / /lus kyang sngags kyi ngo bo nyid/ /sngags kyis bskyed pa'i lus
nyid ni/ /sngags dang bcas pa'i lus su 'gyur/ /sngags kyi lus kyi rigs rnams kyi/ /zhing khams du ma sbyangs nas kyang / /'gro ba rnams
kyi lus su ni/ /'gro ba grol ba'i spyod pa ni/ /kun bzang mchog dang mtshungs pa ste/ /'gro dang dbyer med don rig 'gyur/ /don de ma lus thob pa'i thabs//
dag gi rig par gyur pa yis/ /rig 'dzin zhes bya'i dngos po ste/ /de la gang gnas de yi ming / /rig pa 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ste/ /sangs rgyas mu stegs pas mi
shes/ /lhag dang bcas pa'i rtsol ba ni/ /shin tu ngal ba nyid yin te/ /ngal ba nyid kyis gol ba'i lam/ /bgrod par dka' ba de spangs nas/ /shin tu bag
yangs bde ba'i lam/ /skal dman yang dag sgrub 'di la/ /nan tan du ni 'jug par bya/ /ston pas de skad gsungs pa'i tshe/ /'khor rnams dga' nas
thal sbyar te/ /mkha' la me tog gtor nas kyang / /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang gtso/ /thams cad kyis ni phyag 'tshal te/ /bskor ba du ma byas nas kyang //
gdod bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i/ /zhal dang sku yi 'du byed la/ /'dzum bzhin du ni bltas nas kyang / /gsang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag /pus btsugs thal
mo sbyar byas te/ /phyogs bcur rang rang bde bar 'khod/ /de nas 'jig rten mgon pos ni/ /'gro ba'i don du rig sngags gsungs/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi don
rdzogs phyir/ /las kyi sbyor ba'ang tha dad do/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa nA byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te samyakasaM bud+d+hA ya/ na maHsarba

ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+ha te b+h+yaHsamyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaHna ma A R+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twa ya/ ma hA sa twa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ye/ tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu
ru d+hu ru/ iT+Ta/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me/ ku su me ba re/ i le mi li/ /tsi ti dz+wa ma pa la na ye swA hA/ shud+hA ya swA hA/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya swA hA/ 'di
gsungs tshe na sa chen dag /rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur/ /rtsa ba'i snying po stong brjod pas/ /dngos grub ci dang ci 'dod 'grub/ /gzhan yang sngags pas kun
gyi dbur/ /sngon gyi phyag 'tshal bzhi po brjod/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byA ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samya kas bud+d+hA ya/ na maH
sarba ta thA ga tA+ai b+h+yaH/ ar+ha b+h+yaHmyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ha ra ha ra/ i li mi li/
tsi li tsi li/ khi le ha la swAhA/ dkyil 'khor nang du 'jug pa'i sa/ /chu dang gos la bdun bdun brjod/ /khrus byas gos gyon nang
du 'jug /snod sogs rdzas gzhan dag kyang bsam/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma A R+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa nA byA ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+he te samyak+saM bud+d+ha
ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ a r+ha te b+h+yaH/ samyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ na ma AR+ya lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+ha satwa ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru NI kA ya/ taR+ya thA/ oM d+hu ru
d+hu ru/ ha ra ha ra swA hA/ bdun phrag re re btab pa yis/ /spos bsregs pa dang mang me sbar/ /na ma rat+na tra yA/ na ma aR+ya dz+nyA sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta

thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha da te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ a r+ha te b+h+yaH/ samyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ na ma AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA
kA ru Ni kA ya/ t+ya thA/ si ri si ri/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ si d+hi ra si d+hi ri swA hA/ me to byug spos me tog phreng / /bdun bdun brjod la sku gzigs la/ /gtor dang
byug dang gdags par bya/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma aR+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na bya ha ra dza ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ na maHsarba te thA ga te b+h+yaH/

ar+ha te b+h+yaH/ samyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bod+hi satwa ya/ ma hA sa twa yA/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sA d+he sa d+he/ so hi so hi/ so du so du/ bshos
gtsang me tog 'bras bur bcas/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod nas ni/ /zhal zas rnams kyis rnam par mchod/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU

ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ ar+ha te b+h+yaH/ samyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwa ya/
ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sa mA d+hi si/ tsa le tsa le/ tsu ru tsu ru/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru swA hA/ me tog dkar pa'i shing dum bu/ /sum cu bzhi mar sbrang rtsir ni/ /
zhag gcig spangs nas nyin gcig gam/ /nang re nub par re re la/ /sngags re btab nas bsregs nas gzod/ /ci dgos pa rnams bsgrubs na 'grub/ /na mo

rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya dz+nyA na sA ga re bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+ya// ar+ha te b+h+yaH/ samyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ na ma
A r+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bod+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM i li li mi li/ pi li ti li tsi li ti la swA hA/ chu'am thal ba yungs
kar la/ /lan bdun bsngags nas phyogs bzhir gtor/ /sa phyogs nye ring gang du yang / /mtshams gcod pa yi mchog lags

so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa nA byA ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaH/ ar+ha te b+h+yaH/ samyak+saM
bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ na ma Ar ba lo ki shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM bo ti bi ti/ ti Te ti Te/ ba de ba de/ ka tsa ka tsa/ b+ha ga
wA na/ A r+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ sarba sA d+ha naM swA hA/ sku sogs slar yang spyang drang dang / /rang nyid gnas nas ldog don phyir/ /chu la lan bdun btab pa
yis/ /bkrus nas dgongs pa de dag 'grub/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ na maH/

sarba tha thA ga te b+h+yaH/ ar+ha te b+h+yaH/ samyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ na ma AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM badzra hUM hriHhoH/ /'jig
rten 'pho la rab dga' bas/ /zas skom byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas /sku gsung
thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /mgon po zhal ni bcu gcig pa'i/ /rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dza ya

ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha ta samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ ar+ha te b+h+yaH/ samyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bod+hi sa twa ya/ ma hA sa twa ya/ ma hA kA ru/

Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ na maH/ sarba byU ha bi hi sarba ahaM bud+d+he pra shra ba ka saM g+he b+h+yaH/ na mo rat+na tra yo ya/ na ma AR+ya dz+nyA na sa ga ra bai ro tsa nA byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha
te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tA+e b+h+yaH/ ar+ha te b+h+yaH/ bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twa ya/ ma hA sa twa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ a b+ha
ye d+ha na/ sarba pa ta g+ha ra twa na ka raM/ sarba Ar+yA ya ga ba pany+tsa sha sha ma na ka raM/ sarba bi shud+d+ha/ kA lo hi g+ha ba hA/ bi gra hA/ pra ma Na ka raM/ sarba pA paM nA shA ya ka raM
sarba b+h+ya da be ta la/ pi sha mar+d+he na/ du rda sA da ne/ dur ni mi taM/ sarba big+h+naM bi nA ya kAM na/ bo d+hi sa twa ka raM/ pa tsa tsa kra/ dur b+he k+Sha/ sha ke b+ha ya ni ra ka raM/ sA
d+hi pa/ nA ga/ yak+Sha/ gan+d+harba/ a su ra/ ga ru Da/ kin+na ra/ ma ho rA gi/ sarba ts+tshe da na ka raM/ sarba pi shI ke Ta b+ha/ suk+Sha d+ha ga d+ha/ krats+tsha ka li ra/ be Da li/ /a myaM
g+ha la/ bi nA sha kA ra yaM/ na mo nA thA ma hA ka ru Ni ka/ e ka da sha mu khaM/ sa ha sra b+hu dzaM/ sa ha sra ne DaM/ tad+ya thA/ /oM dza ka ri/ yu
dita hA ri Na/ /bi tsi tra mu khi/ /e ka sa mu kha/ /sarba sa g+ha mahA ra Ni dza mu t+te/ sa ha sra b+hu dza ma hA ne traM/ ma hA shrI ni na la kA ra/ ma Ni kuN+Da/ sa sa na d+ha hA sa na t+te/
bi tsit+ta mu la d+ha re/ tsan+d+ra sUR+ya/ a ti re ka /A kA sha ga ga na tsa ri Ni/ maM ga la sha ri dze mu te be bit+ta bi na maM ga le/ b+hu ti maM traM kA ra Ni/ /tsu ru tsu ru shwe ta pA te/
mu ru mu ru/ /shat+ta a ba nat+te/ hu ru hu ru/ b+ha bit+ta mu khi/ /ku ru ku ru/ /tsi tra mu khi/ A di d+ya pA sha pa ra Ni ni/ /dzam+b+ha ni/ maM g+ha d+ha ni/ sarba pA Na Ni/ sarba paR+ya
raM b+he/ ma hA ni/ a mo g+ha pA sha ha sta/ sarba b+ha ya po tsa yo ni rtsa ri/ ag+ni bi shwa/ u da ka/ ba ya/ pra sha ma ni/ ka khod+da ni/ pA na/ oM hi ri hi ri/ dza ya ka
ri/ ba la ka ri/ d+ha na ka ri/ te dza sa ka ri/ b+hi ba b+hi/ pra sha ma ni/ yud+d+ha ni pa ra tsa kra sha ma Ni ni pa ra s+ya/ bi na ni/ mu do ta te ra ni pra b+hu na b+he la/ ma Ni ma Ni
ma hA ma Ni/ ma Ni d+ha re/ tre lo kA/ a laM ka ka ri hi pur+Na ka ri/ tri pUr+Na ga bi daM sa Ni/ ba ra b+he na/ bi t+t+ri pA Ni ni/ sarba biR+ya karma Ni/ su da ni/ sarba byU d+hi ni/ pra sha
ma Ni swAhA/ oM tsi le mi le swAhA/ tsi li tsi li swAhA/ mi li mi li swAhA/ si li si li swAhA/ tsi li li tsi li li swAhA/ tsin+t+ra li ma ti ni swAhA/ ur+d+ha ke sha bi ga la
ke to d+he ma nu mu khi swAhA/ oM ka ra ka ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ muny+tsa muny+tsa muny+tsa ya/ muny+tsa ya/ pra shA ma ya/ yu d+hod d+hA rA Ni swAhA/ tsin+ta
ni ra mA la ka ri phaT/ a su ra na ri ki ti ha phaT/ dza ya ka ri phaT/ ska ti ri phaT/ sa ha sra b+hu dze phaT/ sa ha sra ne tra phaT/ sarba b+ha dra d+ha ra na maHtre te pheT/ sarba b+ha ya

bi mo k+Sha Ni phaT/ ma ra tsa kra na pa ra Ni phaT/ pa ra se n+ya si gru pa Ni phaT/ sarba kr-i t+ya ka ma si du ni phaT/ sarba byA d+hi pra sha ma ni phaT/ sarba bya d+hi bi nA sha ya phaT/ sarba gra ho

ta ts+tshin+da ni phaT/ rak+Sha rak+Sha maM/ sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twa nAM/ sa pa ra sa pa ra/ naM te tsa sha ti sa ma nAM/ sarba pra ya pra ta b+h+yaH/ sarba yut+te b+h+yaH/ dus tri te b+h+yaH/ sarba tri t+ta ka kho rda
sarba be she b+h+yaH/ sarba kA ya bAk+tsita te si tse b+h+yaHrak+Sha rak+Sha maM swAhA/ sa ha sa ha dze/ sa ha sra ni tra/ e ka da sha mu khi/ AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA
swatwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sid+d+h+ya n+tu me man+t+ra pA da ni swAhA/ rje btsun zhal ni bcu gcig pa'i/ /sngags 'di yon tan mtha' yas te/ /gang la 'di ni gtsug
tor du/ /yid bzhin nor bu thogs dang mtshungs/ /'chang dang klog par byed pa des/ /mtha' yas yon tan rnyed par 'gyur
nad dang gdon rnams sel ba dang / /khyad par du ni sdig kun 'byung / /ba dkar mo yi bdud rtsi lngas/ /maN+Dal 'jam po lnga byugs la/ /gtsang spra ldan pas
dbus su ni/ /shing sku ring bsrel ldan pa bzhag /gzhan yang ring bsrel ldan pa yi/ /sku gdung bzhi ni phyogs bzhir te/ /tshad ldan pa yi bum pa ni//
lnga po dbus dang mtshams su ste/ rigs lnga'i mdog dang phyag rgya can/ /sna tshogs rgyan dang mchod pa dang / /srad bu tha dad bri bar bya/ /ci 'dod phyag rgya bris
byas te/ /tshes gcig nas ni bcu bzhi'i bar/ /'dod la dmigs nas sngags brjod de/ /bzhi khri rdzogs nas bco lnga la/ /'dod pa gsol gdab khrus byas nas/ /
ci 'dod myur du 'grub pa dang / /bdud dang bar du gcod ba dang / /rnam par 'tshe dang mi mthun pa/ /khrus kyis nges par sel bar 'gyur/ /sngags brjod
yon tan mtha' yas rnams/ /bsdus nas sgrub po la ldan 'gyur/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang gi /sngags gang brjod pa tsam la yang / /gshis
ngan shi ba bco lnga med/ /skyes bzang bco lnga thob par 'gyur/ /mu ge rgyal po'i chad pa dang / /dug dang mtshon dang g.yul 'gyed dang / /stag sogs sbrul sogs
gcan gzan gdug /dug can zas dang me chus 'chi/ /srog chags mdun du nyal nyes dang / /g.yeng byed dang ni lha 'dres gtses/ /gsor mi rung dang bdag
lceb rnams/ /de la nam yang mi 'jigs so/ /rgyal po chos ldan yul skye zhing / /'phags pa bzhugs dang dus bzang yul/ /bshes gnyen bzang dang
dbang po tshang / /dge la dga' zhing tshul khrims ldan/ /dran khom bzang zhing nor mang rtag /gzhan gyis bkur zhing dgos 'dong sbyor/ /sems bder
'jig rten skyong bas srung / /sangs rgyas zhal mthong don bzang rtags/ /gzhan yang dman la byams sems bskyed/ /snying rje mchi ma 'khrug pa dang / /
yon tan dran nas spro ba dang / /dkon mchog gsum la dang pa dang / /phul du byung ba'i blo yis 'phel/ /tshul bzhin ma yin yid bral dang / /bka' lung
snga snod dad pa rnams/ /yang nas yang du skye bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar spros pa'i gnas mthong na/ /sngags 'di rang bzhin med par byas/ /oM sa b+ha wa shud+d+haHsarba
d+harmaHswA b+ha wa shung+d+ho \u0f85haM/ 'dzin pa dag po'i blo byung tshe/ /sngags 'dis stong pa nyid du bya/ /oM shU nya tA dz+nyA na badzra swA b+ha wa At+ma ko nya haM
gang gis lus ngag yid g.yo na/ /sngags 'dis brtan par byin gyis brlab/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzra swa b+ha wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ gang la
gnod yod sems ldan dang / /ngan gis sa gzhi bgegs yod pa/ /bsal phyir seng ldeng dkar po ni/ /brag las skyes shing gzhon pa las/ /sor
drug tshad ldan phur bu ni/ /brjid ldan rtse mo rno dpal can/ /mgo bo rked pa brgya mdud tshul/ /sor tshad phyed phyed ldan pa la/ /zur ni bcu drug rked pa la/ /sor
gnyis zur brgyad ldan pa'o/ /sor gsum zur gsum rtse rno ba/ /dpal mtho cung zad par reg pa/ /ngos dang skabs ni zab pa ste/ /sngags kyi byin rlabs
ldan pa brgyad/ /khang pa'i zur dang phyogs bzhi bor/ /g.yas su phyogs pa gzugs par bya/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ /na ma AR+ya dz+nyA sA na ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha
rA dzA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tA ar+ha te b+h+yaH samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da
badzra kro d+ha ya/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ a mr-i te hUM phaT/ ltas ngan thams cad 'joms pa dang / /gnas khang
byin gyis brlabs pa dang / tshe dang longs spyod rtag pa dang / dal 'byor phun sum tshogs pa dang / /dang po thal mo sbyar byas te/ phyis ni lag g.yon sdigs
mdzub bcas/ /oM dang a la la la ho/ /zhes ni brjod cing khang pa yi/ /nang du 'jug pa khro bor bcas/ /de nas hUM sgras se gol gtogs/ /de nas oM AH
badzra dang / /s+tha na pa Ni b+h+yaHa haM/ rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM phaT brjod/ /shin tu 'jam pa'i gdan la ni/ /rdo rje skyil krung gis gnas nas/ /bsrangs te mig ni sna
rtser phab/ /dal ba'i rlung ldan rkan la ni/ /lce yis cung zad reg par bya/ /lte ba cung zad 'khum pa yis/ /sems ni bag yod gnas par bya/ /rtag pa
ma yin mi rtag min/ /gtsang ba ma yin mi gtsang min/ /bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal min/ /bdag dang ngar min bdag med min/ /blang dang dor
ba'i 'jig tshogs min/ /sems ma yin zhing sems byung min/ /phung khams skye mched med ma yin/ /yod min rtag min chad pa min/ /mun pa ma
yin shes rab min/ /'gro min 'ong min gnas ma yin/ /sna tshogs sprin glog du ba ni/ /'dod gzugs du ma sgyur byed pa/ /mkha' byung nam mkha' la
ni thim/ /'gro 'ong ston pa 'dod bskul ba/ /med mod na yang de ltar spyod/ /yul gyis ma skyes dbang po min/ /dus kyis ma yin gtan gyis min/ /
rgyu dang de bzhin rten gyis min/ /gnas skabs gzhan yang de la med/ /de la sems pa'i sems nyid kyang / /gang nas mi 'ongs gar mi gnas/ /gar
yang ma song brtags na stong / /brtag par byed pa rtog pa tsam/ /dngos rnams brtags pa ming tsam ste/ /kun rdzob tsam du ming yig la/ /brten
nas rang gi sems bzung na/ /drod kyi bzhi pa dang por gzung / /phyung ba'i gnyis pa de la brten/ /de la dang po gnyis pas bskor/ /dang po'i bco
lngas mnan pa ste/ /bcu drug pa ni grogs su gzhag /yi ge drug la grub pa ni/ /sangs rgyas drug gi rang bzhin te/ /'od zer rnam pa drug dang bcas/ /
rlung drug gis ni dbang byas nas/ /yul ni rnam pa drug la 'jug /yul drug dag gis dbang byas nas/ /nyon mongs rnam pa drug dang bcas/ /nyon
mongs rgyas par 'gyur ba yin/ /phung po rnam pa drug dang ldan/ /phung po grangs kyi dbye bas ni/ /yan lag drug drug 'phel bar 'gyur/ /yan lag rdzogs
pa'i grib mas ni/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems sgrib byed/ /sgrib gnyis go bas mthug po ni/ /bsal dka'i ri bo dang bcas pa/ /rtag chad gnas su zhugs
pa'o/ /srog rtsol bsdams pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /phyi rol snang ba nub par 'gyur/ /rtsol dang bral nas dga' skye ste/ /yi ge la ni sems gnas 'gyur/ /yi ge
gsal ba'i 'od zer ni/ /ba spu khung rnams thams cad nas/ /sems dang bcas pa ldang 'jug ste/ /slar yang thig le bsdus nas ni/ /yi ge nyid kyang mi
dmigs so/ /'dzin pa de las thos nas kyang / /sgyu ma'i rnam pa rjes su dran bya/ /de la goms nas ting 'dzin ni/ /nyams pa med pa thob par 'gyur/ /ting
'dzin de brtan gyur nas ni/ /lus 'dis rig pa 'dzin pa thob/ /rig 'dzin de la gnas nas ni/ /bla med byang chub de thob 'gyur/ /skad cig de la dngos rnams
ni/ /nam mkha' lta bur dag nas kyang / /mkha' ltar kun la khyab par spyod/ /rten ni spyan ras gzigs dbang ste/ /lus ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal lo/ /
yan lag phyag na rdo rje ste/ /mgo dang thod ni ma pham pa/ /gtsug tor sgrib pa rnams sel nyid/ /nyi zla kun tu bzang bo ste shas chu
me rlung nam mkha' dang / /rnam shes nyid dang bcas pa'o/ /thams cad dbyer med 'gyur ba ste/ /bsam gtan la ni gnas pa'i phyir/ /stsal rnams so sor
bsdu bar bya/ /sems klong pas ni nges par 'grub/ /'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi/ /dus ni rtag pa ma yin te/ /mi rtog sems nyid 'brel gyur nas/ /
dus la tha dad mi rtog go/ /nyi ma'i 'khor lo chu rgyun dang / /nam mkha'i phyogs ni ji lta bar/ /sems kyang sems kyis btsal bar bya/ /gzhan ni go
skabs mi 'byed do/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las/ /thun mong gi sngags byung ba'i
le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas drang srong gnas nas ni/ /sna tshogs gzugs ldan zhes bya ba/ /bskal pa du mar sbyangs pa yi/ /byang chub
sems dpa' rig 'dzin zhig /rgya cher rang gi 'khor bcas la/ /dkyil 'khor drug tu lhags nas ni/ /rmad byung chen po'i tshogs kyis mchod/ /phyag
'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /thal sbyar 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis ni/ /ston pa la ni 'di skad gsol/ /oM/ /mtha' yas spros pa nyer zhi zhing / /zhi mdzad du
rab spyod mdzad/ /rtog bcom rtog mkhyen rtog yongs zhugs/ /ye shes kun rgyal phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhi las zhi gyur mtha' 'byung ba/ /chos rnams
kun mchog zhi chos che/ /spros med las spros dkar bcu bya/ /mtha' yas chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /grol gyur grol mdzad dag pa che/ /dag par spyod pa
gtsang ma mgon/ /tshogs rdzogs tshogs ldan tshogs spyod rgyal/ /tshogs rtag bdag nyid phyag 'tshal lo/ /rab mdzes thugs rje'i nyi mas brgyan/ /
'jig rten rab gsal mdzad pa'o/ /rtag pa don chen rtag zhugs la/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal/ /khams gsum bag chags
kyis dkrugs pa/ /thibs po'i ling rtog zhugs pa rnams/ /mngon du snang bar brjod pa dang / /sems la gsal myur shin tu dga'/ /mngon sum med
la brjod bral yang / lkog tu gyur pa smos ci dgos/ /klog don mngon du byed pa la/ /phyag rgya dang ni 'dra 'bag mchog /mngon sum thob ldan ming
nas kyang / /don la sems kyi gsal ba skye/ /don gang yang yang goms pa las/ /sems kyi 'jug pa rtog pa ste/ /de gsal
mi rtog blo 'bras bu/ /sgom pa'i pha rol phyin pa'o/ /blo dman rnams kyis 'jug pa dang / /'bring po 'gro bar bya phyir dang / /rnon po rdzogs sangs rgyas
'gyur phyir/ /gzugs brnyan byung tshul bshad du gsol/ /myur du 'jug dang grol ba dang / /myur du byang chub cher 'gyur zhing / /gzugs brnyan
dge ba'i tshul 'byung can/ /'dren pas de ring bshad du gsol/ /mkha' sbyin rtog pa med pa la/ /mtshan mar gzung du med pa ltar/ /rnam rtog gis
dkrugs sems la ni/ /su zhig mtshan mar 'dzin par 'gyur/ /dmigs pa'i mtshan ma gsal byed pa/ /gzugs brnyan tshad dang ldan pa
ste/ /legs par 'gyur ba'i yid 'jug cing / /byin rlabs nges par 'jug par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'dren pa gtsos/ /ljags kyi
dbang po rab bkram nas/ /gzugs brnyan dge ba'i tshul byung ba/ /nga las mnyan par brtson pa ni/ /legs pa lha yi drang srong mchog /rig 'dzin
byang chub sems khyod legs/ /rtse gcig sems kyis nyan nas kyang / /legs par gsungs pa yid la zhog /khyod la yang dag bshad bya ba/ /byin rlab
dgyes pa'i gzugs brnyan dang / /tshon gyis ris su bris pa'am/ /rin chen rigs sam sa rdo'am/ /shing la byas na mchog tu bsngags/ /dang po'i
las can sems can la/ /dmigs pa gsal bar 'gyur pa dang / /byin rlabs mchog ni 'jug par 'gyur/ /tsan+dan dkar po gsal zhing drang / /gzhon
zhing chag pa med pa la/ /bsang zhing dud pas bdugs nas ni/ /dad ldan ngang tshul bzang bas gzhag /'jig rten dbang phyug mgon gyi sku/ /bco brgyad
sor tshad ldan pa la/ /gdan khri dag ni sor dgu ste/ /rgyab yol sor tshad drug gis bskyed/ /bzhengs te ldem bag nyams dga' ba/ /rin chen du ma'i
gzugs kyis brgyan/ /g.yas kyi dang po bgrang phreng ste/ /gnyis pa mi 'jigs stsol pa'i phyag /g.yon pa dang po pad+ma dmar/ /gnyis pa ril ba
spyi blugs thogs/ /zhal gyi grangs ni bcu gcig la/ /mdun gyi zhal gsum mtshan bzang can/ /byams pa snying rje dga' ba'i mdangs/ /dkar po
dkar ser dmar skya 'o/ /g.yon gyi gsum ni khro bo'i zhal/ /sgeg pa'i mdangs dang ldan pa ste/ /dmar dang dmar ser le
brgan no/ /g.yas su gtum pa'i khro zhal gsum/ /sngo dang ser dang ljang gu'o/ /rgyab tu khro gtum mdog dmar ba/ /rta skad rab tu 'tsher ba'i zhal/ /
khro ba'i zhal rnams mche ba gcigs/ /mig gsum dbu skra ser po ni/ /gyen du thor tshugs bcings pa'o/ /steng du sangs rgyas 'dzum pa'i zhal/ /
byi ru bcag pa'i mtshan 'dra ba'i/ /dbu yi cod pan nang rnams su/ /'di dag phyogs bcu'i thub pa rnams/ /re re bzhin du bzhugs par bya/ /dbu rgyan
cod pan ldan pa dang / /rna rgyan mgul rgyan dpung rgyan dang / /lag rgyan se mo dor bcas pa/ /do shal rkang gdub ska rags can/ /rgyan dang na bza'
mdzes pas brgyan/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /ri mo dag la dga' gyur nas/ /yid gzhungs dal spyod khro ba med/ /sred chung shes rab snying rje che/ /
thabs ldan ri mo rgyud la mkhas/ /bsam pa bzang ldan tshul khrims srung / /'dri chos gzo la gzhungs pa yis/ /dben zhing nyams dga'i gnas su
bri/ /gzugs bzang yid dal gtsang ldan pa'i/ /bu mos bkal ba'i ras la ni/ /tshon bzang ngur smrig mdog bya'o/ /'thas par bcags te 'jam por bya/ /
thig gi phyogs cha bshad nas kyang / /ser skya tshon gyi gzugs brnyan no/ /tshad la mkhas pa tshad ldan pa'i/ /nan tan du ni bri bar bya/ /dkar po wa yi shel
yin te/ /dmar po sems rtso li khri 'o/ /sngon po rams dang mthing shing ste/ /ser po ba bla dag pa yin/ /nag po snag tsha nyid yin te/ /ljang gu rams
dang ldong ros sbyar/ /yang na spang ma nyid kyis bya/ /smug rtsi rams dang skags sbyar te/ /gzhan yang ci rigs sbyar bar bya/ /sbyin dang bral na grugs par
'gyur/ /shing spyin ser dang ka pi ta/ /lo mi ta dang than dza ra/ /de dag so sor sbyar ba yis/ /gsal zhing dkrugs med dag par byed/ /a ta pas ni snun par
byed/ /gan+to has ni rtag par 'gyur/ /rgyas par gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa/ /yang na sgo gcig pa yang rung / /dkyil 'khor cha rim gsum pa'am/ /yang na gnyis
sam gsum yang rung / /dbus su gdong bcu gcig pa ni/ /mdzes pa'i lha mo bzhi ldan bri/ /shar du spyan ras gzigs dbang gi /dkyil 'khor rnam snang
gtso bo can/ /de yang spyan sogs lha mo bzhi/ /phyag bzhi pa dang bcas pa'o/ /lhor ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi /dkyil 'khor
shAka thub gtso bo can/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang / /'bebs pa'i phyag rgya ldan pa 'o/ /nub tu rig ma'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /sems dpa'
bzhi bzhir bcas pa 'o/ /dbus su rdo rje dbang mo yang / /mdun du rdo rje rtag pa ste/ /g.yas su rdo rje dpal 'byung ngo / /rgyab tu rdo rje dpag med de/ /g.yon
du rdo rje don grub bo/ /shar du lha mo spyan ma ni/ /mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' 'o/ /g.yas su rdo rje rgyal po 'o/ /rgyab tu rdo rje chags pa ste/ /g.yon du rdo rje
legs pa'o/ /lhor ni lha mo mA ma kI/ /mdun du rdo rje rin chen no/ /g.yas su rdo rje nyi ma ste/ /rgyab tu rdo rje rgyal mtshan no/ /g.yon du rdo rje bzhad pa
yin/ /nub tu na bza' dkar mo yang / /mdun du rdo rje chos yin te/ /g.yas su rdo rje rnon po yin/ /rgyab tu rdo rje rgyu zhes pa/ /g.yon du rdo rje smra ba 'o/ /
byang du lha mo sgrol ma yang / /mdun du rdo rje las yin te/ /g.yas su rdo rje srung ba 'o/ /rgyab tu rdo rje gnod sbyin te/ /g.yon du rdo rje khu tshur ro/ /'khor
gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /kun kyang zhal gcig phyag bzhi ste/ /g.yas kyi dang po rang rigs rtags/ /gnyis pa thams cad skyabs sbyin te/ /
g.yon gyi dang po pad+ma yang / /phyogs kyi kha dog ldan pa 'o/ /gnyis pas phyogs kyi mdog ldan pa'i/ /sngags nor phreng yang 'chang ba'o/ /'khor gyi
lha mo da dag kun/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /g.yon pa'i tha ma bum pa 'chang / /lhag ma gong ltar shes par bya/ /byang du khro bo'i dkyil 'khor
yang / /khro mo zhi bzhir bcas pa 'o/ /dbus su rdo rje hUM byed de/ /sngon po ut+pa la yi mdog /mdun du sngo bsangs chen po ste/ /g.yas su rdo rje drag mo 'o/ /
rgyab tu rdo rje brjed byed pa'o/ /g.yon du rdo rje mthu chen mo/ /shar gyi 'khor lo'i cha rtsibs la/ /khro bo gshin rje gshed po nag /mdun du rdo rje dbang zhal ma/ /
g.yas su rdo rje khyab 'jug mo/ /rgyab tu rdo rje gzhon nu ma/ /g.yon du rdo rje skul byed ma/ /'khor lo rtsibs ni mnyam pa la/ /khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub ser/ /
mdun du rdo rje nag byed mo/ /g.yas su rdo rje me chen mo/ /rgyab tu rdo rje zla ba mo/ /g.yon du rdo rje rnon po ma/ /rtsibs gsum rdo rje gtsug tor gser/ /rdo rje
khro mo khrag 'thung mo/ /rdo rje'i rlung 'dzin chen mo dang / /rdo rje snang byed mor bcas pa'o/ /nub kyi rtsibs la rta mgrin dmar/ /mdun
du rdo rje rmongs byed ma/ /g.yas su rdo rje zhi ba mo/ /g.yon du rdo rje tshol byed ma/ /lnga pa'i rtsibs la de bzhin du/ /khro bo bgegs mthar byed pa ljang / /
mdun du rdo rje gsor byed ma/ /g.yas su rdo rje gtum mo che/ /rgyab tu rdo rje ro langs ma/ /g.yon du rdo rje rengs byed ma/ /rtsibs drug 'khor lor dri ba
ni/ /rdo rje gnod mdzes rgyal ljang sngo/ /mdun du rdo rje chu dbang mo/ /g.yas su dngos grub 'byung ba mo/ /rgyab tu rdo rje mtshan mo dag /g.yon du rdo rje mkha'
dbang phyug /de ltar khro bo khro mo rnams/ /kun kyang zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'o/ /khro bo phyag gnyis mda' gzhu bkang / /g.yas su be con kha T+wAM dang / /
tho ba rdo rje rgya gram dang / /'khor lo gtun shing rdo rje rnams/ /rang rtags phyag rgya 'chang ba'o/ /g.yon na sdigs mdzub zhags pa'o/ /kun kyang stag gi
sham thabs can/ /khro mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni/ /g.yas na gri gug cang te'u ste/ /g.yon na thong khrag kha T+wAM ngo / /zhing lpags dag gi chos gos te/ /
gzig gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ /khro bo'i g.yon na sgeg pa'i tshogs/ /de rgyab cha yi snam bu la/ /phyogs rer lha mo bzhi bzhi dang / /de bzhin byang
chub sems dpa' bzhi/ /phyogs rer brgyad brgyad bkod pa ste/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis bzhengs pa'i tshul/ /de bzhin bskor bzhin sems ma mchog /lcags
kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang / /'bebs ma rang rtags phyag rgya g.yas/ /gnyis pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya ste/ /g.yon pa phyogs mdog pad+ma dang / /gnyis
pa dar gyi chos gos so/ /kun kyang sgeg nyams ldan par bri/ /de rgyab dkyil 'khor cha la ni/ /shar du brgya byin glang chen zhon/ /g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje ste/ /
gnyis pa skyabs sbyin phyag rgya can/ /g.yon pa phyogs mdog pad+ma ste/ /gnyis pa rang mdog phreng ba bri/ /de yi g.yon du tshangs pa ser/ /ngang pa'i khri
la bzhugs pa la/ /g.yas kyi dang po nyi ma 'chang / /me yi phyogs su nyi ma ste/ /mdog dmar ra zhon me dpung 'dzin/ /lho yi phyogs su gshin rje
sngo/ /thong dbyug bzung ba ma he zhon/ /bden bral du ni srin po nag /rtse gsum bzung nas srin po zhon/ /nub tu chu lha dkar po ni/ /klu yi khri la sbrul zhags
bzung / /de yi g.yon du sa bdag dkar/ /bum pa bzung ste rus sbal zhon/ /lha min phyogs su rlung lha ljang / /ba dan bzung ste
sha ba zhon/ /byang du gnod sbyin mi la zhon/ /ljang nag phyag na gter sgrom mo/ /byang shar dbang ldan dkar po ni/ /rtse gsum bzung ste khyu mchog zhon/ /sgo
bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi/ /phyogs kyi kha dog go cha can/ /pi wang ral gri zhags pa can/ /rin chen dbyug tho g.yas kyis 'chang / /gnyis pa skyabs
kyi phyag rgya ste/ /g.yon pa ma la bgrang phreng ni/ /phyogs kyi kha dog ldan pa'o/ /kun kyang sgeg nyams phyogs kyi mdog /rim bzhin stag gzig dom
seng+ge'i/ /khri la bzhugs pa'i gzigs pa can/ /rang rang phyogs kyi sgo la ni/ /srung brtson shin tu 'grus pa 'o/ /dkyil 'khor cha brgyad khor yug tu/ /
bza' shing me tog spos shing dang / /mdzes pa'i shing tshogs tshal gseb tu/ /mdzes pa'i bya tshogs dud 'gro dang / /lha yi bu dang bu mo sogs/ /de bzhin
klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /dri za grul bum bu mo'o/ /rol mo byed pa du ma bri/ /'di ltar dad na la las ni/ /'jig rten skyong pa'i nang rol tu/ /gza' dang rgyu skar
sum cu drug /rin chen pad+ma la gnas bri/ /smin drug pad+ma dmar po 'chang / /snar ma mgo ni ut+pa la/ /nabs so pad dkar lag tri shul/ /rgyal ni bgrang phreng
skag sbrul nag /mchu ni pad ser gre mnyam bzhag /me bzhi pad dkar dbo dbyug pa/ /nag pa pad+ma sa ri ras/ /sa ga po ti lha mtshams bum/ /snon ni rdo
rje snrubs dbyug ste/ /chu snod ril ba chu smad pad/ /byi bzhin gser gyi 'khor lo ste/ /gro zhun chu skyogs mon gru dang / /mon gre shel sgong khrums stod kyis/ /
ral gri khrums smad ku mu da/ /nam gru ba dan tha skar gyis/ /shing lo bra nye dbyug sran no/ /zla ba ku mud dkar po ste/ /nyi ma pad+ma dmar po 'o/ /mig dmar
me yi phung po ste/ /gza' lag ut+pal sngon po 'o/ /phur bus chos kyi glegs bam mo/ /pa ba sangs ni bgrang phreng bzung / /spen pa lag na ral gri
'chang / /sgra gcan bdud rtsi'i gzhong bu 'o/ /nang gi grwa yi char gtogs pa/ /bkra shis lha mo brgyad yin te/ /rtag dga' ma dang rgyal ma shar/ /don
grub ma dang mi pham lhor/ /nub tu bde ba bde dga' ma/ /myur grub ma dang gtan ma byang / /rtse lnga rtse gsum rdo rje dang / sngon po ser po rin chen dang / /dkar dang
dmar dang ut+pal dang / /ut+pal sngo dang ku mu da/ /dang po phyag na rim bzhin 'chang / /skyabs sbyin pad+ma bgrang phreng ni/ /lhag ma
rnams kyis rim bzhin 'chang / /de dag thams cad phyogs mdog go/ rgyas pa'i spros pas skyo na yang / /lnga bcu brgyad dam sum cu bdun/ /nyi shu dgu
'am nyi shu lnga/ /bco lnga dgu 'am lnga 'am gcig /yi ge phyag rgya gzugs brnyan tshogs/ /sprul pa'i sku yi cho 'phrul te/ /rang gis ji ltar 'dod pa
yi/ /sems kyi byin rlabs nyid du 'gyur/ /bde gshegs sku dang po ti dang / /phyag rgya sogs pa rab gnas bya/ /nyams sam dri mas gos pa ni/ /bkrus
dang bshig nas dag byed pa/ /rtog pa med pa'i sems kyis su/ /de la bsod nams dpag tu med/ /gzugs tshogs sngo bas dman gyur kyang / /de yis
bsod nams mtha' yas thob/ /'phrin las dang ni sku gsang ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid de/ /de bzhin nyid de stong pa nyid/ /byang chub
nam mkha'i mtshan nyid dang / /mtshan dang dpe byad kun rdzob ste/ /sgyu ma rmi lam lta bu 'o/ /sum cu gnyis dang brgyad cu ni/ /yi ge brda dang spros pa'i sku/ /
long sku bsod nams rgyu mthun 'bras/ /sprul sku las kyi rnam smin 'bras/ /kun rdzob don dam mtshan nyid ldan/ /dag dang ma dag skal ldan la/ /de gshegs 'phrin las gzugs sku
gnyis/ /tshogs gnyis la ni sku gsum byung / /rnam byang kun nyon mongs pas stong / /lus ngag yid kyi spyod yul min/ /dmigs med nam mkha'i khams
rtogs pa/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi chos sku 'o/ /rtag chad med pa'i rten 'brel ni/ /skye 'gag med par thugs chud pas/ /yid kyi rnam shes 'jug lam gyis/ /bsam
gtan goms pas shes par bya/ /dad pa'i lcags kyu shes rab can/ /lha klu 'bum phrag dkar po'i sems dge ba/ /kun slong byang chub gter gyi rin chen
nor/ /thob par 'dis mdzod 'khor los bsgyur ba 'byung / /sems kyi dbus su gces phyir ngal spyod pas/ /dbang por bya ba'i rgyud kun khyab par du/ /pad+ma'i
dra ba phyag stong gis brgyan pa/ /myur du sgrub pa'i thabs mang gsungs pa rnams/ /bsdus brtson dad byas ldan pas gces su bya/ /bla ma'i lung yod snying rje
gang ldan pa/ /rgyal dang rgyal sras tshogs rnams kun dgyes nas/ /'jig rten skyong tshogs dga' ba smos ci dgos/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las/ gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //
de nas dga' ldan gnas 'khrungs pa/ /bskal pa du mar tshogs bsags pa/ /rig pa gsum ldan lha yi bu/ /mdzes pa'i tog ces mtshan gsol
pa/ /spyan ras gzigs la cher dad nas/ /bzhengs te thal mo sbyar byas shing / /'khor tshogs chen po dang bcas pas/ /mgrin gcig tu ni 'di skad
gsol/ /oM khams gsum kun gyi bla ma gtso/ /'dren pa mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sa gsum ye shes 'od po che/ /bde bar gshegs la phyag
'tshal lo/ /yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog /rig sngags bde ldan byin rlabs can/ /g.yung drung rtag pa dam chos gtso/ /kun rtog sel
skyob phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtag par brtse ldan spyan ras gzigs/ /byang chub sems tshogs 'byung tshogs rgyal/ /bya ba byas nas bskal par gnas/ /
pad 'chang tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bskal pa du mar bsags pa yi/ /thugs rje ye shes las byung ba'i/ /rig sngags phreng ba byin rlabs
can/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang gis/ /sems can rnams la phan don phyir/ /phyag rgya 'phrin las ldan par gsungs/ /las kyi dri ma dang ldan
zhing / /nyon mongs bdag rgyal gyis bcings nas/ /le lo ser sna'i 'dab rdzab can/ /khur dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams/ /myur du grol bar bya ba dang / /thugs
rje nyi ma bkram byas te/ /srid 'dab stug po skem pa dang / /myur du sangs rgyas 'grub bya'i phyir/ /lha dang gsang sngags blang ba dang / /'phrin las sbyor ba
ldan pa dang / /brgyud pa rgyun gzhan med pa yi/ /sbyor ba'i tshul 'byung bshad du gsol/ /rig sngags rjes gnang med pa ni/ /bsgrubs kyang 'bras med ngal
ba ste/ /'dren pa med pa'i shing rta ni/ /'khor lo bzang yang gang du phyin/ /nyon mongs rtsa ba gcad pa'i phyir/ /rig sngags ral gri rno dang mtshungs/ /bdag 'dzin
go cha 'bigs pa'i mdung / /sdug bsngal mtsho skem nyi ma che/ /kun rtog rdul phung sreg pa'i me/ /shes rab me tog 'khrungs pa'i rlan/ /nad dan kun sel sman
mchog ste/ /bag tshogs sel ba'i sred med bu/ /bag chags bkru ba'i chu rgyun te/ /longs spyod 'phel ba'i gter chen nyid/ /'khor ba las rgal gru
gzings te/ /nyes pa kun sel rlung dang mtshungs/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa che/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas chen
gyis/ /srab 'jam ring ba'i ljags bkram nas/ /tshangs pa'i gsung snyan dbyangs kyis gsung / /'gro la thugs rje chen po yis/ /sngags 'byung
brgyud pa'i ri ma 'byung ba'i/ /cho ga dam pa nyan brtson pa/ /shin tu legs so lha yi bu/ /nyams dga' dge ba'i sa phyogs su/ /sa yi cha mnyam
dkyil 'khor ltar/ /pad+ma'i gdan 'dra'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /tshon sna ma lus rnams kyis bri/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang sogs/ /sangs
rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /rig pa'i lha mo khro bor bcas/ /'jig rten skyong sogs ma lus pa'i/ /sku 'am phyag rgya bkod pa dang / /mchod
pa'i tshogs kyang bkram par bya/ /mar me yon chab byug spos dri/ /zhal zas gtor ma sna tshogs dang / /gzhan yang zas skom sna tshogs dang /
rgyan dang na bza' lhab lhub dang / /sil snyan me tog phreng du ma/ /yid 'ong mdzes pa'i tshig gis brgyan/ /slob ma gus pas bla ma la/ /yon phul brtson
byas 'di skad gsol/ /sems can kun gyi sems kyi gnyen/ /dmus long lam log las 'dren ba/ /rab rib sel ba'i thur ma can/ /bdag la 'dren pa'i
sgrol ma sogs/ /shes rab snying rje'i skya ba can/ /thos bsam sgom pa'i gru gzings can/ /las can sdug bsngal chu sgrol ba'i/ /thabs brtson mnyan pa khyod
phyag 'tshal/ /byang chub lam mthong dpag yas thugs/ /'gro rnams thar lam rten gzigs pa/ /dge brtson dge la skul ba 'o/ /dge bcu med pa dag la
stsol/ /dam tshig sdom gnas ngang tshul bzang / /bag yod dbyangs mkhas ltung ba med/ /chos don gnyer ba'i don skyob pa/ /skyabs dang sdom gnas bdag la
stsol/ /dpa' brtan zhi dul spyad pa yi/ /dga' slad slob dpon 'di skad brjod/ /oM/ gti mug rnam dag bde gshegs thugs/ /rnam par snang mdzad skyabs su
mchi/ /zhe sdang rnam dag rdo rje thugs/ /mi bskyod pa la skyabs su mchi/ /ser sna rnam dag longs spyod gter/ /rin chen mdangs ldan skyabs su mchi/ /'dod
chags rnam dag pad+ma'i gsung / /'od dpag med la skyabs su mchi/ /phrag dog rnam dag 'phrin las rgyal/ /don yod rdo rje skyabs su mchi/ /AHgnas med
mkha' dang mnyam spyod pa/ /chos dbyings chos la skyabs su mchi/ /skye med skye snang ltar sgrub chos/ /'phags lam brgyad la
skyabs su mchi/ /don gcig tshogs lam bcu gnyis grangs/ /gsung rab yan lag skyabs su mchi/ /rgyu 'bras snang ba'i so sor rtog /nyan thos
dge 'dun skyabs su mchi/ /gcig gam tshogs spyod rdzu 'phrul che/ /rang rgyal dge 'dun skyabs su mchi/ /snying rje shes rab byang chub 'brel/ /sems
chen tshogs la skyabs su mchi/ /gsod dang rku rdzun 'khrig spyod dang / /tshig rtsub phra ma dag 'khyal dang / /brnab sems gnod sems log lta spyod/
thar pa'i srog gcod bcu po spong / /chang 'thung til mar 'tshir las dang / /mgar dang rgya skyegs rtswa shing gcod/ /srog chags tshogs dang mgo zlum
tshong / /mtho ris lus kyi gegs chen spong / /rtags dang phyag rgya 'dra 'bag dang / /rten dang dge 'dun rtags yi ge/ /bgrang phreng 'dzin pa'i yo
byad sogs/ /'gom dang bshig pa gtan du spong / /mchod pa nyid dang sgog pa dang / /'bags dang lhag mar gyur pa dang / /sha dang dman pa'i
lag gi zas/ /srog chags yod pa'i chu rnams spong / /deng nas bzung ste ji srid pa/ /byang chub snying por thug bar du/ /sdom pa yi ni tshul khrims dang /
dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims sogs/ /nam du mi dor brtan por gzung / /lha dang slob dpon yid byed cing / /rdo rje
dril bu phyag rgya gzung / /'gro la zang zing mi 'jigs skyabs/ /chos kyi sbyin pa ci 'byor stsol/ /theg gsum tha dad chos tshul rnams/ /mi 'gal sbyor bas
rgyun du spyod/ /lus ngag yid dang longs spyod bcas/ /ser sna med pas mchod 'os mchod/ /lha dang lha min gsang ba pa'i/ /ri 'byung sku gsung thugs kyi
rgya/ /des spyod dam tshig dam pa rnams/ /sdom tshul brtan po gzung bar bya/ /'gro rnams kun la snying brtse dang / /yi dwags rnams la gtor ma sbyin/ /dzam+b+ha
la ni chu yis mchod/ /yi dwags dag kyang chus mnyes bya/ /de rjes slob ma rab dga' nas/ /ci 'byor lha dang bla ma mchod/ /dga' chen las sbyor slob dpon
dgongs/ /snying brtse bdag la gzigs nas kyang / /lha dang sngags dang byin rlabs thabs/ /de bdag brtse phyir stsal du gsol/ /rgyal ba sras bcas tshogs
bzhugs pa'i/ /nyams dga' thar pa'i grong khyer che/ /yid bzhin longs spyod char du 'bab/ /khang chen der ni bdag 'jug
'tshal/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /zab mo'i sangs rgyas spyod yul ba/ /spros bral dmigs su med pa'i don/ /lam chen bdag la stsal du
gsol/ /de nas slob dpon sngags rig pa/ /de nyid bcu sbyar mkhas pa pos/ /g.yon pa chos gos rtse bzung ste/ /lag pa g.yas chos phyag
rgya can/ /gsang bstod 'dzum pa'i 'od mdangs rgyas/ /dang ldan pa ni 'di skad brjod/ /oM/ bu shog theg pa chen po yi/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin
phyir/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga rnams/ /khyod la nges par bstan par bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams
cad kyi/ /rdo rje gsang sngags rab bsgoms pas/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes rnams/ /shAkya seng+ge dpa' bos kyang / /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam
med kyis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa'i/ /dpung chen dag kyang 'dis bcom mo/ /'jig rten rjes 'dul rdzogs bya'i phyir/ /'khor lo bskor nas
mya ngan 'das/ /de phyir kun thob bya ba'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /sngags dang rdzas kyi srung ba dang / /lha yi rten mig de la mchod/ /u dum+ba ra'i me
tog ltar/ /'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen dag /brgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig /'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ngo / /sngags kyi spyod tshul 'byung ba ni/ /de bas
kyang ni chos dkon te/ /gang gis mtshungs med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /bskal pa du mar bsags pa'i sdig /gang la sdig
khur ci yod pa/ /lha yi dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang / /byin rlabs tsam gyis byang gyur nas/ /blo gros dri ma med pa yis/ /spyod tshul rlabs pa zhugs nas
lha/ /ngan 'gro sdug bsngal rgyun bcad nas/ /mtshan ldan sku ni gzhan don spyod/ /bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis/ /rnyed pa mtshungs med de ring
rnyed/ /gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pas/ /bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams ni/ /gang du skyes kyang gzung ba'i phyir/ /deng nas khyed rnams theg chen rigs/
sha stag tu ni skye nges te/ /theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba/ /dpal dang ldan pa'i lam mchog 'di/ /gang du rgyas par khrid nas kyang / /bde bar gshegs
pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de bas spro la brtson par gyis/ /slob ma ku sha dge ba yi/ /stan la nyal nas rmi lam dri/ /gsang dang sbyong ba
byas nas kyang / /chus bkrus 'di rnams bklags pa dang / bkra shis du ma bklags byas te/ /gdong pa dar gyis bcings nas kyang / /'bras kyi
me tog phreng ba ni/ /lha yi dkyil 'khor dbus su dor/ /slar blangs mgo la bcing bya ste/ /pad+ma ldan rigs mtshan gyis brgyan/ /mig phye de la lha
rnams dang / /byang chub phyogs chos mtshan ma yi/ /yon tan ye shes stobs mnga' ba/ /mchod rten lha tshogs bcas pa gdan/ /yid ches dang
ba mngon byas la/ /ci 'byor ba yi mchod pa bya/ /de nas dag pa'i sras de la/ /mar me la ni mar me ltar/ /'dod pa'i lha ni stsal bar bya/ /brjod pa
dang bcas 'brel ba yis/ /rtsa ba'i snying po nye snying tshogs/ /sngags kyang gsal bar sbyin par bya/ /zhi ba shel gyi phreng ba ste/ /rgyas pa la ni a ru ra/ /
dbang la lung thang dmar po shis/ /drag po rwa'am ru rak+Sha/ /bo de tses ni las kun byed/ /sngags bcas stsal nas mgo la bcing / /hUM dang bcas
ba'i rdo rje yang / /lag pa g.yas su gzhag par bya/ /stod g.yogs kr-iSh+Na sa ri ste/ /smad g.yogs kha dog sngon po'o/ /dbu rgyan rigs lnga'i kha dog ste/ /
zhal zas snod ni pad+mas brgyan/ /sems can kun don spyod pa'i rdzas/ /thub pas bkra shis bzhed pa'i rtags/ /gdugs nya bum pa dpal be'u dang / /rgyal
mtshan 'khor lo pad+ma stsal/ /nad sel bde byed 'tsho ba'i phyir/ /'dod yon phyogs rigs grub pa'i rdzas/ /gi wang dur ba li khri zho/ /bil ba sbrang rtsi a
ru ra/ /kA ra bI ra'i 'bras bu rnams/ /hrIHzhes dag pas stsal bar bya/ /gur gum ga pur gla rtsi dang / /ba yi 'o mas sbyar byas nas/ /tshig 'dris lce la
gzhag par bya/ /oM/ yan gar nges pa'i tshig rig dang / /ming gi rnam grangs chos rig dang / /dri ba lan ldon spobs pa rig /phyi nang mtshan nyid don
rig shog /badzra d+ha rma bra be sha /oM bcas brjod cing lce la ni/ /lan gsum rdo rje gzhag par bya/ /hrIHyig dmar po me 'bar bsam/ /gang la
goms pa de 'byung zhing / /goms pa gzhan gyi dbang med na/ /rtog pa'i 'byung ba chad pa'i phyir/ /kun rtog phyag rgya la dmigs bshad/ /dmigs pa'i
rten gyi sngags la yang / /byin rlabs tha dad 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sa la dbang bskur thob 'dod pas/ /phyag na 'khor lo
'chang la dmigs/ /ting 'dzin brtan la rdo rje ste/ /dpal thob 'dod pas rin chen dmigs/ /gzugs bzang 'dod pas pad+ma ste/ /spobs pa 'dod
pas ral gri 'o/ /gzhan don 'dod pas rgya gram ste/ /rdo rje dkar pos sems gsal 'gyur/ /shes rab 'dod pas glegs bam mo/ /khang bzang gis
ni mi'i rgyal po/ /thub gzugs rtag tu sangs rgyas 'jam/ /thal sbyar bas ni 'gro bas bkur/ /'khar gsil byams dang snying rje skye/ /lcags kyu
'jig rten skyong bas srung / /rin chen ze'u 'brus lce bder 'gyur/ /dril bus skad snyan byed par 'gyur/ /bgrang phreng gis ni lung bstan 'thob/ /khri
rkang gis ni nye dbang 'gyur/ /lha sogs bdug pa dung yin te/ /mdung rtse gsum pa g.yul las rgyal/ /pad+ma dmar pos lha ru ste/ /ril ba spyi
blugs tshangs ris skye/ /sprin mdog lnga ni drang srong skye/ /me long gis ni lha zhal mthong / /pad+ma rA gas ye shes skye/ /pad+ma sngon pos dag pa'i zhing / /
pad+ma dkar pos dge tshogs 'phel/ /ri bos bu dang bu mo 'phel/ /dgra stas bdud kyi bar chod sel/ /'khor dang sems mthun b+h+ring+gA ras/ /phub kyis dgra
dang gcan gzan 'joms/ /rnga yab dkar pos sdig pa 'phyag/ me tog snye mas nad sel byed/ /rin chen mdangs ni yid 'od grogs/ /gzhus ni nor
dang go 'phang rnyed/ /chu shel dug dang tsha rims sel/ /mi 'jigs phyag gis 'jigs skrag 'joms/ /dgra la rdo rje gtun shing ste/ /rdo rje nag mo bdud
'dul 'gyur/ /rin chen ral gris rig sngags zlog /lto ba na las lhung bzed de/ /rims nad sel byed zhags pa'o/ /'bru 'dod pas ni 'bru'i snye ma/ /nor
dbyig 'dod pas rin chen phug /yang na lung bstan 'dod pas na/ /mgo la sangs rgyas dmigs par bya/ /mngon par shes pa lnga 'dod na/ /sangs rgyas lnga po
dmigs par bya/ /de nas mgon po spyan ras gzigs/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis pad+ma'i zhal/ /sa yi snying po la gzigs nas/ /sa yi go rim 'di gsungs
so/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i rtog pa ni/ /gsang sngags thams cad sa gsum ste/ /gsang sngags sa dang sngags sbyar sa/ /rig 'chang sa dang rig gsal sa/ /
rigs mchog sa dang rin chen sa/ /phyag rgya chen po'i sa rnams so/ /gtsug tor chen po'i sangs rgyas sa/ /gnas skabs drug
tu rgyal bas gsungs/ /kun tu 'od dang dad pa'i spyan/ /yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen sa/ /rdor 'chang ye shes bla ma'i sa/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas bde ba chen po'i sa/ /
sa'i snying pos gsol pa/ mgon po 'phags pa thugs rje'i spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /byin rlabs lcags kyu lta bus 'khor ba'i btson ra nas/ /
klu phyugs 'bum phrag drangs ltar dge ba kun slong gis/ /byang chub rin chen sa la 'jog mdzad ngo mtshar che/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las/ byin rlabs 'byung ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas tshang pa'i 'jig rten
du/ /rab dga'i tshul du 'khrungs pa'i lha/ /ting 'dzin yang pa zhes bya ba/ /rtogs pa rgya che zab pa zhig /'khor dang bcas pa bzhengs byas te/ /me
tog rin chen rigs byung ba/ /ston pa'i phyogs su char bzhin phab/ /mkha' la gdugs kyi bla res bkang / /'khor dang bcas pa mgrin gcig tu/ /
gsang bstod nas ni tshig 'di gsol/ /lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje theg pa bla med pa'i/ /rdo rje rig 'dzin mchog grub pa/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung
phyir/ /bdag dang sems can kun tu yang / /dngos grub 'byung rim bshad du gsol/ /la la g.yeng bar gyur pa yis/ /bla ma'i rgyud don bral mod kyi/ /
sngags rgyud sdig pa 'chang byed 'byung / /snyan tshig rmongs rnams ngo mtshar skye/ /gdams ngag med pas 'gro ba bslus/ /dngos grub med pas bstan pa
zhig /sred pas lan gcig sogs par 'gyur/ /gnyis pa dmyal tshogs ngan 'gror 'gro/ /la la las kyi skye mched sgo/ /dbang po rten khang dmar myur
la/ /gdams ngag rgyud tshul yod mod kyi/ /chos tshul bzhin du spyod byed cing / /gang la dbang du gzung ba yi/ /bu 'dra bas kyang brnyas gyur nas/ /sdang ba
'phel nas rtsod par 'gyur/ /des kyang gnyis ka dmyal sogs 'gro/ /la la thos chung shes rab dman/ /rmongs pa gzhan rkyen nga rgyal can/ /bstan pa
dang ni 'chang byed la/ /skyon smod smra bas dmyal sogs 'gro/ /la la mi dge'i bshes gnyen gyis/ /log lam 'jug pa'i nges 'dzin can/ /yang dag
lam spyod brtson pa dor/ /log sgrub can de dmyal bar 'gro/ /la la bsam med sngags brjod med/ /mar me bdug spos
gror ma sogs/ /'byung pos brlams te bdag nyid dang / /'khor bcas tshe thung longs spyod 'grib/ /la la 'dod sred gtum rdab che/ /mkhas gzhan
dag la phrag dog gis/ /sgro sku tshul 'chos chos la smod/ /rang nyid lta ngan sgrub la rtsod/ /ther zur blo yi mun pa can/ /'byung po drag po'i rigs
su skye/ /la la ser sna rab 'jug pas/ /lha dang bla ma'i tshig gis bstod/ /zas dang longs spyod rgyan gos dang / /me tog bdug spos gtor ma
sogs/ /nyung du mug tshul rgyun stsol na/ /zas skom dag gis gdungs pa yi/ /yi dwags dman pa'i rigs su ni/ /yang nas yang na skye bar nges/ /
de phyir de dag spangs nas ni/ /ya rabs bsam pa bzang ldan pas/ /tshul bzhin blangs te thos bsam gyis/ /gtan la phab don ma 'khrul par/ /
brjod cing yid la byed pa dang / /the tshom med par brtson byed pas/ /'gro tshogs sgrol byed thabs thob nas/ /rang don 'ga' zhig smos ci dgos/ /
de nas lag na rdo rje gtso/ /ye shes mtha' yas mnga' ba'i skus/ /'gro la snying brtser rab gzigs nas/ /gsang ba'i skad kyis 'di skad gsungs/ /nga la
mnyan par brtson byed pa/ /shin tu legs so lha yi bu/ /lha dang dngos grub 'byung 'brel ba'i/ /ting 'dzin nga yis bshad par bya/ /khyod nyid rtse gcig
yid kyis ni/ /legs par nyon la yid la zungs/ /shin tu zab cing rgya che ba'i/ /dam chos thob pa shin tu dka'/ /rgyun chad med pa'i thugs rje can/ /
spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon po gtso/ /rang gi sems la bskyed par bya/ /shin tu gsal na dngos grub 'gyur/ /dang po stong ba'i byang chub sems/ /
gnyis pa yi ge'i byang chub sems/ /gsum pa sgro btags ming tshogs sems/ /bzhi pa gzugs brnyan phyag rgya'i sems/ /lnga pa byin rlabs rgyas 'debs
sems/ /sgra dang brag ca'i tshul 'byung bar/ /gtso bo'i 'khor gyis khyad par gsol/ /dbus su yi ge oM la ste/ /shar du hUM ste lho ru swA/ /nub tu hrIHyig
byang du hA/ /rigs kyi rigs ni yang yang bskyed/ /lha ni gang du 'pho 'gyur bas/ /dkyil 'khor de yi rigs 'byung yin/ /rigs kyi phyag rgya de nyid
kyi/ /rig pa rigs kyi rgyas 'debs shing / /rigs kyi lha tshogs pho mo rnams/ /nyams dga' dben pa'i tshul gyis su/ /phan tshun
du ni bltas nas gnas/ /ldem bag na bza' 'chang 'phrul dang / /'phur lding sil snyan rin chen tshogs/ /du ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan bya ste/ /la la
ldem bzhengs 'gying dang bcas/ /la la rdo rje skyil krung bcas/ /la la pad+ma'i skyil krung ste/ /la la sems dpa'i skyil krung can/ /la la khro thabs
brkyang bskum can/ /la la zhal phyag zhabs kyang mang / /la la zhabs ni gnyis yin te/ /la la zhal gcig phyag kyang gnyis/ /la la pad sdong
pad+ma can/ /la la pad+ma mi 'jigs phyag /guN+d+he bum pa 'khar gsil dang / /rnga yab legs so skyabs sbyin phyag /rdo rje dril bu mda' gzhu dang / /'khar rda
shing rda rdza rnga dang / /zang lcags rdo dang rus pa'i rnga/ /ring zlum rked nyag leb phyag che/ /chung phra sbom yang dog pa dang / /ral gri chu gri gri ring
dang / /gri leb gri zlum gri kyog dang / /sta zur sta leb phyag sta dang / /sta chung gzhogs sta 'bigs stag dang / /zlum sta phreng sta bzhar sta dang
mdung dang rtse gsum 'phen mdung dang / 'khor lo kha T+wAM gtun shing skyogs/ /snye ma tig mu me tog dang / /stong bu lo 'dab yab ga dang / /ba dan
pad gdugs rgyal mtshan spungs/ /rgya gram pad+ma rin chen sgrom/ /'khor lo glegs bam ut+pal lo/ /de la sogs te mchog mtha' yas/ /phyag
rgya stong snyed tshangs pa 'am/ /brgya rtsa brgyad dam bzhi bcu drug /nyi shu gnyis sam bcu gnyis drug /bzhi 'am gnyis sogs mos pas 'byung / /
phyag rgya bcings ldan phyag rgya ste/ /de ni lha la rgyas 'debs byed/ /goms pa'i stobs kyis phyag rgya che/ /seng+ge'i sgra ni seng+ge zhon/ /rgyal po rol pa'i
stabs tshul can/ /rtse gsum sbrul dang mi 'jigs phyag /pad+ma sdong ba cas ral gri 'bar/ /dpal bo'i lcags kyu thod pa ni/ /nang ma bdun gyi cha
gnas pa/ /gtum po drag po 'od ldan ma/ /g.yon du klu dbang phyug ma/ /pad+ma dang ni zla ba'i steng / /phyogs mdogs sems dpa'i skyil krung can/ /
yid bzhin nor bu rta la bcibs/ /zhal gsum phyag drug 'khor lo dang / /rdo rje pad+ma rin chen phyag /skyabs gsol mchog sbyin phyag rgya can/ /'khor
ni sems dpa'i skyil krung ste/ /mdog bzang sgeg pa'i lha mo ni/ /yid myur rin chen bzang mo dang / /pad rgyal mo dang rta
rna mo/ /rin chen pad+ma zla nyi la/ /'khor lo grogs kyi tshal du'o/ /pad+mo 'byung gnas rma bya zhon/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi ldem ba ga can/ /pad+ma skyabs
sbyin lcags kyu dang / /ril ba spyi blug phyag na 'chang / /sgeg mo phreng ma glu gar ma/ /pad zla sems dpa'i skyil krung ngo / /mi bskyod pa ni mkha'
lding bcibs/ /ral gri pad+ma mda' gzhu dang / /skyabs sbyin gang ba'i bum pa thogs/ /bzang 'dzin ma dang rnam sbyangs ma/ /sa srung ma dang rab
brtan mo/ /de dag gong gi cha byad mtshungs/ /don yod zhags pa klu steng bzhugs/ /rin po che dang zhags pa dang / /skyabs sbyin lcags kyu
'chang ba'o/ /seng+ge mo dang glang po ma/ /stag gdong khyu mchog gdong ldan ma/ /pad+ma zla ba'i gdan la 'o/ /ha la ha la rus sbal steng / /rdo rje dril
bu skyabs sbyin dang / /chos kyi za ma tog 'chang ba'o/ /nyi 'od ma dang zla 'od ma/ /chu dbang mo dang nor phreng mo/ /dge ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa'o/ /
mgon po pad+ma rgyan lung che/ /chu srin steng du rol pa'i tshul/ /DA ma ru dang bgrang phreng dang / /mi 'jigs phyag dang lcags sgrog go /lu gu rgyud ma 'khor lo
ma/ /gsang ba mo dang ri pa bsrel mo/ /glang sor rdo rje chos dbang phyug /chos kyi 'khor lo chos 'chad rgya/ /skyabs sbyin pad+ma po tir bcas/ /dga' ba dga'
skyes snang byed ma/ /sil snyan ma rnams pad zlar ni/ /phyed krung ldem bag tshul du 'o/ /rje btsun chos kyi gtsug tor ni/ /ha ri ha ri ha ri zhon/ /zhal gsum
phyag ni brgyad pa la/ /'khor lo rdo rje mda' gzhu dang / /pad dkar bgrang phreng skyabs sbyin dang / /bdud rtsis bkang ba'i bum pa 'chang / /mkha' lding gdong
ma shA ri'i gdong / /nyi zhal zla zhal lha mo'o/ /mgrin sngo dga' bo nye dga' ste/ /zhal gsum phyag drug pad+ma dang / /po ti skyabs sbyin bgrang phreng phyag /
seng+ge'i gdong mo klu zhal mo/ /dga' byed mo dang srog byed mo/ /pad zlar sems dpa'i skyil krung ngo / /dbus su mgon po gdong bcu gcig /gsang 'dzin
mo dang 'dzin pa mo/ /sngags srung ba dang grub srung ma/ /gong ltar cha byad phyogs mdog go /phyogs bzhi 'khor lo'i cha la ni/ /gtso bo sems dpa' bzhi
dang bcas/ /shar du rdo rje dbang phyug ni/ /thogs med yid dang grub dbang phyug /rdo rje phyag rgya gter sgrom can/ /kun kyang
pad+ma zla ba la'o/ /lhor ni rin chen dbang phyug ste/ /grub chen dbang phyug dang phag zhal/ /grub pa'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug dang / /gru 'dzin dbang phyug
zhes bya'o/ /nub tu pad+ma'i dbang phyug ni/ /skyes bu seng+ge'i zhal dang ni/ /pad+ma'i phyag dang sbrul nag phyag /rtse bran rgyas 'dzin zhes bya'o/ /byang du
dam tshig dbang phyug dang / /'khor lo 'chad dang stag lpags 'chang / /kun grub dbang phyug sgra dung 'phel/ /phyogs dang phyogs kyi mdog can
no/ /'jig rten skyod ba bcu po dang / /rgyal po chen po sde bzhi po/ /kun tu grags pa'i lha chen rnams/ /bstan la dga' ba dgod par bya/ /'jig rten
'jig rten 'das don du/ /rigs bzang skye ba bzhes dgongs pa/ /bskal pa bzang po 'dir 'byung ba'i/ /sangs rgyas stong yang dgod par bya/ /de
ltar rgyas par spros pa ni/ /lha rnams grangs ni rgya che bar/ /chig stong nyis brgya bzhi bcu bdun/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i lha/ /mgon
po gdong bcu gcig pa yi/ /lha grangs dkyil 'khor bkod pa'o/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi dkyil 'khor bcu/ /'jig rten dbang ni dkyil 'khor lnga/ /
rig pa'i lha mo'i dkyil 'khor lnga/ /rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bdun/ /dkyil 'khor de dag re re la/ /sems kyi dkyil 'khor lha mang ste/ /rang bzhin
gyis ni nyi shu lnga/ /rgyu 'bras tshul du rnam pa dgu/ /ye shes cha la lnga yin te/ /chos nyid ngo bos gcig tu rgyal/ /gang gang mos pa de dang de'i/ /
dkyil 'khor rnam par spro ba'am/ /gcig tu mos pa'i sbyor ba yi/ /byang chub rdo rje mchog thob nas/ /khams gsum rgyal por longs spyod che/ /chos
kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/ /gtsang sbra che zhing dad sems can/ /rtse gcig sgrub la nan tan stsol/ /blo bzang 'gro la 'jug cing spyod/ /dag
snyad dang gis khro ba med/ /g.yo sgyu 'dod brkam g.yeng ba med/ /lus ngag dal zhing thos pa mang / /nga rgyal ser sna chags pa med/ /gtong phod
snying rje dag ldan pas/ /spyan ras gzigs la gang dmigs nas/ /de yi snying po rtsa sngags la/ /bar chod med pas rab brjod nas/ /gzhan la phan
phyir smon lam brjod/ /spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang la 'jigs pa brgyad snang tshe/ /khro bo chen po
rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /de dag myur du sel byed shog /spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang la nad rims gang byung tshe/ /gso dpyad sman dang sman
par ni/ /bdag nyid gyur nas myur sel shog /spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo/ /mu ge'i nang du byung gyur tshe/ /phyogs gcig nas
ni rnam g.yos nas/ /zas skom rgyun chad med par shog /spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang du 'khrug pa che byung tshe/ /rang dbang
gis ni sems gyur nas/ /bde bas phan tshun sdum par shog /spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo/ /byol song gcig la gcig za dang / /
zas skom dkon dang gzhan 'jigs tshe/ /de dag sel ba'i skyabs gyur cig /spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo/ /yi dwags zas skom
gdungs pa dang / /log par lta ba'i gnas zhugs tshe/ /nad bral bdud rtsi kun snang shog /spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba'i
skyabs dang thabs mkhas dang / /shes rab gru dang ldan nas kyang / /thabs kyi sdug bsngal grol bar shog /spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo//
tshul khrims zhags ldan lam la rtag /mya ngan 'das pa'i ri bo 'jig /'dus ma byas kyi khyim 'jug shog /spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal
lo/ /ngan song gnas rnams mthong nas kyang / /der phyin de rnams zad pa yi/ /gnyen po so sor 'byung bar shog /spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal
lo/ /dmyal rnams tsha grang bcad gtubs tshe/ /go cha che dang bsil grib dang / /drod kyi 'od du gyur par shog /rig sngags yang yang brjod pa yis/ /
yang dag lam nyid rtogs par shog /kun 'byung sa bon rul nas ni/ /sdug bsngal phung po skam par shog /mgon po mya ngan 'das thob nas/ /'jig
rten phyogs bcur rab grags 'gyur/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /bsnyen pas bgegs kyi mthu bcom nas/ /dngos grub myur du rnyed bya'i phyir/ /
sgrub pa la ni brtson par bya/ /zla ba dkar po'i tshes gcig nas/ /khrus byas gos gsar gyon byas nas/ /sku gzugs bzang po'i mdun 'dug nas/ /myur
bar gnas nas nyin gcig la/ /dus gsum sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad/ /brjod cing ci 'byor mchod par bya/ /tshes brgyad
tho rangs dus nas ni/ /dben par gdan khri bzang po la/ /sku gzugs nub tu gzigs nas bzhag /bza' btung mngar bas sbags pas mchod//
a ga ru dang du ru ska/ /bdug pa rgyun du bsreg par bya/ /'bru dkar 'o ma'i zas bza' zhing / /zhag gsum bzlas pa ci nus bya/ /de nas zhag gsum
bar du bdag /'o ma zho dang 'bras can 'tshal/ /lha la mchod pa cher bskyed nas/ /byang chub shing drung stong rtsa brgyad/ /du ru ka yi mar du sbang / /dum
bu re re sngags re dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i drung du bsreg /sa yang g.yo zhing sku yang g.yo/ /steng zhal nas ni snyan pa'i sgra/ /legs so
legs so rigs kyi bu/ /khyod ni nan tan brtson 'grus can/ /'dod sman don gnyer gang yin pa/ /mkha' la 'phur ram rkang mgyogs sam/ /
drang srong rig 'dzin rgyal po la/ /bdag dang skal mnyam 'dod na yang / /de ring nyid du stsal par bgyid/ /bco lnga'i tshes la sku gzugs te/ /
bde gshegs ring bsrel yod pa yi/ /mchod rten nang ngam drung du bzhugs/ /gso sbyong blangs nas smyung ba yis/ /skya snar me tog brgya rtsa brgyad/ /
sngags re brjod pas sku la brdeg /de tshe mdun zhal rtsa ba nas/ /'brug sgra chen po lta bu 'byung / /sa chen rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur/ /de tshe bdag
nyid ma skrag par/ /sngags sgrub rjes su dran bya ste/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /thugs
rje che dang ldan pa la/ /bdag nyid gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi/ /mgon skyabs re gnas gyur nas kyang / /'gro
ba kun gyi re 'dod rnams/ /tshul bzhin du ni skong bar shog /de tshe 'dod pa stsol pa la/ /lha klu tshogs kyi bar chad med/ /sngags kyi 'dod don kun
grub yin/ /bsod nams rdzogs byed smon lam mo/ /phyag 'tshal rten la bskor ba dang / /mchod rten rtsig cing dkyil 'khor ni/ /rnal 'byor yan
lag las ldan pas/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir/ /rgyun chad med par brtson pa na/ /dge byed smon lam rgyas pa ni/ /de dag myur du 'byung
bar 'gyur/ /de phyir smon lam mchog tu bshad/ /gang la dge spyod g.yel ba yi/ /le lo can ni bdud bzung nas/ /gya
tshom smra zhing chos la smad/ /bstan pa 'jig par byed par 'gyur/ /de phyir sman rigs gdol pa can/ /log spyod can ni ring du song / /ser sna
le lo nga rgyal can/ /bag med g.yeng dang bcas pa ni/ /bdud kyi 'ching lam log lam pa/ /zhugs dang slar la gtang bar bya/ /'phags pa
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las/ dngos grub 'byung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //
de nas nad dang gnod pa sogs/ /sngags brjod tsam gyis gsal bar bshad/ /nad gdon gang dang gang la yang / /sngags pas drag tu gsal
btab la/ /rang gi rtse gcig sems kyis bzla/ /dang po snying rjer bcas pa yi/ /sngags kyis nad dang gdon las grol/ /de tshe mchod la brtson
par bya/ /smyo nad nyin re ldang ba dang / /nyin gnyis pa'am nyin gsum pa/ /nyin bzhi nyin bdun ldang ba'i rims/ /'byung po mkha' 'gro sha za 'am//
smyo byed brjed byed lus srul po/ /'dre gdon drag pos bgyis mod kyang / /brgya rtsa brgyad kyis sel bar 'gyur/ /yang na srad bu kha dog lnga/ /mdud re
sngags re brgya rtsa brgyad/ /mdud ldan mgul lam dpung par gdags/ /kha na ma tho bsags pa yi/ /sgrib kun zhi zhing byang gyur na/ /bgegs sogs
nad lta smos ci dgos/ /bde rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /skrangs dang 'bras kyi phreng ba dang / /shu ba phol mig rma mdze dang / /me dpal lhog pa
g.yan la sogs/ /ma rungs pa yi nad rnams dang / /ral gri mda' mdud la sogs pas/ /myos sam de yis zhon pa dang / /sprul dang sdig pa
tshangs pa dang / /bung ba mchu rnon la sogs pa'i/ /gdug pa rnams la lan bdun dang / /brgya rtsa brgyad dang stong du brjod/ /yang na sa ser 'jim
pas byug /de yi nad las grol bar nges/ /bgegs sam rlung la sogs pa yi/ /gzhogs gcig phyogs su nad langs sam/ /rna ba 'on nam sna
las na/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa'am/ /'bru mar zho dang ru rta dang / /lan bdun brjod na bsku byug dang / /zos shing rna ba snar byugs na/ /sos par
'gyur bar the tshom med/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' che/ /nyi 'od kyis kyang rig sngags 'chang / /srung dang lam 'gro
bskyab pa'i phyir/ /byin rlabs ldan pa'i tshig 'di gsungs/ /na mo bud+d+hA ya gu re be/ na mo d+harmA ya tA yi ni/ na maHsaM g+hA ya ma hA te/ tri b+h+yo bi
swA hA nA ma/ nyin mtshan dus su 'di brjod pas/ /sdig kun byang zhing nad rnams zhi/ /lam du bgegs bdud mi phrad cing / /rtag tu sems dga'
dam pa 'thob/ /byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od kyang / /srung ba'i don du sngags 'di gsungs/ /sha ma te he ru sha ho/ /A dz+nyA pa te/ su ru te/ shaM ki
