Te/ ba ra ma byA te/ su ru te/ kA la Ta te/ khi ma te swA hA/ tshon sna lnga yi skud pa la/ /bdun bzlas mdud pa nyi shu gcig /na sar btags na nad
sel 'gyur/ /gzhan yang yon tan grangs med thob/ /sbrul gyi rma ni sgo phye la/ /bdun bzlas rma khar btab na sos/ /seng+ge stag gzig dom dred kyi/ /
pags la nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags/ /brjod nas gra khrims can la bskon/ /de ma thag tu rims sel 'gyur/ /glo bur nad kyis nyen pa la/ /lan
bdun brjod pa'i gu gul bdug /ldong ros yungs kar lan tshwa dkar/ /sbyar nas nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod/ /nad pa'i mal bzhag nas bdugs na/ /'byung po
'bros te nad las grol/ /til mar nang du ru rta btsos/ /byugs pas gzhogs nad rna nad dang / /zhwa grum myur du sel bar byed/ /yang na rtsi mar nyid la
bya/ /til mar lte bar bskus pa yis/ /myur du bu thon 'gyur bar nges/ /lcim rtsas sha ma thon par nges/ /du ru ka dang spyi mong sbyar/ /snying nad drag po
sel bar 'gyur/ /ba rog mo yi lci dron gyis/ /rma khar bslan na mes tshig sos/ /srin bu ring mo snying la za/ /rta dkar gcin la khyor gang 'thung / /
des ni srog chags 'bud par 'gyur/ /'bras la rams kyi lo ma yi/ /khu ba bskol bas byug par bya/ /bong bu'i rtug pa gsar pa btsir/ /nyal
kar mig du blug na sos/ /mtshan mo skrangs la skud dkar ro/ /de ku nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas/ /brgya rtsa brgyad brjod shu dag dkar/ /dpung par btags
pas g.yul las rgyal/ /phug ron ril ma nyi shu brgyad/ /bzlas bcas bskus pas lcags sgrog dang / /shing sgrog la sogs grol bar nges/ /thal
ba 'am bye ma la ni sngags/ /stong bzlas me tog srin bu grol/ /gdon dang yams nad bzlog pa la/ /dri bzang chu la bzlas
nas bkru/ /bud med bu 'dod don du ni/ /stong bzlas pa mar btung bar bya/ /byi ba sbrul dang rus sbal sha/ /phye ma gtor na phyugs rnams rengs/ /mar
ga ni dang shu dag dang / /lga dang go snyod sbrang rtsi sbyar/ /sngags 'di yis ni shes rab 'phel/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa
rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ khA hi khA hi/ ba li te swA hA/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa
rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pad+me phu/ ma hA pad+me phu/ pad+ma lo tsa ne phu/ a mo g+ha be te/ na mo a do ta
ku tA ya/ sa ra sa ra/ gats+tsha gats+tsha/ i maM mak+Shi ro gaM nA sha ya swA hA/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas kyang / /thal bas mig ni phyi rol bsku/ /mig nad
thams cad 'joms par 'gyur/ /skud pa dkar po mdud pa bdun/ /sngags bdun bzlas pas rna ba yi/ /nad rnams thams cad 'joms par
'gyur/ /gur gum ka ra cha mnyam pas/ /sna yi nad ni sel bar byed/ /a ru ra yi phye ma dang / /sbrang rtsi bsres pa'i 'dag pa ni/ /so yi nad dang lce yi nad//
thams cad 'joms par shes par bya/ /oM hUM shrI hUM shu k+She phu/ nyi shu rtsa gcig chu la bzla/ /'thungs pas ma zhu'i gnod pa sel/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ /na
mo AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM rat+na she/ ma hA tsaN+Da/ a su ra marta ki /dz+wa la dz+wa la/
ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ hu ru hu ru/ ki ri ki ri/ ha na ha na/ sarba dz+wa ren+d+re ka /ban+d+he na/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ sarba gra haM swA hI/ sngags 'di mtshal gyis bris nas kyang / /
mgul du btags na nad rnams sel/ /gzhan yang rtsa ba'i sngags gang gis/ /las rnams de dang de la sbyar/ /sbrang bu srin bu sprul lhog pa/ /g.yan
pa shu ba ske nad la/ /sbrang rtsi pi pi ling gis byug /gang zhig btson du zhugs pa la/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa la/ /tsan+dan lnga gu snying gar byug
gang gi mig nad sel ba la/ /shing mngar chu 'am spos chu'am/ /ba la sha yi khu yis bya/ /rna ba la ni til mar gyis/ /gzhan gyi yi ge gsal ba dang / /
'thab mo shags 'gyed 'gyur ba'i tshe/ /bum pa chu yis gdong pa bkru/ /gang yang byis pa srung ba ni/ /seng ldeng phur bu sor
bzhi pa/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / /don yod zhags pa'i sngags ring dag /stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas btags na/ /tshe ring nyid du bde bar spyod/ /ba
lang rwa dang po so 'cha'/ /shing kun dung sbrul pags pa dang / /ras bal sa bon drung po dang / /de bzhin du ni ser po gnyis/ /nas kyi phub ma
g.yengs pa'i skra/ /byi la'i rtug pa bri ha ti/ /shug pa bya rog sgo nga dang / /ba lang rmig pa na le sham/ /da du ra dang lhan cig sbyar/ /de rnams
bsres pa'i dud pa yis/ /bgegs rnams sel phyir ru tra yi/ /dud pa bcu drug zhes bya'o/ /pu shel rtse dang ba bla dang / /btsan dug gi ni sprul shun
gyis/ /bdugs na rims nad thams cad sel/ /nad gzhan dag kyang sel bar byed/ /ba lang lci ba'i khu bar ni/ /so ma rA dza'i phye ma gdab/ /yi ge
hrI yis byin brlabs nas/ /mgrin pa sngon po'i rtsa ba'i sngags/ /brgya rtsa brgyad brjod 'thungs pas ni/ /dug dang rims nad sel bar byed/ /skyer pa
bskol ba'i khu bar ni/ /so ma rA dza'i phyi ma sbyar/ /ril bu rgya sran tsam gyi tshad/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i sngags brjod nas/ /zos pa tsam gyis dug rigs
rnams/ /zos kyang lus la gnod pa med/ /'o mar yung ba srang gcig bskol/ /so ma rA dza blugs te rlung / /so so'i chang la ha la'i sngags/ /brgya rtsa brgyad
sngags grangs tshang ba/ /brjod de blud na skyugs nas ni/ /dug nis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /khyim gyi dud pa rgyam tshwa dang / /skye du dmar rtsa lo mar bcas/ /
phye ma mar gsar sbrang rtsi bcas/ /ha ri chen po rtsa ba'i sngags/ /brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btung bar bya/ /sbrul nad thams cad sel bar byed/ /shu dag ru rta a ga ru/ /
yung ba bong nga dkar po rnams/ /don yod zhags pa'i sngags kyis mnye/ /byugs pas dug nad thams cad sel/ /rgyam tshwa srang gang mar srang gnyis/ /
gcin srang brgyad dang lhan cig bskol/ /rdo rje chos kyi sngags kyis 'thungs/ /dug nad thams cad sel bar byed/ /rgyam tshwa tshwa gsum mar srang bzhi/ /sbyar
te mi bshol sngags brjod nas/ /byugs na reg pa tsam gyis ni/ /sdig pa sbrul gyis zin pa sel/ /ku ma ri dang ser po gnyis/ /lcim tshwa myang tsha sbyar bcas
la/ /gar dbang sngags dang chu yis btung / /dug nad thams cad sel bar byed/ /ser po gnyis dang ldong ros dang / /go
thal gur gum le brgan rtsi/ /pad+ma rgyan lung sngags kyis btung / /dbyig dug thams cad 'joms par byed/ /gang la gza' dang rgyu skar gyis/ /'tshe
ba byung na des bsal phyir/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad maN+Dal gyis/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dbus rnams su/ /mgon po 'jam pa'i rdo rje ni/ /mkha'
lding gzugs su gyur pa la/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang bcu gcig gis/ /gus pa'i tshul du mchod byed bkod/ /nyi ma zla ba lag 'dzin pa'i/ /
khyab 'jug gis ni byi ba'i gzugs/ /mnan pa'i mkha' lding mig sman mdog /nor rgyas bu gnyis lha yi gzugs/ /mig gsum ldan pa brjid
pa'i lus/ /rin chen lnga yi sder gshog can/ /rdo rje mchu rno khro dang bcas/ /nyi ma bye bas brgyan pa'i 'od/ /snying gar nyi ma 'od 'bar la/ /gaM yig
nag po sngags kyis bskul/ /spu rnams zings kyis gyur nas kyang / /phyogs bcur rdo rje khyab par 'phro/ /gza' dang rgyu skar mog byas te/ /
gdon dang klu rnams sreg par byed/ /thugs rje mi bshol ba yi sngags/ /'brug sgra lta bur gsal bar brjod/ /gang yang grangs med stong phrag ni/ /
las rnams thams cad sngags 'dis 'grub/ /mkha' lding dkar po brjid pa'i lus/ /klu yi gdon las sbyar bar bya/ /de la mgrin pa sngon po yi/ /
rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bskul ba ni/ /sa steng gtum po klu yi gdon/ /du ma nges par sel bar byed/ /klu dang tshangs pa'i srin po sreg /'gro la mdze nang
gtong bar bya/ /mkha' lding dmar po sbrul za ma/ /me tog thod ma kha T+wAM ga /g.yon na 'chang ste g.yas pa na/ /ral gri me 'od 'bar ba 'chang /
mgon po seng+ge'i sgras bskul nas/ /dpa' rlabs bskal pa'i me dang mnyam/ /sbrul dang rin chen dbyug tho can/ /mkha' lding sha za'i gdon la ni//
mgon po ha ri'i sngags kyis bskul/ /mkha' 'gro'i gdon la mkha' lding ni/ /ljang gu ral gri phur pa 'chang / /pad+ma ral gri sngags kyis bskul//
las rnams gang dang gang la yang / /sngags dang phyag rgya ldan sbyor ba'o/ /ji ltar mos te phyag rgyar bcas/ /lus kyi phyag rgya sems kyi rgya/ /ngo bo nyid
kyis mtshan pa yi/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas rgyas 'debs 'gyur/ /da ni phyag rgya bshad par bya/ /sku yi mdun du langs
nas kyang / /rkang pa g.yas pa yud tsam bskum/ /lag gnyis so sor thung du brkyang / /gung srin so sor mthil du bkug /mtheb mdzub dag ni so
sor brkyang / /gru khug lag mthil mdun du brtan/ /'gro 'am 'dug kyang dgra dpung las/ /rgyal phyir sngags 'di brjod par bya/ /na mo rat+na tra
yA ya/ na ma AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a ba te/ ba ra ba te/ e h+ye hi swA hA/ yang na
sngon ltar lus bsrangs te/ /snying gar thal sbyar spro ba bsnol/ /mdzub mo gnyis bsgrengs rtse mo sprad/ /mtheb gnyis mdzub tshigs dang por bkug/
lag mthil cung zad ma reg pa/ /gzungs sngags gang brjod phyag rgya'o/ /bgegs kyi 'tshe ba byung ba'i tshe/ /sngags dang phyag rgya 'dis bsal bya/ /
na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba d+harma Ni maN+Da la ya/ e h+ye hi
pa ri ma shud+d+ha sa twA ya swA hA/ yang na sgom la 'jug pas ni/ /thog mar phyag rgya 'di bcing ngo / /pus btsugs spyi bor thal mo sbyar/ /mdzub gnyis bkug la
rtse sprad nas/ /de la mtheb gnyis bzhar bar bya/ /'di ni bdud las rgyal bar nges/ /yang na lag gnyis rgyab sprad nas/ /sor mo rtse rnams reg par bya//
mtheb gnyis brkyangs nas mdzub nang sbyar/ /smin mtshams su ni gzhag par bya/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya ba lo te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA
satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba du Sh+Ta na mo badzra ya me swAhA/ khyad par du ni lha mthong 'gyur/ /yang na bsgrengs te mnyam gzhag rgya/ /snying
gar bzhag la sngags 'di brjod/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM
sarba de ba a na le swA hA/ glo bur rtsod pa rgyal byed yin/ /yang ni bsgrengs te rting pa sprad/ /lag gnyis kyis 'jigs byed tshul bya/ /rtsa sngags gang rung
brjod pas ni/ /ting 'dzin yan lag brtan par 'gyur/ /yang ni pad+ma rgyan lung gi /rtsa ba'i sngags kyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag gnyis thal sbyar srin lag
gis/ /mthe bo'i sen mo mnan byas te/ /mthe'u chung rtse mo'i gung mo sprad/ /gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya ste/ /dgug na
mdzub rtse bskul zhing dgug /yang na g.yas pa'i mdzub mo dgug /g.yon pa slar gtang bya ba'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ /na ma AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa ra
ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM brah+ma e h+ye hi swA hA/ yang na sor rtse rnams bskyed na/ /mdzub mo g.yas pa lha
chen rnams/ /yang na phyag rgya 'di bcas la/ /nyi zla gzas bzung dus su ni/ /gzungs sngags ba mar la bzlas nas/ /phyag rgyas btab nas zos
pas ni/ /shes rab 'phel dang tshe 'phel zhing / /nad med gzugs bzang thob par ngas/ /'greng ste rkang gshibs thal sbyar nas/ /mtheb gnyis
lag pa'i nang bkug pa/ /snying gar gzhag bya spyan ras gzigs/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i 'khor lo'i rgya/ /mchod sogs las kyi sngon 'gro ba'o/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa la yang ngo / /mdzub bkug mthe bong sen mor bcas/ /lag gnyis rgyab sprad gar dbang rgya/ /thal sbyar mtheb mdzub so sor
brkyang / /mgrin pa sngon po'i phyag rgya 'o/ /mdzub mo gnyis bkug lhag ma brkyang / /mi bshol ba yi phyag rgya 'o/ /lag gnyis rgyab sprad mtheb gnyis
brkyang / /bdug pa bzang la sngags 'di bzla/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ /na ma AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ /bo d+hi satwa ya/ /ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/

tad+ya thA/ na mi rat+na sha ri tsan+d+ra a laM kA ra marga te dza su pra tsa ke shwa rA dza ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM rat+ne rat+ne/ ta ta sha rat+na ta ta sha rat+na/ pri te ma he rat+ne pra b+hA te/ rat+na gar+b+he
swA hA/ snga bar brgya rtsa brgyad brjod de/ /nor yang thob pa'i gter rnyed 'gyur/ /'gro gzhan bdag la byams 'dod na/ /so shing la ni nyi shu gcig /ldob rkyen
'dod pa shu dag la/ /stong rtsa brgyad bzlas snying gar bsku/ /gang bshad phyag rgya dang bcas pas/ /gdug pa'i sngags 'dis bgegs kyang 'bros/ /na
maHsarba bud+d+ha d+harma saM g+hA ya/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ /na ma AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ /tad+ya thA/ na mo badzra pA
Ni s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM hu po hu pi/ ka pa du pi/ pra gA ya ni swAhA/ rnam grangs bdug pas sangs rgyas bdug /lha rnams dag kyang mchod par bya/ /yan lag
g.yas pa'i mthe bong ni/ /lag mthil bzhag nas sor mo dag ba/ /rna ltag phyar nas mdzub mo ni/ /brkyang bskum bskul bas
spro ba dang / /g.yon pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya ste/ /dus ma yin par 'chi sogs zlog /lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas kyang / /sor mo bsnol te bkod
pa las/ /mthe bong mthe'u chung so so ni/ /sprad de sprad pa shes rab rgya/ /oM sarba saM sho d+ha ni swAhA/ de bzhin bsnol te bkan pa yi/ /gung gnyis nang
du gshibs bsgrengs pa/ mar me'i rgya ste sngags 'di 'o/ /oM dip+ta lo tsa na swAhA/ de nyid sbubs nas gung mo gnyis/ /rtse sprad bsgrengs pa bdug spos
so/ /oM d+hU pa d+ha ta swAhA/ rting sprad so so rtsengs sar dgug /byug pa'i tshul ni byug pa'i rgyu/ /oM d+ha li be t+ya swAhA/ rting sprad sor mo gyen du bgrod/ /
zhal nas 'thor tshul bshos kyi rgya/ oM ne wi d+yai prak+Sha taM swAhA/ lag gnyis bkug nas rtse brgyad sprad/ /mthe bong gyen du yan pa ni/ /na bza' dam
pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM b+hA sa ra Ni swA hA/ /snyim pa kha pye bteg pa'i tshul/ /ro ma stsal pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM AM krUM hrIH/ sa ka la gaN ba ri wa re NaM/ pa ri
ke ra a a/ /a ba ta raM te/ a ba ta raM te/ a ba ha ran+tu/ da sha dika lo ka pa la sa pa ri wA re b+h+yaHi daM ba liM grih+Nan+tu/ /khA daM tu/ /pi paM tu/ /ya the baM ya theSh+TaM/
dzaHhUM baM ho/ /saM trib+hU sarba satwa ni/ shAn+ti ku ru/ /puSh+TiM ku ru/ /wa shaM ku ru/ /A ba ra Na ku ru gu ba ti/ ka ro ta kurbaM tu/ hUM hUM phaT/ AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra
s+ya/ A dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ oM a ka ro mu khaM sarba rmA NAM ad+ya nub twan+na twAta oM AHhUM phaT swAhA/ oM hrIHdza b+ha la dza len+d+rA ya swAhA/ longs spyod rtag phyir gnod
gnas la/ /chu gtsang rtag tu sbyin par bya/ /oM A hrIHlo ke shwa ra nu nu smr-i ti ka rA ya swahA/ yi dwags rnams la sa ra zas/ /cig phyir chu dang bcas pa
stsal/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa'i rnal 'byor grogs/ /lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang / /'byung po yi dwags kun brtson 'gyur/ /sems kyi lcags kyu
ldan bya ste/ /nyon mongs sems la rab drangs te/ /lha klu 'bum phrag sems dga' ba'i/ /kun slong byang chub rin chen gyis/ /las la sgyur ba'i lhag
bsam bskyed/ /mdzad pa rgya chen kun 'grub 'gyur/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud
las/ sngags kyi sbyor ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas/ /byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' che/ /nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba/ /'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa zhig /mchod pa'i bkod pa chen po dang / /bstod pa'i dbyangs
dang bcas pa yis/ /bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas/ /bskor ba du ma byas nas kyang / /phyag 'tshal gsang bstod phyogs gcig mchod/ /
pus btsugs thal sbyar 'di skad gsol/ /mgon po yon tan kun gyi rgyal/ /ye shes rmad kyi 'byung gnas gtso/ /thar pa'i lam chen nyi shar
rgyal/ /'dren pa rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan dpe mthar thug med pa'i sku/ /gzi brjid rgya che mkha' khyab la/ /blo gros yangs pa'i nam mkha'
can/ /sku yi gsang ba phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs dbyangs du ma bsam mi khyab/ /nam mkha' yangs pa'i mtha' bkang nas/ /tshad med yan lag bcu
gnyis byung / /gsum gi gsang pa phyag 'tshal lo/ /ting 'dzin rnam thar bsam gtan sgo/ /bsam yas bsam du med bsams pas/ /bsam
mi khyab pa'i shes rab dang / /thugs rje'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba'i nyon mongs 'ching gcod pa'i/ /ma rig g.yul las rgyal byed pa/ /kun
rtog dra ba sel ba yi/ /sgron ma de ring bshad du gsol/ /byis rnams mun pa'i 'obs su lhung / /nyan thos 'dod chags tshogs kyis skrag /rang rgyal gsang
pa'i bzad dang ldan/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'ching bas 'jigs/ /nyon mongs mnga' bdag gsang sngags la/ /shes rab snying rje'i sbyor ba yis/ /bag
chags bcas pa gtan spong pa'i/ /thabs mchog du ma bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ /'od zer phyogs bcur rgyas byas nas/ /tshangs pa'i
dbyangs chen gsung snyan pas/ /nam mkha'i khams chen rab bkang nas/ /shes rab snying rjer 'brel ba yi/ /sbyor ba'i cho ga du ma gsungs/ /bsdus pa'i
don du byas pa 'di/ /nyi ma'i snying po nyan pa ni/ /legs so byang chub sems dpa' chen/ /dpal dang ldan pa khyod legs so/ /rtsi gcig gus dang bcas pa
yi/ /sems kyis legs nyon yid la zungs/ /nyams dga' bde ba'i sa phyogs su/ /shin tu dga' ba'i sa las ni/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa bya/ /
gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bcas/ /shar ram lho yis sgo gtod bya/ /dkar po ser po dmar po dang / ljang gu'i
tshon gyis bri bar bya/ /dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /dkar po'i lta ba 'tsham par dmar/ /mu khyud gnyis dang ldan pa 'o/ /gser dngul zangs sam
sa nyid la/ /bum pa lto yangs mgrin pa phra/ /kha g.yel zhabs tshod zhum pa la/ /shin tu gtsang mar bkrus nas kyang / /ga pur gur gum cu gang
dang / /gla rtsi gi wang chu yis bkang / /byA g+h+ri siM g+h+ri ha sa der/ /ka ri kar ni de pa ko /nas 'bras til gro mon sran dang / /gser dngul byi ru mu tig
dang / /man shel yin te rin chen lnga/ /bum par stsal nas ras dkar gyis/ /mgul pa bcings nas kha rgyan yang / /dri zhim shing lo me tog gzhag /
me tog phreng dang bcas pa de/ /pad+ma'i dbus su bzhag nas kyang / /rgya mtsho chen por 'khrugs pa nas/ /dpag bsam shing chen 'bras bur bcas/ /'jig
rten dbang gis gang ba yi/ /sngags kyang mtha' yas khyab dmigs nas/ /sngags kyi mthu yis sangs rgyas nas/ /dgongs pa rgya chen skyes gyur te/ /
legs so bkra shis 'bab par 'gyur/ /rgyal sras rnams dang rigs pa yi/ /lha mo tshogs dang glu len dang / /bkra shis du ma brjod par 'gyur/ /de tshe
mkha' la ye shes kyi/ /'od zer bye ba phrag brgya yis/ /shing chen yongs su smin pa las/ /bdung rtsi'i char chen 'bebs par 'gyur/ /'jig rten
skyong la gtor ma sbyin/ /rgyal dang rgyal sras mchod par bya/ /skar ma la sogs 'bab pa 'am/ /tshes gcig nas ni nya yi bar/ /sngags kyi phreng ba
brjod par bya/ /lha la yang yang bskor ba bya/ /las rnams gang dang gang la yang / /lha yi dbang gyur sbyar bar bya/ /de dang de ni las rnams la/ /ci
bde bar yang sbyar bar bya/ /phran tshegs las la spyan ma'i sngags/ /lhog pa 'brum pa la sogs la/ /mi bshol ba yi sngags kyis sbyar/ /gdon
rigs zlog la gar dbang ste/ /byad stems rig sngags zlog pa la/ /don yod zhags pa'i sngags kyis brku/ /shes rab 'phel ba rdo rje chos/ /klu
nad ha la ha las sel/ /tshe 'phel pad+ma rgyan lung ste/ mgrin sngon sngags kyis dpal 'phel byed/ /ha ri chen pos bdug spos te/ /gdong bcu gcig
pas glo bur sel/ /seng+ge sgras ni mdze nad sel/ /rnal 'byor yo byad 'dod pas ni/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i sngags kyis bkru/ /
bkra shis rol mo du ma dang / /gtsang sbra gos ser ldan pa yis/ /snyan pa'i gdangs dang ldan pas bkru/ /myur du sgrib pa 'byang ba dang / /
'dod yon kun grub sngags phreng ni/ /gang dang gang sbyar bar 'gyur/ /phan tshogs gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /zla ba gzas gzung gyur
ba'i tshe/ /mar srang gcig ni dngul gzhug /sku gzugs mdun bzhag sngags brjod nas/ /zla ba sos nas mar blangs te/ /zos sam
lus la byugs pa yis/ /nad rnams zhi zhing bde bar 'gyur/ /ldong ros gi'u wang cha mnyam pas/ /sku yi mdun bzhag sngags stong bzla/ /
chus bkru dpral par thig le ni/ /khams gsum mthong zhing 'dod gsum 'grub/ /chu dron sbyar nas lus bkrus na/ nad dang bgegs rnams
dag par 'gyur/ /bse 'bras la ni brgya rtsa brgyad/ /bzlas nas khro zhal g.yas la byug/ /dgra dbung phyogs su bstan na ni/ /dgra g.yul shin tu
nyes par 'gyur/ /bal bu 'bras bu sngags rer bcas/ /bal bu le la brgya rtsa brgyad/ /sku yi drung du bsregs pas ni/ /mi yams phyugs nad thams cad
'chad/ /skud pa gtsang ma mdog dmar po/ /sngags re btab pa'i mdud pa bdun/ /zhal gcig steng zhal btags nas ni/ /nad pa la btags rims
nad zhi/ /sngags re mdud pa nyi shu gcig /mdun zhal steng bzhag blangs btags pas/ /mkha' 'gro 'byung po ro langs gdon/ /drag pos zin pa
'joms par byed/ /gal te des kyang ma sos na/ /mdud re brgya brtsa brgyad brjod nas/ /zhal gcig mdun zhal dbur btags te/ /blangs te btags
na nges par grol/ /sdug bsngal nad pa yun ring gdungs/ /khyim du 'dre gdon 'jigs zhugs nas/ /'bru re sngags re thang 'brom 'bras/ /sku mdun
brgya rtsa brgyad grangs te/ /gong ltar bsgrubs pa'i skud pa yang / /lus la btags na nges par grol/ /mi mdza' ba dang 'khrug pa dang / /byad stems
drag po zlog pa la/ /sku la spos dang me tog mchog /bi na ya yi gzugs mdun du/ /bra bo'i 'bras bu dgra ming bsreg /sngags re mdud pa brgya rtsa
brgyad/ /mdung ldan g.yon gyi khro zhal gdags/ /zhag bzhi lon na sku las dgrol/ /mdud pa re re'i bar du ni/ /
sngags re brjod cing gcad par bya/ /bdag la sdang byed skyabs su 'ong / /rdzas dang sngags kyi nus pa'o/ /brtson pa'i bar chad bsal ba ni/ /
tshon sna lnga yi skud pa la/ /mdud pa sngags re brgya rtsa brgyad/ /mdud nas mdun bzhag steng btags pa/ /zhag gcig lon dgrol lus
btags na/ /las rnams bkra shis tshul du 'grub/ /gang zhig sgrib pa'i gshegs ldan pas/ /las gang 'dod bzhin mi 'grub cing / /
dus dus bkra mi shis byung na/ /gtsang sbra bum chu bzang po gnyis/ /brgya rtsa brgyad bgrangs re re brjod/ /dang pos sku gzugs bkru bar bya/ /
gnyis pas bi nA ya ka bkrus/ /brgya rtsa brgyad kyis sngags btab nas/ /rang nyid de nas bkru bar bya/ /bar chad byang nas 'dod kun 'grub/ /ji
ltar sprul pa'i gdon bsal phyir/ /byi la'i mgo rus thal ba dang / /sa bzang chu ltar sbrus pa'i sa/ /byi la yi ni gzugs byas te/ /sku yi
mdun du bzhag nas kyang / /khro zhal g.yon par srad bus gdags/ /rta mgrin sngags ni stong phrag bra ba/ /gzungs brgya bzlas pa'i ral gri yis
dum bu brgya rtsa brgyad du gtub/ /dum bu re re sngags re dang / /dong gi nang du dor bar bya/ /de dag gnod pa gtan du sel/ /mig nad sna tshogs ma
rungs la/ /'bras bu gsum pa zhib tu btags/ /sbrang dkar khye'u 'tsho'i nu zhor bcas/ /bu btsas gsar pa'i bud med dang / /khyi phag dag gis
ma mthong byas/ /thum po 'dzum pa'i zhal la btags/ /sngags stong bzlas nas sbyar ba des/ /mig tu blugs na mig 'bras skye/ /mig nad
thams cad sel bar byed/ /mig rnon dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur/ /lhag ma ma yin khron pa'i chu/ /gu gul ga bur cha mnyam bskol/ /khyor gang bldag
par gyur pa de/ /rtsa ba'i zhal gdangs sngags stong bzlas/ /bkrol nas ril bu byas mid na/ /ha la ha la'i dug 'joms 'gyur/ /glang po dkar po'i
gi'u wa ni/ /mthing bum bzhag nas sku yi mdun/ /stong rtsa brgyad bzlas yan lag bskul/ /dpral bar thig le byas gyur na/ /lha klu 'byung po mi rnams
dga'/ /khyo shug mi mthun brtags pa la/ /dur ba'i mjug sgro sku'i mdun du/ /stong bzlas lag tu blangs na 'dum/ /chu bskams
pa 'am char med na/ /ling+ga'i drung du sku bzhugs la/ /cher mchod nas ni sku'i mdun du/ /stong brjod chur skyes char chen 'bebs/ /gang zhig char
che ring 'dod ni/ /'geg par snyoms zhugs phyag rgya bcing / /sku yi mdun du rtag par ni/ /a ga ru nag bdug pa sogs/ /mchod pas rgyun du
mchod bya zhing / /brgyad nas nya bar sngags stong brjod/ /mig gi mngon shes bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /dri zhim dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la/ /rgyal mtshan ba
dan kha dog bzhi/ /bla re yol ba dkar po yi/ /dbus su pad+ma lnga bris te/ /ring bsrel ldan pa'i sku gdung bzhugs/ /tsan+dan dkar po'i dri chu dang / /
bdug pas rgyun du mchod par bya/ /ba mdog ser skya'i mar gyi ni/ /sgron me'i phreng bas mchod par bya/ /man shi ri ka ku shu dang / /pad+ma dmar dang sngon
bo dang / /rgya mtsho chab kyi dbu ba dang / /nya rkun nag po'i myu gu dang / /ma brlabs pa dang gu gul dang / /ku ban sa dang gi'u waM dang / /gur gum dmar
dang ser po dang / /tsha ba gsum dang cha mnyam brdungs/ /de rnams phyed tshad gla rtsi dang / /ga bur stsal nas re re'i tshad/ /sngags ni stong phrag re re grangs/ /
sku yi mdun du brjod par bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor dbus bzhag nas/ /sngags khrir bcas te nya la ni/ /zangs kyi za ma tog tu stsal/ /sku yi steng
zhal btags nas ni/ /mchod pa byas nas gsol ba gdab/ /'khar ba'i thur mas mig tu stsal/ /ling thog gam ni mchi ma 'jig /sprin dkar sprin
dmar g.yos pa dang / /klad pa na dang mig nad dang / /glo bur long dang thibs pa sel/ /nyin gnyis bskus na lus kyi nad/ /bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi sel
par 'gyur/ /gsum pas gdon rnams 'bros par 'gyur/ /bzhi pas sgrib pa thams cad 'byang / /lngas ni rtsod pa'i g.yul las rgyal/ /drug pas
rmi ngan byad stems sel/ /bdun pas glo bur 'chi ba med/ /bdun phrag gnyis kyis dbang phyug 'thob/ /gsum gyis 'byung po dbang du 'gyur/ /bzhi
pas gnod sbyin lnga pas klu/ /lnga pas lha mi srin po rnams/ /drug pas mkha' lding ri bdun lha/ /bdun pas nag po chen po 'grub/ /brgyad pas ma mo
dgus gnyer mthong / /bcu pas 'gro ba'i sman par 'gyur/ /bcu gcig lha mi'i khang par phyin/ /bcu gnyis rig 'dzin
drang srong khyim/ /bcu gsum klu yi khang par phyin/ /bcu bzhi sum cu gsum pa'i gnas/ /bco lnga mtshan mo kun mthong ste/ /bcu drug khams gter
mthong bar nges/ /bcu bdun rdo rje sa gzhi dang / /rlung gi dkyil 'khor thogs pa med/ /bco brgyad pa ni nyi ltar mgyogs/ /bcu dgus rgyal sras kun
mthong 'gyur/ /nyi shus spyan ras gzigs nyid kyis/ /lung bstan dam chos bshad par 'gyur/ /nyi shu gcig gis gzugs khams phyin/ /mngon
shes lnga dang ldan par 'gyur/ /lo gcig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi/ /zhing khams du mar phyin pa dang / /dam chos nyan dang zhing spyod 'gyur/ /mig
sman sbyor ba bla med 'di/ /sangs rgyas mu stegs can la gsang / /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sna tshogs sman gyi sbyor ba yis/ /bdag dang
'gro bam lus pa'i/ /'dod pa'i don kun 'grub byed nyon/ /ga bur gla rtsi gi'u waM dang / /gur gum dzA ti li shi dang / /ka tan li dang sug smel
dang / /tsan+dan dkar dang pad+ma dang / gser gyi me tog ut+pal sngo/ /re re la yang sngags stong bzla/ /sbrang rtsi dkar po lhan cig bsdu/ /dkyil 'khor
dbus su sku yi zhal/ /dbu ma la ni gdags bya ste/ /tshes gcig nas ni bcu zhi'i bar/ /nyin re sngags stong brjod par bya/ /mchod pas rgya cher mchod
par bya/ /bstod dang gsol ba gdab par bya/ /dge slong dge tshul dge bsnyen gang / /bco lnga'i nyin par lnga stong bzla/ /de nas gtsang ma'i snod bzhag
ste/ /dgos pa gang dang gang la yang / /lha ni de dang de dag sbyar/ /gang la bgegs kyis gnod gyur na/ /pad+ma gar gyi sngags kyis bdun/ /mgo
bo'i nad yams bsal ba dang / /ha la ha la'i sngags bzlas pas/ /gos la sogs pa bdug par bya/ /gzhan dag dga' bar 'dod pas ni/ /yid
bzhin nor bu'i phreng sngags kyis/ /mig gi steng du byug par bya/ /rgyal po rgyal mo la sogs pa/ /pho mo dbang du bya 'dod na/ /rdo rje chos kyi phreng sngags
kyis/ /dpral bar thig le bya ba'o/ /mdze la sogs pa'i nad la ni/ /seng+ge sgra yi phreng sngags kyis/ /lus la reg pa bde bar byug /long du zhugs pa'i
nad la ni/ /ha ri chen po'i sngags dang chus/ /rang gi khong du btung bar bya/ /byad stems rig sngags zlog pa la/ /don yod
zhags pa'i sngags kyis bdug /dug nad sel la mgrin sngon te/ /sgrib pa sbyong ba'i don du ni/ /gdong bcu gcig pa nyid kyis sbyar/ /rgyal srid
thob par byed pa ni/ /mgon po pad+ma rgyan lung ngo / /de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba/ /'byung po sha za mkha' 'gro dang / /lus srul po dang brjed byed kyis/ /
nyin gcig nas ni nyin bdun par/ /glo bur pa yi rims rnams dang / /rtag pa'i rims dang drang po'i rims/ /brtun byed la sogs rims rigs
dang / /glo bur ba dang rtag pa'i gdon/ /nad drag po ni ji snyed dang / /dug rigs rims dang wa ba dang / /'bras dang lhog pa med dpal dang / /shu ba rdo dang
'brum bu'i rigs/ /phol mig me dpal bal ldag sogs/ /mngon du gang dang gang snang la/ /sngags stong bzlas pa'i 'jim pa ni/ /sku zhal dbus
la btags nas ni/ /mchod pas mchod de sngags khri brjod/ /tshes gcig nas ni tshes brgyad par/ /gsol ba yang ni btab byas nas/ /tshes dgu'i
snga dro dgrol bar bya/ /bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod/ /byug pas nad rnams thams cad sel/ /cho ga de ltar ldan pas ni/ /sna nad ru rta 'bru mar byug /ya
na gre bar sngags bcas gdags/ /byis pa gdon gyis nyen ba la/ /'bru mar ram ni srad bu bya/ /dud 'gro la ni chu nyid dam/ /yang na srad bu bya ba ste/ /rtsi
mar dag gi mchog tu 'gyur/ /sbyor rnams gang dang gang la yang / /sku byad mtshan dpe ldan pas ni/ /me long nang gi gzugs ltar dmigs/ /gsol
ba btab pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /dang po skye mched drug ldan sems/ /thun mong rigs can sra ba'i khams/ /gnyis pa mos dang ldan pa ni/ /thun mong
kun tu zhugs pa'i rigs/ /gsum pa rigs pa'i rtags ldan pa/ /rig 'dzin gsang sngags 'chang pa'i rigs/ /bzhi pa lhag sems mthun ldan
zhing / /gsang sngags sngon du gyur pa yis/ lnga pa blang dor med pa'i sems/ /drug pa bdag gzhan dbyer med sems/ /bdun pa chos rnams rgyal
pa'i sems/ /brgyad pa 'phags pa'i bden pa'i sems/ /dgu pa rten 'brel za ba snang sems/ /bcu pa mtshan bral grub pa'i sems/ /bcu gcig
mtshan bral snang ba'i sems/ /bcu gnyis chos kyi sgo yi sems/ /bcu gsum lhag par 'byung ba'i sems/ /bcu bzhi
shes bya mthar thug sems/ /rgyas dang gsal dang khyab pa dang / /rtags dang 'gyur med gya nom pa'i/ /gnas skabs bcu bzhir rab tu rtogs
sems rtogs gyur na sangs rgyas chos/ /rgyud kun du ni rgyal bas bshad/ /'od zer lcags kyu khyu mo ri yi bar/ /spros pas lha 'bum phrag dge
kun slong sems/ /dkar po skyes nas byang chub rin chen gling / /thob mdzad blos bsgyur 'di ni ngo mtshar che/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyag gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra bzhes bya ba las/ /sku la brtan pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas 'jig rten skyong
ba'i tshogs/ /rgya chen rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi/ shar lho'i mtshams na bzhugs pa yi/ /nya na ka zhes la sogs pa/ /drang srong tshogs rnams mgrin
gcig tu/ /bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol/ /oM/ kun mkhyen ye shes nyi ltar lha/ /mtshan dpe du mas brgyan mdzad pa/ /bdud las rgyal
ba rkang gnyis mchog /'dren pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhi ba chags bral 'od gsal ba/ /rgyun chad med pas 'khor lo'i tshul/ /skye rga na 'chi las
sgrol zhing / /rnam dag sgrub gsum chos phyag 'tshal/ /sa chen sa chen gzhan rnams kyang / /sa la 'dren mdzad tshogs chen rdzogs/ /rgyun mi chad du sku
'byung ba/ /thal sbyar pus btsugs phyogs gcig 'khod/ /de nas rgyal ba kun gyi yab/ /dbang phyug chen po'i mchog gi lha/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang
thugs rje can/ /'gro la thugs brtse'i slad du ni/ /rig sngags bla na med pa gsungs/ /sngags de myur du 'grub pa dang / /skongs dang ngag la sel ba'i
phyir/ /me yi las la brten pa'i phyir/ /sbyor ba rim pa bshad du gsol/ /de skad gsol nas drang srong tshogs/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas kyang / /
mchod pa'i char chen phab pa ste/ /thal sbyar pus btsugs phyogs gcig 'khod/ /de nas rgyal sras kun gyi yab/ /'gro ba'i gnyen gcig 'dren pa'i
gtso/ /sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga 'di/ /nan tan du ni bka' stsal to/ /sa bzang dri bzang chur bcas pas/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham par bya/ /'bras
phye ba mar 'bru bzang rnams/ /shing rtsi shi 'am brgya rtsa brgyad/ /bsgrags pas nad yams gnod pa zhi/ /nad la mar lhag
nyung zhig btung / /nad gzer gang yang 'joms par 'gyur/ /yang na 'bru men phye ma 'am/ /sa 'am spra tshil gzugs byas te/ /srad bus khro
bo'i zhal btags nas/ /rig sngags brgya rtsa brgyad brjod de/ /ral gris gtubs nas sbyin sreg bya/ /brgya phrag lngas ni sdang byed nyams/ /yang
na dug gis gzugs brnyan btum/ /dug khrag nim pa'i shing la bsreg /drug cu rtsa bzhi'i grangs kyis ni/ /tshar bcad pa yi dbang du 'gyur/ /'byung
po drag po zhen pa la/ /gu gul yungs kar de ltar bsreg /bal po se'u lcug ma la/ /bu ram sbrang rtsi zho mar sngags/ /sku yi mdun du bsregs pas
ni/ /'go ba'i nad yams 'chad par 'gyur/ /gu gul dkar po nyi shu gcig /bsregs na byang chub sems dpa' 'gugs/ /zho mar sbrang rtsi
lung tang shing / /nyi shu rtsa gcig sku mdun bsreg /sa chen rgyal sras kun mnyam pa'i/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po des rnyed 'gyur/ /gang gis bsod nams
rgyas 'dod ni/ /dri bzang chu dang sa gtsang la/ /gru bzhi khru gang dkyil 'khor bya/ /dri bzang shing la khru gang brtsig /many+dzu sha ka yungs kar sbrang / /'o ma
zho mar a ga ru/ /tsan+dan dkar po dmar po dang / /dri zhim mtho gang tshad kyi shing / /'bru bzang tshad dang bcas pa dang / /dang por sngags stong 'das
nas kyang / /brgya rtsa brgyad du bsgrags pa yis/ /tshe ring nad med rgyal srid thob/ /stong gis 'jig rten pa dag 'grub/ /khris ni 'dod pa'i lha yin
te/ /'bum gyis gzugs khams mngon du 'gyur/ /sa yas rgyal sras kun mthong zhing / /mngon shes drug dang ldan par 'gyur/ /bye bas rgyal ba
kun mthong zhing / /zhing khams du ma sbyong bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang phran tshegs las rnams la/ /ji srid nyi shu rtsa gcig nas/ /brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar
du sbyar/ /sngags dang lha la sems brten bya/ /nad yams drag po bsal ba la/ /gtso bor 'bras bu gsum bsreg go /gdon chen rnams ni bsal ba
la/ /gu gul sgog pa rnga mo'i sha/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bsreg par bya/ /rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan/ /phra mo nad dang gdon rigs la/ /dur ba yungs kar
mchog tu bshad/ /'bru rnams gang dang gang 'dod la/ /'bru rigs de nyid sbyin sreg bya/ /char pa dbab par 'dod pas ni/ /
tsam pa ka dang rnam gsum dang / /mngar gsum nA ga ge sar dang / /dbang po lag gi sbyin sreg ni/ /ci 'dod char pa 'bab par 'gyur/ /gal
te gcad par 'dod pa ni/ /thal ba de ltar yungs kar gyis/ /nan tan phyogs bzhir gar dbang gi /sngags kyis yang yang gtor bar bya/ /yungs
kar zho mar sbrang rtsi dang / /'bras yos kyis ni byis pa sos/ /gdon nam rims las 'jigs pa dang / /khyim srung bar ni 'dod pa yis/ /pad+ma
dmar po'i sbyin sreg ni/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig kho na bya/ /sems bzang gnyugs ring 'dod pas ni/ /tsan+dan dkar po'i sbyin sreg bya/ /phran tshogs
yams nad sel ba la/ /lo ma tsam gyi sbyin sreg bya/ /phyugs nad sel bar 'dod pa'i tshe/ /'o ma me tog dkar bcas bsreg /nad dang gdon
bcas sel ba la/ /mngar gsum 'bru bzang ga pur bcas/ /dur ba dkar po'i yam shing rnams/ /dri bzang 'o ma can rnams ni/ /me tog
bzang po'i shing la bsreg /gdon nad zhi bar 'dod pas ni/ /'bras bu gsum sogs shing rnams bsreg /gdon phran la ni mngar gsum dang / /dur ba
dkar po bsregs pas zhi/ /rmi lam ngan dang ltas ngan gang / /'bras phye mar bsngags sel bar byed/ /gos dang snod bcas rdzas dang lus/ /gzhan
grib ngan pas gos pa la/ /'bras phye mar dang spos dkar dang / /me tog dkar po bsreg par bya/ /ting lo byid kyi me tog bsreg /mig nad thams
cad sel bar byed/ /ma su li ma rtsa bar bcas/ /bsregs na rna ba'i nad sel 'gyur/ /tsan+dan gla rtsi ba mar bsreg /sna yi nad rnams thams cad sel/ /
mu zi gu gul ril bu bsreg /so dang lce yi nad sel 'gyur/ /so nam dza dang ka ku ra/ /bsregs pas ske nad 'joms par nges/ /sbrang rtsi tsan+dan sha ka ra/ /
bsregs pas glo nad sel bar byed/ /'bras bu gsum dang zho sha lnga/ /bsregs pas snying nad sel bar byed/ /'u su sbrang dang byi dang ka/ /bsregs pas
mchin pa'i nad sel 'gyur/ /me tog kha dog lnga bsregs na/ /pho ba la sogs nang grol nad/ /ma lus thams cad zhi bar byed/ /lus mdzes pa yang
thob par 'gyur/ /nor 'dod pas ni seng ldeng mer/ /ba gsar zho dang mar bsreg bya/ /gos mdog gang dang gang 'dod la/ /de
dang mtshungs pa'i me tog dang / /srad bu sor ni bcu gnyis pa/ /shing mdog de dang mthun pa yi/ /dri zhim dag la bsreg par bya/ /rnyed 'gyur the tshom
mi bya 'o/ /pri yang ku dang ka ling+ka/ /pad+ma'i ze ba yal sdong la/ /bsreg cing gsol ba gdab pa ni/ /gter gyi longs spyod rgyas par 'gyur/ /'bras
dang myu ge'i 'bras bu sogs/ /bsreg na longs spyod brtan par 'gyur/ /don+Dot+pa la 'bras bu gsum/ /brgya bsregs bu dang bu mo 'phel/ /'bras
yos 'phel bar 'dod pas kyang / /spri ka dzA ti me tog dkar/ /ba dkar 'o ma zho mar bcas/ /bsregs pas 'khor dang dmag dpung 'phel/ /de
'bum grangs kyis rgyal srid 'thob/ /mngar gsum bil pa'i 'bras bu la/ /'bum gyis rang nyid rgyal por 'gyur/ /sngags mthu rgyas pa'i
don du ni/ /nim pa'i shing la mar dang ni/ /yungs kar dkar po sbrang bcas la/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bsreg par bya/ /gang gis rgyal po sras 'khor
bcas/ /dbang du bya bar 'dod pa yis/ /yungs kar rgyal ba'i yungs kar bcas/ /brgya sran drug tu bsreg par bya/ /gnod sbyin mo rnams dbang
'dod na/ /mya ngan med pa'i yam shing la/ /'bras bu gsum dang gur gum ni/ /stong phrag gcig tu bsreg par bya/ /gnod sbyin tshogs dbang byed
pa la/ /'bras bu gsum pa'i shing la ni/ /'bras bu gsum dang gu gul la/ /stong phrag gnyis su bsreg par bya/ /lha rnams dbang du bya 'dod pas//
a ru ra yi shing gsar la/ /'o ma zho mar sbrang rtsi la/ /sum stong bsregs pas lha dbang 'gyur/ /bud med dbang du 'dod pas ni/ /til dang 'bras
sogs phub ma la/ /'bras dang rang byung brgya rtsa brgyad/ /bsregs pas bzang mo dbang du 'gyur/ /byis pa dbang du 'dod pas ni/ /pri yang ku yi sbyin
sreg bya/ /las rnams gang dang gang la yang / /de dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis sbyor/ /zhi ba zhi ba'i yid kyis te/ /skal bzang blo ni rgyas pa la/ /chags
dang 'dun sems ldan pas ni/ /dbang du 'gyur la the tshom med/ /khro dang bcas pa'i yid kyis ni/ /drag po'i las su 'gyur ba yod/ /brtan po dal
'byor ldan pa'i blo/ /rgyun rtags gsal ba yod gyur pas/ /ji ltar bsam pa de 'grub kyi/ /gzhan du yang ni de ltar
min/ /mig la skyon zhugs lus kyi ni/ /dngos gang gsal bar lta ba ltar/ /bla ma dang ni bral gyur na/ /sngags kyi byin rlabs snang ba med/ /
lus ngag yid kyi sgo nas kyang / /rnam pa kun tu bla ma la/ /smod pa 'bad de spang bar bya/ /smad pas dmyal sogs ngan 'gror 'gro/ /bla ma'i
ngag las byung ba dang / /ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya mchod/ /oM ru ru spu ru dz+wA la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ne sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ bsang gtor dang
ku sha dgram pa'i sngags so/ /oM dz+wA la dz+wA lA na lArka swA hA/ sbar ba'i sngags so/ /na maHsa maM ta bud+d+ha nAM/ /oM ag+na ye A di bya A bi sha ma hA shri ye ha
bya ka bya ba ha na ya swA hA/ mchod mar gyi sngags so/ /oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzra ye swA hA/ til gyi sngags so/ /oM sarba saM pa de swA hA/ /zho dang zan
dam pa'i 'o/ /oM badzra b+hasmi ku ru ku ru swA hA/ ut+pa la'i'o/ /oM badzra puSh+Ta ye swA hA/ 'bras kyi'o/ /oM badzra a pra ti ha ta badzra swA hA/ ku sha'i 'o/ /oM
badzra bi dzA ya swA hA/ lag pan gyi'o/ /oM badzra mA le puSh+pa ye swA hA/ mngar gsum dang dkar gyi'o/ /oM badzra ma hA be gA ya swA hA/ nas kyi'o/ /oM ma hA
ba lA ya swA hA/ sran ma ma sha'i 'o/ /oM badzra g+hasma ri swA hA/ gro'i 'o/ /oM badzra A dz+nyA swA hA/ u duM ba ra'i 'o/ /oM ti ti pri mi swA hA/ byang chub shing gi'o/ /oM
badzrAr+tha ya swA hA/ n+ya gro d+ha'i 'o/ /oM badzra naM kA ya swA hA/ a mra'i 'o/ /oM AHhrIHhUM/ thams cad du bsang ba'i 'o/ /chus ni dag par byed pa dang / /rdul
sogs mun pa zhi bar byed/ /zhi ba chu yi dkyil 'khor bar/ /dkar po zlum po kho na'o/ /sas ni rtswa shing 'bru me tog /skyed dang dngos po rgyas par byed//
rgyas pa'i sa yi dkyil 'khor ltar/ /ser po gru bzhi pa na'o/ /rlung gis sdud dang 'byed pa dang / /dbang du byas nas g.yo bar byed/ /dbang la rlung
gi dkyil 'khor ltar/ /zla gam dmar po'i kha dog go /mes ni smin cing sreg pa dang / /drag shul gyis ni yal bar byed/ /drag po gru gsum me'i
dkyil 'khor/ /nad dmar rgyab ni nag por bya/ /mkha' la nyi ma shar ba ni/ /mun pa'i sgrib pa zhi bar byed/ /zhi la shar du bltas pa ste/ /dpal ldan
gos kyang dkar po'o/ /nyi ma byang du 'gro ba'i tshe/ /dngos po rgyas par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ /rgyas pa byang du bltas bya ba/ /
gos ni ser ram ljang gu shis/ /nyi ma thal nas mtshan mo ni/ /dbang du dngos por 'byung ba'i phyir/ /dbang la nub phyogs bltas pa dang / /gos
kyang dmar ser rab tu shis/ /nyi ma lhor 'gro'i dus su ni/ /shin tu grang ba'i chu yis ni/ /rtswa sogs dngos rnams bsad nas kyang / /des dang 'thor
dang dengs pa dang / /bskams dad g.yengs dad dub pa dang / /rab tu g.yos dang bcas par 'gyur/ /mngon spyod lho yi phyogs bltas nas/ /
gos kyang sngo dang nag po bya/ /tsam pa ka dang pu ti ka /lag skyes pad+ma dkar po dang / /ku mud dkar po zla seng rnams/ /chu gtsang dang bar bcas
pa dag /zhi ba'i las la mchod par bya/ /many+dzu na ga be sha ri/ /su mu le dang a spras dang / /gser mdog chen po chu dung dang / /tse'u li ser dang
pad+ma ser/ /chu bo chen po chur bcas pa/ /rgyas pa'i las la bsngags pa'o/ /mu tsa na dang man+d+hu dmar/ /lo yi che dang nya sha rnams/ /sin+hu ra
dang pad+ma dmar/ /ku mu ta rigs dmar po rnams/ /lu ma'i chu dang bcas pa dang / /dbang gi las la mchod par bya/ /ut+pal k+She pa la ka dang / /ud
khyed pa dang ma mi shi/ /dzu mong sbyin la mgo bo dang / /phag rna dan+Dot+pa la rnams/ /khron pa'i chu dang lhan cig tu/ /mngon spyod las la mchod par bya/ /
sA lu dkar po zan dang zho/ /pri ka spos ni zhi ba la/ /sA lu dmar po'i zan 'o ma/ /tsan+dan dmar po dbang la 'o/ /gro dang ma sha ser ba'i zan/ /hu
lu ka ni rgyas pa la'o/ /nas dang bra bo zan gu gul/ /btsos pa'i sha dang lhan cig ste/ /drag po'i las de zhal zas dang / /bdug spos bye brag shes
par bya/ /rtsi mar dang ni a ba se'i/ /sdong bur ldan pa'i mar me ni/ /zhi ba'i las la shin tu shis/ /yang na pad dkar sdong bu'o/ /til lam shin tu dang
ma dang / /sa ri hi ya stong bu ni/ /rgyas pa'i las la shin tu shis/ /yang na ba yi lag gi cha/ /na ke la yi mar dang ni/ /pad+ma dmar po'i mar dang ni/ /
dbang gi las la shin tu shis/ /yang na ba yi mar dang ngo / /yungs dang rtsi li mar dang ni/ /tsi tra'i sdong bu mar me ni/ /yang na gso ma'i shun pa yis//
mdog dmar dal zhing gsal ba ni/ /gangs ri'i rtse ltar dkar 'bar ba/ /phar pre smra gul spos dkar dri/ /zhi ba'i las
ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /mdog dmar g.yo zhing mog pa la/ /nyi ma thal ka'i ri rtse 'dra/ /shib sgra ma li ka la'i dri/ /dbang gi las 'grub the tshom
med/ /mdog ser mig g.yo dang ba la/ /nyi ma shar ba'i ri ltar 'bar/ /lhab sgra tsam pa ka yi dri/ /rgyas pa'i las 'grub the tshom med/ /le brgan
mdog ldan 'khyil zhing smug /hur sgra rul dri bro ba dang / /nags kyi ri bo ltar 'bar ba/ /mngon spyod las la 'grub par 'gyur/ /'jig rten
ting 'dzin ldan grub pa'i/ /drang srong rigs la dpag med kyang / /me yi lha ni bzhi bcu bzhi/ /sbyin sreg las la spang bar bya/ /'jig rten 'das
ba'i ting 'dzin can/ /bcu gnyis grangs ni gzung bar bya/ /gnya' na ka dang sa be ki/ /tuk+Shu se'u mya s+ye tro dang / /lto ba yid skyes khro bo dang / /dmar
po mr-i ta cho ma li/ /b+hi su ya ki bcu gnyis po/ /phan 'dogs la sogs las la sbyar/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg thal bas ni/ /'byung po phra mo zhi bar
byed/ /dbang gi thal bas 'byung po 'ching / /rgyas pas 'dod pa'i las sbyin byed/ /ri bo'i rtse la gtor bar bya/ /drag pos 'byung po sel bar byed/ /
lam gyi gzhung du gtor par bya/ /zhi dang dbang gi zhing phyogs dang / /ra ba skyed mos tshal du gtor/ /dag par byed pas chu bo ltar/ /rgyas pa nyi ma'i
dkyil 'khor dang / /gang bar byed pa rgya mtsho ltar/ /sbyin sreg gi ni lha mnyes shing / /sngags sgrub sngags kyi las rnams 'grub/ /drang srong tshogs
rnams thams cad dang / /dri za'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang / /'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad ni/ /sbyin sreg gis ni rab dga' nas/ /
rnal 'byor grogs byed srung ba dang / /skyob phyir tshe ring dpal 'phel zhing / /nad med longs spyod rgyas pa dang / /bsam pa bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur/ /
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rta ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma'i dra ba zhes bya ba las/ me la brten pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //
de nas byang chub sems dpa' che/ /rdzu 'phrul 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ /mkha' la yi ge sprul nas ni/ /'gro don sna tshogs mdzad pa zhig /'khor bcas
dkyil 'khor der lhags nas/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /mchod pa'i sprin gyis rgyas par mchod/ /phyogs gcig
'khod nas ston pa la/ /mgrin gcig gsung ni snyan pa yis/ /'di skad tshig ni gsol ba 'debs/ /oM/ mtshan dang dpe byad brgyan pa'i sku/ /
'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /chos kyi longs spyod ji snyed pa/ /rdzogs par longs spyod mdzad phyag 'tshal/ /gang la mkho ba de'i gtso bo//
'dren pa gzugs brnyan du ma 'chang / /sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa'i sku/ /bde ba che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi 'gyur rnam dag byang chub lam/ /
phyogs chos byang chub sum cu bdun/ /stobs dang mi 'jigs brtson mdzad pa/ /chos rnams lhun 'grub sku phyag 'tshal/ /rnam dag rgya mtshor ldan
rnams la/ /thugs rje rgya mtsho rgyun byung bas/ /zhing khams rgya mtsho sbyor mdzad pa'i/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal/ /sngags dang rdzas
dang phyag rgya'i rims/ /sna tshogs kyis ni don mdzad phyir/ /theg pa kun las khyad par du/ /sngags kyi theg pa khyad par 'phags/ /nan tan sgrub
pa smos ci dgos/ /sngags dang phyag rgya 'chang bas kyang / /nad dang gnod sel bskal pa yi/ /sgrib rnams 'byang bas khyad par 'phags/ /dbul
po rigs dang sman pa yang / /zhugs ma thag nas bde ldan zhing / /cung zad grub nas nus mthu ni/ /dpag med 'byung bas khyad par 'phags/ /mgon
po bcom ldan rdogs sangs rgyas/ /dpal chen ye shes kun gyi mdzod/ /'od zer nyi ma 'bum gzi can/ /'gro ba 'dren gtso ded dpon gyi/ /mgon
po spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/ /sngags dang phyag rgyar bcas pa yis/ /'gro la sna tshogs phan don du/ /ji ltar 'gyur mdzad bshad du gsol/ /
de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ /pad+ma'i spyan gdangs 'dzum mdzad nas/ /tshangs pa'i gsung ni snyan pa yis/ /'gro la phan phyir 'di skad gsungs/ /
dge byed phyag rgya sngags dang bcas/ /'gro la phan phyir zhus pa ni/ /legs so rdzu 'phrul 'khor lo che/ /shes rab 'chang ba khyod legs so/ /sems
dpa' chen po de phyir ngas/ /khyod la ngo mtshar legs par bshad/ /khyod kyang rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/ /legs par zungs la rgya cher spros/ /ras sam
gro ga shing shun gang / /'jam shing nag ris med pa la/ /gur gum gi'u waM sen rtsi dang / /tsan+dan gyis ni phyag rgya bri/ /pad+ma 'dag
brgyad mu khyud bcas/ /'od dang ldan pa bri bar bya/ /d+ha ra d+ha ra dang po ste/ /gnyis pa d+hi ri d+hi ri spro/ /gsum pa d+hu ru d+hu ru ste/ /iT+Te biT+Te bzhi lnga pa/ /tsi le tsa
le gnyis bri'o/ /pra tsa le gnyis drug par ro/ /ku su me dang ku su ma/ /bdun par bris te brgyad pa la/ /pa le i li mi li bri/ /oM mi tsi ti dz+wa laM dang / /
swAhAr bcas pa dbus su'o/ /phyag 'tshal bcas sngags mtha' mar bri/ /rab rdzogs sngags kyis lhar dmigs nas/ /gtsang ma'i mchod pas mchod
bya ste/ /sngags stong brjod nas lus la gdags/ /'di ni srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /nad dang yams nad gdon rnams dang / /'jigs pa brgyad
las skyob par nges/ /rig sngags bzlog nas khyad par du/ /rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga la/ /'od kyi ra ba zlum po yi/ /ri mo gnyis dang bcas pa bri/ /rwa rnams
la ni hUM gnyis par/ /rig sngags bzlog dang bcas pa bri/ /lte bar oM hrIHswAhA'i bar/ /bdag nyid bsrung zhes bri bar bya/ /mu khyud dang bor bri bar
bya/ /gzigs dbang yid bzhin nor sngags so/ /gnyis par gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags/ /gsum par pad+ma gar dbang gi /sngags rnams g.yas su
bskor bar bya/ /gal te nad yams bzlog pa la/ /'dab brgyad pad+ma mu khyud gsum/ /sngon ltar yi ge bkod pa la/ /mu khyud gnyis par spyan gyi sngags/ /
gsum par rten 'brel sngags pris nas/ /lus sam mgul du thogs pas ni/ /nad rims dang ni lhog 'brum sogs/ /rlung gis rdul bzhin sel
bar 'gyur/ /de nas tshig de thos ma thag /lha min bu mo nad bdag mo/ /sa tu de bi zhes bya ba/ /bzhengs te thal mo sbyar byas te/ /bu mo khris ni mgrin
gcig tu/ /bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol/ /rje btsun 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig pu/ /mgon po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /bdag gi
sngags 'di gang 'dzin pa/ /gal te 'brum nad byung na ni/ /bdag ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro/ /dam bcas 'di ni dran par bya/ /tre ba la bya yi ka
ka ba ni te/ su ma ya bi lA sa ka ka ra ni/ ki shun pany+tsa tra li he da yi/ /ka na ka ta tsa ra Ni/ ya mir+Na na da ma tsa/ ya mi pa ra nad bur dwa/ dwa tsa pi ta tra tsan+t+ra
nad dam/ /sastu de wi me b+ha wa/ /lha mos de skad gsol ma thag /mgon pos 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /oM oM b+ha bi
ta bi ti mi ti/ /ga tsan+d+ra Ni a mu ka s+ya ka bya/ /lo hi ta gaM d+ha rba rak+Sha ku ru swAhA/ /byin rlabs ldan pa'i sngags de ni/ /rgyun du bzlas pas 'grub
par 'gyur/ /oM ha na se rU pa d+ha ri swAhA/ /srad bu ma nyams dkar po la/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig mdud par bya/ /bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi bzlas nas kyang / /lus
sam mgul du gdags par bya/ /kraM hi ti ka ti ka tra tha pra ka shi ka /ta thA ya thA tsa la he huM hUM phaT/ sran ma rdog po re re la/ /brgya rtsa brgyad brgyad bzlas
pa yi/ /'bru bdun thum por byas pa zhig /dri bzang bcas la mgul du thogs/ /yams nad kun dang 'brum nag nad/ /shin tu gdug pa kun sel
'gyur/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang ba mo/ /dpal phreng mas ni 'di skad gsol/ /bdag gi rig sngags 'di zlas pa/ /rims nad kun dang
bral bar 'gyur/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo badzra mA ri bi dza yA ya//
ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ ta tha thA/ oM badzre badzre/ ma hA badzre/ /sarba b+hir thA/ ha na ha na badzra/ sarba dz+wa ra pra sha ma na ye swAhA/ mi skra mi rus sle
tres dang / /gu gul yungs kar sgog skya dang / /shing kun gla rtsi 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs brgyad phyogs bzhir hrIHyig bri/ /mtshams bzhir ris te
dbus su ming / /sngags 'di mu khyud dang po la/ /gnyis gdong bcu gcig pa yi sngags/ /bris nas lus sam mgul du thogs/ /nad rims thams
cad sel ba dang / /rnal 'byor kun dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang gis/ /'gro ba'i don du 'di skad gsol/ /rang 'byung can
gyi ras la ni/ /sen rtsis 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa/ /mu khyud gsum dang ldan pa bri/ /rtsibs bzhi hrIHla g.yon bskor du/ /hrIHgi waM shiM ku ru hrI/ mu
khyud dang por mgon po ni/ /pad+ma gar dbang sngags bri'o/ /gnyis pa ut+pal dmar po phreng / /gsum pa lcags kyu nyi shu gcig /dbus su baM yig
hrIr bcas bri/ /lha dam nyid kyang dam byed na/ /'gro ba gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /gsol dang bkra shis brjod pa dang / /bgegs kyi gnod pa sel
'dod pas/ /rtse gsum rdo rje rgya gram ste/ /dbus su spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon/ /pad+ma gtsug tor sngags bri'o/ /rwa rnams
kun la hUM yig ni/ /bgegs ming u tsa ta yis bskor/ /mu khyud dang por spyan ras gzigs/ /ha la ha la'i sngags bri'o/ /gnyis par khro bo rta skad
sngags/ /gsum par bgegs dgra'i sngags bris la/ /de rgyab me yi phung po bri/ /gang zhig 'khor lo 'di ris pas/ /sred med bu ltar mthu che
ba'i/ /gdug ba can yang 'thor byed na/ /phran tshegs 'byor pa smos ci dgos/ /gang la ser sna rnams chags shing / /longs spyod 'phel bar mi
'gyur na/ /phun sum tshogs ldan dpal 'phel phyir/ /skyob pa'i phyag rgya bshad par bya/ /rgyal po 'am ni dge 'dun la/ /gtsang ldan rab bzang
blangs nas kyang / /dag par bkrus te dri bzang byug /legs par brgyan nas thig btab ste/ /gur gum dang ni gla rtsi yis/ /pad+ma 'dab bcu drug pa
bri/ /phyogs bzhir 'dab mar dpal be'u ste/ /mtshams bzhir yid bzhin nor bu bri/ /mtshams brgyad la ni yi ge gaM /oM dang badzra da ke hUM/
yi ge drug gis bskor bar bya/ /mu khyud dang por mi bshol sngags/ /gnyis par gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags/ /gsum par ut+pal phreng ba ste/ /yang tog
tse 'am mdzod bzhag nas/ /gsol btab mchod na longs spyod 'phel/ /bud med gang zhig bu 'dod pas/ /de bzhin pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /phyogs bzhir hrIH
ni mtshams su drang / /dbus su khye'u'i gzugs shig bri/ /phyogs bzhir yid bzhin nor bu dri/ /sngags bu stsol bcas bri bar bya/ /mtshams bzhir oM dang
a ma ra/ /dzi wa n+ti ye swAhAs bskor/ /mu khyud dang por spyan ras gzigs/ /pad+ma rgyan lung can gyi sngags/ /gnyis par gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags/ /
gsum par ut+pal dmar po'i phreng / /'od 'phro rtag par mchod pa dang / /phul du byung ba'i bstod pas bstod/ /gsol ba 'debs shing sngags bzlas
na/ /bu stsol 'gyur la the tshom med/ /srung dang nor 'phel dbang byed dang / /bu slong ba yi phyag rgya ni/ /smin drug snar ma rgyal la bri/ /lhag ma rnams ni
ci bder bri/ /gang zhig sems stor yid mi dga'/ /glo bur yi mug skye 'gyur na/ /pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi pa yi/ /dbus su rang gzugs mtshan ma bri/ /
'dab mar rdo rje mdog bzhi pa/ /gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags kyis bskor/ /mu khyud la ni spyan ras gzigs/ /don
yod zhags pa'i sngags bri 'o/ /gnyis par rdo rje pheng ba bri/ /de'i rgyab 'od kyi phreng ba bri/ /rtag par mchod cing gsol ba gdab/ /nad sel tshe ring
bsod nams 'phel/ /gang zhig shes rab 'dod pas ni/ /dpal be'u rgyal po'i du mar ni/ /tri yig rgyab tu sngags 'dis bskor/ /oM dang kA
la de ka la/ /ma ni swAhA zhes pa bri/ /de rgyab mu khyud 'khor ba la/ /mgrin pa sngon po'i rtsa sngags bri/ /de rgya ba 'od kyi ra ba bri/ /gang gis 'di
'chang mchod pa la/ /nad dang gnod pa kun bral te/ /dug dang rims nad 'joms pa dang / /shes rab myur du 'phel bar 'gyur/ /yul du lo tog
nyams pa dang / /thog 'brug ser ba rgod pa dang / /klu dang sa bdag gnod pa ste/ /de gsal sbyor ba bshad par bya/ /shing shun dkar po ma nyams
pa/ /nyams dga' nyi rim sbyor ba la/ /rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa/ /mig sman gyis ni bri bar bya/ /grwa rnams la ni hUM yig la/ /oM dang dzi ni ti ti
te/ /hUM phaT ces pa'i sngags kyis bskor/ /mu khyud dang por mgon po che/ /gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags phreng bri/ /gnyis par thugs rje chen po
mgon/ /mi bshol ba yi sngags kyis bskor/ /gsum par rdo rje phreng ba dang / /me yi 'od dang ldan par bri/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bstan tsam gyis/ /klu yi
rgyal po mthu ldan rnams/ /'khor dang bcas te lus bskams 'gyur/ /gang gi khyim du gdong pa dang / /ma he rta sogs yams nad can/ /bsal
ba'i thabs kyi phyag rgya ni/ /brtan par drang srong tshogs rnams nyon/ /ko pi da ri'i shing la ni/ /khru gang khru gnyis dbyibs gru bzhi/ /gas grugs chag
sogs med pa la/ /shin tu srab 'jam sor gnyis rngams/ /shing de la ni rta babs gzugs/ /'khor lo gdugs dang bcas pa yi/ /brtsegs
pa'i g.yas zur dang por ni/ /rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga ste/ /gnyis par ut+pal dmar po 'o/ /gsum par 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ser/ /bzhi par pad+ma
dkar po'o/ /g.yon zur dang por pad+ma dmar/ /gnyis par ut+pal sngon po'o/ /gsum par nor bu bzhi rgya gram/ /nang khong du ni pad+ma bya/ /'dab ma brgyad
pa 'od ldan pa 'o/ /lte ba dang ni 'dab brgyad la/ /oM dang pi shA rtsi par+Na/ /sha pa ri sarba byA d+hi/ /bra sha ma ni swAhA zhes/ /paM
yig la ni bskor ba bri/ /mu khyud dang por spyan ras gzigs/ /gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags bri 'o/ /gnyis par chos kyi gtsug tor gyi/ /rtsa ba'i
phreng sngags bri bar bya/ /rgya skyegs dang ni mtshal yin te/ /de la shing sbyin byug par bya/ /mchod dang gsol gdab sngags dag ni/ /bdun stong re re
brjod byas nas/ /sgo gong la gdags 'byung 'jug tshe/ /'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rta phyugs yams nad ma lus la/ /rig pa'i lha mo'i
tshogs bcas pa'i/ /'jig rten mgon gyi rig sngags mthus/ /myur du sel bar mnan pa dang / /zlog dang bcings par mdzod ces brjod/ /phyugs
bdag chen po skyong ba ltar/ /glang po rta bong ma he tshogs/ /brtan zhing nad dang gnod pa med/ /shin tu 'phel zhing rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de nas yang
dag bshad bya ba/ /dmag dpung chen po 'jigs pa la/ /khyad par du ni skyob pa yis/ /phyag rgya sbyor ba mnyan par gyis/ /yung bas ras sam shing la
ni/ /pad dkar steng du kha T+wAM dang / /ral gri 'od ma bri bar bya/ /de la gdu bu gsum gyis bskor/ /dang por gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags/ /gnyis par seng+ge sgra
yi sngags/ /gsum par ha ya chen po'i sngags/ /de rgyab me yi ra ba bri/ /'di la gsol ba btab nas ni/ /g.yul ngor khyer te zhugs pa gang / /dgra dpung
chen po 'bros 'gyur te/ /rang nyid g.yul las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /longs spyod spyir ni byang bltas bri/ /dbang skyed pa ni nub tu ste/ /g.yul zlog pa ni lhor
bltas bri/ /lhag ma rnams la shar bltas bri/ /dkar ser dmar dang sngo ba yi/ /dbye bas zas dang gos shes bya/ /'dzum dang rngam dang dgod dang khro/ /
bzhin gyi rnam pa bshad pa yi/ /sngags dang sngags kyi 'od phreng dang / /lha yi kha dog dbye ba dang / /snod la sogs pa'i dbye ba dang / /rgyan yang de ltar shes
par bya/ /kun kyang rin chen pad+ma'i gdan/ /kha dog sna tshogs ldan par ni/ /sngags kyi yig 'bru'i lha rnams bzhugs/ /sngags rdzogs nas ni sngags
su dmigs/ /gang gis phyag rgya 'chang byed la/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams dang / /rig pa'i lha mo'i tshogs rnams dang / /'jig rten 'dren pa'i
tshogs bcas dang / /spyan ras gzigs dbang tshogs chen dang / /khro bo tshogs bcas ma lus dang / /'jig rten skyong ba grags
ldan rnams/ /ci 'dod las rnams ma lus pa'i/ /grogs dang dpung du byas nas ni/ /tshul bzhin du ni sgrub pa la/ /brtson 'grus gang dang gang gis
kyang / /the tshom du ni mi bya 'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma'i dra ba las/ /phyag rgya la brten pa'i le'u
ste bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas mkha' la gshegs pa yi/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i drang srong mchog /mtshan dpe du ma rgyas pa chen/ /
nyi ma'i gong bu zhes bya ba/ /drang srong rje dpon tshogs kyi mchog /'gro don rdzogs mdzad thugs rje can/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon po la/ /sangs
rgyas tshig gis 'di skad gsol/ /oM/ 'od zer du ma ther zug gi/ /srid 'dab stug po sel byed rgyal/ /yon tan ye shes kyis brgyan sku/ /mgon po
spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal/ /gsung snyan yan lag brjod bral chos/ /bag chags ri bo snyil mdzad rgyal/ /skye 'gag bral ston sde snod gsum//
mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal/ /skye 'gag gnod bral mnyam bzhag pa/ /ting 'dzin shes rab 'phel mdzad rgyal/ /ye shes gzigs pa mtha'
yas thugs/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal/ /sna tshogs sman dang sngags sbyar nas/ /lha yi gong bu'i ril bu ni/ /'jig rten 'jig rten
'das pa yi/ /dngos grub ma lus rdzogs pa yi/ /thugs rje'i nyi ma lham mdzad pa'i/ /mgon po pad+mas bshad du gsol/ /'gro rnams ma rig 'dam la
zhen/ /srid pa'i thag pas rgya gram bcings/ /'dod chags zhe sdang mun pas g.yogs/ /nga rgyal phrag dog chu bos g.yengs/ /ngan rtog log lam g.yang
sar lhung / /bag med ser sna'i dug gis myos/ /sdig pa'i grib mas rnam par rgyal/ /bag chags thum po'i ri bos mnan/ /mgon khyod thugs rjes dal
ba med/ /nyes pa'i rgya mtsho bsal ba'i phyir/ /shes rab thabs 'byung bshad du gsol/ /de nas 'jig rten mgon po rje/ /thugs rje thugs dpal mnga'
ba yi/ /thugs dam rdzogs pa'i 'bras bur bcas/ /khyad par gzungs 'di bka' stsal to/ /mtha' dag gzugs sgra thos pa dang / /rdzu 'phrul bsgyur dang
gzhan sems shes/ /'das dang ma 'ongs don shes dang / /mtha' yas shes drug las spyod pa/ /dngos dang rtags dang cha
mthun gyis/ /rnam pa bco brgyad dag tu 'gyur/ /phra dang yang dang mchod par bya ba dang / /bdag por gyur dang dbang du 'gyur ba dang / /gar yang
phyin yang 'dod rgur ldan pa dang / /dga' mgur gnas te dbang phyug yon tan no/ /rnam pa brgyad kyi dpe bya yis/ /longs spyod dbang dang lus
la dbang / /tshe la dbang dang rkang mgyogs dang / /chu la mi bying mkha' la 'gro/ /sa 'og 'gro dang mi snang ba/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod sogs//
dngos po gang dang gang bsgrub rnams/ /ril bu las ni 'byung 'gyur gyis/ /gzhan ni myur du 'grub mi 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ril bu ni/ /
mtshams med la sogs byed pas kyang / /rnyed ma thag tu dngos grub 'gyur/ /nye dang dbang ldan lha yi sras/ /ma mos dbang du byas gyur na/ /'byung
po sha za lha min mi/ /ma mo mkha' 'gro 'byung po klu/ /dud 'gro la sogs rdzogs gzugs can/ /sems can gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /dngos grub
bzang po 'dod pa yis/ /khyad par ril bu 'di bsgrub bya/ /gi'u waM dang ni lig pu mig /ldong ros bzang por sbyar ba yis/ /ril bu rgya sran tshad byas
nas/ /snod gtsang nang du gzhag par bya/ /sku yi mdun du sngags brjod na/ /sngon chad ma mthong snang ba 'am/ /sgra thos sam ni bde gshegs gzugs/ /
yid 'ong mngon du byung ba sogs/ /mar ngo gsum gyis 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas zla ba gzas bzung tshe/ /ci 'byor mchod de snyim par bcug /bzlas
brjod byas nas nyi shar na/ du bar 'thul dang dri can 'gyur/ /dud 'thul lus la byugs pas kyang / /snang ba dang 'od gzugs can dang / /'dzam gling
phyogs rnams rgyu ba dang / /longs spyod che dang ldan 'gyur te/ /shi 'phos dga' ldan gnas su skye/ /dri ma tsam gyis lus byugs kyang / /'gro ba thams
cad dbang byed cing / /thos pa 'dzin cing rgyu btsal mkhas/ /shi nas 'dzam gling 'di nyid du/ /lcang lo can gyi gnod sbyin ni/ /'khor lo gzhon nu'i rigs
su skye/ /yang na mi yi rgyal po 'am/ /glang po nyid du skye bar nges/ /'bar ba lus la bskus na lta/ /rig sngags 'chang lus nyid shar mdog /bskal bar
gnas te 'dod rgu'i spyod/ /'jig rten kun tu thogs med rgyu/ /mkha' lding sa 'og chu bran 'gro/ /sangs rgyas kun nas phyin
nas kyang / /dbang por gnas te rgyal por gnas/ /sprul ba'i rdzas kyis bde gshegs mchod/ /'dod nas shi 'phos 'jig rten khams/ /gzhan
'das sangs rgyas dag tu skye/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /bdag nyid yid du 'ong 'dod pas/ /gur gum ga bur bla rtsi dang / /gi'u waM
bsregs nas sngags stong bzlas/ /brdungs te phye mar byas nas kyang / /sngags stong bzlas te chu gtsang gis/ /ril bu rgya sran tshad byas nas/ /re re la
yang stong stong brjod/ /rlung dang nyi ma ma reg pas/ /bskams nas snod gtsang gzhag par bya/ /ril bu tsam zhig mur na yang / /rgyal po blon po
'khor bcas kyis/ /mthong na bu bzhin gzigs 'gyur na/ /tha mal skye bo smos ci dgos/ /nor rnams gzhan gyis ster ba dang / /bsgo ba la ni ngag
btsan 'gyur/ /ga pur gu gul gi'u waM dang / /tsan+dan gan+d+ha brda dang / /gla rtsi dag ste cha mnyam du/ /re re sngags stong bzlas nas su/ /brdungs te ril
bu byas pa dag /g.yon pa'i zhal la gdags par bya/ /mdun nas nya yi bar du ni/ sngags bzlas pa dang mchod par bya/ /bdugs pas nad dang gdon
rnams sel/ /mi ga la byugs pas rgyal po dang / /rgyal mo bu dang bu mo dang / /blon po la sogs dbang du 'gyur/ /khar bcug tsam gyis grol bar 'ong / /
gdams pa thams cad don yod 'gyur/ /spyi bor btags na byad stems dang / /g.yul las shin tu rgyal bar 'gyur/ /gal te phye mas bdug pas
kyang / /sdig pa thams cad byang 'gyur te/ /kun gyis mthong dang dga' ba dang / /gzi byin 'phags pa kun gyis mchod/ /ga pur gla rtsi gur gum dang //
tsan+dan gla rtsi ka ko la/ /spos kyi rgyal po pad+ma dang / /ut+pal sngo dang tsan+dan dmar/ /re re la yang stong stong bzlas/ /cha mnyam phye ma gi'u waM bcas/ /ril
bu tsa na ka tshad bya/ /grib bskams byas nas lus la 'chang / /gling bzhi kun khyab rgyal srid 'thob/ /kra ku la yi thang chu dang / /ldong ros bed dang
ut+pal sngo/ /rgya mtsho dbu ba gi'u waM dang / /yungs dang skyer pa gur gum dang / ga pur dang ni gla rtsi gsum/ /re re la yang sngags stong bzla/ /de nas sku
yi mgul btags te/ /stong bzlas dril nas ril bu bya/ /mig nad sel na chu dang sbyar/ /so nad la ni ka ka ru/ /rna ba'i nad
la ru rta ste/ /ut+pal mu tig mig nad la/ /gre ba'i nad la ba sha ka/ /glo nad la ni ba li ka/ /sha ka ra yi thang dang sbyar/ /rlung nad la ni mar dang sbyar/ /
mkhris nad la ni tig ta dang / /bad kan la ni lga dang sbyar/ /mdze nad la ni dug mo nyungs/ /ma zhu ba la kha ru tshwa/ /skrangs nad rnams la thug po che/ /
bgegs dang yams nad sel ba la/ /gu gul dang bcas bdug par bya/ /ril bu'i yon tan mtha' yas ni/ /nam yang brjod par mi nus so/ /gu
gul la ni stong bzlas pa'i/ /ril bus bgegs tshogs sel bar byed/ /ke su rtsa dang sge'u gsher dang / /ba la ta ka tsha ba gsum/ /ser po mu zi phye
ma rnams/ /sbrang rtsi dang bsres ril bu bya/ /pad+ma gar dbang sngags stong bzlas/ /zos pa tsam gyis lus rgyas te/ /nad dang gdon dang dgras mi tshugs /
'dod rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /ta ka'i rtsa ba ba ru ra/ /skyu ru ra dang til ti la/ /mnyam byas srin bya'i khrag dang ni/ /ril bu byas nas mig
la byugs/ /klu dang yi dwags khang pa dang / /sa 'og thams cad mthong bar nges/ /byis pa zla ba gsum pa'i lce/ /nyin gcig spos phor nang du gzhug /gnyis pa
ra 'o gsum dang 'byung / /bzhi pa ril bu tshil chen btso/ /lnga pa sbrang rtsi'i nang du ste/ /drug pa dngul chu'i nang du gzhag /bdun pa rigs ngan thod par ni/ /phyi
la'i khrag gis bskus la gzhag /bskams nas bya dang spyang ku'i sha/ /lhan cig rang gi khar bcug na/ /de ma thag tu mi snang 'gyur/ /gzhan yang yon tan
dpag tu med/ /ldong ros gyen du bcas pa dang / /dzA ti lo ma sa bon bcas/ /ril bu sngags stong bzlas pa yi/ /bar snang la ni 'gro bar nges/ /pan+du ma dang
ki raM dang / /ma ka ri dang su mi taM/ /pra pan+ta ma'i ril bu ni/ /nyi zla gzas bzung dus su mid/ /shes rab phul du 'byung ba ste/ /thos pa 'dzin 'gyur smos ci dgos/ /
gi'u waM swA hA tsa ni dang / /sre ta sbrang gi ril bu bya/ /sngags stong bzlas nas khar bcug na/ /'das pa'i don rnams shes par 'gyur/ /gi'u waM sug pa phye ma
dang / /ba ra swa ta ha su ri/ /A ra hu ri sbrang rtsir bcas/ /ril bu byas nas sngags stong bzla/ /mid pas ma 'ongs don rnams shes/ /gzhan yang nad 'don
byed pa yi/ /ril bu chen po bshad par bya/ /rgyal dang rnam rgyal na gu la/ /kan+d+ha na gu li dang ni/ /ru Ni a pa ya pa ni/ /i pa ya na
ta ka ra/ /gan+d+ha ka dang pri yang ku/ /'khor lo che dang 'khor lo dang / /biSh+Nu ka Ti de bzhin du/ /so ma ra tsa un na ti/ /re re la yang sngags phreng dang / /brgya rtsa
brgyad du brjod par bya/ /de nas brdungs te sbrang dang bcas/ /byis pa la ni dpung par te/ /bu 'dod mo la mgul par gdags/ /'di btags pa yi
de ma thag /'jigs pa brgyad dang nad las grol/ /ba mar shu dag pa lcir bcas/ /lcags kyi snod du btsos pa yis/ /ril bu a mra'i 'bras bu tsam//
sngags 'di stong phrag brgyad brjod de/ /phyis ni nyi shu gcig brjod nas/ /snga bar mid pas shes rab 'phel/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ /na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te
shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi swA hA ya/ ma hA ya twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM shud+d+he mra taM/ ba la baM d+ha ni swA hA/ srong dang tho rangs dge spyod dang / /dal smra
gsong po dul bag can/ /khrus la dga' zhing dri bzang sten/ /spyod lam rab zhi khro ba med/ /rtag tu sngags brjod brtse sems can/ /spyan ras gzigs
dbang la cher dad/ /gdung bag gdong la mchi ma can/ /lung thob bla mar rab dga' ba'i/ /skyes mchog de la rab dag zhing / /'jig rten skyong gi lha rnams
dang / /'byung po la sogs smos ci dgos/ /rtag par rang gi yid la ni/ /snying po gsang sngags bcad par bya/ /nye ba'i snying po lus dag pa'i/ /lha yang
rang la nye bar byed/ /rtsa ba'i sngags rnams brjod mang ba/ /khri dang 'bum dang sa ya dang / /sa ya gsum dang drug brjod de/ /kha cig la yang bzhi dang
ni/ /lnga tsam gyis ni de grub yin/ /las la sbyar ba bdun dang ni/ /bcu bzhi nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / /brgya dang de bzhin stong gis rdzogs/ /de ma thag
tu chu yin te/ /cung zad pa ni mar gyis bya/ /brtan par 'gyur ba ka ra ste/ /ches brtan pa la srad bu yin/ /sman dang sngags kyis sel byed de/ /ril bus
ring du skyong byed yin/ /sngags sgrub pa la mi mos pa'o/ /mdun du rtsom na de dag rnams/ /de skad gsungs pa'i de ma thag /rdo rje snying po nyi 'od dang / /pad
dkar rin chen snying po dang / /pad spyan gzigs kyi snying po dang / /ye shes dbang phyug pad dbang phyug /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams/ /rang
rang sde dpung sder bcas pa/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po rnams/ /'jig rten dbang la cher dmigs nas/ /mchod pa'i
tshogs rnams bkram byas te/ /rin chen rigs las 'khrungs pa yin/ /mchod pas nam mkha' gtos par bkang / /rol mo du ma lhab lhub dang / /
sil snyan lha yi tshogs rnams kyis/ /sprin mdzes tshogs rnams rab 'khrigs ltar/ /bkod pa mtha' yas bshams byas te/ /de nas byang chub sems
dpa'i tshogs/ /mgon gyur ye shes mnga' ba rnams/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang gsung snyan la/ /yi rang skyes nas mtshan chen brjod/ /spyan ras
gzigs dbang mchog brtan che/ /'jig rten dbang po dbang phyug che/ /pad+ma sems dpa' pad 'byung che/ /rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dag pa chen
po chos rgyal gtso/ /blo gros chen po sems dpa' che/ /pad+ma 'chad dang pad+ma dpal/ /pad+ma'i mgon khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad+ma las byung dam pa'i
yid/ /pad+ma gsal mdzad dga' mdzad po/ /pad+ma'i rdo rje pad+ma'i sku/ /khyod mchog sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /snang ba kun chen thabs po che/ /che mnyam
dga' ba dgongs pa che/ /dpa' bo chen po brtan chen rgyal/ /bde ba chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /bsam chen mkhyen chen theg chen po/ /rnal 'byor chen po
mes chen po/ /bde stsol bde mdzad dga' mdzad che/ /pad+ma rgyas zhal phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos mnga' don mnga' pad+ma rgyal/ /dag pa chos mnga' chos mchog
'dzin/ /rmad byung chen ldan chos rab 'chang / /chos kyi tshogs khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sems dpa' mchog sems dpa'/ /rin chen sems
dpa' chos sems dpa'/ /dam tshig sems dpa' las sems dpa'/ /kun mkhyen sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal/ /'jig rten dpa' bo dpa' bo
mchog /rnam par gzigs gtso skyob mdzad che/ /'jig rten gsal mdzad 'jig rten don/ /'jig rten mgon khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten yi
ge kha dog che/ /yi ge che mtshungs yig drug mchog /yi ge'i rang bzhin yi ge gzigs/ /yi ge 'khor lo khyod phyag 'tshal/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya pad+ma'i lag /
legs so sbyin mdzad dbugs sbyin pa'o/ /sangs rgyas tshogs te sangs rgyas chos/ /sangs rgyas che khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshad med che sku sangs rgyas sku/
gzugs bzang 'chang ldan rdo rje gzugs/ /gzi brjid che mchog chos snang ba/ /snad bar mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtso
mgon rgyal po pad+ma'i dpal/ /chos kyi dpal mgon 'dren mdzad pa/ /tshangs pa'i mgon chen khyab 'jug mgon/ /tshangs pa'i sras khyod phyag
'tshal lo/ /cher gsal gtso bo snang ba mchog /'od chen mdzad pa rang gsal mdzad/ /snang ba chen po kun gsal mgon/ /snang ba khyod la phyag
'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas spyan can spyan po che/ /chos kyi spyan ni gzigs pa che/ /ting 'dzin chen po ye shes mtsho/ /rdo rje spyan khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /
'dren pa'i gtso bo dbang sgyur gtso/ /mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas sras/ /rgyal thabs brnyes pa khyu mchog che/ /sangs rgyas dpag med phyag 'tshal
lo/ /drag po chen po rtul chen po/ /ha la chen po seng+ge sgra/ /mgrin sngon gar gyi dbang phyug gtso/ /ye shes gtsug tor phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar ming
brgya rtsa brgyad gang / /'chang la nad med ba gegs med de/ /dpal 'byor 'jig rten dbang phyug mthong / /yang yang lhar skye mya ngan 'da'/ /de skad
gsungs nas blo ldan rnams/ /rang rang gdan la rnam par 'khod/ /de tshe phyogs bcu rnam par g.yos/ /bdud rigs thams cad mog por gyur/ /de nas
gzungs kyi dbang phyug gis/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams la/ /rtogs pa'i ye shes ngo bo nyid/ /nga yi mtshan nyid 'di gsungs so/ /kun tu
bzang po spyod tshul can/ /dkar lam bcu pa rnams spro ba/ /sems can gang du 'dod sbyor ba'i/ /rigs ni rigs chen thams cad pa'o/ /lus dag yid
bcu spyod bcu ni/ /rgyun mi 'chad du sbyor mod kyang / /rags pa yi ni gzugs brnyan mthus/ /sngags sbyor gsang sngags 'dzin pa yi/ /lha la goms pa
lha mthong ngam/ /mngon shes dang po sems gsal bas/ /mkha' mnyam sems kyi rdzu 'phrul che/ /sems snang rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa/ /mtshan ma phra mo
la sogs pa'i/ /mngon shes 'jig rten gsal mthong sa/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i snying po ste/ /brtan pa'i ye shes las byung ba'o/ /dam tshig sdom pa
mkha' mnyam spyod/ /sems dang sems dpa' dbyer med dang / /zhi lam sgro skur chad pa dang / /sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'gog dang lam/ /bzhi bzhi lhun
gyis grub pa dang / /rten 'brel zab don mngon gyur pa/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs kun mchog /mtshan med ting 'dzin la
gnas nas/ /rtsol bcas gzhan don sgrub pa dang / /rtsol med shugs kyis bde 'byung dang / /nges tshig chos don spros pa'i mtha'/ /rdzu 'phrul du ma
spyod yul la/ /rigs chen yongs su grub pa'i sa/ /mkha' spyod phun sum tshogs ldan zhing / /sems kyi snang ba du mar bsgyur/ /dngos rnams spros
spangs bsdu spyod pa/ /rig 'dzin phyag rgya chen po yis/ /chos sku kun snang kun tu 'od/ /bde skur snang ba pad+ma'i spyan/ /yi ge 'khor lo sprul tshogs che/ /
mtshon bya mtshan nyid rdo rje 'dzin/ /zag med ye shes bla ma'i sa/ /'du 'bral med pa'i bde chen sa/ /de ltar drug ni sangs rgyas kyi/ /sa chen bla med
mthar gnas so/ /ngo bo spros med chos sems pa/ /gsang sngags sgrub pa'i rgyu gcig go /sems can sems snyoms byang sems 'dzin/ /nges par
sgrub pa'i rgyu gnyis so/ /sems can mi gtong tshul khrims srung / /sngags don mi spong nyid dang gsum/ /rang gi sngags grub gzhan gyi sngags/ /bar
mi gcod dang 'gro ba la/ /byams pa sgrub dang snying rje sgrub/ /sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu bzhi'o/ /dben pa sten dang 'du 'dzi spong / /thos pa bsam zhing
de don spyod/ /phyi rol sngags spong zhe sdang skyung / /de dag sngags sgrub rgyu lnga 'o/ /dad pa 'dun pa gsol ba dang / /phyi nang sngags la mi spyod dang / /spros
med ston pa'i gzhung 'jug dang / /theg chen mdo gzhung 'dzin pa dang / /sngags gzhung tshol ba mi skyo dang / /dge spyod brtson dang drug pa'o/ /bzlas dang
sbyin sreg mchog gtor brtson/ /phyi rol bka' thub gdung med dang / /snod bcud 'og min gnas lha dang / /bu mo pha rol phyin yul lha/ /'gro ba mi slu
chos mi 'byed/ /theg dman mi len pa dang bdun/ /nyan thos rang rgyal blo ldan dang / /rig 'dzin rdzu 'phrul the tshom med/ /lha dang bla ma'i bsnyen bkur
dang / /dbang bskur lung nod spro ba dang / /ser sna med dang gtong la dga'/ /gsang ba dga' zhing mi g.yeng dang / /gzi brjid dbang tshe'i lus thob
dang / /grags kun blo ldan brgyad por blta/ /skur ba med cing bden par smra/ /bag yod tshul 'chos spangs pa ste/ /brgyad pa de yang sgrub pa'i rgyu/ /rgyu
med 'bras bu ga la srid/ /gang zhig lcags kyu bzung bas gnyis re nas/ /klu phrug 'bum phrag 'dren ltar dge ba'i sems/ /
kun slong byang chub rin chen thob mdzad rgyu/ /rtag par 'chang na gnas bsgyur byed par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ /blo ldan rnams la bka'
stsal pa/ /legs so legs so sems dpa' che/ /gang dag de dag de bzhin du/ /bde 'dod rnam par g.yeng ba dang / /des ni sdug bsngal mya ngan
'das/ /gdung ba chags sdang 'khrug pa dang / /des ni log pa'i chos 'dir yang / /dge sbyong log ltas tshangs pa'i gdon/ /sngags log spyod
byed rig 'dzin gdon/ /gdul dka' dag la rgyun ring ngo / /skye ngan 'jigs phyir blo zab spyod/ /gang gi khyim na rgyud 'di yod/ /bri dang bklag dang
mchod pa dang / /rim gro ched du gsal byed dang / /bkra shis tshe ring dpal 'byor bskyed/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa
dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs de dang / rig pa'i lha mo dang / khro bo du ma dang / nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad
dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las/ sbyor ba sna tshogs kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rig pa'i 'byung gnas rig pa'i
'od zer gyis shes rab pad+ma rgyas pa'i kha tshe'i yul bdud rtsi'i 'byung ba'i gtsug lag khang chen por paN+Di ta chen po so ma shrI b+ha bya zhes bya ba dang / bod kyi lo
tsA ba skyu ra dge slong tshul khrims 'od zer gyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya a mo g+ha pA ShA pA ra mi ta Sha T+pa ri pU ra ya nA ma d+hA ra ni/
bod skad du/ /'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang
chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal
lo/ /oM a mo g+ha pA sha ma hA dA nA pA ra mi ta pa ri pU ra ya hUM/ da ra da ra/ bi bi d+ha ra/ bi tsi traiHsarba sa twAM u pa b+ho ga /sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA dA na pU dza me g+ha pra
brta ya/ ta ra ta ra/ tA ra ya/ ma hA pad+ma ma Ni hUM phaT swA hA/ 'di ni don yod zhags pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po chen po ste/ gang gis
yungs 'bru tsam gyi sbyin pa yang byin te dran pa tsam gyis lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ mchod sbyin chen po rnam par 'phrul pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa
chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a mo g+ha shI la/ saM
b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ma hA shud+d+ha sa twA pad+ma bi b+hu Shi ta/ b+hu dza/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man+ta a wa lo ki te hUM phaT swAhA/ gzungs 'di gso sbyong gi yan lag
brgyad bzung nas smyung bar gnas pa byas te mi smra bar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig du dran pas brjod par bya'o/ /de nas don yod zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bya'o/ /
bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyi mod la tshul khrims dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po mang po lus la 'byung zhing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du grags par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig nyi ma re re zhing gzungs 'di dran par
byed na/ de ni rtag tu tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gang la la zhig tshul khrims zhig cing nyams par gyur pas smyung bar gnas pa
byas te gzungs 'di bzlas brjod pa tsam gyi mod la tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur zhing tshul khrims mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum gyi
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a mo g+ha k+ShAn+ti sarba bo d+hi satwa k+Sha mi Na/ k+Sha Na k+Sha Na/ ma hA mai tri ka ru Ni/ sarba satwA ba ta sa la/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ sarba satwa k+Shi mi Na
hUM phaT swAhA/ gzungs 'di dran pas sems can du gyur pa thams cad la bzod pa dang / bzod pa chen po dang / snying brtse ba
dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pas sems kyis mnyam par gnas pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i ri dwags dang / bya dang / lto
'gro la sogs pa gang dag 'das pa gang yin pa dang / gnas pa gang yin pa dang / skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag rnams la snying brtse ba'i
phyir gang la la zhig gzungs 'di dran pas bzod pa'i mchog sgom par byed na/ de sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro thams
cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur zhing / skye bo'i tshogs mang po sdug bsngal la gnas pa rnams las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /nam sangs
rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa la gnas par gyur gyi bar du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum gyi de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM ma hA bIR+ya a mo g+ha bi lo ki te/ ba ra ba ra/ dri D+ha bIR+ya/ ma hA ba la/ ba la ba la/ ma hA bo d+h+yaM ga /ba la bo d+ha ni hUM phaT swA hA/ gzungs
'di dus rtag tu dran pa'am/ yongs su dag cing spro ba'i yid kyis dran pa tsam gyi mod la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /gang
'di yid la byed pa dang ldan pas dge ba sna 'ga' tsam byas pa yang dpag tu med pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /myur bar 'gyur
ro/ /byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du brtson 'grus nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/
brtson pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje
chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma hA a mo g+ha kA ru Na d+h+ya na sa mA d+hi/ sar+b+ba bi mo k+Sha/ a pra
kam+p+ya ka/ /tsu ru tsu ru hUM phaT swAhA/ gzungs 'di 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du yid la byed pas rtse gcig tu dran par byas na/ dran pa tsam
gyi mod la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang ting 'dzin stong phrag brgya so sor
rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyi mod la ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang
byed par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan
pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a mo g+ha ma hA pra dz+nyA pA ra mi ta a ba b+hA sa swA b+hA ba sa maM s+pha ra Na bud+d+hi/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/
sa man+ta bud+d+hi/ a ba lo ki te/ b+ha ga wa na pra dz+nyA a ba lo ki te tsak+Shu ShA ma hA pra dz+nyA pa ra dA ma Ni ma hA pra dz+nyA/ pad+ma d+ha ra Ni/ b+hu dze hUM phaT swAhA/ gzungs 'di dran pa
tsam gyi mod la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /thabs dang shes rab sna tshogs kyi dge ba'i blo chen po rab tu 'phel bar
'gyur ro/ /rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i blo dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / 'das
pa dang / ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la byed cing / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i shes rab kyi blo dang rab tu
ldan par 'gyur ro/ /lan 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus
dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi
bar du nam yang rmongs par mi 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la yang dag par rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i de kho na nyid dang rab tu ldan par
'gyur ro/ /blo gros dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rab tu dgongs par
'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' thams cad rjes su sems par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs
su rdzogs par byed pa'i gzungs chen po rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta many+dzu shrI wa rma dang / lots+tsha ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te
gtan la phab pa/ lots+tsha ba chos kyi shes rab kyis kyang bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o// //byang chub sems dpa' 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang / mig stong dang ldan pa'i cho ga zhib mo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ri gru 'dzin na byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas na rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams na bzhugs shing / bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs te/ khri de ni
rin po che'i mchog sna tshogs du mas spras pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal mtshan rnams kyis yongs su brtsegs pa/ lha'i ba dan dbyangs pa ste/ de'i
