ro/ /gang dag mig nad kyis btab te mig gi 'bras bu nyams par gyur tam/ mdongs par gyur tam/ mi bsal bar gyur tam/ ling tog dkar po dang dmar po dag gis khebs te/
'od dang mi ldan par gyur na/ a ru ra dang / pa ru ra dang / skyu ru ra 'brum bu re zhib tu btags te 'thug pa'i tshe gtsang sbra bya dgos pas bud med gsar dus su btsas pa dang / khyi dang phag
rnams bsnyen par mi bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nas brjod de sbrang rtsi dkar po dang / mi'i 'o ma dang sbyar nas mig la bsku bar bya'o/ /'o ma de yang bu khye'u btsas pa'i nu zho rung
gi/ /bu mo btsas pa'i nu zho ni mi rung ngo / /sman de sbyar zin nas kyang mig stong pa'i gzugs kyi mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste mig la bskus nas zhag bdun gyi bar
du khang pa dben par rlung bsangs na/ mig gi 'bras bu skye bar 'gyur bas ling tog sngon po dang dkar po bsal te gsal ba rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag gdon rnams kyis btab
ste smyos par gyur na/ stag dang / 'phar ba dang / spyang ki'i pags pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste lus la bgos gsos par 'gyur ro/ /gal te sbrul gyis zin
par gyur na/ gang zin pa'i mi de'i rna spangs blangs nas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste rma khar bslan na sos par 'gyur ro/ /gzer thabs
ma rungs pas snying la gzer te 'chi la thug na/ ka pyi ta lag pa tsam chu gtsang ma phul gang tsam dang sbyar te bskos nas phul phyed lus pa la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste gcig
car blud na sos par 'gyur ro/ /sman de yang bud med kyi drung du bskol bar mi bya'o/ /ro langs kyi gdon gyis btab nas rgyun ring du na bar gyur na/ gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
sngags kyis btab ste bsregs te snar bdug par bya'o/ /yang na ri bong gi rtug pa'i ril bu bdun blangs te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas mig tu bcug na sos par
'gyur te/ sha dang / chang dang / dku ba rnam pa lnga dang / tshig ngan pa rnams srung dgos so/ /yang na ba bla dang / yungs kar dang / lan tshwa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste
nad pa'i khri'i drung du bsregs na/ gdon de'i lus 'jig par 'gyur bas 'dug pa'i thugs mi thub ste 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te gzhogs phyed na zhing rna ba dang sna sub
par gyur tam/ rkang lag sdud mi nus par gyur na/ ru rta til mar gyi nang du bskol te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas lus la bskus na gtan du 'tsho bar
'gyur ro/ /yang na/ ba'i mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste lus la bskus na yang sos par 'gyur ro/ /gal te bu btsa' dka' bar gyur na/ til mar la lan nyi
shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste bud med sbrum ma'i lte ba dang mo mtshan la bskus na myur du btsa' bar 'gyur ro/ /bud med sbrum ma gang dag mngal du bu shi bar gyur na/
gi'u si srang gcig chu phul do'i nang du bskol te phul gang lus pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas blud na/ sdug bsngal zhing na ba med par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
sha ma 'byung du mi btub par gyur na yang sman 'di 'thungs na phan par 'gyur ro/ /glo bur du snying ga gzer te mi bzod par gyur na/ de ni/ ro nyul gyi gzer thabs zhes bya ba yin
pas kun tu ru dang pog dkar po ma grugs pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste ci tsam 'byor pa byin nas slon du bcug na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /sha chang dang dku ba
rnam pa lnga srung dgos so/ /mes tshig par gyur na/ ba lang gi lci ba dron po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste rma khar bskus na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /srin bu khong par
zhugs te na bar gyur na rta dkar po'i gcin phul phyed la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste blud na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /tshabs che ba la phul gang blud na srin bu thag pa
gcus pa bzhin du rang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /shu chen byung ba la leng se'u hwa brdungs pa'i khu ba la lan rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste shu ba'i steng du blugs
na/ rtsa ba rang 'byung bar 'gyur bas med la 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /mig tu sbrang ma zhugs te na bar gyur na/ bong bu'i rtug pa btsir ba'i khu ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis
btab ste mtshan mo mig tu blugs na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /lto ba na bar gyur na/ khron pa'i chu gtsang ma'i nang du lan tshwa ma grugs pa 'brum bu nyi shu rtsa gcig bor te lan nyi shu rtsa
gcig sngags kyis btab nas phul phyed 'thungs na phan par 'gyur ro/ /mig tshag por gyur tam/ mig tu sha lhag byung bar gyur tam/ ling tog byung bar gyur na/ ke'u
khi tsha'i shing gi lo ma brdungs te btsir ba'i khu ba la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste de'i nang du khar ba'i dong tshe gcig mtshan gcig spangs nas yang lan bdun sngags
kyis btab ste mig tu blugs na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te mtshan mo 'bud 'jug gi tshe 'jigs sdangs nas mi bde bar gyur na/ skud pa dkar po la lan nyi shu rtsa
gcig sngags kyis btab ste mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig byas nas mgul du btags na 'jigs shing sdangs pa dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa dang bral bar kho
nar ma zad kyi/ bsod nams kyang thob la sdig pa rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te khyim 'khor du ltas ngan byung bar gyur na/ bal po si'u'i shing gi yal ga
blangs nas dum bu stong rtsa brgyad du gtubs te mgo mjug gnyi gar mar dang zho bskus nas sngags lan re bzlas shing re re bsregs te stong rtsa brgyad tshang par byas na/ gdon
bgegs thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ de yang sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bya dgos so/ /shu dag dkar po blangs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste dpung pa
g.yas pa la btags na/ g.yul ngor 'thab pa dang / 'brel ba'i gtam smra ba'i gnas thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /ke'u khi tshe'i shing gi lo ma'am yal ga yang rung ste/
dum bur gtubs nas mgo mjug gnyi gar ba mar yang dag pa dang / sbrang rtsi dkar po dang ba zho bskus te sngags lan re bzla zhing dum bu re re sreg pa stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar
bya'o/ /nyin gcig la dus gsum du bya zhing dus gcig la yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te zhag bdun tshang bar gyur na/ sngags mkhan de rang gis mngon par shes par thob
par 'gyur ro/ /gdon mthu bo che gdul bar 'dod na/ lung tang la lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu sngags kyis btab ste bu ram dang sbrang rtsi bskus nas 'phags pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i
gzugs byas pa'i mdun du bsreg par bya'o/ /gi'u wang srang gcig bai DU R+ya'i bum pa'i nang du bcug ste/ 'phags pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i gzugs
byas pa'i mdun du bzhag nas sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis btab ste lus la bskus sam dpral bar thig le byas na lha dang / klu dang / 'dre srin dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thams
cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te la la zhig btson rar chud par gyur na phug ron dkar po'i rtug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste lag pa la bskus nas
mtshon cha la byugs na mtshon cha rang rang grol bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te khyo shug chu dang me bzhin du mi 'dum par gyur na bya dur ba'i mjug ma blangs te/ 'phags pa snying rje chen po dang
ldan pa'i gzugs byas pa'i mdun du sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis btab nas lus la btags na/ de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du gcig la gcig dga' zhing byams pa
dang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ /lo tog dang 'bras bu rnams la srin bu zhugs te za bar gyur na sa'am/ thal ba'am/ bye ma gtsang ma blangs te lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags kyis
btab nas zhing gi phyogs bzhir gtor na srin bu rnams 'gyes par 'gyur ro/ /chu gtsang ma la sngags kyis btab ste 'bras bu'i ljon shing la gtor na srin bu 'bras bu
la za ba'i thugs mi thub bo/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ sha ra ma hA sha ra/ tu lu tu lu mahA tu lu/ oM ku me ha na sha sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang la la zhig 'bru dkon
pa'i gnas su phyin te mu ge byung nas zan chad par gyur na/ khyed kyis mig btsums nas lus drang por bsrang ste sems rtse gcig tu gzungs sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyas bzlas
nas mig phye zhig dang / lha rnams kyis lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa snod bkang nas khyer te 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te khyim na gnas pa'i tshe dgos par gyur na snod
gtsang ma stong pa mdun du bzhag nas mig btsums te kha chus bkang nas lcang ma'i lcug ma dang rnga yab dang lhung bzed la gtor bar bya'o/ /chus gtor zin nas mig
btsums te gzungs 'di lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu bzlas na rang gi dang gis ro brgya dang ldan pa'i zas snod kun gang ba 'byung bar 'gyur bas blangs nas zhag bdun gyi
bar du bza' bar bya'o/ /de ltar na 'di'i mthu stobs ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya'o/ /zas zos zin nas mig btsums te/ sa ra kha zhes brjod nas zas kyis
lhag ma yang spang bar bya'o/ /zas zos te ltor mid nas kyang myur du 'ju bar 'gyur bas stobs dang ldan zhing bde ba 'thob par 'gyur/ /thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /
kun dga' bo/ thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i gzungs ni/ 'di yin te/ na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa g+hA ya/ na maHa dan
ni ya/ u ga tsi du ug tsi du/ ma ti la li la/ la lu te na ma ni mi ti na mi swA hA/ gzungs 'di 'dzin pas phyogs bzhi nas rgyun chad pa'i ri'i rtse mor dkyil
'khor byas nas mtshams bcad lus bsrungs nas khar ba'i lhung bzed chung du zhig khron pa'i chu gtsang mas bkang ste mdun du bzhag nas gzungs sngags
bzlas na/ gdon mi za bar skar ma gsal ba zhig 'ong bar 'gyur bas/ 'ongs pa'i tshe 'jigs pa mi bskyed par sems bde bar mnyam par bzhag nas
sems rtse gcig tu gzungs sngags 'don par byed na/ dbang po rno zhing shes rab dang ldan phar 'gyur bas mi shes pa ci yang med par 'gyur/ 'jig rten
pa'i lam gyi chos kyang mi rtogs pa ci yang med par 'gyur ro/ /thos pa rgyud pa'i tshe skar ma mchog tu gsal ba zhig lhung bzed kyi chu'i nang du 'ong bar 'du
shes bskyed par bya'o// //byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa'i gzungs/
bam po gnyis pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gus pas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni/ sngon bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsod nams bsags pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis deng bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag
la lung bstan par mdzad pa dang / bdag snying rje chen po bskyed nas sems can thams cad la sman par bgyi ba dang / bcing ba mtha' dag bcad pa dang / 'jigs
pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur bar bzhed pa lags pas/ deng bdag gis yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad par 'tshal te/ dus tha ma'i sems can rnams
yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs 'di thos pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus de dag thams cad sdug bsngal kyi rgyu dang bral nas bde ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur lags
so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dus lnga brgya tha ma la yul lam/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal gang yang rung ba dag tu dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/
rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la sogs pas rtag par gdugs mtshan lan drug tu chos bzhin du yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs sngags kyi chos kyi rnam
grangs 'di klog cing 'don pa dang / yongs su 'dzin par bgyid na/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' drin rjes su dran zhing
gzo ba'i slad du rtag par rjes su 'brangs nas gang zag de dag yongs su srung bar bgyid cing spong bar mi bgyid pas 'dre srin thams cad kyis gnod par
bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/ /gzhan yang tshe rabs kyi sgrib pa lci ba thams cad kyang dus gcig tu yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/ gzungs sngags kyi
dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya'i chos kyi sgo thams cad kyang myur du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma'i sems can rnams ni/ phal cher sdig pa'i dri ma lhun stug cing bsod nams chung bas yongs
su 'dzin par bgyid pa zhig mchis na yang 'dre srin dag gis gnod pa bgyid pas/ deng bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can
rnams la rgya cher sman par bgyi ba dang / sems can rnams la bde bar bgyi ba dang / lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa'i ched du gzungs kyi chos bshad
par 'tshal te/ bdag gis sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad ma mchis pa snyed kyi bar du gzungs kyi chos 'di la bsten cing mchod pa bgyis lags so/ /'das pa
dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bar dag kyang yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i rgyus bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par brnyes pa lags pas/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig sems rtse gcig tu yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs
kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'don cing klog pa dang / yongs su 'dzin par bgyid na/ de dag tshe 'di nyid la tshig gi spobs pa myur zhing thogs pa ma mchis pa dang /
shes rab dang sbobs pa mngon par rtogs par 'gyur bas/ /lha dang mi'i 'khor mang po'i nang na mchog tu 'gyur/ gang dag thos pa rnams kyang rab tu dga' zhing
thams cad kyi spyi bo la btud de phyag bgyid par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun mthong bar 'gyur/ gang ci smras kyang rung ste/
thams cad kyis yid ches pas nyan par 'gyur lags te/ de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu lags te/ rang
nyid kyi mthu ni/ ma lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la khyod kyis 'di
ltar/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa de dag thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bya ba dang / las kyi lam yongs su spyang ba'i ched du smras pa
legs so legs so zhes sngags pa brjod nas ngas kyang deng ye shes kyi phyag rgyas btab nas khyod byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po la sogs pa'i
sems rnam pa sna tshogs las gtan du ldog par mi 'gyur bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag mngon par dran lags te/ 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad ma mchis
pa nas yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su bzung bas ri po Ta la la mchis pa'i tshe bdud kyi rgyal pos bdud kyi 'khor mang po dang
'grogs nas bdag gi chos dkrug cing / sngags kyi tshig rnams mngon par mi 'grub par bgyi bar bshams pa las/ de'i tshe bdag gis yum zhes
bgyi ba'i gzungs 'dis bdud mang po rnams btul nas thams cad so sor gyes par gyur pas gzungs 'di'i mthu bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bgyi lags so/ /
de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byams pa dang / snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad la phan gdags shing / lha dang mi rnams bde ba
thob par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das dang / 'khor 'dus pa chen po'i mdun du byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong dang ldan
pa'i yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs lus po che'i sngags 'di smras so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te
samya k+saM bung+d+hA ya/ na mo AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo ma hA s+tha mA ya/ prap+tA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA
kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo bi pu la bi ma na su pra tiSh+Thi ta saM g+hA ya/ sUR+ya sha ta sa ha sra a ti re ka pra b+ha a ba b+ha si ta mU rta ye/ ma hA ma Ni mu ku Ta kuN+Ta la a laM kA ra d+hA ra
Ni/ b+hA ga wa te pad+ma pA Na ye/ sarba lo ka u pA sha ma nA ya/ bi bi d+ha mu kha sa ma be sha biSh+Ta sarba satwA pa ri mo tsa kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM b+hu r+b+hu pa/ ma hA lo ka ka ra Na nA tha ma
sing+d+ha mi ra b+hA dra bi nA sha na ka rA ya/ rA hA dwe Sha mo ha dz+wa la sha ma ka /sha sa ka sa mA shA sa nA ka ra rak+Sha sarba pA pa durga te pra sha ma na ka rA
ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma pa da na ka ra/ he he ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da pad+ma lo ka saM b+hu ta/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka dza TA mu ku TA laM gr-i te shwa rI raM/ ma Ni ka na ka sha ta badzra bai
DUr+yA laM kr-i ta sha rI raM/ a mi tA b+hA si na ka ma lA laM kr-i ta pra b+ha ra Na/ la ri tsa na ma hA du na/ na ra ni ra sha ta sa ha sra/ a b+hi la ShI ta k+Sha ya/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa
ya/ bi b+ha ma bi d+ha ma/ bi nA sha ya bi nA sha ya/ ma hA ya n+taM kle sha ka ba d+ha/ a ba ba d+ha bi bi d+ha sa twA saM sA ra tsA ra ka pra ma tha na/ pu ru Sha pad+ma/ pu ru Sha nA ga /pu ru
Sha sA ga ra/ pu ru Sha siM ha/ bi ra bi ra sha ya/ su tan+ta su yan+ta/ ba ra ba ra/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ sa ma sa ma/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ pra shA sa ya pra shA sa yi/ gi ri gi ri/ bi ri
bi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ mu ru mu ru/ mu yu mu yu/ mu ya mu ya/ mu ny+tsa mu ny+tsa/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ kA ya gA ya/ gA d+ha ya gA d+ha ya/ ha sa ha swa/ pra ha
sa pra ha sa/ bi bi d+ha kle sha bA sa na/ bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba'i ha ra ha ra/ sam ha ra saM ha ra/ du ru ti du ru ti/ ma hA man+t+ra du ru ti/ ka ra Ni sha ta pa ra si ka b+ha ba
ba sa na/ sha ma ka ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da swA hA/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la pad+ma
chen pI phyag rin po che'i bkod pa'i khar ba'i yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di smras ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'du shes
med 'du shes med min gyi lha'i gnas kyi bar dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /rab tu g.yos par gyur to/ /lha rnams kyis kyang rin po che'i me tog gi char mngon
par phab bo/ /'og min gyi lha dang dbang phyug chen po rnams kyang g.yo zhing mi bde bas shin tu 'jigs shing sdangs par gyur to/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /
'dre gdon ma rungs pa thams cad kyang sdug bsngal chen po myong ba'i sgra skad chen po phyung nas shar nub tu 'byer zhing bros kyang gang du 'gro ba'i gnas kyang rig cing
rnyed par ma gyur to/ /de nas sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpas 'khor mang po rnams dang / 'dre srin ma rungs pa thams cad la gang gis bdag gi rig sngags las
'da' zhing rjes su 'brang bar byed na/ de dag gi lus kyi yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad rab tu bu 'di 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'dis ni/ ri rnams
'joms shing rgya mtsho chen po skem par byed do/ /lha ma yin gyi dmag rnams rnam par bcom nas pham par byed do/ /yul 'khor
rnams dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal rnams yongs su srung bar byed do/ /'dre gdon dang / nad dang / sman gyi dug dang / srin bu'i dug dang /
log pa dang / ma rungs pa'i mi rnams pham zhing rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams btul nas rab tu dul bar byed do/ /zhes smras pa
dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po'i pho brang rab tu dga' ba na bzhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu btsun pa dang / lha dang / klu dang /
gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi 'am ci la sogs pa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas pa tshad med pa thams cad kyis kyang dus gcig tu bsngags pa
brjod par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
rig sngags 'dis ni/ sgrib pa'i ri bo shin tu rgya che ba dag kyang rnam par 'joms par bgyid pas gang la la zhig nyan tam/ klog gam/ 'don tam/ yongs
su 'dzin par bgyid dam/ mthong bar gyur na/ de dag la nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa nag po ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag thams cad zhu byang bar 'gyur lags so/ /
gzhan yang gang la la zhig rtag par nang par langs nas gus pa'i sems las yum gyi gzungs 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig klog gam/ 'don par bgyid na/
byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid rtag par de'i rjes su 'brangs nas yongs su srung bar bgyid cing / yongs su skyob par bgyid do/ /
gang la la zhig smon lam rgya chen po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo chen po thams cad myur du 'grub par 'tshal na/ gcig pu gnas dben par mchis nas byang
chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid la dran par bgyi zhing / gzhan yid la mi bgyi bar rtag par gzungs 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
brjod bgyis na/ smon lam rnams mi 'grub pa gang yang ma mchis lags so/ /gzhan yang sems can gyi snying drung du sdug par 'gyur/ ngan 'gro'i sgo thams
cad du ltung bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /mchis kyang rung ma mchis kyang rung ste rtag par sangs rgyas mdun na bzhugs par 'du shes nye bar bzhag par gyur na/ gang
zag de skye ba'i gnas bye ba brgya stong tshang ma mchis pa kun tu bsags pa'i sdig pa'i las ci mchis pa de dag thams cad zhu
byang bar 'gyur/ gang zag de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po stong gi bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad
du byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang dus gcig tu skye bar 'gyur/ btsun pa'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la
zhig rtag par spos sam/ me tog snyim pa gang tsam byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du mngon par gtor nas
gzungs 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig 'don par bgyid na/ stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yon tan dang snying rje chen po'i chos nyid 'thob par 'gyur/
gang zag de 'jig rten na mthar gyis mthu chen po myur du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la zhig rtag par byang chub sems dpa' gdong dang /
mig dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad la rnam par bltas te gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug myur du lus mngon sum du bstan nas rnal 'byor pas mthong bar 'gyur bas/ dri ma dang bral nas sa dang po dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting
nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur bas 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gsal bar bgyid par 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la sogs
par 'jug pa bzhin du 'chi bar 'gyur bas tshe rabs thams cad du sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes rab thob par 'gyur/ kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa ci mchis
pa thams cad kyang zhu zhing byang bar 'gyur lags so/ /gzungs 'di yongs su 'dzin par 'tshal ba des rtag par dpyid zla ra ba dang / dbyar zla 'bring po dang /
ston zla tha chung tshes gcig nas tshes bcu'i bar du gso sbyong dang tshul khrims la gnas nas gos dkar po gtsang ma bgos te/ zas dkar gsum 'tshal
nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam ring bsrel gyi mdun du tsan+dan dkar po'i 'jim pa las dkyil 'khor khru gang gru bzhi pa bgyis nas me tog dang spos
rnam pa sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi nang du gtor nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar spos kyis bdugs te zhugs mar bltams nas sangs
rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gus pa'i sems bskyed de rtag par gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid
na/ tshes bco lnga'i nub mo byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid dkyil 'khor gyi nang du mchi bar 'gyur bas/ rnal 'byor pas mthong
ma thag tu mtshams ma mchis pa lnga'i kha na ma tho ba shin tu lci ba'i sgrib pa ci mchis pa thams cad zhu byang nas lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las
thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur bas/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu dang / dbang bskur ba'i sa'i mthu dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i sa'i mthu
dang / khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi sa yang 'thob par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te dgung char dbab par 'tshal bar gyur
na/ gnam du bltas nas gzungs 'di stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na zil dngar gyi char dus bzhin du 'bab par 'gyur lags so/ /dog sa la bltas
nas gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar 'don par bgyid na/ 'bru rnam pa sna tshogs legs par 'gyur lags so/ /gtsang po dang / chab mig bskams
pa'i drung du gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na/ chab 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur lags so/ /bro nad kyis thebs pa thams cad kyi mdun du
rang gi sug pa lag pa la sngags 'dis lan bdun bsngags te sug pas bya bas na/ 'tsho bar 'gyur lags so/ /gang dran pa nyams pa'i mdun du gzungs
'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ yang dag pa'i dran pa 'thob par 'gyur lags so/ /gang dag bkres skom gyis nyen pa'i mdun du de'i gdong la
bltas nas gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ bkres skom gyis nyen pa'i 'du shes ngan pa thams cad rab tu gsal bar 'gyur lags
so/ /gang dag mtshams dgum par 'tshal na/ rdzing chab kyi nang du zhugs te chos bzhin du gzungs 'di yongs su rdzogs par bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi khar
btags na/ dpag tshad brgya tshun chang du gdon bgegs ci yang ma mchis te mtshams bkum pa nyid du gyur nas yongs su srung bar 'gyur lags so/ /rigs
kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rtag par gdugs gcig bzhin du gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na/ gang zag de'i bsod nams
brjod kyis mi lang bas rig sngags 'dzin pa de dag btsun zhing dbang phyug dang ldan par 'gyur/ gzhan yang skye bo mang po kun
gyis byams shing bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur/ smon lam rnams yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so/ /gang dag bdud 'dul bar
'tshal na/ yum gyi gzungs 'di bzlas te gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas sngags 'di lan re bzlas shing lan gcig bsreg pa
lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na/ yongs su bsal bar 'gyur lags so/ /gal te skye bo mang po thams cad dga' bar 'tshal na/ rtag par lcang
ma'i lcug ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste g.yar khar bcas na/ thams cad kyis byams shing bkur bar 'gyur lags so/ /gang
dag bdag nyid spobs pa dang / shes rab dang ldan par 'tshal na/ shu dag srang gcig phye mar btags te chab mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang sbyar nas ril bu
bgyis te yum gyi gzungs 'dis mtshan ma gsum po 'di lta ste/ drod dang / dud pa dang / 'od byung gi bar du sngags kyis gdab par bgyi'o/ /mtshan
ma de dag thob nas gdugs re bzhin sman gyi ril bu tsam bdun bdun 'tshal nas snying gar yang yang byug par bgyi ste/ de ltar zhag brgya'i bar du 'tshal na/
thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur pas/ bdag nyid kyi lus bsrung ba'i slad du gdugs re zhing yum gyi gzungs 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad
bzlas nas phyag rgya rnam pa bcu gnyis kyang bgyi'o/ /de la dang po byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i lus kun tu srung ba'i phyag rgya ni/ 'di lags
te/ sngar langs nas 'greng ste lus drang por bsrang nas rkang pa gnyis gshibs te rkang pa g.yas pa chung zad cig dgug par bgyi'o/ /sngar sug pa lag
pa g.yon pa thur du brkyang nas gung mo dang srin lag gnyis bkug ste lag mthil du bzhag la mthe'u chung dang / mdzub mo dang / mthe bong ni/ yan par
brkyang ste lag mthil bkan nas gyen du phyogs par bgyi'o/ /de'i rjes la sug pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis nas gung mo bkug ste phrag pa dang mnyam
par bgyis nas lag mthil mdun du blta bar bgyi ste/ 'di ni/ lus kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o/ /gal te bdud dang mu stegs can log par lta ba'i
thibs po bcom nas yang dag pa'i lam du gzung bar 'tshal na/ phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
nas gdon mi 'tshal bar smon pa bzhin 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /gzungs ni/ 'di lta ste/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA
ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ a bat+ta/ a bat+ta/ pa ri bat+te/ e hi he hi swA hA/ de la gnyis pa byang chub sems
dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i kun 'dzin gyi gzungs phyag rgya ni/ 'di lags te/ snga ma'i lus kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya bzhin du thal mo sbyar te snying gar
bzhag nas sor mo lnga snol mar btang ste g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan nas mdzub mo gnyis drang por bsgreng ste rtse mo phrad par bgyis la/ mthe bo
gnyis mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs pa dang po la mnan nas cung zad cig dbye bar bgyi ste/ 'di ni/ kun 'dzin gyi phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o/ /phyag rgya
'di bgyis par gyur na/ bskal pa tshad ma mchis pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig pa'i las ci mchis pa thams cad dus gcig tu yongs
su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /slad ma'i dus kyi tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub tu nye ba'i tshe bdud kyi rgyal pos glags btsal ba dang / kun 'dzin gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya 'di mdzad pas shin tu bde ba'i
bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin brnyes par gyur to/ /gzungs ni/ 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ sarba d+hA ra Ni/ maN+Da la/ e hi e hi/ pra b+hA shud+d+ha/ satwA ya swA hA/ de
la gsum pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ni/ 'di lags/ slar bla gos
phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste rtse mo sprad la mthe bong gnyis mdzub
mo'i tshigs gnyis pa'i steng du bkan par bgyi ste/ chos kyi phyag rgya 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa dang / bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o//
'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang chos 'di mngon par bsgrubs pas bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par grol ba brnyes
pa lags te/ rig sngags ni/ snga ma dang mthun lags so/ /gang la la zhig gdugs re bzhin du phyag rgya 'di bgyis te mchod pa
bgyis na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams myur du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de la bzhi pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya ni/ 'di lags
te/ langs nas 'greng ste rkang pa gnyis gshibs nas sngar gung mo dang / srin lag dang / mthe'u chung rnams rgyab sprad la mdzub mo gnyis 'greng ste rtse
mo sprad nas mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo'i tshigs kyis gnyis pa'i steng mnan te lag pa gnyis kyi bar du tshon sna lnga tsam phye nas smin mtshams su gzhag
par bgyi ste/ 'di ni/ mig stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o/ /phyag rgya'i chos kyi sgo 'di bgyis par gyur na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams gya nom pa bye ba phrag brgya stong snyed mthong bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'bum
phrag bcu dang bzhi stong rnal 'byor pa de'i grogs bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ /gang dag dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi sgor lan gsum ma zhugs pa de dag
gi phyag rgya'i chos kyi sgo 'di mthong du yang mi rung la cho ga 'di yang bgyir mi rung lags so/ /rtags mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chos dang / ye shes kyi
mngon par shes pa gsal ba zhig lags na ni/ ci dang ci smon pa de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so/ /gzungs ni/ 'di lta ste/ oM sarba
tsak+ShuHka rA ya/ d+hA ra Ni/ in+d+ra ya swAhA/ de la lnga pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i lag stong kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya ni/ 'di lags te/ langs
nas sug pa rkang pa gshibs te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i lag mthil bkang nas sor mo lnga so sor phan tshun du bsnyen te/ de'i rjes la sug pa lag
pa g.yon pa'i lag mthil g.yas pa'i steng du mnan nas snying gar 'jog pa gang lags pa 'di ni/ lag stong kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi ste/ 'dis
stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud ji snyed mchis pa thams cad sdud cing 'dul bar bgyi lags so/ /gzungs sngags ni/ 'di lta
ste/ tad+ya thA/ a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ sarba duSh+Ta o hA ya ni swAhA/ de la drug pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtogs par 'gyur pa'i
phyag rgya ni/ 'di lags te/ 'greng ste rting pa gnyis sprad nas sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo 'greng ste/ gung mo bkug nas mdun du phul
la/ de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis nas gung mo bkug ste/ nang logs su phul ba 'di ni/ ting nge 'dzin rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya
zhes bgyi ba lags na/ 'dis ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i bkod pa dang / chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong yang rtogs par 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon du bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ /rig sngags ni/ snga ma nyid bzla bar bgyi'o/ /de la bdun pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong
pa'i lha klu sde brgyad dang / 'dre srin rnams dgug cing sdud pa'i phyag rgya ni/ 'di lags te/ 'greng nas rkang pa gnyis gshibs te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i
srin lag gis mthe bong sen mo la reg par bgyis nas de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis te/ mthe'u chung dang gung mo gnyis dang por bsgreng
nas rtse mo phan tshun phrad par bgyis la/ lag ngar gyi tshigs gnyis sbyar nas mdzub mo ni/ phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o/ /rig sngags ni/ 'di lta ste/ oM sarba de ba nA ga a
na ri swAhA/ de la brgyad pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pas tshangs pa chen po dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po g.yar drang nas chos 'dri ba'i phyag rgya ni/ 'di lags te/ phyag
rgya snga ma'i steng du lag ngar gyi tshigs gnyis phye nas sug pa lag pa'i zur sprad de/ lag mthil bkan la/ mdzub mo ni/ phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o/ /rig sngags ni/ 'di lta ste/ oM
mahA brah+ma ya e hi e hi swAhA/ phyag rgya dang rig sngags 'dis ni/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i sgo mo tshad ma mchis shing grangs ma mchis pa thams cad yang dag par sdud cing 'du bar
bgyi'o/ /gal te nyi zla la gza' zhugs par gyur na/ chab mar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis gdab par bgyi'o/ /yang na lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags bzla bar bgyi'o/ /chab
mar phyag rgyas btab ste 'tshal na/ dbang po rno bar 'gyur bas gdugs gcig la sho lo ka khri lobs par 'gyur lags so/ /phyag rgya'i chos kyi sgo mo 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs
pa nyi ma'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa lags so/ /de la dgu pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pa'i bar du dga'
ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya ni/ 'di lags te/ 'greng nas snying gar thal mo sbyar te mthe bong gnyis ka lag mthil du bkug nas sor mo gzhan bzhi ni/ drang por
bsgreng ste/ snying gar thal mo sbyar nas rig sngags snga ma 'don par bgyid na/ gdon mi 'tshal bar lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang dag tu 'jug par
'gyur/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su kun tu rgyu zhing rin po che brgyad stong bsam pa bzhin thob nas sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa bgyid par 'gyur
lags so/ /gang la la zhig chos kyi sgo 'di mngon par sgrub pa gang legs pa des nang par sngar langs nas khrus yongs su dag par bgyis te/ phyag rgya 'di bgyis na/ phyogs
bcu'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mngon sum du mthong nas bskal pa tshad ma mchis ba snyed kyi 'khor ba'i las ngan pa'i kha na me tho ba lci ba rnams yongs su
'byang bar 'gyur bas/ de'i slad yon tan 'di lta bu'i bsngags pa brjod pa lags so/ /de la bcu pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pa'i smon pa rnams yid bzhin du
mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgya ni/ 'di lags te/ phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du bgyis pa las mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste/ mthe bong gnyis kyi sen mo mnan nas mdzub mo'i sen
mo ni/ rgyab sprad par bgyis te/ rig sngags ni/ snga ma nyid bzla bar bgyi'o/ /de ltar bgyis na/ smon pa rnams mngon par 'grub cing / gdon mi za bar byang chub kyi lam las
ldog par mi 'gyur lags so/ /de la bcu gcig pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pa'i 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ni/ 'di lags te/ phyag
rgya snga ma bzhin du bgyis pa las mdzub mo lnga drang por bsgreng ste thal mo dbye bar bgyi'o/ /phyag rgya 'di ni/ bdag sngon rgyu'i sa la gnas pa'i tshe gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs
rgyas rnams kyis bdag la stsal pas/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam mngon sum du gyur pa lags te/ rig sngags ni/ snga ma nyid bzla bar bgyi'o/ /de
la bcu gnyis pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas spyan 'dren pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ni/ 'di lags te/ phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du snying gar thal mo
sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o/ /rig sngags ni/ 'di lta ste/ oM sar+b+ba bud+d+ha sa ma ya/ e hi e hi/ brah+ma shud+d+ha satwA swAhA/ de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong
lag stong dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor 'bri ba'i cho ga ni/ 'di lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa'i yum gyi dkyil 'khor dang / rig sngags dang /
phyag rgya'i chos 'dis ni/ dus tha ma'i dus kyi tshe rig sngags 'dzin pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig sngags kyi gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin
thams cad myur du gsal bar mthong bar 'gyur bar bgyid pas/ rig sngags 'dzin pa'i gang zag gang lags pa des rtag par ngag
bsdams te bre mo'i gtam rnams smra bar mi bgyi'o/ /gzungs las byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma ya mtshan can rnam pa sna tshogs
gang lags pa de dag ma brtags par bab col du brgyud par mi bgyi'o/ /yongs su dang ba'i sems kyis dran pa nye bar bzhag nas skad cig tsam du yang
rnam par g.yeng bar mi bgyi'o/ /gal te khe la gdu bas slad rol du gzhan dag la tha dad pa'i mtshan ma ston par bgyid na/ sdig pa'i las sbyong bar 'tshal
yang de dag 'grub par mi 'gyur lags so/ /gal te yang dag par yongs su dang ba dang / chos kyi bsam pa gang lags pa des sgom par mi bgyid na/
bgyis pa rnams chab 'tshal zhing don ma mchis par sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong ba tsam du bas kyi/ nam yang sgrub pa dag mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur
bas rtag par nan tan brtson 'grus kyis tshul khrims yongs su dag par bsrungs nas rku ba rnam pa lnga dang / sha chang 'tshal bar mi bgyi'o/ /gal te dbyen
tshig dang / g.yo sgyu'i tshig dang / phrag dog gi tshig smra bar gyur tam/ dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / rig sngags kyi cho ga rku ba'i nongs pa 'di dag byung bar
gyur na/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis spong bar mdzad pas/ 'di skad du ngas khyed spangs pa ma yin yang gzigs shing yongs su
bsdu ba'i 'os ma yin no/ /zhes gsungs par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang zag de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims yongs
su dag pa bshig pa dang / dkon mchog gsum dang / yang dag pa'i chos dang / dge ba'i mtshan nyid thams cad la skur cing 'jig par bgyis pa lags
bas de lta bu'i gang zag de dag ni/ rtag par lha'i bu'i bdud dang / 'dre gdon thams cad dang / mu stegs can rnams dang / bi nA ya ka rnams dang / khams
gcig tu bsdu ba dang / las gcig la gnas pa dang / gtan du skyabs ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags pas/ 'phags pa rnams kyis yongs su skyob
par mi mdzad cing / rtag par sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa dang / lha dang / drang srong thams cad kyis smod par 'gyur bar rig
par bgyi lags so/ /lam sun 'byin cing chos 'jig par bgyid pa'i gang zag de lta bu de dag gdugs mtshan du rtag par
gzungs 'di rjes su dran par bgyid kyang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis gang zag de dag nam yang 'grub par mi 'gyur bar mthong lags te/ de ltar mi
'grub pa de yang bdag gis nongs pa ma lags kyi/ de dag rang nyid kyi nongs skyon lags pas don de'i slad du gzungs 'di'i cho ga dang / glegs
bam de dag gis mthong zhing thos par yang mi bgyi/ 'don cing 'dzin tu stsal bar yang mi bgyi ste/ gang dag tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag pa srung ba dang /
byams pa dang snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa dang / sems can la snying rje zhing byang chub yongs su gnyer bar bgyid pa dag gis yi ger bris nas klog pa
dang / 'don pa dang / yongs su 'dzin par gyur na/ yum gyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par 'grub par 'gyur bas so/ /chos kyi cho ga 'di ni/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po lags pa'i slad du rig sngags 'dzin pas
yang dag pa'i sems dang / brtson 'grus kyi sems kyis lus kyi yan lag dang / nying lag dang / rus pa dang / sha dang / rtsa rgyus dang / rkang dang / mgo
dang / mig la sogs pa yang yongs su spangs nas gzhan dag la stsal te/ chos 'di yongs su gnyer nas rtag par nan tan brtson 'grus kyis mngon
par sgrub pa 'tshal na/ rin po che dang / 'bru dang / dar zab dang / gos dang / mal cha dang / sman dang / nor rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par grol ba'i
yul gyi gzungs dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya'i gzugs brnyan gyi chos kyi ched du gtong ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ slob dpon gyis bstan pa ji lta
pa bzhin du sems rtse gcig tu bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par grol ba'i gzungs kyi chos 'di ni/ slad ma'i dus tha ma'i tshe sems can rnams
la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyis nas yang dag pa'i spyod pa dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus dang / lta bas bgrod pa'i
phyogs dang / rnam par grol ba'i lam mngon par 'grub par bgyid cing / de dag dus 'di nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
'tshang rgya ba'i bar du nam yang ldog par mi 'gyur bar bgyid pas so/ /dkyil 'khor de yang gtsug lag khang gi nang ngam/ ri'am/
chab mig 'bab pa'am/ nags tshal gyi drung du yang rung ste/ nye 'khor kun tu khru gang yan chad nas shing gi rtsa ba dang / dog sa ngan pa dang / gyo mo dang /
gor ma dang / rus pa la sogs pa ci mchis pa brkos te bsal nas dog sa bzang po las rmang khru gang tsam du blangs te brdungs nas mnyam por bgyis
la ba lang gi lci ba dang / spos chab dog sa ser po dang bsres nas 'jim pa bgyis te legs par byug cing zhal zhal bgyis nas gling lngar bgo bar
bgyi'o/ /de la dbus kyi gling ni/ zheng du khru gsum tsam du bgyis te/ dbus kho nar khru do gru bzhir lham par mchis pa'i rin po che'i 'khor lo rtsibs
brgya rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa zhig bri bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang 'khor lo dbus su rin po che'i pad+ma kha phye ba 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis mchis pa khru gang ba zhig bri
bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang 'khor lo'i tha ma 'khor bar 'od 'bar ba bri bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes la gling gi gru bzhir pad+ma kha bye ba re re bri bar bya'o/ /gzhan
yang pad+ma re re'i steng du yid bzhin gyi nor bu re re bris nas nor bu bzhi po'i steng du 'od 'bar ba bri bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i
pad+ma de'i steng du byang chub sems dpa' spyan re gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs tsan+dan dkar po las bgyis pa zhig bzhag par bgyi'o/ /de nas gling gnyis pa ni/
zheng du khru gang bar bgyis nas sngar gru bzhir pad+ma kha bye ba re re bri bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang pad+ma de dag re re'i steng du ri rab lhun po'i stan rim pa gsum mchis pa
gsum gsum bris nas byang shar mtshams kyi stan la dbang phyug chen po'i lha bri'o/ /shar lho'i mtshams kyi stan la ni/ lha mthu chen po bri'o/ /lho nub mtshams
kyi stan la ni/ tshangs pa chen po bri'o/ nub byang mtshams kyi stan la ni/ /brgya byin bri bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang ngos bzhir ni/ rin po che'i me tog dang / phreng ba bcu drug
bri bar bgyi'o/ /de nas gling gsum pa ni/ zheng du khru do bri bar bgyis te/ sa gzhi sngon po la gser gyi thig bkra ba 'ba' zhig bri bar bgyi'o/ /de nas gling
bzhi pa ni/ zheng du khru gang bar bgyis te/ ngos bzhi spyi la bar chad nyi shu rtsa brgyad du byas nas bar chad dum bu re re nang du yang pad+ma kha bye ba re re bri bar bgyi'o/ /
gzhan yang go rim bzhin du pad+ma de dag re re'i steng du yang rdo rje tho ba dang / rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya dang / dgra sta'i phyag rgya dang /
gri'i phyag rgya dang / ral gri'i phyag rgya dang / dung gi phyag rgya dang / chu gri'i phyag rgya dang / zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang / dbyig pa thogs pa'i phyag rgya dang / gdugs
kyi phyag rgya dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang / gshin rje'i dbyig pa'i phyag rgya dang / bi nA ya ka'i phyag rgya dang / mtshon cha'i phyag rgya dang / 'khor lo'i
phyag rgya dang / sug pa lag pa sna tshogs dang ldan ba'i phyag rgya rnams so sor bris nas phyag rgya de dag kun la yang 'od 'bar ba dag bri bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan
yang lho phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni/ 'thab bral gyi lha bri'o/ /nub phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni/ chu lha bri'o/ /byang
phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni/ ku be ra bri'o/ /shar phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni/ lha gzhon nu bri bar bya'o/ /de nas
gru bzhi'i gnas so sor ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi khro gnyer can g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bgyi'o/ /de nas gling lnga pa ni/ khru gang bar bgyis te
ngos bzhi kun tu 'bras bu'i ljon shing dang / me tog gi ljon shing dang / rin po che'i ljon shing rnam pa sna tshogs bri bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang gru bzhi kun tu
rin po che'i ri rab lhun po re re bri bar bgyi'o/ /chab sgo bzhir ni/ rgya mtsho chen po'i chab bri bar bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi slad nang gi gling rnams kyi sa gzhi ni/ kha
dog sngon por bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang slad nang gi gling rnams kyi nub phyogs kyi nub sgo'i lho'i ngos kyi zur la sngags mkhan 'byung zhing 'jug pa'i chab sgo gcig
dbye bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bgyis pa gcig dbus su kha shar phyogs su
blta bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i mdo sde glegs bam gcig pad+ma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis mchis pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng
du bzhag nas gzugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du gzhan yang tsan+dan dkar po'i dri chab zhal bu bcu drug dang / zhal zas rnam pa sna tshogs dang / zas dkar gsum
dang / shing tog la sogs pas bkang ba'i gzhong bu nyi shu rtsa lnga dang / spos chab bre gang dang / bum pa dar tshon sna tshogs dang / me tog dang / ljon shing gi
yal ga la sogs pas kha brgyan pa nyi shu rtsa lnga dang / me tog dang / phreng ba sna sna nas nyi shu nyi shu dang / mar me nyi shu rtsa brgyad
dang / byug spos dang / spos kyi phye ma dang / de la sogs pa'i spos deb tshe nyi shu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs bris pa'i 'phan dang / dar tshon
sna tshogs las bgyis pa'i 'phan spyir phreng nyi shu rtsa lnga bsham par bgyi'o/ /'di ltar mchod pa bgyid pa'i zhal deb dang / snod spyad dang / bum pa la
sogs pa de dag thams cad gser dang / dngul dang / 'khar ba la sogs pa las bgyis pa las sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /gal te yang dag par ma mchis
na/ brnyan ma yang rung lags so/ /'di ltar yo byad de dag thams cad kyang slad nang gi gling rnams ngos bzhir chos bzhin du bri zhing dgram par bgyi'o/ /
gdan dang / me tog sna tshogs gzugs shing gtor bar bgyi'o/ /'bras sA lu'i me tog dang / yungs kar dang / me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dkyil 'khor
gyi steng du gtor bar bgyi'o/ /zhal zas de dag kyang gdugs gcig bzhin du gsar du bgyis pa bzang po las mchod par bgyi'o/ /sngags mkhan de
yang 'byung 'jug gi tshe khrus yongs su dag par bgyis nas byug spos kyis byug ste gos gsar pa gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/ /zas dkar gsum 'tshal
nas tsan+dan dang / a ga ru dang / du ru ka dang / ga pur la sogs pa bsres te gdugs gcig la dus gsum du byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bgyis pa la mchod par bgyi'o/ /nang gi gling gsum pa'i nang du mig stong pa'i gzugs bzhag pa'i
mdun du rang byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa gsum po dag yang dag par blang bar dam bca' bar bgyi'o/ /gdugs mtshan du slad rol gyi gling gi nub phyogs
kyi chab sgor skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas gdugs gcig la yum gyi gzungs lan stong rtsa brgyad bar chad ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyis nas
gdugs nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du bsam pa gtugs te mchod par bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang dus drug tu dkyil 'khor gyi nub ngos zur gyi chab sgo nas dkyil
'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas gling gsum pa'i nub phyogs kyi chab sgor 'greng ste/ sngar bstan pa'i phyag rgya dang po dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa nas bcu gnyis
pa sangs rgyas spyan 'dren pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar gyi phyag rgya kun bgyis nas sngags lan bdun bdun bzla bar bgyi'o/ /phyag rgya bcu
gnyis pa'i bar du bgyis lags nas kyang bdag nyid byang chub chen po'i smon lam shin tu brtan pa las phyir mi ldog par bgyi'o/ /zhes smon lam btab
nas g.yar 'dren par bgying na/ thams cad nye bar mchi bar 'gyur bas lus drang por bsrang ste mchis nas nges pa'i sems kyis lha 'dre thams cad
sgrib cing chod pa ma mchis par mig sngar mchis so snyam du 'du shes nye bar bzhag ste/ tha dad pa'i yul la mi dmigs par lus po che'i sngags snga ma lan nyi
shu rtsa gcig 'don par bgyid na/ de'i mtshan mo gzugs bgyis pa de las 'od zer chen po byung nas byung chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug nyid gdon mi 'tshal bar mngon sum du lus ston par 'gyur te/ lus bstan nas mchi ba'i tshe kun dga' ba'i lus kyi byad gzugs su mngon
par sprul nas dga' zhing 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis rnal 'byor pa de la ci zhig dgos/ gang zhig smon ces 'dri bar 'gyur bas/ de'i tshe sngags mkhan gyis
'di skad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi chos yongs su gnyer ba dang / gzhan yang dkyil 'khor
dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags kyi cho ga thams cad mngon par 'grub pa dang / 'dre gdon thams cad 'dul zhing ngag nyan par 'gyur bar 'tshal lo zhes
lan gdab par bgyi'o/ /de ltar smon ba rnams grub nas kyang bdag nyid rig par bgyi'o/ /gzhan dag la brjod bar mi bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di
ni/ bal ras sam/ btso ras la ri mo bris te bgyis na yang rung lags so/ /smon pa thams cad 'grub par 'tshal na/ chab kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa
bgyis la a ga ru bsregs te lus po che'i sngags snga ma lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas bcu pa smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub pa'i phyag rgya snga ma
bgyis na/ smon pa thams cad bsam pa bzhin du 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so/ /gal te skye bo mang po thams cad dga' bar 'gyur
bar 'tshal na/ rab tu dga' ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya snga ma bgyis nas lus po che'i sngags kyis til 'bru la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gdab par
bgyi'o/ /yang na sngags lan re bzlas nas lan re zhugs kyi nang du dor ba lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na/ thams cad
yid bzhin du dga' bar 'gyur lags so/ /gnod sbyin rnams dga' bar 'tshal na/ gnod sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba'i ljon shing gi yal ga blangs te
lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas kun dga' ra bar bor na/ dga' bar 'gyur lags so/ /mi ma rungs pa dgrar gyur pa gdul bar 'tshal na/
shing khong len 'bog la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re zhugs su dor ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis
na/ skyabs su mchi zhing thul bar 'gyur lags so/ /'dre gdon gdul dka' ba zhig mchis na/ gu gul dang / yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
sngags kyis btab nas sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re zhugs su dor ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na/ 'dre gdon thams cad rang dul bar 'gyur
lags so/ /yul phyogs su rims nad byung bar gyur na/ chab kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis nas ba mar bzang po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis
btab ste sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re zhugs su dor ba lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na/ rims nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na chab nyung zad
cig blangs te rims kyis thebs pa 'tshal du stsal na/ 'phral du 'tsho bar 'gyur lags so/ /sngon yul ge byin zhes bgyi bar rims nad byung nas gang rims
kyis btab pa de dag gdugs zhag gcig gam/ gnyis las mi 'da' bar 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par gyur to/ /de'i tshe bram ze tsin ti zhes bgyi ba zhig snying
rje chen po skyes nas cho ga'i sgo 'di bshams nas yul khams gcig gi rims kyis thebs pa thams cad gsos pas/ thams cad zhi bar gyur te/ rims
gtong ba'i 'dre gdon gyi rgyal po yang de'i tshe yul nas byung bar gyur pa'i slad du sman yon che bar rig par bgyi lags so/ /gal te pha rol gyi dmag tshogs
kyis gtses par gyur tam/ chom rkun dang / 'khrug pa byung bar gyur na/ lus kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya dang po bgyis te/ rig sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
brjod bgyis na/ dgra dang / chom rkun de dag thams cad rang gi ngang gis rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la
zhig las kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang gis tshe rabs su nye ba'i tshe 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya snga ma bgyis te/
gdugs re bzhin du mchod pa bgyis nas a ga ru bsregs te rig sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas sngags lan re bzlas nas de'i ming nas lan re
'don par bgyis na/ las kyi sgrib pa de dag yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur lags so/ /sngon yul wA ra NA sir khyim bdag cig gnas pa las/ bu
gcig las ma mchis pa de lo bcu drug las mi thub par gyur nas lo bco lnga lon pa dang / khyim bdag khyo shug mya ngan gyis rod nyams par gyur to/ /
de'i tshe bram ze zhig sgo kun tu rgyu zhing zas slong ba las/ khyim bdag de mthong nas ci'i phyir mi bde bar gyur ces smras pa dang / khyim bdag gis lo rgyus
de dag rgyas par bshad do/ /de nas bram ze khyim bdag de la mya ngan ma byed par bdag gis bsgo ba bzhin du byos shig dang / khyod kyi bu tshe ring bar
'gyur ro/ /zhes smras nas de'i tshe bram ze des cho ga'i sgo 'di nyid zhag bdun tshang bar bgyis pa dang / gshin rjes khyim bdag de la khyod kyi bu'i tshe tshad
lo bcu drug las mi thub pas/ lo bco lnga lon te lo gcig las ma lus pa las/ deng dge ba'i rkyen dang phrad pas lo brgya thub par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'dir
nga 'ongs nas bsgo ba yin no/ /zhes smras pa dang / de'i tshe khyim bdag khyo shug rab tu dga' zhing mgu bar gyur pas/ khyim gyi nor ci mchis pa bteg ste
sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la phul bas/ cho ga 'di ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mthu chen po dang ldan par rig par bgyi lags so/ /sngar
'dus pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por lan gsum zhugs pa zhig lags te/ dkyil 'khor mi 'tshal te phyag rgya bgyis
nas rig sngags bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyis smon pa rnams mi 'grub pa gang yang ma mchis la/ myur du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par
'gyur lags so/ /bud med gang la la zhig bu btsa' ba'i tshe sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur na/ chab mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab
ste 'tshal stsal na/ nges par bde bar 'gyur zhing / khye'u dang bu mo btsas pa gang lags pa de dag kyang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang ldan par 'gyur/
dge ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas sngon bsod nams bsags pa'i mthus skye bo mang po kun gyi snying du sdug par 'gyur/ rtag
par mi'i nang du longs spyod khyad par du 'phags pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur lags so/ /sems can gang la la zhig mig nad kyis thebs te sdug
bsngal zhing mi bde bar gyur na/ sngags mkhan gyis byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya bgyis nas sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
bzlas te mig la phyag rgyas btab par gyur na/ mig kyang 'tsho bar 'gyur la/ rgyu dang rkyen des gang zag de lha'i mig thob par 'gyur bas lha rnams gsal
bar mthong zhing longs spyod mchog la longs spyod par 'gyur lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong lag stong dang
ldan pa'i gzugs 'bri ba'i cho ga ni/ ras dkar po khru bcu drug pa'am/ khru nyi shu pa yang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus ni/ dzam+bu'i gser
gyi kha dog can du bgyis te/ gdong la mig gsum mchis pa/ sug pa lag pa stong dang ldan zhing / sug pa lag pa stong po de dag re re'i mthil du yang
yang mig re re bri'o/ /sug pa lag pa chen po yang dag pa nyid ni/ bco brgyad mchis te/ sngar sug pa gnyis kyis ni/ snying gar thal mo sbyar bar bgyid do//
sug pa gcig gis ni/ rdo rje'i tho ba thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni/ rtse gsum pa thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni/ glegs bam thogs so/ /yang gcig
gis ni/ rin po che'i phyag rgya thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni/ 'khar gsil thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni/ rin po che'i nor bu thogs so/ /yang gcig
gis ni/ rin po che'i 'khor lo thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni/ pad+ma kha phye ba thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni/ zhags pa thogs so/ /yang gcig
gis ni/ lcug ma thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni/ 'od zer kha dog lnga 'byin par bgyid do/ /yang gcig gis ni/ bgrang phreng thogs so/ /yang gcig
gis ni/ ril ba thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni/ zil dngar yongs su gtong ba'i lag tu ston to/ /yang gcig gis ni/ rin po che'i char sna tshogs
'bebs shing mi 'jigs pa'i lag tu ston to/ /yang gnyis ni/ lte ba'i thad kar g.yon pa g.yas pas mnan nas mthil bkan te mchis so/ /sug pa
lag pa gzhan dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag thams cad ni/ sprul pa'i sug pa lags te/ sug pa de dag kun kyang
so so nas mtshon cha dang / phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs thogs pas/ kha cig ni/ sug pa lag pa'i phyag rgya brkyang ba nyi tshe ba yang mchis te/ so so nas mi
mthun pas snying po'i mdo las/ ji skad du byang chub sems dpa' de ni/ lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi mgo rgyan thogs so/ /lag ngar la ni/ gdub kor
rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan to/ /lus la ni/ phreng ba thogs shing lha'i rin po che'i gos gya nom pa dag bgos pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /
tshon rtsi de dag gi nang du ko ba'i spyin stsal bar mi bgyi'o/ /kun tu ra'i khu ba dang sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /gang dag yum gyi gzungs kyi cho ga bgyid par 'tshal na/
sngar de'i gzugs ri mor bri'o/ /gzugs ri mor bri bar yang nges par chos bzhin du bgyi 'tshal bas ri mo 'bri ba'i gnas khang nye 'khor kun tu tsan+dan
dkar po'i chab kyis dog sa la byugs te dkyil 'khor bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang ri mo mkhan 'byung 'jug gi tshe khrus bgyis nas gos gsar ba gtsang ma
bgos te nyin re bzhin sdom pa brgyad yang dag par blang bar bgyi'o/ /chos bzhin du gzugs bris lags nas kyang ri mo mkhan chos bzhin du ma bgyis par
dogs par gyur na/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa gcig yid la ji ltar mos pa bzhin du bgyis te/ ba dan dang / me tog dang / zhal zas dang / zas dkar
gsum dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos chab dang / me tog sna tshogs kyis kun tu khyab par bkram nas mchod pa rgya cher bgyis te/ rnal 'byor
ba dang / ri mo mkhan gang lags pa des gdugs gcig la dus gsum du gzugs bris pa'i mdun du nongs pa rnams mthol bshags na/ zhag nyi
shu rtsa gcig tshang ba'i mtshan mo mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bris pa las 'od zer chen po byung nas nyi zla zil gyis mnan te/ 'od kyis
phyogs bcu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang / tshad ma mchis pa thams cad thogs pa ma mchis par gsal bar bgyis
pas/ rnal 'byor pa dang / ri mo mkhan gang lags pa de dag dang / sems can gang dag 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cad shin tu lci ba'i kha na ma tho ba
ci mchis pa dus gcig tu zhu byang nas yongs su dag par 'gyur lags so/ /cho ga 'di sgrub pa gang lags pa des sems rtse
gcig tu ma bgyis pa ni/ ma gtogs lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag
gis sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyis kyang phyag stong dang / spyan stong po 'di dag bstan nas bdud chen po
rnams gdul ba mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das/ der bdag gis kyang lag stong dang / mig stong po 'di dag bstan nas bdud chen po rnams btul
ba lags te/ sug pa lag pa stong po de dag kyang so so nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po re re mngon par sprul nas bskal ba bzang po rabs stong gi
'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bgyid par 'gyur la/ mig stong po de dag kyang so so nas sangs rgyas re re mngon par sprul nas bskal ba bzang po'i
sangs rgyas stong dang mtshungs par 'gyur bar 'gyur ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i lus bdud 'dul ba'i nang nas
mchog tu gyur pa lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so//
ngas kyang byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus bskal pa mthar thug pa'i bar du khyod kyi yum gyi gzungs 'di byin gyis brlab par bya'o// //byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa'i gzungs/ bam po gsum pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis bsngags pa brjod pa thos nas rab tu dga' zhing mgu bar gyur pas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan
'das kyi zhal du bltas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs kyi phyag rgya mngon par
sgrub par bgyid pa mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas kyang rjes su yi rang gi khyod kyis shod cig /de nas byang chub sems
dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa dang / nam byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rig sngags 'di smras pa na stong
gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi bar gyi lha'i gnas thams cad kyang
rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to/ /'og min gyi lha dang / dbang phyug chen po yang mi bde bar shin tu skrag par gyur to/ /'dre gdon mdungs
pa thams cad kyang sdug bsngal chen po myong bar gyur pas/ ku co 'don cing shar nub tu byer nas 'gro ba'i gnas kyang mi rnyed par gyur to/ /de nas
sprul pa'i lus kyis 'khor mang po rnams dang / 'dre gdon ma rungs pa rnams la khyed gal te bdag gi rig sngags kyi rjes su mi 'brang zhing 'gal
bar byas par gyur na/ mgo tshal bar 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bsgo'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rig sngags 'dis ni/ ri rnams 'joms par
bgyis shing rgya mtsho chen po skam par bgyid do/ /rig sngags 'dis ni/ lha ma yin gyi dpung rnams bcom nas yul rnams srung bar bgyid do/ /rig sngags
'dis ni/ 'dre gdon ma rungs pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / mi ma rungs pa thams cad tshar gcod par bgyid do/ /rig sngags 'dis
ni/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'joms shing dul bar bgyid lags so/ /rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin
par bgyid na/ gang zag de'i mthu stobs brjod kyis mi lang ngo / /rig sngags 'di 'don pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa de dag btsun zhing dbang phyug dang
ldan pa dang / nam 'tsho'i bar du rgyal pos byams shing yid du mchi ba dang / smon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/ /gang la la zhig phyir rgol
ba'i bdud gdul bar 'tshal na/ spos gu gul bsregs te bdag gi lus po che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /skye bo mang po
thams cad kyis bdag la byams par 'tshal na/ lcug ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste g.yar khams bcas na/ byams shing bkur
bar bgyi'o/ /bdag nyid spobs pa dang shes rab dang ldan par 'tshal na/ shu dag la lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste snying gar bskus na/ thogs
pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa thob par 'gyur te/ yum gyi gzungs kyi snying po'i phyag rgya bgyi'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa'i phyag rgya ni/ 'di lags te/ sug pa lag pa gnyis rgyab sprad de sbyar nas mthe bong gnyis
mdun du brkyang bar bgyi'o/ /phyag rgya 'dis ni/ bdag kyang srung zhing gzhan yang bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /phyogs gang dang gang du mchi yang rung ste/ mtshams
dgum par 'tshal bas/ chab gtsang ma'am/ thal ba gtsang ma la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste gang du mchis pa'i gnas der chab bam/ thal
ba snyim pa gang sngar rang gi lus la gtor nas de'i rjes la phyogs bzhir chos bzhin du gtor na/ de nyid mtshams su 'grub par 'gyur lags
so/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'dre srin ma rungs pa dang / log pa'i gdon mang po rnams kyis gtses par gyur na/ bal
po se'u'i yal ga dang / grib logs kyi lcang ma'i yal ga blangs te rig sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis nas nad pa la bzhus na/ nad gang yang
rung ste mi 'tsho ba ma mchis lags so/ /rig sngags ni/ 'di lta ste/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha d+harma saM g+hA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/
na mo badzra pA Ni ye/ bo d+hi satwA ye/ tad+ya thA/ bi si bi si/ kA ya si bi/ pa la sha pa la sha ni swA hA/ rig sngags kyi phyag rgya 'dis ni/ log par lta ba'i mu
stegs can rnams 'dul bar bgyid do/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rtag par gdugs dang po 'char pa'i tshe dang / gdugs kyi
gung dang / gdugs bas pa'i tshe lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis na/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu la mchod pa bgyis pa dang /
bye brag tu gyur pa ma mchis pas nam du yang bud med kyi dngos po len par mi 'gyur/ tshe 'das nas kyang ngan song gsum po dag dang gtan du 'bral zhing /
de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gis spyi bo la byugs te/ khyod nga'i zhing du
skye bar 'gyur bas ma 'jigs shig ces bka' stsal par 'gyur/ tshe 'di nyid la glo bur du 'chi bar mi 'gyur zhing / 'dre gdon dag gis kyang glags
rnyed par mi 'gyur lags so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi kha na ma tho ba yongs
su sbyong ba'i phyag rgya ni/ 'di lags te/ 'greng nas 'di ltar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa mdun du brkyang ste sor mo lnga so
sor phye nas mdun du phul te sor mo lnga char bsgreng ngo / /de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong lag mthil du bkug ste/ sor mo gzhan
bzhi ni/ khu tshur du bcangs nas rna ba g.yas pa'i thad kar bzhag ste/ lus po che'i sngags bzlas nas mdzub mo ni/ phan tshun brgyu bar bgyi'o/ /phyag
rgya ni/ gdugs gcig la dus gsum du bgyi 'tshal pas/ dus gsum gyi tshe yang lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na/ mtshams su mchis pa
lnga pa/ shin tu lci ba bzhi'i kha na ma tho ba rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur lags so/ /sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje bskyed
par gyur na/ kha na ma tho ba thams cad kyi rtsa ba bsregs nas/tshe 'das pa'i rjes la yang sangs rgyas rnams dang 'jal bar 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas
kyi zhing de dag tu yang 'khor los bskyur ba'i rgyal po bgyid par 'gyur/ gzhan yang bas pa ma mchis pa'i gter zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs dang /
ye shes mnyam pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur/ gzhan yang mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur/ gzhan yang tshe 'di nyid la mig dang /
rna ba dang / sna dang / lce la sogs pa bro 'tshal bar mi 'gyur zhing / lus kyi nad thams cad kyang yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/ /sngon gyi las dang / kha na ma tho ba
rnams kyang zhu byang bar 'gyur lags so/ /gal te than pa byung bar gyur na/ til 'bru yog po'i 'bras bu mar dang sbyar te ril bu bgyis nas lan brgya
rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ chab rdzing du bor na/ dgung char 'bab par 'gyur lags so/ /gal te char ches na/ 'bras sA lu brdos pa'i me tog yungs
'bru'i mar dang sbyar te ril bu bgyis nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ chab rdzing bur bor na/ dgung char 'chad par 'gyur lags so/ /nga
la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud rnams btul ba'i phyag rgya ni/ 'di
lags te/ sor mo snol mar btang ste/ g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan te/khu tshur dam du bcangs te spyi bor bzhag nas lus po che'i sngags bzlas brjod
bgyis na/ 'khon pa'i dgra thams cad rang dul bar 'gyur lags so/ /cho ga 'di bgyid pa gang lags pa des ring
bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du tshes nyi shu dgu'i mtshan mo tsan+dan dkar po'i phye ma'i dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ me tog sna tshogs bkram
nas yongs su dag par khrus te gos gsar pa gtsang ma bgos nas sug par pog phor thogs te a ga ru bsregs la/ kha shar phyogs su bltas
te skyil mo krung bcas nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag stong mig stong dang ldan pa spyi bo la mchis par 'du shes nye bar
bzhag ste lus po che'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ 'di dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'i phan yon dang po mchog lags so/ /
gzhan yang yungs kar til gyi 'bras bu gcig tu bsres te brdungs nas phye mar bgyis te phog gsum gyis cung zad cig blangs nas lan
gcig sngags kyis btab ste zhugs su 'dor ba dgung bdun tshang bar bgyis la/ gdugs re la yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na/ slad
kyis ci bgyi'o 'tshal mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'jigs pa ma mchis pa
chen po'i phyag rgya ni/ 'di lags te/ 'greng nas sug pa rkang pa gnyis gshibs te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yas pa bkan te lag ngar g.yon pa bteg
nas pus mo'i steng du bzhag par bgyis te/ sug pa lag pa g.yon pa yang de bzhin du bgyis nas rtag par ring bsrel gyi mdun du lus po che'i sngags
lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ myur du sems can la mi 'jigs pa stsal pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thob par 'gyur lags so/ /gzhan yang shing
kun dang / yungs kar dang / shu dag dang / ta ta ba'i ril bu blangs te dngos po 'di dag zhugs kyi nang du bor te bsreg par bgyi'o/ /'di dag sreg
pa yang sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar ram/ dkyil 'khor ram/ gnas gtsang ma dag tu bsregs nas lus po che'i sngags bzlas te sngags
lan re bsregs pa brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis nas spos dang me tog dag gis rig sngags la mchod pa bgyis na/ ci dang ci smon pa rnams yid bzhin
du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /gal te rig sngags gzhan gyis ma thub pa dang sngags 'dis btab na/ thams
cad thub cing 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /gal te rmi ltas mthong bar 'tshal na/ sngags 'di bzlas nas phyag rgya bgyis te mig la btab na/
ci dang ci mthong bar 'tshal ba de dag thams cad rmi lam du mthong bar 'tshal lags so/ /bsod nams ma mchis pa gang dag ci bgyi'o 'tshal
yid bzhin du 'grub par mi 'gyur na/ gdugs re bzhin rig sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'don pa dgung bdun du tshang bar gyur na/ ci dang ci
smon pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag sngon klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas su rgya mtsho'i nya chos kyi mdun sar
chos ston pa na klu mang po rnams sdug bsngal chen po rnams myong bar mthong ba dang / klu mang po rnams la snying brtse nas de dag sdug bsngal las
yang dag par bzla ba dang / sems can mang po rnams sdug bsngal dang bral zhing 'khon pa'i dgra ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du chos bstan pa
las/ de'i tshe klu'i bu mos chos 'di gnyer ba'i slad du nor bu rin po che mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ri ba zhig lus pa dang / bdag gis de la
yum gyi gzungs 'di rgya cher bstan pas sdug bsngal gyi bgegs rnams dang bral bar 'gyur lags so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chu shel gyis
rig sngags 'di yongs su 'dzin pa dag la phan gdags shing bgegs yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir sngags 'di smras so/ /bi ma le/ ma hA bi ma le/ u
ha la/ ma hA u ha le/ hu ma le/ ma hA hu ma le/ sa hA le/ ma hA sa hA le/ tsi le te swA hA/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig phyogs gang
du gnas kyang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i chos kyi cho ga 'di yongs su 'dzin par bgyid na/ bdag kyang rtag
par de dag gi rjes su 'brel ste yongs su srung bar bgyid pas bdud kyi khor rnams kyi bar dag gis gtse bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la zhig
brel zhing phongs par gyur tam/ pha rol gyi dgras gtses sam/ chom rkun dag gis gnod pa bgyid par gyur na/ tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu
rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste sngags lan re bzla zhing mdud pa re re mdud nas dpung pa g.yon pa la mdud par bgyi'o/ /
gzhan yang sug pa g.yon pa'i srin lag dang / gung mo dang / mdzub mo rnams khu tshur bcangs te/ mthe bos steng du mnan nas mthe'u chung chom kun
gyi phyogs su kha bstan te/ sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ thams cad rang gyis nas gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/ /sngon byang chub
sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gangs ri la gnas te/ chos ston pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i yul na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams
sems can gyi sha khrag 'ba' zhig 'tshal zhing / dge ba'i sems ci yang ma mchis pa mthong ba dang / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de thabs la
mkhas pas phan gdags shing sems can gdul ba'i ched du rdzu 'phrul gyis mthus de ma thag tu yul de dag tu mchis nas mig stong dang
lag stong dang ldan pas bdud gdul ba'i lus mngon par bstan te/ yum gyi gzungs mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgya bgyis pa dang / de'i tshe srin
po'i yul gyi rgyal po bdag gi thad du mchis nas nongs pa mthol bshags te phyag bgyis pa dang / bdag gis skyang mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgyas btab
pas/ de bla na ma mchis pa'i lam mngon par grub par gyur lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag
rgya ni/ 'di lags te/ 'greng nas sug pa rkang pa gnyis gshibs te snying gar thal mo sbyar te mthe'u chung gnyis snol mar btang zhing / g.yon pas
g.yas pa mnan nas lus po che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas cho ga rnam pa sna tshogs gang bgyid kyang rung ste/ thams cad mngon par 'grub par
'gyur lags so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'gro ba drug po dag sdug bsngal gyi bgegs las yongs su skyob pa'i
'khor lo'i phyag rgya ni/ 'di lags te/ 'gro ba drug gi sems can sdug bsngal las yongs su skyob par 'tshal na/ 'khor lo'i phyag rgya spyad par
bgyi ste/ 'di ltar sor mo bcu'i rtse mo phan tshun phrad par bgyi ste/ lag ngar gyi tshigs dang / lag mthil ni/ dbye bar bgyi'o/ /sor mo rnams kyi bar
yang tshon gang tsam mchis par bgyi ste/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' de 'gro ba drug po dag tu gnas nas sdug bsngal gyi
bgegs las yongs su bzlas pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'di ltar phyag rgya'i 'khor lo 'di'i dbang gis thams cad sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur pas so//
de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyag rgya ni/ 'di lags te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas sngar sug
pa g.yon pa brkyang ste sor mo lnga char bkan nas pus mo g.yon pa'i steng du gzhag go/ /de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste sor mo lnga char
kha sbub nas pus mo g.yas pa'i steng du mnan par bgyi'o/ /'di ni/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya dang 'dra ste/ 'das pa dang / ma byon
pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mtshungs par phyag rgya 'dis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ba lags pas/ phyag
rgya 'dis ni/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad sel bar bgyid do/ /rnal 'byor pa bsam gtan sgom pa gang dag ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du ma gyur na/ gdugs
mtshan bdun gyi bar du dgon pa'i gnas su mchis nas gzungs 'di bzlas te phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas sems rtse gcig tu sangs rgyas rnams mig sngar mngon
sum du bzhugs pa yid la bgyis te gdugs mtshan gcig la lan drug tu mthol bshags bgyis na/ sangs rgyas rnams kyang mngon sum du 'gyur
zhing / bsod nams kyi phung po chen po tshad ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa rnams kyang 'thob par 'gyur lags so/ /de la byang chub
sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dgug pa'i phyag rgya ni/ 'di lags te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo
bzhi khu tshur bcang bar bgyi'o/ /de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pas g.yon pa'i mthe bong khu tshur bcangs pa bzhin bcangs nas lag pa g.yon pa'i
mthe bo lag pa g.yas pa'i chang ba'i gong du rtse mo phyung nas sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo ni/ phan tshun brgyu bar bgyi'o/ /sngags ni/ 'di lta ste/ oM
ku tsi ku tsi/ ku tsi ya ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsi re le swA hA/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya dang / sngags 'di ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang
la la zhig mchis nyal gar phyag rgya 'di bgyis te sngags 'di lan re bzlas shing snying gar phyag rgya lan re bgyi ba lan brgya rtsa
brgyad tshang bar gyur na/ sems la ci dang ci 'dod pa rnams rmi lam du rig cing mthong bar 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la zhig rtag par phyag rgya 'di bgyis
nas sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na/ sdig pa thams cad byang nas byang chub kyi sems stong bar mi 'gyur bas/ gang zag de mtshan mo mchis nyal ba'i tshe
g.yar lam na rgya cher 'phel zhing bkra shis par 'gyur/ /g.yar lam na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs nas lung ston pa dang / mngon
par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba'i bar dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ /tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / lha rnams kyang rtag tu nye bar mchis nas rim
gro bgyid cing yongs su srung bar 'gyur lags so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas lha dang / klu dang / 'dre gdon sde brgyad po dgug
pa'i phyag rgya ni/ 'di lags te/ 'greng nas sug pa rkang pa gnyis gshibs te sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong lag mthil du bkug nas sor
mo bzhi khu tshur bcangs te snying gar gzhag go /de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis te/ lag pa g.yas pa rna drung du gtad nas mdzub
mo phan tshun du brgyu bar bgyi'o/ /sngags ni/ 'di lta ste/ na mo nI la kaN+tha/ na ma AR+ya sha pa ta swA hA/ na ma AR+ya sha la swA hA/ e hi e hi swA hA/ rigs kyi bu'am/
rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gzungs dang / phyag rgya 'di len tam/ 'dzin tam/ glog gam/ 'don par bgyis na/ myur du tshe rabs bdun tshun chad kyi sngon
gyi gnas kyi dngos po rjes su dran par 'gyur/ sbrul gdug pas zin par mi 'gyur ro/ /dug gis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ mtshon gyis gnod pa bgyid par mi
'gyur/ rgyal pos gshe bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la zhig gdugs re bzhin du rig
sngags 'di 'don par bgyid na/ 'dre srin sde brgyad po rnams rig sngags 'don pa'i drung du nye bar mchis nas rig sngags 'don pa nyan par bgyid do/ /rigs kyi
bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'dre gdon gyis zin par gyur na/ skud pa dkar po la sngags kyis btab ste sngags lan re bzla zhing mdud pa re re mdud de
mdud pa bzhi bcu rtsa dgu tshang bar bgyis nas de'i mgul du btags na/ de'i nad sel bar 'gyur lags so/ /gal te yul gang du
ltas ngan pa dang / rims nad byung ste/ yul mi mang du gum par gyur na/ rgyal po'i kun dga' ra ba dang / rdzing dag tu pad+ma stong rtsa brgyad blangs te pad+ma re
re la sngags lan re btab nas zhugs kyi nang du bor te bas bar bsregs na/ rims nad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'
mig stong dang ldan pa'i rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgya ni/ 'di lags te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i gung mo mthe bo'i rtse mo
dang sbyar te bkan la/ sor mo gzhan gsum ni/ brkyang nas pus mo g.yon pa'i steng du gzhag par bgyi'o/ /de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa
yang de bzhin du bgyis nas sug pa lag pa pus mo g.yas pa'i steng du kha sbub tu gzhag par bgyi'o/ /gang la la zhig rtag par phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas
lus po che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis na/ smon lam rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / sdug bsngal rnams kyang rnam par
grol bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i dngos sdig rnam pa sna tshogs
par bgyis pas dzam+bu'i gling gi sa ci mchis pa de dag thams cad rdul phra rab tu bgyis la/ rdul phra rab re re yang bskal pa re re mngon par byung bar gyur na/
gang dag de dngos sdig rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis pa'i dbang gis bskal pa'i grangs de snyed kyi bar du sems can dmyal bar lhung nas sdug bsngal myong zhing gtan
du 'byung ba'i dus ma mchis pa zhig lags na yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar zla ba dkar
po'i ngo tshes bco lnga la gdugs mtshan gcig zas bkum ste phyag rgya mdud nas rig sngags stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas na/ gong du bstan pa'i sdug bsngal
de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur te/ gal te byang bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na/ de lta bu'i gnas ma mchis lags so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug mig stong dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa la rang dbang thob pa'i phyag rgya ni/ 'di lags te/ langs nas 'greng ste sngar sug pa g.yon pas sug
pa rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong la btsir nas khu tshur bcangs pa bzhin du bgyi'o/ /de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pas g.yon
pa'i lag ngar gyi steng du btsir nas lus po che'i sngags lan bdun 'don par bgyis na/ dpag tshad brgya stong du mar mchi 'tshal na yang dka' ba ma mchis par
'gyur lags so/ /sngags 'don pa'i tshe sgra 'byung bar ma bgyi'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul la rang dbang thob pa'i
phyag rgya ni/ 'di lags te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong mthe'u chung gi sen mo'i steng du reg par bgyi'o/ /de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa
g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis nas sor mo gzhan gsum ni/ so sor yan par bsgreng ste/ lag ngar gyi tshigs sbyar nas spyi bo'i steng du bzhag ste lus po
che'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na/ drang srong 'phur te mchi dag dang 'dra bar rang dbang du mchi bar 'gyur lags so/ /de la byang chub
sems dpa' rnams sems rtse gcig tu spyan 'dren pa'i phyag rgya ni/ 'di lags te/ sug pa gnyis nam mkha' la thal mo sbyar te lag ngar gyi tshigs
sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis ni/ phan tshun brgyu bar bgyi'o/ /sngags ni/ 'di lta ste/ oM a ru li ka te li/ lo ki bi do ya/ sarba ya dru/ pra ma ra rda na ka rA ya bu ru swA
hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / tshangs pa chen po dang / lha dang /
klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong dang ldan pa thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po'i sems rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs cho ga
dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+he chos grub gyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur te gtan la phab pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod thogs pa med pa'i yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das drang srong gi ri la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs
mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las
langs te gos tshags bcos nas pus mo sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
la pad+ma du ma chen po'i tsan+dan gyi snying po'i 'khor lo zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen mo smon cing bgyi ba thams cad mngon par 'grub par bgyi ba mchis te/ gal
te de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos bdag gis bshad par gnang na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus sems can thams cad la
sman par bgyi ba'i slad du bshad par 'tshal lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs 'di ni/ gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pas
yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che chen po dang / yid bzhin gyi ljon shing bzhin du smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pas so/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas khyod kyis snying brtse ba'i
phyir sems can gyi ched du 'di ltar zhugs pas na/ khyod thogs pa med pa'i gzungs 'di bshad par gnang bar bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug de ltar bkas gnang ba dang / langs nas thal mo sbyar te phyag byas nas slar stan la 'dug ste/ sems rtse gcig tu 'khor 'dus pa dag la rnam par bltas
nas snying rje chen po dang ldan po'i sems kyis sngags 'di smras so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo AR+ya ba lo ke te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA
ru ti kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa kra pa ti tsin+ta ma Ni ma hA pad+me ru ru ti Sh+Tha te/ badzra ba ra/ A kA rA ye hUM swA hA/ 'di ni/ lus kyi sngags so/ /oM pad+me/ tsin+ta ma Ni/ dza la ma
hA badzra b+ha ra hUM/ 'di ni/ snying po'i sngags so/ /oM b+ha ra ta pad+me hUM/ 'di ni/ snying gi snying po'i sngags lags so/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug gis yid bzhin 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang / sa chen po yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa'i khang khyim rnams kyang rab tu g.yos par gyur/
bdud kyi rgyal po dang / bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyang shin tu skrag cing 'jigs pa chen po skyes par gyur/ bdud kyi rgyal po'i
gzhal med khang yang rab tu 'bar bar gyur/ gnod sbyin dang / 'dre srin ma rungs pa gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyang dngangs shing skrag pas gdong bkab
