ste sa la 'gyel bar gyur/ sems can dmyal ba'i sgo thams cad phye nas sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams rnam par thar te lha'i bde ba mchog myong
bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe lha rnams kyis kyang rin po che'i me tog dang / rin po che'i rgyan gyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char mngon par phab par gyur/ lha'i
rol mo rnams kyang bar snang la sgra sna tshogs phyung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i
dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rigs kyi bu khyod sems can la snying brtse
ba'i phyir gzungs 'di bshad pa nyid kyis sems can rnams kyis phan yon chen po thob par 'gyur ba legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod do/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems can rnams kyi
phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rgyal po chen po'i gzungs 'di'i cho ga shod cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis
'di skad ces gsol to/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu
mo gzhon nu gang la la zhig gis 'di tshe nyid la rnam par smin pa mngon du myong bar 'tshal na/ gdugs mtshan sems rtse gcig tu nan tan brtson 'grus
kyis gzungs 'di mi bskyud par bgyis te/ gdugs dang / dus mi 'dam par gtsang yang rung mi gtsang yang rung ste/ rtag par kha don du bzlas par gyur na/ bgyi ba
rnams dang ldan par 'gyur lags so/ /ci yang rung ste don du bgyi zhing gnyer pa zhig mchis na/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na don brgya stong du
ma 'grub par 'gyur bas/ rig sngags gzhan gang yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di dang sgrun par bzod pa gang yang ma mchis lags so/ /de
ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'das pa dang / da ltar gyi las ngan pa dang / sgrib pa lci ba rnams rab tu 'joms pas so/ /gang la la
zhig gzungs 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na/ mnar ma mchis pa'i dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ba'i rigs dag kyang thar par 'gyur la/ mtshams
ma mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur na/ las ngan pa dang / gdon bgegs dang / bro nad gzhan thams cad lta smos
kyang ci 'tshal lags/ gang dag rims nad nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / nyin mtshan du bro
'tshal ba'am/ rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan la sogs pas bro 'tshal ba dag la rig sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis par gyur na/ thams
cad 'byang zhing sos par 'gyur lags so/ /gang zhig dug dang byad stems kyis phog par gyur tam/ lhog pa dang / g.yan pa dang / mdze nad dang /
phol mig gam/ rlung nad dam/ smyos pa'am/ klad pa bro 'tshal ba'am/ rna ba dang / sna dang / mchu dang / lce dang / mid pa dang / kha dang / gdong dang /
gtsug dang / klad rgyas dang / brang dang / rtsib logs dang / snying dang / lto ba dang / rked pa dang / rgyab dang / rkang pa dang / lag pa la sogs pa thams cad
bro 'tshal bar gyur na yang thams cad sos par bgyid/ ji tsam du lus kyi bro nad ci mchis pa thams cad kyang sos par bgyid lags so/ /gnod sbyin dang /
srin po dang / bi nA ya ka dang / bdud sdig can dang / 'dre gdon dag gis kyang gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/ /mtshon cha dang / dmag tshogs
dang / chab dang / zhugs dang / rlung dang / char pa dang / ser ba ma rungs pa dag gis kyang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /dgra dang / chom rkun dang / rgyal po
ma rungs pa dang / rkun po ma rungs pa dag gis kyang gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/ /glo bur du 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ rmi lam ngan pa rmi bar
mi 'gyur/ rtsangs pa dang / sbrul dang / sdig pa dang / srin bu gyi med dang / rkang mang dang / gcan gzan gdug pa ma rungs pa dang / seng+ge dang / stag dang /
spyang ki dag gis kyang gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/ /g.yul ngor 'thab pa'i tshe thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur lags so/ /gal te bla'i bgyi ba
dag gis rtsod par gyur na yang 'dum par 'gyur te/ gzungs 'di lan gcig bzlas na/ gong du bstan pa de dag thams
cad yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la zhig gis gdugs re gzungs 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ byang chub
sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'jigs shig /ci zhig smon cing ci zhig yongs su gnyer
bar byed/ thams cad khyod la sbyin no zhes bsgo bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyang sku mngon du ston par 'gyur/ mdo las gsungs
pa bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bkod pa'i dngos po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi byang chub
sems dpa'i tshogs rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas ri po Ta la yang mthong bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid kyi lus kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur/ bdag nyid kyi lus kyang yongs
su dag par 'gyur bas rtag par rgyal po dang / blon po rnams kyis bkur zhing rim gro bgyid par 'gyur/ skye bo mang pos byams shing bkur bar 'gyur/ skye
ba thams cad du ma'i mngal du mi skye zhing pad+ma'i steng du skye bar 'gyur/ bkod pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par
'gyur/ 'di nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du nam yang ngan 'gro rnams su mi ltung zhing rtag par sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur lags
te/ 'di ni/ sdig pa'i las thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zhes bgyi ba lags so/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi le'u
ste dang po'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir yang yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i
snying po'i gzungs gsang ba'i cho ga bstan pa su yang rung ba gces pa'i don grub pa zhig mchis na/ thams cad rang zhi bar 'gyur lags so/ /de yang
rnam pa gnyis te/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi nor dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor gang lags pa'o/ /de la 'jig rten pa'i nor ni/ gser dang /
dngul la sogs pa'i rin po che rnams so/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor ni/ bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi bkod pa
rnam pa gnyis dang ldan zhing / lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang / skye bo mang pos byams shing bkur ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'i sems can thams
cad yongs su skyob pa dang / byams pa'i sems rgyas nas blo dang ldan pa rnams bde ba stsol ba dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'phel zhing mthu stobs
rtag pa gang lags pa'o/ /gsang ba'i mdzod kyi spyod yul 'di ni/ gzhan dag la brjod par mi bgyi'o/ /gang la la zhig bdag gi yid bzhin gyi
'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dngos grub mchog thob par 'tshal na/ sems rtse gcig tu dus thams cad dang / gnas thams cad du gtsang yang rung mi
gtsang yang rung ste/ rtag par bzlas brjod bgyis na/ nongs pa ci yang ma mchis pas bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i grangs tshang bar bgyis nas gzhan yang byang
chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming dang / yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi ming dang / gang zag de'i ming nas brjod de/ gal
te rgyal po'am/ rgyal bu'am/ btsun mo'am/ sras sam/ rgyal po'i bu mo'am/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gdol pa'am/ skyes
pa'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gzhon nu ma'am/ mu stegs sna tshogs dag la sten cing mdza' bar 'tshal na/ de dag gi ming nas brjod de rtag par
tho rangs kyi tshe bzlas pa'i grangs tshang bar bgyi'o/ /gal te dngos grub mchog gnyer zhing rgyal po la bsten par 'tshal na/ dgung zhag bdun gyi bar du rtag
par tho rangs kyi tshe lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na mjal bar 'gyur lags so/ /gal te btsun mo la bsten par 'tshal na/ lan dgu brgya bzlas par bgyi'o/ /
rgyal bu la bsten par 'tshal na/ lan brgyad brgya bzlas par bgyi'o/ /slas dag mthong bar 'tshal na/ lan bdun brgya bzla bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal po'i bu mo la
bsten par 'tshal na/ lan drug brgya bzla bar bgyi'o/ /bram ze la bsten par 'tshal na/ lan lnga brgya bzla bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal rigs la bsten par 'tshal na/
lan bzhi brgya bzla bar bgyi'o/ /dmangs rigs la ni/ sum brgya'o/ /gdol pa la ni/ nyis brgya'o/ /dge slong dang dge slong ma la ni/ lan brgya'o/ /dge bsnyen
dang dge bsnyen ma la ni/ lan dgu bcu'o/ /khye'u gzhon nu dang bu mo gzhon du ma la ni/ lan drug cu'o/ /'di ni/ bsten cing
mdza' bar bgyi ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi ste/ nor dang / bran dang / rta dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad 'byor bar bgyid lags so/ /gang la la zhig
snying du sdug cing mdza' ba dag ring po na mchi ba dang mjal bar 'tshal na/ yid la bsam pa bzhin du rlung bzhin du mchi bar 'gyur lags so/ /ci
bgyi'o 'tshal bzlas brjod bgyi bar grangs tshang bar gyur na/ don de dag 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug mthong bar 'tshal na/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na de'i lus yang dag pa nyid mthong zhing bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par bgyid
lags so/ /gal te lag na rdo rje mthong bar 'tshal na/ bzlas brjod lan khri bgyis na lus mngon sum du bstan nas de la brtse zhing phas bu la byams pa
bzhin du sems kyis smon pa rnams stsol bar 'gyur lags so/ /gal te sangs rgyas dang / 'khor 'dus pa mang po mthong bar 'tshal na/ lan khri
sum stong bzlas brjod bgyis na de bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur lags so/ /gal te gdugs mtshan bdun gyi bar du rgyun chad pa ma mchis par bzlas brjod
bgyis na/ rig sngags 'chad rnams mngon sum du ston cing / so so nas rang rang gi sngags kyi mthu ci mchis pa gang zag de la stsal nas yongs su srung
bar bgyid de/ zhag bdun pa la ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi dbang po dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po rnams 'khor dang bcas te mchis
nas de'i smon pa rnams stsol ba bgyid do/ /bzlas brjod kyi cho ga gong du bstan pa bzhin du bgyis na/ smon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid de/ 'di
ni/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod las/ thams cad byams shing mos par 'gyur ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi ba lags
so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod las/ thams cad byams shing mos par 'gyur ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste gnyis
pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir gang gis mthong
bdag byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman sbyar nas lus la thogs te 'gro na mchog tu mngon par 'grub cing bsam pa thams
cad yid shin tu 'grub pa'i cho ga bstan pa/ gi'u waM dang / tsan+dan dkar po dang / gur gum dang / ga bur dang / gla rtsi dang / dzA ti pha la dang / li shi dang /
ko ko la dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pal sngon po dang / gser gyi gyim pag rnams cha mnyam par bgyis te brdungs nas sbrang rtsi dkar pos sbrus te snga ma'i sngags
stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas lus la bdug gam/ gos la bdug gam/ mig la bskus sam/ dpral ba la thig le bgyis sam/ lus la byugs na/ rgyal
po dang / btsun mo dang / blon po rnams dang / bran rnams dang / skyes pa dang / bud med la sogs pa byams shing dga' ba dang / lam gyi chos la bkur
zhing byang chub tu sems bskyed nas lus kyi zho sha dang / nor rdzas dag phangs pa ma mchis par gtor rim gro bgyid par 'gyur te/ brjod kyis mi lang
lags so/ /ji ltar nyi zla thams cad kyis mthong bar mos pa bzhin du sgrub pa'i don rnams 'byor cang 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la zhig sman
'di thogs par 'gyur na/ kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa rnams zhu byang nas bgegs thams cad las thar par 'gyur lags so/ /rgyal po'i mthus nan gyis 'phrog
pa dang / chab kyis ded pa dang / zhugs kyis tshig pa dang / mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dug dang / 'ching ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad las thar
par 'gyur lags so/ /bsam pa thag pa nas sman a ka ta sbyor ba'i cho ga 'di bgyis na/ thams cad kyis byams shing dga' bar 'gyur lags so/ /sman
'dis bdugs pas bab chol du g.yar khar stsal bar bgyi ste/ 'di ni/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan dag la byams shing dga' bar 'gyur
ba'i sman gyi cho ga zhes bgyi lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs las/ gzhan dag
la byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman a ka ta sbyor ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug gis gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman khar mur ba'i cho ga bstan
pa/ ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / gur gum zhib mor btags te gi'u wa nga dang bsres na/ gong du bstan pa'i sngags rnams pa
gsum re re yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te chab gtsang mas sbyar nas ril bu che chung shing mgo stong gi 'bras bu tsam du bgyis te/ yang sngags gong
ma gsum lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas grib ma la bskams te/ gdugs dang / rlung gis ma phog par bgyis nas ril bu re re la yang gong ma'i sngags
rnam pa gsum lan bdun bdun gyis btab ste/ ril bu gcig khar mur nas rgyal po'am/ blon po nye phan nam/ skye bo'i tshogs mang po dag la gtam
bgyis par gyur na/ bkur sti bgyis nas nor dang / rin po che dag 'phangs pa ma mchis par ci dang ci 'tshal ba thams cad stsol par 'gyur/ tshig tu
smras so 'tshal thams cad kyis yid ches shing nyan par 'gyur/ bsgo ba zhig mchis na yang thams cad nyan cing bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ /khar
sman mur ba'i che rtag par sngags bzla 'tshal te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smon pa rnams 'grub par bgyid lags so/ /byang chub sems
dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du spos chab kyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa chu zheng khru bzhis 'khor ba zhig bgyis te/ dkyil 'khor
gyi nang du rtsi shing gi me tog rnam pa sna tshogs ci 'byor ba bkram zhing / tsan+dan dkar po bsregs nas sman gyi ril bu snga ma blangs te dkyil 'khor gyi nang du
bzhag nas rgyal mtshan bzhi gzugs shing / yol ba dang / bla re dkar po bris te dkyil 'khor gyi steng du pad+ma dkar po bzhi yang bris te/ byang chub sems
dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bgyis lags pa'i rjes la snying po'i sngags dang / snying gi snying po'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla
bar bgyi'o/ /lus kyi sngags kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas tsan+dan dkar po bsregs te mo tog gtor na/ de'i tshe smon pa thams cad kyang 'grub par
'gyur la/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang na mchis pa'i sman blangs te lus la btags na/ phyogs gang du mchi yang rung ste/ ci dang ci gnyer ba thams cad 'grub
par 'gyur/ tshig tu smras pa thams cad kyis yid ches shing nyan par 'gyur/ don du sgrub pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /sems rtse gcig
tu ma bgyis pa ni/ ma gtogs te/ 'di ni/ yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo las sman mur ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi lags so/ /byang chub
sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo las/ sman mur ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas
byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir skye bo mang po thams cad kyis mthong na byams
shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i cho ga'i stan pa/ sman shi ri ka ku shu dang / pad+ma le brgan dang / pad+ma sngon po dang / rgya mtsho'i chab kyi dbu ba dang / nya rkun ma
nag po'i rus pa dang / ba bla dang / ka kun ban s+ya dang / gi hang dang / gur gum dang / rgya'i gur gum dang / pi pi ling dang / na le sham dang / bca'
sga rnams cha mnyam par bgyis te brdungs nas zhib mor btsags te sman snga ma srang gcig mchis na/ gla rtsi dang / ga pur srang phyed stsal nas zhib tu
bdar te spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du sbyar ba bgyis lags pas/ snga ma'i sngags rnam pa gsum re re yang lan stong rtsa brgyad
bzlas te/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying brtse ba'i sems bskyed nas sman de dag byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
gi rkang pa'i drung du gzhag par bgyi'o/ /de'i rjes la reg par bgyis nas khar ba'i thur mas blangs te mig tu stsal na/ mig dang / klad pa bro 'tshal ba
dang / ling tog gis bsgribs pa thams cad dang / sprin dkar dang / mchi ma 'dzag pa dang / sprin dmar dang / long nad dang / klad pa bro 'tshal ba
thams cad sos par 'gyur lags so/ /rtag par gdugs re bzhin du sman 'di mig tu stsal na/ mig nad thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur lags so/ /gdugs
gnyis stsal na/ lus kyi bro nad thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /gdugs gsum stsal na/ smyo ba'i bro nad rnam pa brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'byang bar 'gyur lags
so/ /gdugs bzhi stsal na/ phyi nang gi sgrib pa thams cad kyis sgrib par mi 'gyur ro/ /gdugs lnga stsal na/ dgra dang 'thab pa na thams cad du rgyal bar
'gyur ro/ /gdugs drug stsal na/ sdig pa'i las dang / nyon mongs pa dang / lci ba bzhi dang / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang /
byad stems thams cad rnam par 'joms shing / ngan 'gro rnams su nam yang ltung bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /gdugs bdun
stsal na/ rgyal po dang / blon po chen po dang / skye bo mang po thams cad rjes su 'brang zhing bkur sti bgyis nas yid ches shing byams par 'gyur ro/ /
zhag bdun phrag gnyis kyi bar du stsal na/ rang dbang chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag gsum gyi bar du stsal na/ rgyal po dang / blon po
chen po dag mdza' bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bzhi'i bar du stsal na/ gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa rnams rim gro bgyid bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag
bdun phrag lnga'i bar du stsal na/ lha ma yin dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / /srin po rnams g.yog bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun
phrag drug gi bar du stsal na/ nam mkha' lding dang / srin po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du
yongs su srung bar bgyid pas/ byad stems dang / 'dre gdon rnams kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bdun gyi bar du stsal na/
lha nag po chen po dang / 'dre srin brgyad rnams nye bar lhags nas rjes su 'brang zhing g.yog bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag brgyad kyi bar du stsal na/
an+ta da nar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag dgu'i bar du stsal na/ gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu'i bar du stsal na/ lha ma yin gyi
khang khyim gyi sgo rang bye nas/ de na ci mchis pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'byung zhing 'jug pa la thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu
gcig gi bar du stsal na/ sman zhugs ltar 'bar ba ji snyed pa thams cad mngon sum du dga' bar 'gyur bas/ tshe ring bar 'gyur 'tshal lam/ mthu chen
po dang ldan par 'tshal na yang de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu gnyis kyi bar du stsal na/ drang srong mang po rnams kyis rin po che'i
gter rnams phye ste/ nye bar bstan nas yid bzhin du longs spyod par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu gsum gyi bar du stsal na/ klu'i gzhal med khang rnams
sgo rang bye nas/ lta ba dag la thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu bzhi'i bar du stsal na/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med
khang dag sgo rang bye bar 'gyur bas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bco lnga'i bar du stsal na/ mtshan mo mun
nag gi nang du yang bdugs bzhin du gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu drug gi bar du stsal na/ sa'i 'og gi rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang / rlung gi dkyil
'khor yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu bdun gyi bar du stsal na/ gling bzhi po rnams su sems can dmyal ba'i sems can ji snyed mchis
pa yang thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i mthu'i dbang gis sdug bsngal myong ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang thar bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun
phrag bco brgyad kyi bar du stsal na/ gang dag de nyi ma lta bu'i mthu thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu dgu'i bar du stsal na/ /lag na rdo rje'i lus
yang dag par nyid mthong bar 'gyur bas smon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/ /zhag bdun phrag nyi shu'i bar du stsal na/ spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug snying rje chen po dang ldan pa mthong bar 'gyur bas smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/ /zhag bdun phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig
gi bar du stsal na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thob par 'gyur/ gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang gi sgo rnams rang bye nas thams cad mthong
bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /
lo gcig gi bar du stsal na/ yongs su dag pa'i mig lnga 'thob par 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la zhig spyod pa'i cho ga 'di mngon par 'grub par 'tshal
pa gang lags pa des bstan pa 'di la shin tu mngon par yid ches par bgyi zhing / sems can la snying brtse bar bgyi ste/ the tshom ma mchis na/ gong
du bstan pa bzhin du thams cad 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /gal te the tshom 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ /cho ga rnams 'grub par dka' ste/ 'di ni/ spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gi tsan+dan nor bu'i 'khor lo las/ mig sman gyi cho ga zhes bgyi ba lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
gi sems kyi 'khor lo'i las/ mig sman gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan
yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir sgrub pa'i don thams cad grub par byed pa nyon mongs pa dang / kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib
pa dang / las ngan pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/ dgra thams cad 'dul ba/ bi nA ya ka khro ba'i sems nye bar zhi nas skye bo mang po la gnod pa mi
byed cing / byams pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba/ sbyin sreg hoM bkra shis kyi cho ga bstan pa/ dogs brkos te zhugs thab khru gang gru bzhi pa zhig bgyis nas
me tog man len tsa su dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / chab mar cha mnyam par bsres te a ga ru dang / tsan+dan dang / shing dri can
so so nas srid du sor bcu gnyis/ zheng du sor gcig mchis pa gtubs te thab tu bsreg par bgyi zhing / sman nyung zad cig blangs nas lan gcig
sngags btab ste/ zhugs kyi nang du dor ba lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'joms shing / tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub
bar 'gyur lags so/ /zhag bdun gyi bar du rgyun chad pa ma mchis par hoM gyi cho ga bzhin bgyis na/ tshe lo stong thub cing lus kyang yongs su dag par
'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag gnyis kyi bar du cho ga bgyis na/ rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po chen po nye phan dang / skye bo phal ba rnams kyang skyabs
su mchis nas bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag gsum gyi bar du cho ga bzhin du bgyid na/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'khor dang
bcas pa dang / nyi zla'i lha dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa yang nye bar lhags nas yongs su srung par 'gyur/ lag na rdo rjes kyang dngos
grub chen po stsol bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang smon pa chen po rnams yongs su skong bar 'gyur lags so/ /
gal te yul khams su char dkon par gyur na/ yungs kar dang / chab mar la sngags 'dis btab ste gdugs gsum gyi bar du zhugs kyi nang du
bsregs na/ char pa 'bab par 'gyur/ gal te char ches te me khums na/ thab de'i thal ba blangs nas sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btab ste gnam du
gtor na/ char pa khums par 'gyur ro/ gal te ser ba ma rung ba babs sam/ rlung drag po glo bur du langs par gyur na yang thal ba de blangs nas lan brgya
rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste sprin mchis pa'i phyogs su gtor na/ zhi bar 'gyur lags so/ /sngags 'di rtag par bzlas
brjod bgyis na/ mthu stobs mthu po che dang 'dra bar 'gyur bas/ lus 'di spangs nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ mngon
par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du skya ba thams cad du sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa thob par 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang
chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tsan+dan gyi snying po'i 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di
bdag gis bstan pa bzhin du dge slong dam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ skyes pa'am/ bud med gang la la zhig
gis lan gcig 'chang bar bgyid na/ gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur bas the tshom gyi bsam pa bskyed par mi bgyi'o/ /yid la bsam pa'i don
thams cad thob par 'gyur bas shin tu mngon par yid ches par bgyi zhing the tshom bskyed par mi bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la khyod snying rje chen pos yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi cho ga gya nom 'di yang dag par bshad de/ 'dzam bu'i
gling gi sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar byas pa legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod do/ /gang la la zhig gis sems bskyed de
kha nas bzlas brjod byas na/ dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar yin mod kyi/ ngas bstan pa bzhin du sems can rnams la yang nas yang du nan tan
brtson 'grus kyis rjes su bstan nas dngos grub thob par bya ba'i ched du lus nye bar ston la/ nga'i tshig dag 'gal bar ma byed cig dang / nga yang rjes
su yi rang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
ni/ bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas byams pa dang brtse ba'i sems kyis sems can la rjes su ston cing / rtag par yongs su bsrungs nas dngos
grub stsal bar ni/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mkhyen cing dpang du gyur pa lags so/ /sems can rnams kyi slad du yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs
'di bshad pa lags pas/ gang la la zhig gis len cing 'chang ba dang / rtag par bdag nyid bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i
grangs tshang bar bgyis na/ smon pa rnams 'grub par 'gyur te/ bdag ni/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus sems can sdug
bsngal ba rnams yongs su bskyab par bgyid pa lags so/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis
yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang / 'khor 'dus pa chen po thams cad rab tu dga' nas mngon par yid ches pas yang dag par
blangs te spyod par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs las/ sbyin sreg hoM gyi cho ga
sman sbyor ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod thogs pa
med pa'i yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //zhu chen gyi mkhan po dang / lo tsA ba bcom ldan 'das kyi ring lugs
ba ban+d+he chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra e ka da sha mu kha ma nA ma d+ha ra NI/ bod
skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig ba ces bya ba'i gzugs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang du mas yongs su bskor te/ bcom ldan
'das ga la ba der song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas
phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ snying po gdong bcu gcig pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni/ sangs
rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gcig gis gsungs pa lags te/ de sems can thams cad la sman pa dang / bro nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang / sdig
pa dang / bkra mi shis pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi ba dang / dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi ba dang /
ma zhugs pa rnams dad par bgyi ba dang / bgegs dang log 'dren rnams rab tu zhib par bgyi ba'i skad du bshad par
bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ snying po 'di bsrung bar bgyi ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung bar bgyis pa dang / zhi ba dang bde
legs su 'gyur bar bgyis pa dang / chad pa spangs pa dang / mtshon cha spangs pa dang / dug gzhil ba bgyis pa dang / gang la la zhig 'gal
bar bgyid pa de ma mchis te/ de ni/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas
pa na bdag gis mthong ste/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ ma gtogs lags so/ /snying po 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams
cad kyis bstod cing dgongs pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi snying po 'di ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su thugs rangs
par mdzad pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis dran lags te/ bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gi bya ma snyed kyi snga rol na de bzhin gshegs pa
pad+ma brgya'i spyan gtsug gis chags pa'i dus 'joms pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bgyi ba byung ste/ bdag drang srong du gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa de las
'di mnos lags te/ thos ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du gyur/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yang thob ste/ de ltar
bdag gi snying po 'di ni/ gces spras bgyid pa lags so/ /de lta lags pas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas gus par bgyis la
snying po 'di brjod par bya'o/ /gzhan yid la mi bgyid par rtag tu brjod par bgyi'o/ /nang par langs nas brgya rtsa brgyad bton na/ tshe 'di la yon tan bcu
yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ bro nad ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur
ba dang / des bsgrim mi 'tshal bar nor dang 'bru dang dbyig rnams rnyed par 'gyur pa dang / dgra thams cad khugs shing thul bar 'gyur ba dang / rgyal
po'i tshogs pa rnams gsong por smra bar sems par 'gyur ba dang / lus la dug gis mi tshugs pa dang / dbyig dug gis mi tshugs pa dang / rims
kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba dang / mtshon chas mi tshugs par 'gyur ba dang / chab kyis 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi
'gyur ba dang / zhugs kyis 'gum pa'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ba dang / dus ma lags par 'gum pas 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur lags
so/ /gzhan yang yon tan bzhi yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / ngan song
rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ya nga ba ma spangs pas 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig
rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis dran lags te/ 'di nas bskal pa gang+gA'i klung
bcu'i bye ma snyed dag gi yang ches snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa man+dA ra ba'i bsung zhes bgyi ba byung ste/ de na bdag khyim par gyur pas 'di gzung
nas bskal pa bzhi khri'i 'khor ba phyir bsnyil lags so/ /bdag gis snying po 'di bton pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgyal ba thams cad
kyi snying rje 'jug pa ye shes kyi snying po zhes bgyi ba thob lags so/ /gang dag bcing bas bcings pa rnams dang / gang dag bcing ba la thug pa rnams dang /
chab dang / zhugs dang / sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nyen pa'i sems can thams cad la bdag gi snying po 'dis gnas dang / bskyab pa dang /
skyabs dang / dpung gnyen bgyi'o/ /gnod sbyin dang srin po sdang ba rnams kyang snying po 'dis bkug la byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems su bgyi
ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi snying po 'di ni/ de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba lags
so/ /lan gcig brjod pas rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi po dag kyang byang bar 'gyur/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga po dag kyang ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur na/
ji skad bstan pa bzhin du nan tan bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par
'gyur ba lags na/ bzlas brjod bgyid pa dang / sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o//
su zhig bdag gi slad du tshes bcu bzhi 'am/ bco lnga la smyung ba bgyis na/ de bskal pa bzhi khri'i 'khor ba bsnyil bar 'gyur
lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi ming 'dzin pa ni/ don mchis te/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bas lhag lags so/ /bdag gi ming
'dzin pa'i sems can thams cad ni/ phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur/ bro nad thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur/ sgrib pa thams cad
dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi nyes par spyod pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la zhig cho ga bzhin du sbyor ba
bgyid na/ de dag gi sug par sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod sems can thams
cad la de ltar snying rje che ba legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ thabs 'dis sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la
dgod par nus te/ ngas kyang snying po 'di bzung zhing rjes su yi rang ba byas kyi/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis smros shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos
phyag 'tshal te/ snying po 'di smras so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byu ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ ar+ha te/ samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta

thA ga te b+h+yaH/ ar+ha te b+h+yaH/ samyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ na ma AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru
d+hu ru/ iT+Ta baT+Te/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me/ ku su me ba re/ i li mi li/ tsi ti tswa la ma pa na ye swA hA/ 'di'i cho ga ni/ sgrub mi dgos par las thams cad
byed de/ rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / 'byung po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'dre dang / lus srul po dang /
brjed byed dang / lba ba dang / 'bras kyi phreng ba dang / bas balngags la sogs pa dang / dug dang / phol mig dang / g.yan pa la sogs pa la 'jim pa la bsngags
ta bsku'o/ /lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyid na/ las kyi sgrib pa sbyong bar bgyid do/ /byis pa gdon gyis zin pa la ni/ 'bru mar ro/ /rna ba bro 'tshal ba la ni/ ru rta dang
'bru mar ro/ /sma phro 'tshal ba la gro ba btags na/ des zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bro nad thams cad la yang sbyar bar bgyi ste/ bklags pas 'grub
bo/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shri len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen
gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal
lo/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas rig pa
'di brjod kyis rig pa 'di bdag la grub par gyur cig /tad+ya thA/ ha ha ha sa ni/ ni pa sa ni/ ta pa ta pa ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la ne/ tsa la tsa la ne/ pUrba yo ga sma
ra pad+ma hastA ya swA hA/ gang gis rig pa 'di bklags pa de tshe rabs brgya stong du skye ba dran par 'gyur te/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang bde ba can gyi
'jig sten du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi snying po rdzogs so/ /gsar bcug kha bskong gras/ /rgya gar skad du/ da sha b+hu mi d+hA rA Ni/ bod skad du/
sa bcu pa'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas gsang sngags la 'jug pa rnams kyis dgos pa thams cad so sor sprul par 'gyur ba
ni/ oM zhes bya ba don yod zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gsang sngags yi ge gcig po 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar 'bum dran par byas na sa dang po la gnas par
'gyur ro/ /sngon sdig pa bsags pa'i sems can dmyal ba mi bzad pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ji ltar rlung gis phyag dar gtor ba bzhin 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub thams cad
thob par 'gyur/ don thams cad rjes su 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / gang dkyil 'khor gyi lha gzhan yang dgyes par 'gyur la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin par mdzad do/ /gsang sngags oM zhes bya ba dran nas tshe 'phos pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags yi ge gcig pa'o/ /oM b+huH
yi ge gnyis pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas gnyis pa'i yon tan thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi spyan sngar 'dug par 'gyur zhing / mchog thams cad rjes su

sbyin par mdzad do/ /sdig pa thams cad kyang rnam par dag par mdzad/ sngon gyi las ngan gyi nad kyang sos par 'gyur/ nor gyi dbang phyug nor bu bzang po'i bu dbang du 'gyur zhing nye bar gnas par 'gyur
ro/ /mi gang gis kyang phyir zhing bar chad byed nus par mi 'gyur/ tshe 'phos nas kyang ri gru 'dzin tu skye bar 'gyur/ don yod zhags pa'i dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /yi ge gnyis
pa'o/ /oM pad+me/ gsang sngags yi ge gsum pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas gsum pa la yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur/ pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags gang yin
pa thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhon nu'i cha byad can mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog rjes su sbyin par mdzad
do/ /don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor ston par mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams ston par mdzad/ thams cad du dngos grub rjes
su sbyin par mdzad do/ /yi ge gsum pa'o/ /oM pad+ma hrIHgsang sngags yi ge bzhi pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas bzhi pa la 'jug par 'gyur/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs
pa sku mdog gser gyi kha dog can mdun na bzhugs shing dpung pa brkyang nas phyag spyi bor 'jog par mdzad la/ rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba rjes su sbyin par mdzad de/ rig
sngags 'chang tshur shog khyod kyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su dag ste/ rang gi ngo bo thams cad shin tu dri ma med par yongs su dag go/ /mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas tshe 'phos nas

nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'ong zhing tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /phyir zhing nams kyang mngal na gnas pas gos par mi 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /sa bzhi pa'o/ /oM pad+ma

b+hu dze gsang sngags yi ge lnga pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na sa lnga pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i bla ma rab tu ston par mdzad do//
sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra sbyin par 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ /khyod la bsod nams kyi phung po chen po

skyes te/ rig sngags 'chang khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed pas rig sngags 'chang khyod tshe 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba mtshungs

par bskyed par 'gyur zhing / nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur/ khyod kyis don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi snying po dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya chen po'i rin
par bye ba 'grub cing rig sngags 'chang khyod sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad spangs kyis bya ba thams cad kyis shig /yid la bya ba'i sgrub pa thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du de dag thams
cad shin tu grub par 'gyur ro/ /sa lnga pa'o/ /oM pad+ma lo ki te/ gzungs sngags yi ge drug pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na sa drug pa 'thob ste 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad snang bar mdzad par 'gyur/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
rnams gzigs shing mngon sum du ston par mdzad/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma gzigs pa'i
rgyal mtshan des rig sngags 'chang de la yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang khyod nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshur
shog/ las byas pa shin tu yongs su zad cing / khyod kyis sems can dmyal ba'i sgo rnams bcad/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sgo rnams ni phye/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
rnams kyi sa bon dang rigs spyi ni khong du chud/ khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi snying po dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni grub/ khyod kyis thams cad du gnas
kyi sgo rnams ni phye bas/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las sgrub pa rnams ji ltar yid la byas pa bzhin las thams cad byos shig/ oM pad+ma dz+wa la hUM d+h+r-i ka/ yi ge bdun
pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin pad+ma dri ma med pa sgrib pa dang bral pa dag pa zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur la/ ting nge 'dzin gang thob pas lus shin tu 'bar bar 'gyur

zhing / 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs su 'gyur/ sa bdun pa la gnas par 'gyur/ lus kyi snang ba gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi gnas rnams

snang bar byed cing / gang dang gang du 'od zer chen po cher 'bar ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag bab pa las me tog gi char sna tshogs pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur la de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'gyur ro/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba gser gyi kha dog can dpung pa brkyang ste/ phyag g.yas pa rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog
cing legs so zhes bya ba byin nas dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po gsang ba brjod kyi cho ga mchod pa'i mchog yin no/ /
'di ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po gsang ba gces pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po yang dag pa'o/ /rig sngags 'chang khyod kyi dkyil 'khor

mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po'i cho ga zhi ba mo dang / don yod zhags pa'i snying por sprul pa grub kyis/ rig sngags 'chang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song la sangs rgyas kyi
mdzad pa gyis shig/ oM a mo g+ha ma Ni pad+me/ gzugs kyi snying po yi ge brgyad pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na lus shin tu yongs su dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur/ bzlas brjod byas pa tsam
gyis nor bu rin po che me shel ltar phyi nang shin tu yongs su dag pa ste/ de ltar rig sngags 'chang lus yongs su dag par 'gyur sa brgyad pa la gnas par gyur/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi lus yongs su dag pa rang gi gzugs kyi ngo bor ston cing / rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du gnas pa
la rig sngags 'chang yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ phyag g.yas pa mgo'i spyi bor 'jog pa mdzad/ legs so zhes bya ba yang sbyin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang legs
so legs so/ /rig sngags 'chang khyod lhag pa'i bsam pa dga' ba la zhugs so/ /rig sngags 'chang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mnyam par 'brel pa'i 'jig rten rnam par lta bar tshur shog /der khyod
kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /khyod kyis don yod zhags pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi snying po dkyil 'khor gsang ba grub kyis/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa
dam pa bya ba thams cad gyis shig/ oM pad+mo lo tsa ne hu ru hUM/ gzungs sngags yi ge dgu pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas dgu pa la gnas par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug gi sras kyi gtso bor 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu dag rig sngags 'chang la mngon sum du
ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa sna tshogs ston par byed de/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor thams cad kyi phyag 'jog par mdzad de/ legs so zhes bya ba yang sbyin pa mdzad de/ rig
sngags 'chang chen po legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis ngal zhing sbyangs pa'i las legs par sgrub par byas so/ /khyod kyis 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa sangs rgyas nyid du sgrub pa grub

ste/ don yon zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhi ba mor sgrub pa dang / mdo sde dang / lung dang bcas pa sgrub pa dang / 'jig rten gyi 'dren pas bstan pa gang yin pa de dag grub pa yin/ oM pad+mau Sh+Ni Sha
pi ma le hUM phaT/ gsang sngags yi ge bcu pa 'bum bzlas brjod bya na phyir mi ldog par gyur nas sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur zhing / lhag dang / mi'i skye dgu dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /
zhes brjod la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ don yod zhags pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ the tshom mi bya'o/ /gsang
sngags yi ge bcu pa'i sgrub pa de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bla na med pa 'di ni don yod zhags pa'i snying po rnam par sprul pa bzlas brjod tsam gyis 'grub pa yin te/ bdag gis sngar bstan pa thams
cad lhag par zhen pa gtsang ma/ gtsang sbra spyod pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje skyes par bden par smra ba/ bla ma la gus pa/ dkon mchog gsum la dad pa che ba/
bla ma dang slob dpon la rtag tu mchod pa byed pa 'di ni bzlas brjod kyi cho ga yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med par bstan to/ /sa bcu ba'i gzungs phan yon dang rtog pa
rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya a mo g+ha dA sha kalpa rA dza bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das deng bdag cag gis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis shing bsngags pa don yod pa'i

zhags pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo zhes bgyi ba 'di nyid skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / rjes su brtse bar bgyi ba'i slad
du brjod par bgyi yis gson cig /oM pad+ma hasta mahA a mo g+ha pA sha sa hA yaM sa ma ya hr-i da yAM tsa ra tsa ra hUM/ don yod pa'i rang bzhin gyi spyan ras gzigs kyi snying po zhes bgyi ste/
las thams cad kyang bgyi ba'o/ /oM di bya saM pU ra naM ge phi ki k+Sha Ni hUM/ 'khar gsil gyi rig pa ste/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na sgra grags pas sems can rnams ngan 'gro las thar bar

'gyur ro/ /oM pat+t+ra pU ra ya a mo g+ha ba to sa man+ta pra b+he swA hA/ lhung bzed kyi rig pa ste/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na bdud rtsi'i rnam par 'gyur zhing gang gis zos pa rnams ngan 'gro las thar par 'gyur ro/ /

phyag rgya thal mo lhan cig tu dam du sbyar ba las slar pad+ma'i tshul du bgyis nas mdzub mo nor bu lta bur bgyis te/ gung mo yid tsam bkug pa ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i phyag rgya ste/

lag pa spyi bor bkan nas bzhag pa spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i rig pa 'di lan bdun brjod do/ /oM t+r+yai b+hA sa nu ga ta/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAM sarba trai ya d+hI ke pad+ma ma Ni su pad+me a mo g+he sarba ta thA tA 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags
'dis dbang bskur ba tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags

'chang gi rgyal po chen por yang 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi gtso bo gcig pu'i gnas su yang

'gyur par the tshom ma mchis so/ /oM pad+mo Sh+NI Sha pi ma le hUM phaT/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las gsang sngags kyi snying po yi ge bcu pa 'di snying rje dang ldan par bgyis te bzlas

brjod bgyis na byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba nas sa bcu la gnas pa'i bar du 'gyur zhing / lha dang / mi'i skye dgu dag gis 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes brjod par 'gyur la/ bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i pad+ma'i gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te 'di la the tshom ma
mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi snying po yi ge bcu pa 'di ni yon tan chen po tshad ma mchis pa rnams dang ldan par rig par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/
rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu gzungs sngags kyi snying po 'di dag ni yi ge 'bru re re tsam bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur na/
rigs kyi bu gang gis ched du gnyer te/ ches ngal zhing dub par bzlas brjod dang / sgrub pa dang / cho gas tshul bzhin du rgyas par sgrub pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
pad+ma'i gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i snying po khro bo'i gzungs sngags rim par phye ba gsang sngags chen po yi ge bcu pa 'di lan gcig tsam dran nam/ bklags sam/ ming tsam yang bzung ngam/
dus tshigs 'ga' rer dran pa tsam gyis kyang sems can de'i mtshams med pa'i las byas pas mnar med pa'i dmyal bar gzhol ba tshe bskal bar gnas par 'gyur ba yang las thams cad
rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad kyang rang rab tu zad par 'gyur/ lus yongs su dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur/ sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral
par 'gyur/ tshe 'phos nas kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur/ nam yang ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur/
bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad cur 'khor los sgyur ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
kyis rab tu dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal ba/ lag na rdo rje gsang sngags kyi rtsa ba don yod pa'i
zhags pa'i pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi snying po dri ma med pa gsang ba 'di rig sngags 'chang ba'i rig kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen
ma gang la las lan cig tsam yang dran pas yid la byed cing / yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid snying rje chen po dang / byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas sems can thams
cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i blo dang / dmigs pa dang ldan pas sems can gang yang rung ba'i rna khung du brjod na sems can de dag ngan song du skye bar mi 'gyur te de ni gnas med do/ /sems can de
dag thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /lan gnyis brjod na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lan gsum brjod na rims dang / 'brum bu dang / 'bras dang /
lhog pa dang / me dpal dang / g.yan pa dang / rkang shu dang / mdze nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ lan bzhi brjod na/ dug dang / dbyig dug dang / byang dang / gshed byed
thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lan lnga brjod na 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / shags su gyur ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lan drug brjod na 'jigs pa thams
cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / rims thams cad dang / pha rol gyi gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lan bdun brjod na dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad dang / sems can
thams cad kyi 'tshe ba dang / yams thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje de lta bas na sems can thams cad kyi don du nyin re bzhin du tshig gzhan mi smra bar snying po 'di lan bdun
bdun bzlas par bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje gang la la dag 'di ltar sdig pa mi dge ba bcu rab tu spyod pa/ mtshams med pa byed pa/ dam pa'i chos la skur ba 'debs pa/ 'phags pa'i gang zag la rab tu
brnyas pas de dag sems can dmyal bar gzhol ba'i tshe'i dus byas par gyur ba dang / dge slong gang la la dag rang gi bslab pa'i sdom pa dral ba/ tshul khrims kyi sdom pa ral cing zhig pa dang / mkhan
po dang / slob dpon la ma gus shing 'khu ba dang / dam pa'i chos la rma 'byin pas tsha'i dus byas par 'gyur na sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur pa de dag gi don du bye ma gtsang ma la lan
grangs bdun bdun bzlas nas/ dur khrod du bor ba'i ro dang / ro bsregs pa'i rus pa'am/ dur mchad du bcug pa'i ro'am/ rus pa la bye ma des gtor bar bya'o/ /gang dang gang na sems can rnams kyi rus pa

gang dag yod pa de dang de dag tu bye ma des gtor ma thag tu/ de dang der bye mas phog pa'i sems can de dag rnams sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro dang / sha za'i skye gnas dang / gnod

sbyin gyi skye gnas su skyes par gyur na yang de dag de'i mod la tshe brjes nas thams cad mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha dang mi'i gnas su rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur zhing / phyin chad nam yang sems can thams

cad dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro'i 'gro ba rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs sngags yi ge bcu pa 'di nyid gro ga dang / ras sam shog bu la bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug na/ gnas

der srog chags rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa dang / rkang mangs pa dang / rkang med pa gang dag nye bar 'ongs pa de dag thams cad mchod rten de'i gri ma phog pa tsam gyis de dag gi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa

thams cad rnam par dag cing mtho ris su gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /ri dwags dang / bya dang / wa dang / khyi dang / ne'u le dang / grog sbur dang / sbrul dang / rus sbal dang / lag 'gro la sogs pa srog chags phra mo
gang dag gis mchod rten de'i grib ma la 'grims pa thams cad kyang grib ma phog pa tsam gyis de dag rnams kyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur zhing de dag thams cad kyang mtho
ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /bud dung la sogs pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas gnas mthon po'i rtse mo nas dung de bus na/ sems can gang dag gis
dung de'i sgra thos pa'i skyes pa'am/ bud med dam/ khyi'u'am/ bu mo'am/ lha'am/ yi dwags sam/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa de dag thams cad bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhol
bar 'gyur zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang phrad nas chos thos te rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag sbyin pa la dga' ba dang / gang dag bsnyen gnas la
nye bar gnas pa dang / gang dag skyabs gsum nye bar gzung ba dang / gang dag tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa dang / gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pas yang dag par bsdams pa de

dag gis sgra de thos na/ de dag thams cad byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe de brjes ma thag tu 'jig
rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tsan+dan dkar po la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba'am/ dkor sa'am/ skye bo'i dbus sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang du
bdug par byas na/ gang dag de'i dri la bsnams pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par byang bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su rdzogs
pa rab tu 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/ /chos gos la rab tu bdugs nas lus la gyon na gang zag de'i sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad ma lus par rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /lus la bab pa
tsam gyis bag chags kyi dri ma dang / ser sna dang nyon mongs pa'i skyon thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro/ /gos la bdugs te bcangs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi
gos la rab tu bdugs te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na rgyal po dang / btsun mor bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/ /kun gyi mchod gnas chen por 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar 'gyur
ro/ /'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi dbus su zhugs na dge 'dun thams cad kyi mchod gnas chen por 'gyur ro/ /skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i nang du zhugs na nor dang / longs spyod chen po 'phel bar
'gyur zhing mchod gnas chen po'i 'os su yang 'gyur ro/ /tsan+dan gyi bdug pa'i cho ga'o/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rtog pa las pad+ma'i gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i snying po'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //
de nas khro bo'i rgyal ba me'i/ rtog pa rab tu bshad bya ste/ /don yod rgyal po rmad byung tshe/ /kun tu dngos grub thogs med cing / /dkyil 'khor kun tu dbang bskur bas/ /sdang ba thams cad rab tu

'joms/ /bdud dang bgegs dpung rnam par 'jig/ gnod sbyin srin sreg po gsang ba ba/ 'byung po thams cad rab tu 'bros/ /bsam pa thams cad rab rdzogs byed/ /oM b+h+r-i ku Ti daMSh+T+re a mo g+ha sa ma ye/
a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM sarba bid a mo g+ha ga a b+hi She ka hUM/ mi li mi li swA hA/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po'o/ /de nas sku gzugs kyi cho ga ni dngul la khro bo'i rgyal po sor bcu gnyis
kyi tshad tsam shin tu mdzes shing tshad dang ldan pa/ gdong gsum pa/ ral ba'i thor tshugs can/ rgyal ba 'od dpag tu med pas spyi bor brgyan pa/ zla ba tshes pa mgo la thogs pa/ gdong gsum gyi/
dang po khro pa/ g.yas cung zad 'dzum pa/ g.yon gad mo dgod pa/ lag pa bzhi pa/ g.yas dang po na pad+ma/ 'og ma na ral gri 'phyar ba/ g.yon dang po na zhags pa/ 'og ma mdud rtse gsum pa/ rgyan
thams cad kyis brgyan pa pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la rgyal po'i rol stangs kyis 'dug pa/ gcan gzan khro bo'i pags pas smad dkris pa'o/ /g.yas phyogs su ni lha mo sgrol ma ut+pa la thogs pa
rgyan thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'o/ /g.yon phyogs su ni lha mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo nor bu rin po che thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'o/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gi drung du
rig sngags 'chang pus mo btsugs pa lag na spos por thogs shing bgrang phreng 'dzin pa bcom ldan 'das la gyen du blta ba'o/ /yang na ni ri mor bri bar bya ste cho ga bzhin no/ /gzugs brnyan de
dag gi drung du ba'i lci bas byug pa byas la/ tsan+dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bya zhing gung gum gyis mchod yon bya ste/ me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor de'i steng
du khro bo'i rgyal po bzhugs su gsol te/ de'i drung du bzlas brjod stong phrag brgyad bya'o/ /de nas gzugs brnyan de 'gul zhing g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /rkang pas phan tshun du 'chag par 'gyur/ gzugs
las 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshig 'byin par 'gyur/ legs so zhes sgra 'byin par 'gyur/ lag pa g.yas pa rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur/ yid la bsams so cog thams cad
dang / mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bzlas brjod rdzogs pa'i mod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khro bo'i rgyal po rang gi mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa
tsam gyi mod la dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad kyang byed par 'gyur ro/ bklags pas las thams cad dang / dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /
grub pa thams cad ston par 'gyur ro/ /khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i zhags pa nas bzung ste/ bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas nas sngon chad bsags pa'i bsod nams dang / las kyi bgo bskal
thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /tshe'i mthar thug gi bar du dpal chen po thob pa dang / che ba nyams su myang bar 'gyur ro/ /gdong du bltas te bzlas brjod stong rtsa ba brgyas byas nas dbang
phyug chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma nas bzung ste bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /ral gri
nas bzung ste/ bzlas pa stong rtsa brgyad byas na nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /rtse gsum nas bzung ste/ stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas
na/ 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /rked pa nas bzung ste bzlas pa stong rtsa brgyad byas na sngon gyi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal
po dang btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur te/ bdag nyid ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nor rnams nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /cod pan la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ khro bo'i
rgyal po'i dbu la bcings na nges par dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tshom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/ /bzlas brjod dang / sgrub pa 'di dag gis ni 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug khro bo'i rgyal po'i gzugs kyis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du byon te/ ci dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal
po'i cho ga las byung ba rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta many+dzu shrI warma dang / lots+tsha ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/
AR+ya nI la kaN+Tha nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nI la kaN+Tha zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag nges par shes rab chen po'i mig thob par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag
nges par sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag nges par myur du thabs la mkhas pa thob par
gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag nges par myur du shes rab chen po'i grur zhugs par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag nges par myur du sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las rgal bar gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal
lo/ /bdag nges par rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan zhing lam myur du thob par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag nges par myur du mya ngan
las 'das pa'i ri la 'dzeg par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag nges par myur du 'dus ma byas kyi khyim du 'dug par gyur cig /
btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag nges par myur du chos kyi sku dang gcig par gyur cig /gang gi tshe bdag ral
gri'i ri la mchi ba na ral gri'i ri de rang snyil zhing zhig par gyur cig /gang gi tshe bdag me ma mur gyi nang du mchi ba na me ma mur de rang med par gyur cig /gang gi tshe bdag sems can dmyal
ba'i lam du mchi ba na sems can dmyal ba rnams rang bzhin gyis stongs par gyur cig /gang gi tshe bdag gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba na/ yi dwags rnams rang tshim par gyur cig /gang
gi tshe bdag lha ma yin gyi gnas su mchi ba na de dag gi sems rang dul bar gyur cig /gang gi tshe bdag dud 'gro rnams su mchi ba na de dag ye shes chen po rang thob par gyur cig /na mo rat+na tra

yA ya/ na mo AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sarba ban d+ha na/ ts+tshe da na kA rA ya/ sarba pA pa samu drots+tshoSha Na ka rA ya/ sarba byA d+hi pra sha ma na ka rA ya/ sarba i d+yu pa

dra ba/ bi nA sha na ka rA ya/ sarba b+ha ye Shu tA ra NA ya/ ta s+ya na ma skr-i twA/ i daM Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ ta ba nI la kaN+Tha/ nam bar ma hr-i da yaM/ A paR+ta yi Sh+yA mi/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha nan/ shu b+ha tse ta naM/ ya na/ sarba

b+hU tA nAM/ pA pa mArga bi sho d+ha kaM /tad+ya thA/ A lo ke/ A lo ka/ A lo ka/ a d+hi pa ti/ lo kA ti krAn te/ e h+ye hi mahA bo d+hi satwa/ he bo d+hi satwa/ he mahA bo d+hi satwa/ he mahA kA ru Ni ka/ mahA sma ra hr-i da

yaM e h+ye hi AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya pa ra ma mai tre tsit+ta kA ru Ni ka /ku ru ku ru/ karma sA d+ha ya/ sA d+ha ya/ bi d+yAn/ de hi de hi mo/ raM ga maM ga ma/ bi haM ga ma/ sid+d+hi yo gI shwa ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ bIR+yan te/ mahA bIR+yan te/

d+ha ra d+ha ra/ b+ha ren+d+re shwa ra/ tsa la tsa la/ bi ma la mUrte/ AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra/ kr-iSh+NA dzi na/ dza TA mu ku TA/ a yaM kr-i ta/ sha rI ra lam+ba/ pra lam+ba/ bi lam+ba/ mahA sid+d+ha bid+yA d+ha ra/ ba la ba la mahA ba la/ ma la ma la

mahA ma la/ tsa la tsa la mahA tsa la/ kr-iSh+Na bar+Na/ kr-iSh+Na pak+Sha kr-iSh+Na pA sha nir+b+hA ta na/ he pad+ma hA sta/ tsa ra tsa ra ni sh+tsa re shwa re kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ta yadz+nyo/ ba bI ta/ e h+ye hi mahA bI ra/ mahA bA rA ha mu kha tri pu ra da ha ne shwa ne shwa ra/ nA rA

ya Na/ rU pa ba la be ga d+ha ri/ he nI la kaN+Tha/ e h+ye hi mahA ha la ha la/ baM Sha nirdzi ta/ lo ka s+ya rA ga bi Sha bi nA sha na/ dwe Sha bi nA sha na/ mo ha bi Sha na/ nirmo k+Sha na Na hu lu hu lu/ mahA hu lu ha re/ mahA pad+ma

nA b+hi/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ bud+d+h+ya bud+d+h+ya/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bo d+ha ya/ bo d+ha yA mi ta ba nI la kaN+Tha/ e h+ye hi/ bA mas+thi d+ha mahA sid+ha mu kha/ ha sa ha sa/ muny+tsa muny+tsa mahA T+TA T+TA hAs+ya/ e h+ye hi mahA sid+d+ha/ yo gI shwa ra/ b+ha

Na b+ha na/ pA tsa na/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bid+h+yAM sma ra sma ra twam+b+ha ga khaM tan/ lo kA nu be lo ki tan/ ta thA ga tan/ da hi de hi me diR+shan kA ma s+ya/ daR+sha naM/ pra sAd+ha ya me swAhA/ sid+d+hA ya swAhA/ mahA sid+d+hA ya swAhA/ sid+d+hA yo gi shwa

rA ya swAhA/ nI la kaN+Tha ya swAhA/ bA rA ha mu khA ya swAhA/ si d+ha mu khA ya swAhA/ mahA na ra siM ha mu khA ya swAhA/ badzra ha stA ya swAhA/ mahA badzre hastA ya swAhA/ sid+d+hi bid+yA d+ha rA ya swAhA/ mA sid+d+hi bid+yA d+ha rA ya swAhA/ pad+ma hastA

ya swAhA/ mahA pad+ma hastA ya swAhA/ kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ha yadz+nyo d+ha ra bI tA ya swAhA/ mahA mA la mu ku Ta d+ha rA ya swAhA/ tsakrA yu d+ha d+ha rA ya swAhA/ shang+kha shab+da nir+N+Na da na ka rA ya swAhA/ bo d+ha na ka rA

ya swAhA/ bA ma s+thi ta skan+d+ha de sha kriSh+NA di nA ya swAhA/ byA g+h+ra tsarma ni bA sa nA ya swAhA/ lo ke shwa rA ya swAhA/ mahA yo gi nI shwa rA ya swAhA/ sarba sid d+he shwa rA ya swAhA/ rak+Sha rak+Sha ma swAhA/ ku ru rak+Sha mUrti nAM swAhA/
na ma AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sid d+h+yan tu me man+t+ra ba dai ni swAhA/ 'phags pa nI la kaN+Tha'i gzungs rdzogs so// //
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rtog pa las smon lam 'byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag
med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs
rje chen po dang ldan pa mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/ 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug
bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang / mtshan nas brjod pas bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa thams cad zhi zhing rgyun chad par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can
thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang gnod pa dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / mi dge ba'i chos dang /
bdud kyi las skyes pa thams cad byang zhing grol bar gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag
gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal rtag tu mthong zhing smon lam ji skad btab pa thams cad kyang
myur du thob par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang
mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'phags pa gang dag zhal mngon sum du lta zhing dam pa mchog gsol ba thams cad kyang de bzhin du grub par gyur cig /btsun pa
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod
pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi 'jig rten dag na phongs shing nyam thag pa thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bgyid pa la mthu chen po thob par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ 'jig rten dag na mu ge'i
dgon pa chen po dang / me dang / chu dang / rlung la sogs pa'i gnod pa gang dag byung bas skye bo mang po nyam thag pa de dag zhi ba dang / ma mchis par bgyid par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can
gang dag 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol tu 'chi 'pho ba'i 'jigs pa chen po nye bar gnas pa na yang / 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug khyod zhal mngon sum du mthong zhing dbugs 'byin pa
chen po mdzad par gyur cig /bdag dang sems can gzhan 'chi 'pho ba dag gis kyang nyon mongs pa dag gis ma spros pa chos bdag med pa dran pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi sems tshad med
par brtan pa/ sems ma zhum pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang ldan zhing / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad nye bar zhi zhing / dran pa nye bar gzhag bzhin du 'chi 'pho bar gyur cig /tshe rabs

thams cad du yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du skye zhing tshe rabs rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi phun sum tshogs pa dang / ldan pas/ 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang

phyug la sogs pa mnyes par bgyid cing / ji skad bstan pa bzhin du grub pa'i mthu dang ldan par gyur cig /ji ltar thugs rje'i dbang phyug des thugs rje chen po'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo lhun gyis grub pa
dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rje dang ro gcig par gyur cig /ji ltar thugs rje'i dbang phyug gis sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sangs
rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis kyang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par gyur cig /ji ltar dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi thugs rje'i
bdag nyid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyi mtshan nas brjod cing bsnyen bkur bgyis par
gyur cig /ji ltar dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyi thugs rje'i rang bzhin 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas
brjod cing mchod pa bgyis pas/ thugs rje chen po'i yul du gyur pa sems can thams cad la yang snying rje chen por thabs kyi sbyor ba rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung bar gyur cig /ji srid bdag ni
'khor ba'i tshe/ /de snyed bdag ni lus skyes par/ /de srid mgon po mchod bgyid cing / /de snyed lus sbyor tshogs bgyid shog /ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe/ /ji skad bdag gis ngag skyes par//
de srid mgon po'i mtshan brjod cing / /dag gi sbyor ba tshogs bgyid shog /ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba na/ /de snyed bdag gi yid 'byung ba/ /de snyed mgon po rjes dran zhing / /yid sbyor tshogs
par bgyid gyur cig /de ltar lus dang ngag yid kyis/ /thugs rje'i dbang phyug rten bgyis bas/ /lus dang ngag yid skyon bral zhing / /yon tan phun sum tshogs gyur cig /de ltar lus ngag
yid kyis su/ /thugs rje'i dbang phyug sku gsung thugs/ /rtag tu sbyor bar bgyis pas na/ /thugs rje'i dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs/ /srid gsum re ba'i gnas gcig po/ /yon tan bsam

gyis mi khyab pa/ /de 'drar bdag kyang grub gyur te/ /srid gsum re rdzogs bgyid gyur cig /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/

tad+ya thA/ oM tsakra brti/ tsin+tA ma Ni mahA pad+me ru ru tiSh+Tha/ dz+wa la A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT swAhA/ rtsa ba'i sngags rdzogs so/ /oM pad+me tsin+tA ma Ni dz+wa la hUM/ snying po'o/ /oM b+ha ra ta pad+me hUM/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM na Ni badzre Ni hUM/
gsang ba'i snying po'o/ /sngags snying bzhi 'byung ba dang / smon lam dang tshigs su bcad pa dang sngags su bcas pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du ma hA kA ru Ni ka nA ma AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra

d+hA ra NI a nu shaM sa sa hi ta sU trA ta saM gra hi ta/ bod skad du/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po'i gzungs phan yon mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri bo po Ta la spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas na byang chub sems dpa' grangs med
dpag tu med pa'i 'khor gyis bskor nas/ de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar zhing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /nga la 'di lta bu'i
gzungs yod ming ni thugs rje chen po zhes zer sems can kun gyi mi dge ba'i sdig pa shin tu lci ba'i sgrib pa bdud dang 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa 'dod pa thams cad rab tu tshim par byed
pa'i phyir ngas bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das la bshad pa'i gnang ba zhus nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu khyod kyis thugs rje chen po'i sgo nas gzungs bshad par 'dod pa'i dus la
bab bo/ /myur bar bshad du gsol/ /nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang rjes su yi rang ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma'am/ khye'u'am/ bu mos 'don pa dang 'chang bar 'dod
pas sems can thams cad kyi ched du thugs rje chen po'i sgo nas thog mar 'di lta bu'i sems bskyed par bya'o/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag
gis chos rnams thams cad myur du rtogs par shog /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis ye shes mig ni myur du thob par shog /spyan ras gzigs dbang
thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad myur du sgrol bar shog /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis thabs mkhas pa dag myur
du thob par shog /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gi myur du shes rab gru yis sgrol bar shog /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
bdag ni myur du sdug bsngal mtsho las 'da' bar shog /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ni myur du tshul khrims rkang gi lam thob shog /spyan ras
gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ni myur du mya ngan 'da' ba'i ri 'dzeg shog /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ni myur du 'dus ma byas kyi khyim
phyin shog /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ni myur du chos nyid sku dang mtshungs par shog /bdag ni ral gri'i ri 'dzeg na/ /ral gri'i ri ni rang snyil shog /bdag
ni chu tshan 'phrad gyur na/ /chu tshan me tshur rang zhir shog /sems can dmyal bar bdag song na/ /sems can dmyal ba rang skams shog /bdag ni yi dwags gnas song na/ /bkres skom dag ni
'grangs par shog /bdag ni lha min gnas song na/ /ngan sems rang nyid dul bar shog /bdag ni dud 'gro gnas song na/ /rang nyid shes rab che thob shog /de skad du smon lam btab nas sems
rtse gcig tu bdag gi ming nas 'don cing rjes su dran par bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang bdag gi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi mtshan 'don cing / de nas gzungs 'di lan cig gam lan
bdun gyi bar du bton na/ bskal pa 'bum phrag brgya stong ji snyed 'khor bar 'gyur pa'i kha na ma tho ba'i lci ba rnams bsal cing 'byang bar 'gyur lags so/ /gal te thugs rje chen po 'di 'don cing
'chang na 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams der gshegs nas phyag rkyong bar 'gyur bas bsams pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'dod pa de dang
der skye bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can gang la la zhig thugs rje chen po'i rig
sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gal te ngan song gsum po dag tu ltung bar gyur na bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya bar mi bgyi'o/ /thugs rje chen po'i rig
sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gal te ting nge 'dzin dang spobs pa tshad med pa ji snyed thob par ma gyur na bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o/ /
thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gal te tshe 'di nyid la smon pa thams cad ci ltar smon pa bzhin du grub par ma gyur na thugs rje chen po'i sems
kyi gzungs zhes mi bgyi lags te/ mi dge ba rnams dang sems rtse gcig tu ma bgyis pa ni ma gtogs lags so/ /bud med gang la la zhig bud med kyi lus las yongs su
skyo nas skyes pa'i lus thob par 'tshal ba gang lags pa des thugs rje chen po'i sems kyi gzungs kyi tshig 'di gdon cing yongs su gzung bas gal te bud med kyi lus las
yongs su gyur te skyes pa'i lus thob par ma gyur na bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o/ /the tshom gyi bsam pa cung zad cig bskyed par gyur na gdon
mi za bar gang smon pa'i 'bras bu de mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur lags so/ /de skad ces smras nas 'khor 'dus pa'i mdun du thal mo sbyar te/ drang por 'dug nas sems can rnams
la thugs rje chen po'i sems bskyed de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po'i sems rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs gya nom pa 'di dag smras

so/ /snying po ni/ oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/ gzungs ni/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba ban+d+ha na/ ts+tshe da na ka

rA ya/ sarba pA pa sa mu dra uts+tsho Sha Na ka rA ya/ sarba byA d+hi pra sha ma na ka rA ya/ sarba i t+yu ba dra ba bi nA sha na ka rA ya/ sarba b+ha ye Shu tra NA ya/ ta s+ya na ma skr-i twA i daM AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ta ba nI la

kaN+Tha nA ma hr-i da yaM/ A brta yi Sh+yA mi sarba ar+tha sA d+ha na/ shu b+ha tse ta na/ sarba satwA nAM/ pA pa mArga bi sho d+ha ka /tad+ya thA/ a ba lo ki lo ka ma ti/ lo ka ga ti/ e h+ye hi/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ he bo d+hi

satwa/ he ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ he pri ya bo d+hi satwa/ he kA ru Ni kA sma ra hr-i da yaM/ e h+ye hi/ AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra pa ra ma mai tri tsi t+ta kA ru Ni ka/ ku ru ku ru/ karmaM sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bi d+yAM de hi de hi me/

a raM ga maM ga ma/ bi haM ga ma hA sid+d+ha yo gI shwa ra/ du hu du hu/ bI ra yan+te/ ma hA bI ra yan+te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hA ra NI shwa ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ bi ma la a ma la/ mUrti AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra kr-iSh+Na
a dzi na/ dza TA ma ku Ta/ a laM kr-i ta sha rI ra/ a laM pa/ pra laM pa/ bi laM pa/ mahA sid+d+ha/ shud+d+ha d+ha ra/ ba la ba la/ mahA ba la/ mahA ma la mahA

ma la/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ mahA dz+wa la/ kr-iSh+Na pak+Sha kr-iSh+Na bar+Na/ kr-iSh+Na pA sha /ni r+g+hA ta na/ he pad+ma hasta/ dza ya ka ra ni shA tsa re shwa ra/ kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ta yadz+nyo pa bI ta/ e h+ye hi bA rA ha mu kha

tri pu ra da ha nI shwa ra nA rA ya Na pa la rU pa be Sha d+ha ri/ he nI la kaN+Tha/ he mahA ha lA ha ra/ bi Sha ni ra dzI ta lo ka s+ya/ rA ga bi Sha nA sha na/ dwe Sha bi Sha nA sha na/ mo ha bi Sha nA sha na/

ni ra mo k+Sha Na/ hu lu hu lu/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ mu hu lu mu hu lu/ hA la hA la/ mahA pad+ma nA b+hi/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ bud+d+h+ya/ bud+d+h+ya/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bo d+ha yA mi/ ta ba

nI la kaN+Tha/ e h+ye hi nI la kaN+Tha/ e h+ye hi bA maskri ta/ si d+ha mu kha/ sa ha sa ha/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ mahA aT+TA T+TA ha sa ni ra nA di ni/ e h+ye hi/ b+ho b+ho mahA sid+d+ha yo gI shwa ra/ ban d+ha ban

d+ha wa tsaM sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bid+yAM sna ra sma ra twAM/ he b+ha ga bA na/ lo ka bi lo ka s+t+waM/ ta thA ga tA dA dAM hi me daR+sha naM/ pra sA d+ha yA mi swAhA/ sid+d+hA ya swA hA/ ma hA sid+d+hA ya swA hA/ sid+d+hA yo gI

shwa rA ya swAhA/ nI la kaN+Thaya swA hA/ bA rA ha mu khA ya swA hA/ si d+ha mu khA ya swA hA/ ma hA na ra sid+d+ha mu khA ya swA hA/ sid+d+ha bid+yA b+ha rA ya swA hA/ pad+ma ha stA ya swA hA/ ma hA pad+ma ha stA ya

swAhA/ badzra hastA ya swA hA/ ma hA badzra ha stA ya swA hA/ kr-iSh+Na sa ra ya kr-i ta yadz+nyo pa bI tA ya swA hA/ mahA kA la mu yu Ta d+ha rA ya swA hA/ tsa kra A yu d+ha d+ha rA ya swA hA/ shi kha shab+d+ha ni ra nA da na ka rA ya swA hA/

bo d+ha na ka rA ya swA hA/ pA ma skan+d+ha de sha s+thi ta kr-iSh+Na a dzi nA ya swA hA/ bA ma ha ste byA g+h+ra tsa ra ma Ni bA sa nA ya swA hA/ lo ki shwa rA ya swA hA/ mahA lo ki shwa rA ya swA hA/ sarba sid+d+he shwa rA swA hA/ rak+Sha

rak+Sha mAM swA hA/ ku ru rak+Sha mUrtI nAM swA hA/ na mo b+ha ga wa te AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sid+d+h+ya n+tu me man+t+ra pa dA ni swA hA/ de nas byang chub
sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzungs 'di bstan zin nas/ gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gi ched du/ gnod pa dang bgegs yongs su bsal
ba'i phyir/ shin tu dang ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /gang zhig ri dang 'brog dgon song ba las/ stag dang spyang ki gcan gzan gtum po dang / /rtsangs pa sbrul dang
'dre srin phrad gyur kyang / /gzungs 'di 'don pa thos nas gnod mi nus/ /gang zhig chu bo rgya mtshor zhugs pa las/ /gdug pa'i klu dang chu srin ma rungs dang / /gnod sbyin
srin po nya dang ru sbal dag /gzungs 'di thos nas so sor 'byor bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig g.yul sprad dgra yis bskor ba'am/ /chom rkun ma rungs nor ni 'phrog pa'i tshe/ /
rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ /de dag brtse sems skyes nas ldog par 'gyur/ /gang zhig rgyal po'i gyod la
thogs pa dang / /lcags sgrog khong sgril btson rar chud pa'i tshe/ /rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ /rgyal po brtse sems kyis ni gtong bar 'gyur//
gang zhig byad stems dug ma'i khyim zhugs te/ /zas skom dug can gyis ni gsod pa'i tshe/ /rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ /dug ni zil dngar
zas skom nyid du 'gyur/ /bud med sbrum ma bu ni btsa' ba'i tshe/ /bdud kyis bgegs byas sdug bsngal mi bzod tshe/ /rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs
bzlas na/ /'dre gdon byer nas bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur/ /klu gdon gtum pos gdug pa'i dbugs btang bas/ /tsha ba'i nad kyis nyin nas 'chir nye tshe/ /rtse
gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ /rims nad bsal nas tshe ni ring bar 'gyur/ /klu gdon rgyu bas gtses te skrangs pa dang / /shu 'bras mi bzad rnag
khrag 'dzag pa'i tshe/ /rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ /mchil ma lan gsum byugs pas skrangs pa zhi/ /sems can rnyog pa mi dge spyod pas na/ /
byad stems sngags dang dgras ni gtsos pa'i tshe/ /rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ /byad ste mas gdon de gtong pa'i mi la 'dud/ /sdig 'phel snyigs ma
dam chos 'jig pa'i tshe/ /'dod pa'i me mched sems ni rmongs log pas/ /khyo shug so sor gzhan la 'dod zhen nas/ /nyin mtshan log bsam rgyun ni mi 'chad tshe/ /gang
zhig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ /'dod pa'i me zhi log pa'i sems bsal 'gyur/ /bdag gis gzungs 'di mthu stobs rgyas brjod na/ /bskal bar brjod kyang
mthar thug yid mi 'gyur/ /gal te thugs rje chen po'i gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa de dag chu klung dam rgya mtshor zhugs te khrus byas pa las/ de na gnas pa'i
sems can de dang de dag gi lus bkrus pa'i chus lus la reg par gyur na sdig pa'i las dang / kha na ma tho ba'i lci ba thams cad yongs su byang nas/ zhing yongs su dag
pa gzhan dag tu pad+ma la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur bas mngal dang / drod gsher dang / sgo nga las skyes pa'i lus len par mi 'gyur na/ kha don du 'don pa dang 'chang ba la lta
smos kyang ci dgos/ gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa de dag lam du zhugs nas 'gro ba'i tshe rlung chen po langs te gang zag de'i lus dang / spu dang skra dang / gos la
bus pa'i rlung gang yin pa de'i phyogs su song ba'i sems can gzhan gyi lus la reg par gyur na/ de dag gi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa'i las lci
ba thams cad ma lus par yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur bas yang ngan 'gro gsum po dag gi rnam par smin pa myong bar mi 'gyur zhing rtag par sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar skye bar
'gyur bas na 'don pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa de dag gis thos pa'i phan yon ni bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje
chen po'i gzungs phan yon dang bcas pa zhes bya ba mdo las btus pa rdzogs so// //dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/ /
